text.body:
6. anāgatavastugocaramavidyamānaviṣayaṃ; yathā—(śāku. 1.15)
'śāntamidamāśramapadaṃ sphurati ca' ||15 || ityādi (pṛ.1305)
tadetat ṣaḍvidhamapi svārthānumānam | parārthānumānaṃ śrāvaṇapramāṇaṣaṭke vakṣyāmaḥ |
(1.3 upamānānurāgaḥ —6)
avijñātasvarūpasya vastunaḥ sādharmyādibhirupadeśādisavyapekṣaiḥ sākṣātkaraṇa— mupamānam| uktaṃ ca— 'prasiddhasādharmyāt‌sādhyasādhanamupamānam' (nyāyasū. 1.1.6) | upamānamapi sādṛśyādasannikṛṣṭe 'rthe buddhiṃ janayatīti |
tadapi ṣọdhaiva 1. sādharmyopamānam, 2. vaidharmyopamānam, 3. mudropamānam, 4. śilpopamānam, 5. saṃjñopamānam, 6. abhinayopamānamiti |
saṃjñāsādharmyavaidharmyamudrāśilpābhinītibhiḥ |
brūte yad vastuno rūpamupamānaṃ taducyate || 16 ||
1. tatra sādharmyopamānaṃ yathā—(bārā. 1.40)
nirmālyaṃ nayanaśriyaḥ kuvalayaṃ, vaktrasya dāsaḥ śaśī, kāntiḥ prāvaraṇaṃ tanormadhumuco yasyāśca vācaḥ kila |
viṃśatyā racitāñjaliḥ karatalaistvāṃ yācate rāvaṇa— stvāṃ draṣṭuṃ janakātmajāṃ hṛdaya! he netrāṇi mitrīkuru || 17 ||
2. vaidharmyopamānaṃ yathā—(vikramo. 2.3)
ābharaṇasyābharaṇaṃ prasādhanavidheḥ prasādhanaviśeṣaḥ |
upamānasyāpi sakhe pratyupamānaṃ vapustasyāḥ || 18 ||
3. mudropamānaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 10.7)
sacakitamiva vismayākulābhiḥ śucisikatāsvatimānuṣāṇi tābhiḥ |
kṣitiṣu dadṛśire padāni jiṣṇorupahitaketurathāṅgalāñchanāni || 19 ||
4. śilpopamānaṃ yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.9)
līlāvadhūtapadmā prathayantī pakṣapātamadhikaṃ naḥ |
mānasamupaiti keyaṃ citragatā rājahaṃsīva || 20 ||
5. saṃjñopamānaṃ yathā—(vala. 617)
daṭṭhūṇa taṃ juvāṇaṃ pariaṇamajjhaṃmi poḍhamahilāe |
papphulladalaṃ kamalaṃ kareṇa muulāviyaṃ kissa || 21 ||
(dṛṣṭvā taṃ yuvānaṃ parijanamadhye prauḍhamahilayā |
praphulladalaṃ kamalaṃ kareṇa mukulāyitaṃ kasmāt ||)
6. abhinayopamānaṃ yathā—
vaïvivaraṇiggaadalo eraṃḍo sāhaï vva taruṇāṇaṃ |
ettha ghare haliavahū ed‍dahamettatthaṇī vasaï || 22 ||
(vṛtivivaranirgatadala eraṇḍaḥ sādhayatīva taruṇānām |
atra gṛhe hālikavadhūretāvanmātrastanī vasati ||)
tatra pratyakṣāgamāvevopamānamiti kāṇādakapiñjalapātañjalāḥ | tathāhi | yathā gaustathā gavaya iti, ayaṃ sa gosadṛśo gavaya iti | nātra gavānubhavopadeśasmaraṇagavaya— darśanānāmatiriktaṃ sphurati yatprasiddhe turīyaṃ pramāṇamaṅgīkurmaḥ |
yacca kaiściduktam — anena sadṛśī madīyā gaurityetadupamānaṃ, tadapi sādṛśyod‍bodhitasmṛtibījaprabhavagavānubhavasmaraṇato nātiricyate iti |
atrocyate | uktamevāsmābhiḥ | kiṃ taditi cedavijñātasvarūpasya vastunaḥ sādharmyādibhirupadeśādisavyapekṣaiḥ sākṣātkaraṇamupamānamiti | upadeśādayaḥ punarubhayajanyajñāne cakṣurādaya iva tatsahakāriṇaḥ, na tad‍vyapadeśahāriṇaḥ | tathā cendriyārthasannikarṣotpannatve 'pi ubhayajanyavyapadeśyapadena vyavacchinnam akṣapādapādaiḥ|
kiñcānyat; āstāmasthānikī mahatyeṣā kathā | parīkṣakāṇāṃ hi prāyeṇopamānameva pramāṇaṃ, pratyakṣādīni punarupamāyāmevāntarbhavanti | tathāhi | vyavahāropayogi pramāṇaṃ savikalpakajñānapūrvaṃ, savikalpakaṃ śābdam; śabdasya ca sambandhagrahaṇasamaye 'rtha— pratipādakam | taduttarakālaṃ tu tatsādṛśyena avabodhakatvāt kathaṃ na pratyakṣamupamānam | āha ca vindhyavāsī—'śabdasya sāmānyaṃ vācyam | tacca sādṛśyarūpam' iti | sāmānyaṃ ca pūrvavyaktyavacchinnamapūrvavyaktau pratīyamānam; taduktam 'sādṛśyam, taccopamānameva bhavati | pratyakṣasya copamānāntarbhāve prāgevānumānamupamānaṃ yathā tatheti vyapadeśāt ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ svārthānumāne liṅgamadhigataliṅgino 'dhigamahetuḥ | tadadhigamaśca pratyakṣādipūrvaka' iti | yathā tatheti ca vyapadeśāt parārthānumāne coktamanubhāṣyakāraiḥ 'tadāgamaḥ, pratijñā, hetuḥ, anumānaṃ, dṛṣṭāntaḥ, pratyakṣam, upamānam, upanaya' iti | śābdaṃ tu sākṣā ॰ ॰ ॰ pamānamevedaṃ tadityādivyapadeśāt | etenārthāpattisambhavābhāvā api tatprasiddhayaiva vyākhyātāḥ | tairhi te 'numānairantarbhāvitā' iti | aitihyaṃ tu śābdaviśeṣaṇa eva | tasmāt sarvaṃ pramāṇamupamānam |
yadyevamupamānamevāstu, kiṃ pratyakṣādibhiriti |
atrocyate— gatānugatikanyāyo 'vicāritaramaṇīyaḥ saṃsāravyavahāra iva vicāraṃ na kṣamate |
tathāhi—bhagavatā akṣapādena pramāṇaprameyāntarbhūtā api saṃśayādayaścaturdaśa pṛthaduktāḥ| nigrahasthānāntarbhāve 'pi hetvābhāsacchalatrayajātinigrahasthānānāṃ pṛthakprasthāna— mabhihitam | asiddhānaikāntikāntargatā api viruddhādayo hetvābhāsāḥ pañcahetūnupādāya catuṣṣaṭkeṇa triṃśatā ṣoḍaśakatrayeṇa ca dve sahastre dvātriṃśake iti varṇitāḥ |
evaṃ dharmakīrtināpi svabhāvānupalabdhiriti vak‍tavye svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ, kāryānupalabdhiḥ, kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ, vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ, svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhiḥ, kāryaviruddhopalabdhiḥ, kāraṇaviruddhopalabdhiḥ, viruddhavyāp‍topalābdhiḥ, viruddhakāraṇopalabdhiḥ, viruddhakāryopalabdhiḥ, kāraṇaviruddhakāryopalabdhirityekādaśānupalabdhayo vikalpitāḥ | loke 'pi dṛśyate brāhmaṇā āyātā vasiṣṭhaścāyāta iti | tadvadupamānāntargatatve 'pi pratyakṣādipramāṇavarṇanamiti |
(1.4 arthāpattyanurāgaḥ —6)
dṛṣṭaḥ śruto vānyathā nopapadyata ityarthāntaraparikalpanā arthāpattiḥ | sāpi ṣaṭpramāṇapūrvakatvāt ṣaṭprakārā dṛṣṭārthāpattiḥ 1. pratyakṣapūrvikā, 2. anumānapūrvikā, 3. upamānapūrvikā, 4. śabda(sambhava)pūrvikā, 5. arthāpattipūrvikā, 5. abhāvapūrvikā ceti | śrutārthāpattīstu śrāvaṇaṣaṭke vakṣyāmaḥ | sānumānataḥ sāmagrībhedād bhidyate | tathāhi— pakṣe vṛttiḥ, sapakṣavattva/vṛttiḥ vipakṣāvṛttirabādhitaviṣayatvamasatpratipakṣatvaṃ cānumānalakṣaṇam | arthāpattau pakṣadharmatvādyanapekṣastathānupapadyamāno 'rthaḥ svasiddhayarthamarthāntaraṃ kalpayati | tatra dṛṣṭārthāpattiḥ —
1. pratyakṣapūrvikā yathā—(māmā. 1.26)
'santāpasantatimahāvyasanāya tasyāmāsaktam' || 23 || (pṛ.1104) ityādi |
2. anūmānapūrvikā yathā—(māmā. 5.20)
'nādastāvad‌vikalakurarīkūjitasnigdhatāraścittākarṣī' || 24 ||(pṛ.1042)ityādi |
3. upamānapūrvikā yathā—
śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyacciraṃ kimabhidhānamasāvakarot tapaḥ |
taruṇi! yena tavādharapāṭalaṃ daśati bimbaphalaṃ śukaśābakaḥ || 25 ||
4. arthāpattipūrvikā yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.14)
sthitamurasi viśālaṃ padminīpatrametat kathayati na tathāntarmanmathotthāmavasthām |
atiśayaparitāpamlāpitābhyāṃ yathāsyāḥ stanayugapariṇāhaṃ maṇḍalābhyāṃ bravīti || 26 ||
5. sambhavapūrvikā yathā—
'janaḥ puṇyairyāyājjaladhijalabhāvam' || 27 || (pṛ.957) ityādi |
6. abhāvapūrvikā yathā—(gāsa. 4.18)
aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ cia vāṇīravaṇaṃmi cukkasaṃkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï pamhuṭṭhaṇihāṇaṭhāṇaṃ vva || 28 ||
(atha sā tatra tatraiva vānīravane cyutasaṅketā |
tava darśanaṃ vimārgate prasmṛtanidhānasthānamiva ||)
(1.5 sambhavānurāgaḥ —6)
sambhāvanājñānaṃ sambhavaḥ, so 'pi ṣaṭprakāra eva— 'sambhāvanā—saṃśaya—vitarka— prāyovāda—sampratyaya—pratyanusandhibhedāt' | tatra—
1. prabalakāraṇakalāpādarśanāt kāryotpattisampradhāraṇaṃ sambhāvanā, meghodayād vṛṣṭiriti |
yathā—
mā muddhapo ucchoḍaa bālāe imie harisasuaparillaṃ |
viṇiaṃpaṇadaṃsaṇakouhalaggahio hahio gahilli || 29 ||
2. samānānekadharmopapattervipratipatterupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaśca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ (nyāyasū. 1.1.23)— sthāṇurvā puruṣo vetyādi | yathā—(udāttarā. 2.12)
kiṃ rūpaṃ sphuṭameva sā śaśimukhī dhatte tadatyadbhataṃ māmutsāhayituṃ parāpakaraṇe cittaṃ nu kiṃ naḥ svasuḥ |
ityantarvikasad‌vitarkavidhuraṃ cetastathā jāyate svalpo 'pyeṣa mama prayāti purataḥ panthā yathā dīrghatām || 30 ||
॰ ॰ aṃśāvalambī pratyayaḥ sandehaḥ| ihāpi pākṣikī sambhāvanāstyeva | sā pravṛttihetuḥ | tathā hyaniścite 'pi pratibandhakābhāve sukhasādhanaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇameveti |
3. avijñātatattve 'rthe kāraṇopapattitastattvajñānārthamūho vitarkaḥ (nyāyasū. 1.1.40)—
'puruṣeṇānena bhavitavyami'ti | sa yathā—(vikra. 1.10)
asyāḥ sargavidhau prajāpatirabhūccandro nu kāntipradaḥ śrṛṅgāraikarasaḥ svayaṃ nu madano māso nu puṣpākaraḥ |
vedābhyāsajaḍaḥ kathaṃ sa viṣayavyāvṛttakautūhalo nirmātuṃ prabhavenmanoharamidaṃ rūpaṃ purāṇo muniḥ || 31 || ityādi
4. bahūnāmaikamukhyaḥ prāyovādaḥ— 'prāyeṇauśīnarāstakrapāyiṇa' iti | sa yathā—
hriyā sarvasyāsau harati viditāsmīti vadanaṃ dvayordṛṣṭvā ' 'lāpaṃ kalayati kathāmātmaviṣayām |
sakhīṣu smerāsu prakaṭayati vailakṣyamatulaṃ priyā prāyeṇāste hṛdayanihitātaṅkavidhurā || 32 || (rat‍nā. 3.4)
5. kāryārthaṃ pravartitasya yathoktāvāntaracihnadarśanaṃ sampratyayaḥ; yathaitad‍ghaṭṭadvāraṃ tathāgre nāgakanyakānagaramiti, sa yathā— (māmā. 4.9)
pramathya kravyādaṃ maraṇasamaye rakṣitavataḥ pariṣvaṅgaṃ labdhvā tava kathamivānyatra ramatām |
tathā ca vyāpāraḥ kamalanayanāyā nayanayo— stvayi vyaktaḥ snehastimita—ramaṇīyaściramabhūt || 33 ||
6. anyathāvyavasitapadārthatathātvadarśanāt prāgupalabdhe 'pi tadātvasambhāvanā pratyanusandhiḥ| yo 'pi kapolapāṇḍutādisūcitaḥ tasyāḥ smarābhiṣvaṅgaḥ, so 'pi tvannibandhana iti | sa yathā—
mā bhaiḥ śaśāṅka! mama śīdhuni nāsti rāhuḥ khe rohiṇī kathaya kātara! kiṃ bibheṣi |
prāyo vidagdhavanitānavasaṅgameṣu puṃsāṃ manaḥ pracalatīti kimatra citram || 34 ||
(1.6. abhāvānurāgaḥ —6)
pramāṇasap‍takavyāpārātītaprameyagrāhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvaḥ | sa tveko 'pi prameyopādhibhedād vibhidyamānaḥ ṣọdhā sambhavati—'prāgabhāvaḥ, pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ, itaretarābhāvo 'tyantābhāvaḥ, sambandhābhāvaḥ, sarvābhāva' iti | tatra
1. prāgabhāvaḥ—kṣīre dadhi nāstīti | sa yathā—(947)
jāva ṇa uṭṭhaṃti ccia thaṇaā se duddhagaṃdhiamuhīe |
tāva ccia dhudhukkāriāi maaṇeṇa aṃgāi || 35 ||
(yāvanna uttiṣṭhete stanakau dugdhagandhikamukhyāḥ |
tāvadeva thūthūkāritāni madanena aṅgāni ||)
2. pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ, kṣīraṃ dadhni nāstīti | sa yathā—
svasti sukhebhyaḥ samprati tilāñjalireṣa manmathakathāyāḥ |
tatā api māmativayasaṃ taraladṛśaḥ taralamīkṣante || 36 ||
3. itaretarābhāvaḥ, stambhaḥ kuḍyo na bhavatīti | sa yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.325)
na devakanyakā nāpi gandharvakulasambhavā |
tathā 'pyeṣā tapobhaṅgaṃ vidhātuṃ vedhaso 'pyalam ||37||
4. atyantābhāvaḥ, śaśaviṣāṇaṃ nāstīti | sa yathā—(gāsa. 3.12)
jaṃ jassa atthi/hoi sāraṃ taṃ so dei tti kiṃttha accariaṃ |
aṇahoṃtā aṃpi diṇṇaṃ dohaggaṃ taï savaṃttīṇaṃ || 38 ||
(yad yasyāsti/bhavati sāraṃ tad sa dadāti iti kimatrāścāryam |
abhavadapi dattaṃ | daurbhāgyaṃ tayā sapat‍nīnām ||)
5. sambandhābhāvaḥ, caitro gṛhe nāstīti | sa yathā—(śāku. 1.26)
mānuṣīṣu kathaṃ vā syādasya rūpasya sambhavaḥ |
na prabhātaralaṃ jyotirudeti vasudhātalāt || 39 ||
6. sarvābhāvaḥ, tasya nāmāpi nāstīti | ya yathā—
gāmā paesasesā ṇu raṇṇa sesā kuḍuṃgaparivāḍā |
dehā vi jīasesā pemmassa ṇa atthi sesaṃ vi || 40 ||
(grāmāḥ pradeśaśeṣāḥ sumaraṇaśeṣāḥ latāgṛhaparivāḍāḥ |
vayamapi jīvaśeṣāḥ premṇo nāsti śeṣamapi ||)
sambhavābhāvayoranumāne 'ntarbhāvo na ghaṭate, sāmānyāderabhāvāt | tathāhi— niścayātmakamanumānam, aniścayātmā sambhavaḥ; tathāpyavinābhāvena gatārthatvamiti cet tanna utpattikāle tasyāpi niścayātmakatvāt | abhāvastu nānumānasādṛśyamapi spṛśati |
taduktam— mayūro vṛkṣamāruhya kṛtva digavalokanam |
hantṛbhāvamabhāvena jñātvā nṛtyati nirbhayaḥ || 41 ||
sa handriyavyāpārabhāvabhāvitvena pratyakṣa iti cet, tatra, pratyakṣalakṣaṇasyāyogāt | tathāhi | indriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam, indriyārthaś‍ca vyāpārabhāvābhāvādau na ghaṭate | athāghaṭaṃ bhūtalamityatra viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ sannikarṣo bhaviṣyati' yathok‍tam—'saṃyogaḥ, saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ, saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyaḥ, samavāyaḥ, samavetasamavāyaḥ, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaśceti ṣọdhā sannikarṣaḥ | teṣu saṃyogād dravyagrahaṇaṃ; saṃyuk‍tasamavāyād guṇagrahaṇaṃ, saṃyuktasamavetasamavāyād guṇatvagrahaṇaṃ; samavāyācchabdagrahaṇaṃ; samavetasamavāyāt śabdatvagrahaṇaṃ; viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvād abhāvagrahaṇamiti | yadyapi dharmavikalpatyāga1 eva dharmāṇām, tathā 'pyanutpattimān vināśī prāgabhāvaḥ, utpattimānapyavināśī pradhvaṃsābhāvaḥ | tataśca yayaiva sāmagryā bhāvabhūtaṃ bhūtalamupalabhyate na tayā tad‌viśeṣaṇamabhāva iti | na cāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhiḥ pravartate ityato 'bhāvagrāhakaṃ pramāṇāntaramabhyupagantavyam | sa ca pramāṇasap‍takavyāpārātīta (viṣa) yagrāhako 'bhāva eveti | tānyetāni pratyakṣānumānopamānārthāpattisambhavābhāvasamākhyāni darśanāntare ṣaṭ pramāṇāni pratipāditāni |
(2. śrutyālambanānurāgaḥ)
atha śravaṇataḥ śabdaitihyaśrutānumānādi pramāṇaṣaṭkaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ |
tatra śābdaḥ śabdavijñānādasannikṛṣṭe 'rthe jñānaṃ śābdam |
tad dvividham aupadeśikaṃ vidhiś‍ca |
(2.1 aupadeśikam —6)
tatra upadeśaḥ ṣọdhā 1. vidhivādaḥ, 2. arthavādaḥ, 3. saṃjñāvādaḥ, 4. svarupavādaḥ, 5. mantravādaḥ, 6. anuvāda iti | tatra—
(1. vidhivādaḥ —4)
pravṛttinivṛttyorvidhāyako vidhiḥ | sa caturdhā— utpattividhiḥ, viniyogavidhiḥ, prayogavidhiḥ, adhikāravidhiśceti |
taduktam—
utpattiviniyogākhyaprayogādhikriyārthakaḥ |
eko vidhistatparato vibhedena vibhidyate || 42 ||
NOTES pg=1207! 1. 'dharmavikalpatvādata eva dharmāṇām........tathapya' iti rā. HOS | jopāṭhastvādṛtaḥ |
1. tatrājñārūpa—svarūpajñāpanāpara utpattividhiḥ | yathā—(māmā. 2.10)
tata udayagirerivaika eṣaḥ sphuritaguṇadyutisundaraḥ kalāvān |
iha jagati mahotsavasya heturnayanavatāmudiyāya bālacandraḥ || 43 ||
2. śeṣabhāvena karmādīnāṃ viniyojanāparo viniyogavidhiḥ | yathā—(māmā. 2.11)
asau vidyādhāraśśiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanā— dihāyātaḥ sampratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 44 ||
yatra liṅgato vini(yogavidhiḥ) yathā 'varhirdevasadanaṃ dāmi' iti liṅgādanena mantreṇa barhīṃṣi lunīyāḥ iti |
3. karmānuṣṭhānaparaḥ prayogavidhiḥ | yathā—(māmā. 6.15)
puraścakṣūrāgastadanu manaso manyuparatā tanurjyāniryasya tvayi samabhavad yatra ca tava |
yuvā so 'yaṃ preyāniha suvadane! muñca jaḍatāṃ vidhāturvaidagdhyaṃ vilasatu sakāmo 'stu madanaḥ || 45 ||
4. niyojyaviśeṣapratipādanāparo 'dhikāravidhiryathā—(māmā. 1.19)
śarajjyotsnākāraṃ/kāntaṃ kumudamiva taṃ nandayatu sā sujātaṃ kalyāṇī bhavatu kṛtakṛtyaḥ sa ca yuvā |
varīyānanyonya—praguṇa—guṇa—nirmāṇa—nipuṇo vidhāturvyāpāraḥ phalatu ca manojñaśca bhavatu || 46 ||
adhikṛtasya kartṛtve, karturadhikāre vā prayogavidhereva prādhānyam |
taduktam— (tavā. 3.1.13)
abhidhātrī śrutiḥ kācid viniyoktryaparā matā |
vidhātrī ca tṛtīyā sā prayogo yannibandhanaḥ || 47 ||
sa vidhirloṭtavyādipratyayābhidheyaḥ puruṣamiṣṭābhyupāyāvacchinnāyāṃ bhāvanā— yāmapravṛttaṃ pravartayati, pravṛttaṃ rāgato (nivarttayati) |
(2. arthavādaḥ —4)
arthavādaḥ caturdhā stutiḥ, nindā, purākalpaḥ, parā/rakṛtiriti | tatra—
1. vidyamānāvidyamānaguṇasaṅkīrtanaṃ stutiḥ | yathā—(raghu. 6.22)
kāmaṃ nṛpāḥ santu sahastraśo 'nye rājanvatīmāhuranena bhūmim |
nakṣatratārāgrahasaṅkulā 'pi jyotiṣmatī candramasaiva rātriḥ || 48 ||
2. doṣaprakāśanaṃ nindā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.72)
'vapurvirūpākṣam' || 49 || (pṛ.1243) ityādi
3. evaṃ purā 'bhūditi purākalpaḥ | yathā—
'apetavyāhāram' || 50 || (saka. 5.277) (pṛ.1266) ityādi
4. vyāhatasya pravādaḥ ॰ ॰ ॰ parā / kṛtiryathā—(kusaṃ. 5.69)
ayuktarūpaṃ kimataḥ paraṃ bhavet trinetravakṣassulabhaṃ tavāpi yat |
stanadvaye 'smin haricandanāspade padaṃ citābhasmarajaḥ kariṣyati || 51 ||
sa cāyamarthaprakāro 'rthavādaḥ prarocanayā puruṣamapravartamānaṃ stutipurākalpābhyāṃ pravartayati | rāgataḥ pravṛttaṃ nindāparā/kṛtibhyāṃ nivartayati |
(3. saṃjñāvādaḥ —4)
karmavyatihārahetuḥ saṃjñā | sāpi caturdhā—ānvārthikī, pāribhāṣikī, naimittikī, yādṛcchikī ceti | tatra
1. saṃjñārthamanugatā ' 'nvarthikī yathā—(raghu. 6.21)
asau śaraṇyaḥ śaraṇāgatānāṃ agādhasattvo magadhapratiṣṭhaḥ |
rājā prajārañjanalabdhavarṇaḥ parantapo nāma yathārthanāmā || 52 ||
2. anapekṣitasaṃjñārthā pāribhāṣikī yathā—(raghu. 6.41)
tasyānvaye bhūpatireṣa jātaḥ pratī / dīpa ityāgamavṛddhasevī |
yena śriyaḥ saṃśrayadoṣarūḍhaṃ svabhāvaloletyayaśaḥ pramṛṣṭam || 53 ||
3. nimittasavyapekṣā naimittikī yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.26)
'tāṃ pārvatītyābhijanena nāmnā' ||54|| ityādi
4. avidyamānavyutpattiryādṛcchikī, yathā—(mavīca. 1.20)
lāṅgalollikhyamānāyā yajñabhūmeḥ samudgatā |
sīteyamūrmileyaṃ tu dvitīyā janakātmajā || 55 ||
sā tu caturvidhāpi vidhiniṣedhārthamarthavādānuvādau vidhatte |
(4. svarūpavidhiḥ —4)
mitho vivekahetuḥ svarūpavidhiḥ | so 'pi caturdhā—'jātiḥ, guṇaḥ, kriyā, dravyami'ti | tatra—
1. sāmānyābhidhāyinī jātiḥ; yathā—
rateriva nidhānāni rat‍nānāmiva rāśayaḥ |
amṛtasyeva kuṇḍāni yoṣitaḥ kena nirmitāḥ || 56 ||
2. āśrito / āśraya viśeṣaṇaṃ ca guṇaḥ, yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.11)
badhnannaṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvan manasi nirvṛtim |
netre cāmīlayanneṣa priyāsparśaḥ pravartate || 57 ||
3. manaśśarīraparispandaḥ kriyā, yathā—
śiñjānamaññumañjīrakāñcīsañcāracāravaḥ |
ramayanti manaḥkāntā nitāntaṃ yogināmapi || 58 ||
4. viśeṣābhidhāyi dravyaṃ yathā—(śāku. 1.18)
'sarasijamanuviddhaṃ śaivalenāpi ramyam' || 59 || (pṛ.883) ityādi
taccatuḥprabhedamapi vidhyanurodhena hānopādānabuddhimupakalpayati |
(5. mantravādaḥ —4)
manastrāṇa/mananāt trāṇa—dharmāṇaḥ śabdadevatātmāno mantrāḥ; te 'pi caturdhā— vaidikāḥ, paurāṇikāḥ, saiddhāntikāḥ, laukikāśca | tatra
1. vedopanibaddhā vaidikāḥ | yathā—(ṛve. 10.85.41)
somo 'dadadgandharvāya gandharvo 'dadadagnaye |
rayiṃ ca putrāṁścādadagnirmahyamatho imām || 60 ||
2. purāṇopanibaddhāḥ paurāṇikāḥ| yathā—
śriyā viyujyate nātha na kadācid yathā bhavān |
tathā kalatrasambandho deva! mā me viyujyatām || 61 ||
3. siddhāntopanibaddhāḥ saiddhāntikāḥ| yathā—(durgāsaśa. 11.585)
sarvamaṅgalamāṅgalye śive sarvārthasādhani |
śaraṇye vatsale gauri nārāyaṇi namo 'stu te || 62 ||
4. loke viditāḥ laukikāḥ| yathā—(visā. 1.3)
'gonāsāya niyojitāgadarajāḥ' || 63 || (pṛ.586) ityādi
(6. anuvādaḥ —4)
te caturvidhā api karmāṇi prakāśayanto rakṣanti |
vidhivihitasyānuvacanamanuvādaḥ,
sa vidhyarthaḥ, niṣedhārthaḥ, stutyarthaḥ, nindārthaśca |
adravyaṃ hi vidhatte, niṣedhati, stauti, nindati vā; tatra—
1. vidhyartho yathā—(raghu. 6.65)
indīvaraśyāmatanurnṛpo 'sau tvaṃ rocanāgauraśarīrayaṣṭiḥ |
anyonyaśobhāparivṛddhaye vāṃ yogastaḍittoyadayorivāstu || 64 ||
2. niṣedhārtho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.65)
athāha varṇī vidito maheśvarastadarthinī tvaṃ pura eva vartase |
amaṅgalābhyāsaratiṃ vicintya taṃ tavānuvṛttiṃ na tu kartumutsahe || 65 ||
3. stutyartho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.75)
'uvāca cainaṃ paramārthato haraṃ na votsi' || 66 || ityādi
4. nindārtho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.66)
avastunirbandhapare! kathaṃ nu te karo 'yamānuktavivāhakautukaḥ |
kareṇa śambhorvalayīkṛtāhinā sahiṣyate tatprathamāvalambanam || 67 ||
so 'yamupadeśaścaturviśatividho 'pi vidhirityucyamānaḥ—
sākṣād, vikalpena, samuc‍cayena vidadhāti, nañā, niyamena, parisaṅkhyayā ca niṣedhati |
yathocyate—(tavā. 1.2.42)
vidhiratyantamaprāp‍tau niyamaḥ pākṣike sati |
tatra cānyatra ca prāp‍tau vikalpo niyame sati ||
samuc‍cayo 'samāveśe parisaṅkhyāvikalpayoḥ || 68 || tatra
(vidhānam)
sākṣād vidhānaṃ yathā—(raghu. 6.57)
anena sārdhaṃ viharāmburāśestīreṣu tālīvanamarmareṣu |
dvīpāntarānītalavaṅgapuṣpairapākṛtasvedalavā marudbhiḥ || 69 ||
vikalpavidhānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 2.60)
ubhe eva kṣame vọdhumubhayorvīryamāhitam |
sā vā śambhostadīyā vā mūrtirjalamayī mama || 70 ||
samuc‍cayavidhānaṃ yathā—(śāku. 3.17)
parigrahabahutve 'pi dve pratiṣṭhe kulasya me |
samudraraśanā corvī sakhī ca yuvayoriyam || 71 ||
(niṣedhaḥ)
nañādiniṣedho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.73)
nivartayāsmādasadīpsitānmanaḥ k‍va tadvidhastvaṃ k‍va ca puṇyalakṣaṇā |
apekṣyate sādhujanena vaidikī śmaśānaśūlasya na yūpasatkriyā || 72 ||
niyamamiṣedho yathā—(māmā. 1.39)
'jagati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ' || 73 || ityādi
parisaṅkhyāniṣedho yathā—(vikra. 3.11)
ayaṃ tasyā rathakṣobhādaṃsenāṃso nipīḍitaḥ |
ekaḥ kṛtī śarīre 'smin śeṣamaṅgaṃ bhuvo bharaḥ || 74 ||
(2.2 vidhiḥ)
vidhiśca vidhirūpo niṣedharūpo vā prayojakāprayojakatayā dvirūpaḥ |
tatra ca sādhāraṇe karmaṇyekasya prādhānyena hetutvaṃ prayojakatā | sa—
1. vidhirūpo yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.255)
tvadapāṅgāhvayaṃ jaitramanaṅgāstravadaṅgane !
kṣip‍taṃ tvayānyatastena so 'pyahaṃ manasi kṣataḥ || 75 ||
2. niṣedharūpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.54)
asahyahuṅkāranivartitaḥ purā purārimaprāp‍tamukhaḥ śilīmukhaḥ |
imāṃ hṛdi vyāyatapātamakṣiṇod viśīrṇamūrterapi puṣpadhanvanaḥ || 76 ||
(vidhirūpaḥ —6)
vidhiṣu ca prayogavidheḥ prayojakatvamitareṣāṃ tu trayāṇāmaprayojakatvam |
tatrotpattividhyapekṣitabhedapratipādakāni śabdāntarādīni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni |
(1. utpattividhipramāṇāni —6)
śabdāntaram, abhyāsaḥ, saṃjñā, saṅkhyā, guṇaḥ, prakaraṇamiti |
svarūpaparo hi vidhirbhinatti karmeti | tatra —
1. śabdāntarabhedo yathā—
baṃdaṃ kīrāṇa ṇahe pahiāṇa pahe maāṇa chettammi |
tuha kalamagovi chīkā—rava—raṇiaṃ ṇa calaï paaṃ pi || 77 ||
(bṛndaṃ kīrāṇāṃ nabhasi pathikānāṃ pathi mṛgāṇāṃ kṣetre |
tava kalamagopi! stokāravareṭitaṃ na calati padamapi ||)
tatra nabhasi kṣetre caikameva bṛndamiti prāp‍te kīrapathikamṛgaśabdāntarebhyo bhedaḥ |
2. abhyāsād bhedo yathā—(gāsa. 1.81)
adaṃsaṇeṇa pemmaṃ avei aïdaṃsaṇeṇa vi avei |
pisuṇajaṇajappieṇa vi avei emea vi avei || 78 ||
(adarśanena premāpaityatidarśanenāpyapaiti |
piśunajanajalpitenāpyapaityevamevāpyapaiti ||)
atrādarśanādibhiḥ premāpaitīti vācye apaitīti padābhyāsaḥ premabhedaṃ bodhayati | kasyāciddarśanena, kasyacidadarśanena, kasyacitpiśunajanajalpitena, kasyacidevameveti |
3. saṃjñābhedo yathā—(raghu. 11.53)
maithilīmudavahad raghūd‍vaho lakṣmaṇo lalitavācamūrmilām |
yau tayoravarajau varaujasau tau kuśadhvajasute sumadhyame || 79 ||1
atra raghūdvahatvamaithilītvābhyāṃ bhede prāp‍te lakṣmaṇa ūrmilāmudavahaditi saṃjñāto bhedaḥ |
4. saṅkhyāto bhedo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.71)
dvayaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāṃ samāgamaprārthanayā kapālinaḥ |
kalā ca sā kāntimatī kalāvata— stvamasya lokasya ca netrakaumudī || 80 ||
NOTES pg=1213! 1. maithilī = pārthivī, lalitavācamū = tadanujāmatho iti pāṭhāntarāṇi |
atra kapālisamāgamaprārthanayā bhede prāp‍te dvayamiti saṅkhyāto bhedaḥ |
5. guṇād bhedo yathā—(raghu. 6.60)
pāṇḍayo 'yamaṃsārpitalambahāraḥ klṛp‍tāṅgarāgo haricandanena |
ābhāti bālātaparaktasānuḥ sanirjharodgāra ivādrirājaḥ || 81 ||
atra pāṇḍayo 'yamityukte 'nekarājanyasamānābhihārānna jñāyate ko 'sāviti |
aṃsārpitalambahāratvādibhedaka—viśeṣaguṇayogāttu bhidyate |
6. prakaraṇāntarād bhedo yathā—(raghu. 6.85)
śaśinamupagateyaṃ kaumudī meghamuktaṃ jalanidhimanurūpaṃ jahnukanyāvatīrṇā |
iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vivavruḥ || 82 ||
atreyamiti sarvanāmapadaprayogāt na jñāyate kā sā iti | abhede prāp‍te svayaṃvaraprastāvādindumatīti prakaraṇāntarād bhedaḥ |
evametad‍bhedakaṃ pramāṇāntarato vivekaheturbhedaḥ | sa tu kriyārthopādhibhedāt kārakabhedādvā bhavati | nātra kanīyānapi viśeṣaḥ | yoṣāñca kārye 'rthe ve(bhe)dasya prāmāṇyaṃ teṣāṃ mate sāndhyaṃ kriyā na bhinattīti1 | siddhe ca bhede pradhānāṅgabhāvavivakṣā |
(2. viniyogavidhipramāṇāni —6)
tatra viniyogāvidhyapekṣitaśeṣabhāvapratipādakāni śrutiliṅgādīni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni— śrutiḥ, liṅgaṃ, vākyaṃ, prakaraṇaṃ, sthānaṃ, samākhyeti |
paropakārabhāvo hi śeṣaḥ | sa —
1. śrutito yathā—(raghu. 6.35)
anena yūnā saha pārthivena rambhoru! kac‍cinmanaso ruciste |
śiprātaraṅgānilakampitāsu vihartumudyānaparamparāsu || 83 ||
atrānenetyāditṛtīyāśrutyā pārthivasyāṅgabhāvaḥ pratipādyate | tṛtīyā hi ṣaṣṭhīvadapradhānādeva | NOTES pg=1214! 1. atra jo. rā. 'vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ teṣāṃ mate......mabhinandatīti'—paṭhataḥ |
2. liṅgato yathā—(māmā. 2.11)
asau vidyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanā— dihāyātaḥ sampratyavikalaśarac‍candramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 84 ||
atra saubhāgyasūcakābhigāmikasamastavaraguṇābhidhāyipadaprayogaliṅgabhāvitvasyā— bhiprāyavinivartane niyogaḥ |1
4. prakaraṇato yathā—(raghu. 6.51)
adhyāsya cāmbhaḥpṛṣatokṣitāni śaileyanaddhāni śilātalāni |
kalāpināṃ prāvṛṣi paśya nṛttaṃ kāntāsu govardhanakandarāsu || 85 ||
atra kalāpinṛttadarśanādikaṃ kimanyopakārakam, utendumatīyauvanaśrīnirve— śopakārakamiti sandehe prakaraṇāduttaraḥ pakṣaḥ | idaṃ hi 'sambhāvya bhartāramamuṃ yuvānami'ti (raghu. 6.50) prakaraṇe paṭhyate |
5. sthānato yathā—(raghu. 6.78)
asau kumārastamajo 'nujātaḥ triviṣṭapasyeva patiṃ jayantaḥ |
gurvīṃ dhuraṃ yo bhuvanasya pitrā dhuryeṇa 2samyaksad‍ṛśīṃ bibharti || 86 ||
atra rājyadhurodvahanādisādṛśyāt pitṛsannidhau śrūyamāṇasya sthānatastadgaura— vābhyupapattiḥ |
6. samākhyāto yathā—
sac‍caṃ saṇṇā dhaṇṇā jā taïā kesaveṇa giridharaṇe |
gurubhāravāvaḍeṇa vi tiriaṃ acchaṃ ciraṃ daṭṭhā || 87 ||
(satyaṃ saṃjñā dhanyā yā tadā keśavena giridharaṇe |
gurubhāravyāpṛtenāpi tiryagakṣaṃ ciraṃ d‍ṛṣṭā ||)
atra dhanyeti samākhyābalāt sadaiva tasyāḥ priyaprasādapātratva eva viniyogaḥ | evametatpradhānaviśeṣabhāvād viniyojakaṃ pramāṇaṣaṭkam |
atrāpi karmaṇaḥ kārakasya vā śeṣabhāva iti samānaṃ pūrveṇa | NOTES pg=1215! 1. atra kramaprāp‍taṃ vākyanirūpaṇaṃ 3252 mātrikāyāṃ nopalabhyate | 2. samyak=damyaḥ
(3. prayogavidhipramāṇāni —6)
avagate ca pradhānāṅgabhāve kramāpekṣā | tatra prayogavidhyapekṣitapratipādakāni śrutyarthādīni ṣaṭ pramāṇāni śrutiḥ, arthaḥ, pāṭhaḥ, sthānaṃ, mukhyaṃ, prāvṛttikamiti |
paurvāparyeṇānuṣṭhānaṃ kramaḥ | sa
1. śrauto yathā—(raghu. 6.50)
sambhāvya bhartāramamuṃ yuvānaṃ mṛdupravālottarapuṣpaśayye |
bṛndāvane caitrarathādanūne nirviśyatāṃ sundari yauvanaśrīḥ || 88 ||
atra sambhāvyeti pūrvakāle ktvāśruteḥ śrautaḥ kramaḥ |
2. ārtho yathā—(gāsa. 4.27)
īsaṃ jaṇeṃti dāveṃti vammahaṃ vippiaṃ sahāvaṃti |
virahe ṇa deṃti mariuṃ aho guṇā tassa bahumaggā || 89 ||
(īrṣyāṃ janayanti darśayanti/vardhayanti manmathaṃ vipriyaṃ sāhayanti |
virahe na dadati martumaho guṇāstasya bahumārgāḥ ||)
atra pūrvaṃ manmathavṛddhistata īrṣyā, prāṅ‍maraṇābhāvaḥ, tato vipriya— sahiṣṇutvamityārthaḥ kramaḥ, yathā 'ag‍nihotraṃ juhoti', 'yavāgūṃ pacati' iti |
3. pāṭhakramo yathā—(raghu. 6.63)
anena kalyāṇi! kare gṛhīte mahākulīnena mahīva gurvī |
rat‍nānuviddhārṇavamekhalāyā diśassapat‍nī bhava dakṣiṇāyāḥ || 90 ||
atra pṛthvīsāmānyād dakṣiṇāsādharmyāc‍ca pūrvaṃ patitvaṃ paścātkaragrahaṇamityarthe prāp‍te pāṭhasāmarthyāt pūrvaṃ karagrahaṇaṃ tataḥ patitvamiti kramaḥ |
4. sthānakramo yathā—(gāsa. 3.62)
sā tuha kaeṇa bālaa ṇic‍caṃ ghara—dāra—toraṇa—ṇisaṇṇā |
osūsaï vaṃdaṇamālia vva diaha c‍cia varāī || 91 ||
(sā tava kṛtena bālaka! nityaṃ gṛhadvāratoraṇaniṣaṇṇā |
avaśuṣyati vandanamālikeva divasa eva varākī ||)
atra gṛhadvāratoraṇaniṣaṇṇatvena vandanamālāsannidheḥ dine dine sāpi śuṣyati kṛśāyate raṇaraṇāyate ceti kramaḥ |
5. mukhyakramo yathā—(gāsa. 3.44)
vevira—siṇṇa—karaṃguli—pariggaha—kkhalia—lehaṇīmagge |
sotthi c‍cia ṇa samappaï piasahi lehaṃmi kiṃ lihimo || 92 ||
(vepanaśīlasvinnakārāṅguliparigrahaskhalitalekhanīmārge |
svastyeva na samāpyate priyasakhi! lekhe kiṃ likhāmaḥ ||)
atra svastiśabdasya māṅgalikatvena mukhyatvāllekhe prāṅniveśastato vyavahitasthānanām‍noratha pratiyogino 'nantaramakṣarasya, tataḥ sandeśasyeti kramaḥ |
6. prāvṛttikakramo yathā—(gāsa. 5.25)
paḍhamaṃ vāmaṇavihiṇā pacchā hu kao viaṃbhamāṇeṇa |
thaṇajualeṇa imīe mahumahaṇeṇa vva balibaṃdho || 93 ||
(prathamaṃ vāmanavidhinā paścāt khalu kṛto vijṛmbhamāṇena |
stanayugalenaitasyāḥ madhumathaneneva balibandhaḥ ||)
atra trivikramapravṛttāvapi stanapravṛttāvapi (ca) prāg vāmanatvaṃ, tato vijṛmbhaṇaṃ, paścād balibandha iti kramaḥ | siddheṣu ca bhedāṅgāṅgibhāvakrameṣu śabdānāmanekārthatvena kadācid yaugapadyenārthānāmanuṣṭheyatvādiprāp‍tau tadarthaṃ nirdhāraṇāpekṣā |
(4. adhikāravidhipramāṇāni —6)
tatrādhikāravidhyapekṣitāni samastānekārthaśabdasādhāraṇādyarthaprakaraṇādīni ṣaṭprakārāṇi— 'arthaḥ, prakaraṇaṃ, liṅgam, aucityaṃ, deśaḥ, kāla' iti | nirdhāraṇaṃ vibhāgataḥ pṛthakkaraṇam | tad—
1. arthato yathā—(saka. 4.230)
gatirveṇī ca nāgena vapurūrū ca rambhayā |
pāṇī pravālairoṣṭhau ca tasyāstulyatvamāyayuḥ || 94 ||
atra gatirgajasadṛśī, veṇī sarpasadṛśī, vapuḥ surastrīsadṛśaṃ, ūrū kadalīsadṛśau, pāṇī pallavopamau, oṣṭhau vidrumopamāviti arthato 'nekārthaśabdārthavibhāgaḥ |
2. prakaraṇād yathā—
lacchīe muddhakuvalaadalujjalā jalahi—mahaṇa—viramammi |
diṭṭhī jaaï saaṃvaramāla vva harimmi ṇivaḍaṃtī || 95 ||
(lakṣmyā mugdhakuvalayadalojjvalā jaladhimathanavirame |
dṛṣṭirjayati svayaṃvaramāleva harau nipatantī ||)
atra lakṣmīsvayaṃvaraṇaprakaraṇato hariśabdena viṣṇurucyate |
3. liṅgato yathā—
kalaholujjalagoraṃ kalahoasiāsu saraarāīsu |
cuṃbaṃti ad‍dhaacchaṃ viatta/ddha—juaīmuhaṃ dhaṇṇā || 96 ||
(kaladhautoj‍jalagauraṃ kaladhautasitāsu śarad‍rātriṣu |
cumbanti ardhakṣaṃ vidagdha/vivṛtayuvatīmukhaṃ dhanyāḥ ||)
atra gaurasitaśabdābhyāṃ kaladhautaśabdasya svarṇaraupyavācakatvena yathākramaṃ yuvatimukhaśarad‌vibhāvaryorupamānavibhāgaḥ |
4. aucityato yathā—(raghu. 6.83)
sā cūrṇagauraṃ raghunandanasya dhātrīkarābhyāṃ karabhopamorūḥ |
āsañjayāmāsa yathāpradeśaṃ kaṇṭhe guṇaṃ mūrtamivānurāgam || 97 ||
atrāṅganārūpamaucityāt | karabhaśabdena dhanuḥkoṭyagrabhāgo vidhīyate, noṣṭrāvayava iti |
5. deśato yathā—
paümappahaṃ diaṃ kaṃ maacchi puṃḍariapuṃḍarīeṇa |
karasaṃdhieṇa maggasi puṃḍarīasamāule raṇṇe || 98 ||
(padmaprabhaṃ dvijaṃ kaṃ mṛgākṣi! puṇḍarīkapuṇḍarīkeṇa |
karasaṃhitena mārgayasi puṇḍarīkasamākule araṇye ||)
atra deśataḥ puṇḍarīkaśabdo 'raṇyaviśeṣaṇe vyāghramāha, karasthāne padmamātapatrasthāne chatramiti vibhāgaḥ |
6. kālato yathā—(gāsa. 1.64)
uari—dara—diṭṭha—khaṇṇua—ṇilīṇa—pārāvaāṇaṃ viruehiṃ |
ṇitthaṇaï jāaviaṇaṃ sulāhiṇṇaṃ va devaülaṃ || 99 ||
(upari—dara—dṛṣṭa—śaṅku—nilīna—pārāvatānāṃ virutaiḥ |
nisstanati jātavedanaṃ śūlābhinnamiva devakulam ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.9)
pālei acchabhallaṃ va uaha kuggāmadeuladdāre |
hemaṃtaālapahio vijjhāaṃtaṃ palālaggiṃ || 100 ||
(pāṭayatyacchabhallamiva paśyata kugrāmadevakuladvāre |
hemantakālapathiko vidhmāyamānaṃ palālāg‍nim ||)

atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe sap‍taviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
saṅketaprakāśaḥ
{ādau truṭiḥ}
saṅketāpacāro yathā—(gāsa. 5.15)
coriaraasaddālui mā putti bbhamasu aṃdhaārammi |
ahiaaraṃ lakkhijjasi tamabharie dīvaa sihavva || 1 ||
(cauryarataśraddhāśīle mā putri bhramāndhakāre |
adhikataraṃ lakṣyase tamobhṛte dīpakaśikheva ||)
yathā vā—
halia—suā—muha—sasikaṃti—pahaa—timirammi ia haaggāme |
oṁ māmi kaha vasijjaï saṃkeaabhaṃgadūmiāsāhiṃ || 2 ||
(hālikasutāmukhaśaśikāntiprahṛtatimire iha hatagrāme |
he mātulāni! kathamuṣyate saṅketaka—bhaṅga—dūnāśābhiḥ ||)
saṅketamanoratho yathā—(gāsa. 2.65)
phalahī—vāhaṇa—puṇṇāhamaṃgalaṃ laṃgale kuṇaṃtīe |
asaīa maṇorahagabbhiṇīe hatthā tharaharaṃti || 3 ||
(kārpāsīkaṣaṇa—puṇyāhamaṅgalaṃ lāṅgale kurvatyāḥ |
asatyā manorathagarbhiṇyā hastau tharatharāyete ||)
yathā vā—
aṃtohuttaṃ ḍajjhaï chiṃdaṃte deare ṇaï—karaṃjaṃ |
hiaabbhaïamaṇorahāṇaṁ vi paraṃmuhī suṇhā || 4 ||
(antarabhimukhaṃ dahyate chindati devare nadīkarañjam |
hṛdayābhyadhikamanorathānāmapi parāṅ‍mukhī s‍nuṣā ||)
saṅketotkaṇṭhā yathā—
saṃkeaūsuamaṇo gahavaï—dhūā—kaḍakkha—saṇṇaï/saccavio |
taṃbaṃ gaaṃ ṇa veaï govālo aṃbaraṃ duhaï || 5 ||
(saṅketotsukamanā gṛhapatiduhitṛkaṭākṣasaṃjñāpitaḥ/ d‍ṛṣṭaḥ |
tāmrāṃ gatāṃ na vetti vrīḍayā ambaraṃ dogdhi ||)
yathā vā—(vala. 496, gāsa. 868ve.)
saṃkeakuḍuṃguḍḍīṇasaüṇikolāhalaṃ suṇaṃtīe |
gharakammavāvaḍāe vahueṁ sīaṃti aṃgāiṃ || 6 ||
(saṅketakuḍuṅgoḍḍīnaśakunikolāhalaṃ śrṛṇvatyāḥ |
gṛhakarmavyāpṛtāyā vadhvāḥ sīdanti aṅgāni ||)
saṅketaharṣaṇaṃ yathā—
occei/accaï jā kusuṃbhaṃ, tāva ccia putti pulliā uvvā |
maggeṇa muhuvalaṃtī kallāṇaparaṃparā tujjha || 7 ||
(avacinoti/arcayati yāvat kusumbhaṃ tāvadeva putri phullitāpūrvā |
mārgeṇa muhurvalantī kalyāṇaparamparā tava ||)
yathā vā—
silliri gulime gāme vodrahapaïraṃmi putti diṇṇāsi |
rajjaa paggabaṃsaṃ tuggamāaṃ muhutthiccihisiṃ || 8 ||
(sillirigulime grāme taruṇapuruṣapracure putri! dattāsi |) ku.
saṅketāśvāso yathā—(gāsa. 1.9)
kiṃ ruasi oṇaamuhī dhaalāaṃtesu sālichettesu |
hariālamaṃḍiamuhī paḍi vva saṇavāḍiā jāā || 9 ||
(kiṃ rodiṣyavanatamukhī dhavalāyamāneṣu śalikṣetreṣu |
haritālamaṇḍitamukhī naṭīva śaṇavāṭikā jātā ||)
yathā vā—(vala. 472)
āsaṇṇakuḍuṃge juṇṇadeaüle bahujuāṇasaṃkiṇṇe |
therī tti paī mā ruasu putti diṇṇāsi suggāme || 10 ||
(āsannakuḍuṅge jīrṇadevakule bahuyuvasaṅkīrṇe |
sthavira iti patiḥ mā rudihi putri! dattāsi sugrāme ||)
saṅketāgamo yathā—(gāsa. 2.71)
golāṇaīeĕ tūhe cakkhaṃto rāiāe pattāiṃ |
uppaḍaï makkhaḍo kokkhaei poṭṭaṃ ca piṭṭei || 11 ||
(godāvarīnadyāḥ kacche carvayan rājikāyāḥ patrāṇi |
utpatati markaṭaḥ khokhāśabdaṃ karotyudaraṃ ca tāḍayati ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 6.31)
osaraï dhuṇaï sāhaṃ ko/khokkhāmuhalo puṇo samullihaï |
jaṃbūpalaṃ ṇa geh‍ṇaï bhamaro tti kaī paḍhamaḍakko || 12 ||
(apasarati dhunoti śākhāṃ khokhāmukharaḥ punaḥ samullikhati |
jambūphalaṃ na gṛh‍ṇāti bhramara iti kapiḥ prathamadaṣṭaḥ ||)
saṅketabhraṃśo yathā—(gāsa. 2.80)
sāmāi sāmalīe addhacchipaloirīe muhasohā |
jaṃbūdala—kaa—kaṇṇāvaaṃsa—bhamire haliaütte || 13 ||
(śyāmāyāḥ śyāmalāyate 'rdhākṣipralokanaśīlāyā mukhaśobhā |
jambūdalakṛtakarṇāvataṃsabhramaṇaśīle halikaputre ||)
yathā vā—
gaṇhāi maṇo haliassa aüaṇā ṇiapaïssa paccakkhaṃ |
dummaṇa—muhassa vāṇīramaṃjariṃ dei diarassa || 14 ||
{gṛh‍ṇāti mano hālikasya asatī nijapateḥ pratyakṣam |
dūnamukhāya vānīramañjarīṃ dadāti devarāya ||}
saṅketavighno yathā—(gāsa. 5.16)
vāhittā paḍivaaṇaṃ ṇa dei rūsei ekkamekkassa |
asaī kajjeṇa viṇā païppamāṇe ṇaīkacche || 15 ||
(vyāhṛtā prativacanaṃ na dadāti ruṣyatyekaikasya |
asatī kāryeṇa vinā pradīpyamāne nadīkacche ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.4)
ṇippacchimāiṁ asaī dukkhāloāiṁ muhuapupphāiṃ |
cīe baṃdhussa va aṭṭhiāiṁ ruirī samucciṇaï || 16 ||
(niṣpiṣṭānyasatī duḥkhālokāni madhūkapuṣpāṇi |
citāyāṃ bandhorivāsthīni rodanaśīlā samuccinoti ||)
saṅketopaghno yathā—(gāsa. 4.65)
āaṇṇei aḍaaṇā kuḍuṃga—heṭṭhammi diṇṇasaṃkeā |
aggapaapelliāṇaṃ mammaraaṃ juṇṇapattāṇaṃ || 17 ||
(ākarṇayatyasatī kuñjādho dattasaṅketā |
agrapadapreritānāṃ marmarakaṃ jīrṇapatrāṇām ||)
yathā—
aṇṇāsaṃkāe tamaṃdhaāravāaṇṇapavaṇeṇṇi |
sattiṇiūhaṃticcia hasaī teṇamahakāā || 18 ||
saṅketabhaṅgo yathā—
ciṃtehi aṃgasaṃgo vassaaṇṇiṇṇiaṃṇiuvāaṃ |
sā uṇa talahīpā . . ṇateṇa daḍ̣dhā tusāreṇa || 19 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.8)
attā taha ramaṇijjaṃ amha gāmassa maṃḍaṇībhūaṃ |
lua—tilavāḍisaricchaṃ sisireṇa kaaṃ bisiṇisaṃḍaṃ || 20 ||
(śvaśru! tathā ramaṇīyamasmākaṃ grāmasya maṇḍanībhūtam |
lūnatilavāṭīsadṛśaṃ śiśireṇa kṛtaṃ bisinīṣaṇḍam ||)
saṅketānuṣaṅgo yathā—
vacchaï ṇaïtecchanukumoppiāhavāhe pahammamāṇīe |
saṇṇajuāṇo kīraï gāmo ccia haliadhūāe || 21 ||
{. . . śūnya (? sarva) yuvakaḥ kriyate grāma eva hālikaduhitrā} ku.
yathā vā—
osaevasaṃtakāsaasiḍilialaṃgalavilāhi gāmāhi |
aṇṇatatoṇīābhoie saṇṇaloā gahapaïssa || 22 ||
saṅketāśayo yathā—
diṭṭhammi gharaparohaḍabālakaraṃjaṃ païmmi siṃcaṃte |
aṇṇoṇṇapesiacchaṃ diareṇa bahuṇṇiā hasaï || 23 ||
(dṛṣṭe gṛhapaścādbhāga/paś‍cimāṅgaṇa—bālakarañjaṃ patyau siñcati |
anyonyapreṣitākṣaṃ devareṇa bhrātṛjāyā hasati ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 876ve.)
ṭhāṇe ṭhāṇe valiā valaṇe valaṇe saveasakuḍuṃgā |
ṇa gao si amha gāmaṃ diara ṇa diṭṭhā tue muralā || 24 ||
(sthāne sthāne valitāḥ valane valane savetasakuḍuṅgāḥ |
na gato 'si asmin grāme devara! dṛṣṭā tva‌yā‌ muralā ||)
saṅketopaśayo yathā— (saka. 3.112)
so muddhamao maataṇhiāhiṃ taha dūmio haāsāhiṃ |
jaha sabbhāvamaīṇaṃ vi ṇaīṇa paraṃmuho jāo || 25 ||
(sa mugdhamṛgo mṛgatṛṣṇikābhistathā dūno hatāśābhiḥ |
yathā sadbhāvamayīṣvapi nadīṣu parāṅ‍mukho jātaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
ammaṇu—aṃcaṇapuvvaṃ vaṇammi taha dūmiā u āsahiṃ |
jaha sā ṇa ṭhāi heṭṭhe hu tassa vi cūaviḍavassa || 26 ||
(anugamanapūrva vane tathā duḥkhitā tu āśābhiḥ |
yathā sā na tiṣṭhati adhastāt khalu tasyāpi cūtaviṭapasya ||)
saṅketaprārthanā yathā—(gāsa. 2.3)
bahupupphabharoṇāmia bhūmīgaasāha suṇasu viṇṇattiṃ |
golātaḍaviaḍakuḍaṃgamahua saṇiaṃ galijjāsu || 27 ||
(bahupuṣpabharāvanāmitabhūmīgataśākha śrṛṇu vijñap‍tim |
godātaṭavikaṭanikuṃjamadhūka śanairgaliṣyasi ||)
yathā vā—
sikatilatalāḥ sāndracchāyāsstanāntavilambinaḥ śiśiramarutāṃ līlāvāsāḥ kvaṇajjalaraṅkavaḥ |
avinayavatī—nirviccheda—smara—vyaya—dāyinaḥ kathaya murale! kenāmī te kṛtā niculadrumāḥ || 28 ||
saṅketabahumāno yathā—(gāsa 3.95) (1248)
cuṃbaï vāsiṇṇamuhī daïakaolaṃ va paṃḍuracchāaṃ |
asaī ṇihuvaṇavaḍapāavassa vāāṇiaṃ pattaṃ || 29 ||
(cumbati vā svinnamukhī dayitakapolamiva pāṇḍuracchāyam |
asatī nidhuvanavaṭapādapasya vātānītaṃ patram ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 6.56)
gāmaṃgaṇa—ṇialia—kaṇhavakkha vaḍa tujjha dūramaṇulaggo |
tittilla—paḍikkhaka—bhoio vi gāmo suhaṃ vasaï || 30 ||
(grāmāṅgaṇanigaḍitakṛṣṇapakṣa vaṭa tava dūramanulagnaḥ |
dauḥsādhika—pratīkṣaka—bhogiko 'pi grāmaḥ sukhaṃ vasati ||)
saṅketavātsalyaṃ yathā—
jaṃ jaṃ taṇagaaṃ pi vapū . . mattaṇiacchaeasaaṃ |
āṇaṃdavāhaṇibbharabhariacchī vetasakuḍuṃgaṃ || 31 ||
yathā vā—
bad‍dhāveuṃ icchaï paṃsuli gāmasaṇṇo raṇṇa—chettesu |
muggassa kaṇṇasaricchaṃ dīsaï vaṇṇaṃ palāassa || 32 ||
{vardhāpayitumicchati pāṃsulī grāmaśūnyeṣu araṇyakṣetreṣu |
mārgasya karṇasadṛkṣaṃ dṛśyate parṇaṃ palāśasya ||}
saṅketānukrośo yathā—(gāsa. 1.37)
tālūra—bhamāula—khuḍia—kesaro giriṇaīe pūreṇa |
darabuḍḍubbuḍḍuṇibuḍḍamahuaro hīraï kalaṃbo || 33 ||
(jalāvartabhramākulakhaṇḍitakesaro giriṇadyāḥ pūreṇa |
daramagnonmagnanimagnamadhukaro hriyate kadambaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
jaï maggiaṇṇasariaṃjeṇa jahicchāiddiaṃ suraaṃ |
tāe eṇisacceṇa bhammae rakkha vāṇīraṃ || 34 ||
saṅketākṣepaṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.67)
bhajjaṃtassa vi tuha saggagāmiṇo ṇaï—karaṃja—sāhāo |
pāā ajja vi dhammia tuha kahaṁ dharaṇiṃ cia chivaṃti || 35 ||
(bhañjato 'pi tava svargagāmino nadīkarañjaśākhāḥ |
pādāvadyāpi dhārmika! tava kathaṃ dharaṇīmeva spṛśataḥ ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 6.53)
eddahamette gāme ṇa paḍaï bhikkha tti kīsa maṃ bhaṇasi |
dhammia! karaṃjabhaṃjaa jaṃ jīasi taṃ pi de bahuaṃ || 36 ||
(etāvanmātre grāme na patati bhikṣeti kimiti māṃ bhaṇasi |
dhārmika! karajjabhajjaka! yajjīvasi tadapi te bahukam ||)
saṅketābhirakṣā yathā—(gāsa. 2.66)
pahiullūraṇasaṃkāulāhiṃ asaīhiṃ bahalatimirassa |
āliṃpaṇeṇa ṇihuaṃ vaḍassa sittāiṁ pattāiṃ || 37| |
(pathikocchedanaśaṅkākulābhirasatībhirbahulatimirasya |
ālepanena nibhṛtaṃ vaṭasya siktāni patrāṇi ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.75)
bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇaho ajja mārio deṇa |
golāṇaīkacchakuḍuṃgavāsiṇā dariasīheṇa || 38 ||
(bhrama dhārmika! visrabdhaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritastena |
godānadīkacchakuḍuṅgavāsinā dṛp‍tasiṃhena ||)
saṅketatātparyaṃ yathā—
asasiūmasaṃtehiṃ ubbuṭṭhaï taha ṇiuḍḍamāṇaṃmi |
saṃkeakuḍuṃge aḍaaṇāe hiaammi likkhattaṃ || 39 ||
yathā vā—
khujjaṃti jaḍaṃtehiṃ pallaviā hoṃti pallavatehiṃ |
gāmā saṇṇa palāsehi paṃsulīhiaasabbhāvā || 40 ||
(kubjanti śīryamāṇaiḥ pallavitā bhavanti pallavadbhiḥ |
grāmāsanna—palāśaiḥ pāṃsulī—hṛdaya—sadbhāvāḥ ||)
saṅketopajāpo yathā—
ummūlaṃtī jaha tīrataruvaṇiṃ vahasi taha ahaṃ maṇṇe |
hohisi tumaṃ pi murale gaṃgavva tavassiparivārā || 41 ||
(unmūlantī yathā tīrataruvanī vahasi tathāhaṃ manye |
bhaviṣyasi tvamapi murale! gaṅgeva tapasviparivārā ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 760ve.)
raaṇāarassa sāhemi ṇammae ajja mukkadakkhiṇṇā |
veasaladāgharaṃtaṃ ṇīā jaṃ tuṃ si pūreṇa || 42 ||
(rat‍nākarasya śaṃsāmi narmade! adya muktadākṣiṇyā |
vetasalatāgṛhāntaṃ nītā yattvamasi pūreṇa ||)
saṅaketopālambho yathā—
esā te majjāā muddhasahāvāa paasisirāa |
jeṇa murale! vahasi pāṇīaṃ jattha hi kuḍuṃgo || 43 ||
(eṣā te maryādā mugdhasvabhāvāyāḥ payaśśiśirāyāḥ |
yena murale! vahasi pānīyaṃ yatra hi kuḍuṅgaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
taṃ kattha gaaṃ tuha taruṇa—tīra—vāṇīra—bhaṃjaṇa—samatthaṃ |
ṇavaūrajalaṃ kāveri agga/ajja kacche païppaṃte || 44 ||
(tat kutra gataṃ tava taruṇatīravānīrabhañjanasamartham |
navapūrajalaṃ kāveri! agra/adya kacche pradīpyamāne ||)
saṅketavipralambho yathā—(gāsa. 3.95)
gāmavaḍassa piucchā āvaṃḍumuhīṇaṃ paṃḍuracchā/jjhāaṃ |
hiaeṇa samaṃ asaīṇaṁ paḍaï vāāhaaṃ pattaṃ || 45 ||
(grāmavaṭasya pitṛṣvasa āpāṇḍumukhīnāṃ pāṇḍuracchāyam |
hṛdayena samamasatīnāṃ patati vātāhataṃ patram ||)
yathā vā—
karaï ghaṇavāmaṇaviaḍasāhāi jaṇajaṇiapariosaṃ |
jaṇaseviaveḍasiṃ taṇaa pakkhao keṇa chiṇāsi || 46 ||
(ghanavāmanavikaṭaśākhābhiḥ janajanitaparitoṣām |
janasevitavetasīṃ tanaya pakṣayoḥ kena chinatsi ||)
saṅketāśīryathā—
asaīeṁ baṃdhava ghaṇa—viaḍa—sāhā—pattala jala—āsaṇṇa |
diahe vi ṇisāmuhasama kuḍuṃga jivehi maha jīeṇa || 47 ||
(asatyā bāndhava! ghanavikaṭaśākhāpatrala jalāsanna |
divase 'pi niśāmukhasama! kuḍuṅga! jīva mama jīvitena ||)
yathā vā—
jaha icchā taha ramiaṃ ṇa a gahiā ajja/jjha juvasaṃgahaṇe |
tuha tāvi tīrakuḍuṃga khuṇaehiṃ viḍajjhissaṃ || 48 ||
(yathecchā tathā ramitaṃ na ca gṛhītā adyā yūpasaṃgrahaṇe |
tava tāpi tīralatākuñjasthāṇukairvidhakṣyāmi ||)
saṅketapraś‍no yathā—
paḍhamullaavāsollāi bahalamaaraṃdasurabhigaṃdhāi |
gole kuḍuṃgajuāi kaha ṇa ṇamimo tuha puliṇāiṁ || 49 ||
(prathamavarṣārdrāṇi bahulamakarandasurabhigandhīni |
gode! kuḍuṅgayutāni kathaṃ na namāmastava pulināni ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 4.48)
aṃgāṇaṃ taṇuāraa sikkhāvaa dīharoiavvāṇaṃ |
viṇaāikkamaāraa mā mā ṇaṃ pamharijjāsu || 50 ||
(aṅgānāṃ tanukāraka! śikṣaka! dīrgharoditavyānām |
vinayātikramakāraka! mā mā enāṃ prasmariṣyasi ||)
virahavisūraṇaṃ yathā—(līlāvaī 569)
perijjaṃto puvvakaehiṃ kammehiṃ kehiṃ vi varāo |
suhamicchaṃto dussahajaṇāṇurāe jaṇo paḍaï || 51 ||
(preryamāṇaḥ pūrvakṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ kairapi varākaḥ |
sukhamicchan dussahajanānurāge janaḥ patati ||)
yathā vā—(vala. 331)
āraṃbho jassa imo ṇīsāsāāsa—sosia—sarīro |
pariṇāho kahaṃ hohii ṇa āṇimo daḍ‍ḍhapemmassa || 52 ||
(ārambho yasyāyaṃ niḥśvāsāyāsaśoṣitaśarīraḥ |
pariṇāmaḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati na jānīmo dagdhapremṇaḥ ||)
sakhīsampraś‍no yathā—(gāsa. 4.56)
vaaṇe vaaṇammi calaṃta—sīsa—suṇṇāvahāṇa—huṃkāraṃ |
sahi deṃttī ṇīsāsaṃtaresu kīsa mha dūmesi || 53 ||
(vacaneṣu calacchīrṣaśūnyāvadhānahuṅkāram |
sakhi dadatī niḥśvāsāntareṣu kimityasmān dunoṣi? ||)
yathā vā—(līlāvaī 499)
aṇṇaṃ jaṃ ṇūmijjaï eaṃ puṇa suaṇu vammaharahassaṃ |
sāhijjaṃtaṃ ṇa tahā guppaṃtaṃ jaha phuḍīhoi || 54 ||
(anyad yad gupyate etat punaḥ sutanu! manmatharahasyam |
kathyamānaṃ na tathā gupyamānaṃ yathā sphuṭībhavati ||)
itivṛttākhyānaṃ yathā—
ajja sahi so juāṇo uvaïṭṭho muralamuttaraṃtīe |
saṃkea—paaḍaṇa—bhaa—cchaleṇa eāhi vāāhi || 55 ||
(adya sakhi! sa yuvā upadiṣṭo muralāmuttarantyā |
saṅketa—prakaṭana—bhaya—cchalena etābhirvāgbhiḥ ||)
yathā vā—
daṭṭhuṃ ciraṃ ṇa laddho māmi pio diṭṭhigoaragao vi |
daṃḍāhaa—valia—huaṃga—vaṃka—racche haaggāme || 56 ||
(draṣṭuṃ ciraṃ na labdhaḥ sakhi! priyaḥ dṛṣṭigocaragato 'pi |
daṇḍāhatavalitabhujaṅgavakrarathye hatagrāme ||)
sakhīśikṣā yathā—(gāsa. 4.55)
mā vacpa puphphalāvira (lāī) devā uaaṃjalīhi tūsaṃti |
goāṇaīa puttaa sīlummūlāiṃ kūlāiṃ || 57 ||
(mā vraja puṣpalavanaśīla! devā udakāñjalibhistuṣyanti |
godāvaryāḥ putraka! śīlonmūlāni kūlāni ||)
yathā vā—
puphullaṃta—ṇiraṃtara—taruṇa—vaṃjulāvaṇa—siṇiddha—kūlāe |
golāṇaīeṁ vasirī saï tti mā putti pattiasu || 58 ||
(phullad—nirantara—taruṇa—vañjula—vanasnigdhakūlāyāḥ |
godānadyā vasanaśīlā satīti mā putri pratīhi ||)
dhvāntapratīkṣā yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
bālā ṇimīliacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 59 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
bālā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||)
yathā vā—(megha. 99)
gacchantīnāṃ ramaṇavasatiṃ yoṣitāṃ tatra naktaṃ ruddhāloke narapatipathe sūcibhedyaistamobhiḥ |
saudāmanyā kanakanikaṣasnigdhayā darśayorvīṃ toyotsargastanitamukharo mā ca bhūrviklabāstāḥ || 60 ||
dhvāntānuśocanaṃ yathā—
hārīhāusahābahulapaosaha—ṇisā |
majjhavahāu baṃdhava ghaṇaduddiṇakattha dīsihasi || 61 ||
yathā vā—
peduddesesu parohaḍesu haṭṭesu gāmaracchāsu |
viralaarālaṃdhaāra sāra/haa keṇa musiosi || 62 ||
(pretoddeśeṣu gṛhapaścādbhāgeṣu haṭṭeṣu grāmarathyāsu |
viralatarāndhakāra kathaya kena muṣito 'si ||)
dhvāntasatkāro yathā—(gauva. 406)
gaaṇaṃ a mattamehaṃ dhārāluliāi bhuvaṇāi |
ṇirahaṃkāramiaṃkā haraṃti ṇīlāo vi ṇisā || 63 ||
(gaganaṃ ca mattameghaṃ dhārālulitāni bhuvanāni |
nirahaṅkāramṛgāṅkā haranti nīlā api niśāḥ ||)
yathā vā—
ṇa tahā sahī, ṇa dūī, ṇa jaṇaṃ, ṇei ṇaīaḍakuḍuṃgaṃ |
jaha tamaṇivaho sahi! ṇiddhabaṃdhavo baṃdhaïjaṇassa || 64 ||
(na tathā sakhī na dūtī na jano nayati taṭakuḍuṅgam |
yathā tamonivahaḥ sakhi! s‍nigdhabāndhavo bandhakījanasya ||)
candrikābhisaraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 7.7)
gammihisi tassa pāsaṃ suṃdari! mā tūrasu suaṇu vaḍ‍ḍhaü miaṃko |
duddhe duddhaṃ via caṃdiāi ko pecchaï muhaṃ te || 65 ||
(gamiṣyasi tasya pārśvaṃ sundari! mā tvarasva sutanu! vardhatāṃ mṛgāṅkaḥ |
dugdhe dugdhamiva candrikāyāṃ kaḥ prekṣate mukhaṃ te ||)
yathā vā—
avihāvijjaṃto c‍cia gurupurao piaamaṃ samalliaï |
joṇhā—savaṇṇa—paḍa—bahalaṃga—ṭhio kāmiṇī—sattho || 66 ||
(avibhāvyamāna eva gurupurataḥ priyatamaṃ samālīyate |
jyos‍nā—savarṇa—paṭa—bahalāṅga—sthitaḥ kāminīsārthaḥ ||)
candrikānirvedo yathā—
bahuaṃ kalaṃkahariaṃ thovaṃ cia ṇimmalaṃ haāsassa |
caṃdassa taha vi māe ṇa appiṇā sāmalā joṇhā || 67 ||
(bahukaṃ kalaṃṅkahṛtaṃ stokameva nirmalaṃ hatāśasya |
candrasya tathāpi mātarna ātmanā śyāmalā jyots‍nā ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 6.81, 5.91)
kettiamettaṃ hohii māe joṇhājalaṃ ṇaha—sarammi |
jaṃ caṃda—paṇālojjhara—ṇivaha—paḍaṃtaṃ ṇa ṇiṭṭhāi || 68 ||
(kiyanmātraṃ bhaviṣyati mātarjyots‍nājalaṃ nabhassarasi |
yac candrapraṇāla—nirjhara—nivaha—patanna nistiṣṭhati ||)
candrodayanindā yathā—
piasaṃgamo ahavvāe ajja saṃpaḍaï tāva me katto |
jājiaï gahiakaraṇiarakhikkhiro caṃdacaṃḍālo || 69 ||
(priyasaṅgamo 'bhavyāyā adya saṃpatati tāvanme kutaḥ |
yāvajjīvati gṛhītakaranikaro rātriṃcaraḥ candracaṇḍālaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
muhametteṇa varāo rāhū kiṃ kuṇaï daddhacaṃdassa |
jo mīṇamaarakakkaüsavicchuasīhehi vi ṇiggao || 70 ||
(mukhamātreṇa varāko rāhuḥ kiṃ karoti dagdhacandrasya |
yo mīna—makara—karka—vṛṣa—vṛścika—siṃhairapi nirgataḥ ||)
candratiraskāro yathā—
caṃda tumaṃ ṇa gaṇijjasi jāva imo bahalapattalacchāo |
uvvūḍhakaṇhapakkho vāsasahassaṃ vaḍo jiaï || 71 ||
(candra tvāṃ na gaṇayiṣyāmaḥ, asau bahalapatralacchāyaḥ |
udbha‍ūtakṛṣṇapakṣo yāvad varṣasahasraṃ vaṭo jīvati ||)
yathā vā—
gahakallola tti tumaṃ iṭṭho asaīṇa jaha vi dappo si |
abbhupisāakaṇagahiaṃ mā muhaasu gahapaïaṁ || 72 ||
abhisāraṇasādhvasaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.87)
āassa kiṃ ṇu kāhaṃ kiṃ vocchaṃ kaha ṇu hohii imaṃ ti |
paḍhamuggaa/llaasāhasakāriāeṁ hiaaṃ dhaḍadhaḍei || 73 ||
(āgatasya kiṃ nu kariṣyāmi kiṃ vakṣyāmi kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyatīdamiti |
prathamodgatasāhasakārikāyā hṛdayaṃ dhaḍadhaḍāyate ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 3.18)
bahuāeṁ ṇaïṇiuṃje paḍhamuggaa—sīla—khaṃḍaṇa—vilakkhaṃ |
uḍḍei vihaṃgaülaṃ hā hā pakkhehiṃ vi bhaṇaṃtaṃ || 74 ||
(vadhvā nadīnikuñje prathamodgataśīlakhaṇḍanavilakṣam |
uḍḍayate vihaṅgakulaṃ hā hā pakṣairiva bhaṇat ||)
abhisaraṇotsāho yathā—
ārūḍhavisphuritacāpamanojarāje sajjīkṛte sudṛḍhasaṅgamasaṅgarā ca |
uc‍cairnitambajayahastini vallabheṣṭaṃ yat tat priyā sarabhasaṃ nibiḍaṃ cakāra || 75 ||
yathā vā—(amaru. 71)
k‍va prasthitāsi karabhoru! ghane niśīthe prāṇeśvaro vasati yatra manaḥ—priyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 76 ||
abhisārikāvṛttānto yathā—(gāsa. 5.61)
uha saṃbhamavikkhittaṃ ramiavva—lehalāeṁ asaīe |
ṇavaraṃgaaṃ kuḍaṃge dhaaṃ va diṇṇaṃ aviṇaassa || 77 ||
(paśya saṃbhramavikṣip‍taṃ rantavya—lampaṭayā asatyā |
navaraṅga/k‍takaṃ nikuñje dhvajamiva dattamavinayasya ||)
yathā vā—
taha kaha vi hu suraaṃ sarahasaṃ kaaṃ aḍaaṇāe jārāo |
jaha ṇiaḍiṃbhaṃ mottuṃ para—ḍiṃbho āṇio gehaṃ || 78 ||
(tathā kathamapi khalu surataṃ sarabhasaṃ kṛtamasatyā jārāt |
yathā nijaḍimbhaṃ muktvā paraḍimbhaḥ ānītaḥ geham ||)
vañcitāvṛttānto yathā—(gāsa. 4.18)
aha sā tahiṃ tahiṃ via vāṇīravaṇaṃmi cukkasaṅkeā |
tuha daṃsaṇaṃ vimaggaï pamhaṭṭha—ṇihāṇa—ṭhāṇaṃ va || 79 ||
(atha sā tatra tatraiva vānīravane vismṛtasaṅketā |
tava darśanaṃ vimārgati vismṛtanidhānasthānamiva ||)
yathā vā—
vedaṇikhātaṃ/veḍasa—khuḍiaṃ kisalaṃ kaṇṇe kāūṇa haliasoṇhāe |
jāṇāvio sahāsaṃ diaro vaṃkāeṁ diṭṭhīe || 80 ||
{vetasa—khaṇḍitaṃ kisalayaṃ karṇe kṛtvā hālikas‍nuṣayā |
jñāpitaḥ sahāsaṃ devaro vakrayā dṛṣṭyā ||}
paribhogadarśanaṃ yathā—
ajjhāeṁ ṇava—ṇakha—kkhaa—ṇirīkkhaṇe garuajovvaṇuttuṅgaṃ |
paḍimāgaa—ṇia—ṇaaṇuppalac‍ciaṃ hoi thaṇavaṭṭhaṃ || 81 ||
(āryāyā navanakhakṣatanirīkṣaṇe gurukayauvanottuṅgam |
pratimāgatanijanayanotpalārcitaṃ bhavati stanapṛṣṭham ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 3.9)
ṇavi taha paḍhama—samāama—suraa—suhe pāvie vi parioso |
jaha vīadiasasavilakkhalakkhie vaaṇakamalammi || 82 ||
(nāpi tathā prathamasamāgamasuratasukhe prāp‍te 'pi paritoṣaḥ |
yathā dvitīyadivasasavilakṣalakṣite vadanakamale ||)
sakhīvyājagarbhā yathā—(saka. 4.84)
urapellia—vaïkārillaāi uc‍cesi daïavacchalie |
kaṃṭaa—vilihia—pīṇuṇṇaa—thaṇi uttamma ettāhe || 83 ||
(uraḥpīḍitavṛtikāravellīphalānyuc‍cinopi dayitavatsale |
kaṇṭaka—vilikhita—pīnonnata—stani uttāmyedānīm ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 886ve.)
kassa vā ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piāeṁ savvaṇaṃ aharaṃ |
sabhamarapaümagghāiri vāriavāme sahasu eṇhiṃ || 84 ||
(kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ savraṇamadharam |
sabhramarapadmāghrāṇaśīle vāritavāme sahasvedānīm ||)
avinayanigūhanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 959ve.)
uc‍ciṇasu paḍiakusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ haliasoṇhe |
esa avasāṇaviraso sasureṇa suo valaasaddo || 85 ||
(uc‍canu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīḥ śephālikāṃ hālikas‍nuṣe |
eṣa avasānaviraso śvaśureṇa śruto valayaśabdaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
attaghara/ttādharaṇevacchaṃ tā ihi diarassa puttia avehi |
tuha kamma—vāva—uttaṇa—taṇuāe galaṃti valaāi || 86 ||
(ātmagṛha/dharanepathyaṃ tāvad idaṃ devarasya putrike! apehi |
tava karmavyāpṛtatvatanukāyāḥ galanti valayāni ||)
cihnanihnavo yathā—
attassa paḍimā uaratthādaporīe |
bālaa dhaṇṇosi tumaṃ jeṇa jiaṃtī piā diṭṭhā || 87 ||
(ātmanaḥ pratimā udarasthā X X |
bālaka dhanyo 'si tvaṃ yena jīvantī priyā dṛṣṭā ||)
yathā vā—
ḍhakkaṃtī aharaṃ pāāreṇa/pāvāraeṇa hemaṃtapavaṇa—phuḍiaṃpi |
aï ujue kilissasi vijaṃpiuṃ diarajāāe || 88 ||
(chādayantyadharaṃ prāvārakeṇa hemantapavanasphuṭitamapi |
ayi ṛjuke kliśyasi vijalpituṃ devarajāyayā ||)
evaṃ saṅketadānādiśeṣākūpārapāragā |
ityudbhedasamādhānapracchādanaviśāradā || 89 ||
deśakāleṅgitākārabhāvopāyābhiyogavit |
nārī nareṣu sarveṣu naro nārīṣu siddha‍yati || 90 ||
aviṣkṛto 'yamabhiyogavidhiryathāvadātaḥ paraṃ punaramī ramaṇāp‍tipūrvāḥ |
pūrvānurāgatarupallavabhūtadūtasampreṣaṇaprabhṛtayaḥ prakaṭīkriyante || 91 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe abhiyogavidhiprakāśo nāma
|| sap‍taviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 27 ||
asmin prākṛtabhoje mahābdhikalpe 'nubhāvapaiśunikāḥ |
pravahanti hanta nadyo nigūḍhabhāvā dhvanipreṣṭhāḥ ||
atha
śṛṅgāraprakāśe aṣṭāviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
abhiyogavidhiprakāśaḥ
(dūtaviśeṣāḥ)
svayaṃ darśanasyālābhe dūtasampreṣaṇādayaḥ | teṣu dūtasampreṣaṇaṃ nāyakayoḥ karma | tadajñātadūtaviśeṣakarmaṇoḥ na ghaṭata iti dūtaviśeṣāḥ dūtakarmāṇi ca prāgevābhidhīyante | tatra jātyādiyogād dūtaviśeṣāścaturaśītiḥ prāyaśo bhavanti | yathocyate—
jātirguṇaḥ kriyā dravyaṃ sambandho 'rthaḥ prayojanam |
prayogo yogyatā strītvaṃ dūtabhedeṣu hetavaḥ || 1 || iti | teṣu—
1. jāteḥ — devaḥ, manuṣyaḥ, kinnaraḥ, vānaraḥ, śukaḥ, śārikā, pārāvataḥ, haṃsa iti |
2. guṇataḥ — pitṛpaitāmahaṃ, adṛṣṭavaikṛtaṃ, avisaṃvādakaṃ, alobhaśīlaṃ, aparihāryaṃ, amantravisrāvi, dhārmikaṃ, bharasahiṣṇu ceti mitrasaṃpat (iti) |
3. kriyātaḥ — sahapāṃsukrīḍitaṃ, upakārasambaddhaṃ, janmāntarārjitaṃ, sahādhyāyi, samāna— śīlavyasanaṃ, yaścāsya rahasyāni marmāṇi vidyāt (rahasyamarmavedī), yasya ca vidyāt (viditamarmarahasyā), dhātryapatyasahasaṃvṛddham (sahasaṃvṛddhā) iti |
4. dravyataḥ — mālākāra—tāmbūlika—gāndhika—saurika—pīṭhamarda—viṭa—vidūṣaka— pāṣaṇḍinaḥ, mitrāṇi iti |
5. sambandhataḥ — guruḥ, sakhā, śiṣyaḥ, ātmā, jñātiḥ, aurasaḥ, kanīyān iti |
6. arthataḥ — arthaḥ,anarthapratighātaḥ, sahārthatā, prāp‍tiḥ, pratāraṇaṃ, ānṛṇyaṃ, kīrtiḥ, pratītiḥ, ityamīṣāmāstheyāni (iti) |
7. prayojanataḥ— dayā, s‍nehaḥ, kutūhalaṃ, abhiprāyopalambhaḥ, pūrvaprārthanā, anyataraprārthanā, śīlaṃ, saṅgharṣa iti amīṣāmāstheyāni (iti) |
8. prayogataḥ —pracchannaḥ, prakāśaḥ, hīnaḥ, utkṛṣṭaḥ, uddhataḥ, udāttaḥ, dhṛṣṭaḥ, śaṭha iti |
9. yogyatāyāḥ — nisṛṣṭārthaḥ, parimitārthaḥ, patrahārakaḥ, mūkadūtaḥ (iti) |
10. strītvādi —īkṣaṇikā, bhikṣukī, sakhī, dhātreyikā, vidhavā, dāsī, śilpakārikā, śilpinī iti | (kāmasū. 5.4)
teṣu— vidhavā jātimadbha‍yaḥ; sakhī guṇavadbhayaḥ; dhātreyikā kriyāvadbha‍yaḥ; bhikṣukī dravyanimittebhyaḥ; dāsī sambandhakṛtebhyaḥ; īkṣaṇikā arthahetubhyaḥ; śilpakārikā prayojanikebhyaḥ; śilpinī prāyogikebhyaḥ prāyeṇa iti | tatra —
(1. jāteḥ —8)
1. devāḥ sap‍tarṣayaḥ; yathā kumārasambhave—(kusaṃ. 6.94)
te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam |
siddhaṃ cāsmai nivedyārthaṃ tadvisṛṣṭāḥ khamudyayuḥ || 2 ||
2. manuṣyāḥ avibhavā bhūpaprabhṛtayaḥ; harṣacarite yathā—
tasya ca sutā kumārī rūpavatī sarvalakṣaṇopetā |
tāṃ sa bhavataḥ prayacchati haccho prahite sahāsmābhiḥ(?) || 3 ||
3. kinnaramithunaṃ cārumatyāṃ yathā—
kanakakuṇḍalamaṇḍitagaṇḍayā jaghanadeśaniveśitavīṇayā |
amararājapure varakanyayā tava yaśo vimalaṃ parigīyate || 4 ||
4. vānaraḥ hanūmān; rāmāyaṇe yathā—(bhaṭṭi. 10.38)
tasyādhivāse tanurutsukā 'sau dṛṣṭā mayā rāmapatiḥ pramanyuḥ |
kāryasya sāro 'yamudīrito vaḥ proktena śeṣeṇa kimuddhatena || 5 ||
5. śukaḥ jaratkīraḥ; śūdrakakathāyāṃ harimatīvṛttānte yathā—
jaṃvada ṇaravaï viṇaü paāsaï tāṃvahi kīru nirārua bhāsaï |
hāri lakkhajaṇajuttaho dijjaü saṃkhaatta—vaṇiuttaho || 6 ||
(yāvan narapatirvinayaṃ prakāśayati tāvat kīraḥ niścitaṃ bhāṣate |
hāraḥ lakṣajanayuktāya dīyatāṃ śaṅkhadatta—vaṇik‌putrāya ||)
6. śārikā medhāvinī ; bṛhatkathāyāṃ nandaprabodhane yathā—
kiṃ krandasi nirākrāntā nandano rājataskaraḥ |
amṛte viṣamutpannaṃ yato rājā tato bhayam || 7 ||
7. pārāvatassamudraghoṣaḥ; trailokyasundaryāṃ yathā—
kiṃ tvaṃ naiva yaśodayā stutavapurmārgeṇa gāścārayan kiṃ vā no bhavatā varāhavapuṣā pṛthvīyamabhyuddha‍ṛtā |
no vā kaṃ sabalaṃ karoṣi samare vidhvastasainyaṃ haṭhā— ditthaṃ vaibudhavandanīyamahimā tvaṃ deva lakṣmīpatiḥ || 8 ||
8. haṃsau haimantakavasantakau damayantyāṃ nalopagamane yathā—
prasārya hastaṃ nipuṇena tena dhṛtastadainaṃ dhṛtavikrameṇa |
krameṇa haṃso damayantikāyāḥ sandeśakaṃ divyagirācacakṣe || 9 ||
teṣāṃ madhye manuṣyaḥ śreyān | tasyaiva vakṣyamāṇaguṇādisampad‍yogāt | mitre hi dūtakarma kāmasūtrakāraḥ kīrtayati—"yadubhayoḥ sādhāraṇamubhayatrodāraṃ viśeṣato nāyikāyāṃ visrabdham aśeṣaguṇayogi mitram | tatra dūtakarma" (kāmasū. 1.5)
maitrī samānasukhaduḥkhānāṃ, yathā manuṣyāṇām | naivaṃ devatiraś‍cāmiti niścayaḥ | manuṣyā hi prāyaśaḥ ॰ ॰ ruyuprabhṛtayaḥ samānaśīlavyasanavayasāṃ vayasyānāmarthe jīvitamapi parityajanti, narakamapi viśanti | na punardevāḥ tiryañco veti |
(2. guṇataḥ —8)
guṇavatsu —
9. pitṛpaitāmahaḥ, vatsarājasya yaugandharāyaṇaḥ tāpasavatsarāje |
10. adṛṣṭavaikṛtaḥ, bandhudattaḥ śūdrakasya vinayavatyupayamane |
11. avisaṃvādakaḥ, nalaḥ devānāṃ nalopākhyāne |
12. alobhaśīlaḥ, śantanordevavrataḥ satyavatīvaraṇe |
13. aparihāryā/anapahāryā, udayanasya vāsavadattā padmāvatīvivāhe |
14. amantra(vi)srāvī, mādhavādīnāṃ bhūrivasuḥ mālatīmādhave |
15. dhārmikaḥ, abhimanyoḥ bībhatsuḥ uttaropayamane |
16. bharamahiṣṇuḥ, viśvāmitraḥ rāmalakṣmaṇayoḥ sītormilāpradāne iti |
(3. kriyātaḥ —8)
kriyā —
17. sahapāṃsukrīḍā, kuvalayāvalī, mahānuvatyāḥ, līlāvatyām |
18. upakārasambaddhā, madanamañjarī, vikramādityasya kaliṅgasenālābhe |
19. janmāntarārjitaḥ, maheśvara umāyāḥ kumārasambhave |
20. sahādhyāyī, madirāvatībhrātā vasuvegasya madirāvatīvivāhe |
21. samānaśīlavyasanaḥ, malayaketuḥ jīmūtavāhanasya nāgānande |
22. rahasyamarmavedī, kanakalekhādīnāṃ śaktivegaḥ caturdārikālābhe |
23. viditamarmarahasyā naravāhanadattasyakarpūrikālābhe |
24. sahasaṃvṛddhā, dhātreyikā lavaṅgikā malayavatyā/mālatyāḥ vakulamālāpraṇaye iti |
(4. dravyataḥ —8)
dravyavatsu —
25. mālākāraḥ mayūrakaḥ, kusumagehasya kundamālāyām |
26. tāmbūlikaḥ, tāḍajavaḥ devasenasya śākhinīsaṃvāde |
27. gāndhikaḥ, gaudherekaḥ svayaṃprabhāyā īrṣyāluvipralambhe |
28. saurikaḥ, śākunikaḥ śakuntikāyāṃ sātakarṇiharaṇe |
29. pīṭhamardaḥ, dantakaḥ śūdravatsasya kāmasenāvipralambhe |
30. viṭaḥ, mūladevaḥ cārulocanasya śākhāviśākhopākhyāne |
31. vidūṣakaḥ vasantakaḥ udayanasya sāgarikāvipralambhavyatikare |
32. pāṣaṇḍī bhairavānandaḥ caṇḍapālasya karpūramañjarīsaṅgamana iti |
uktaṃ ca—"mālākāra—tāmbūlika—gāndhika—pīṭhamarda—viṭa—vidūṣaka— pāṣaṇḍino mitrāṇi, tadyoṣinmitrāśca nāgarikāḥ syuḥ" iti (kāsū. 1.5)1 |
teṣu— mālākārādayassuprasiddhāḥ | avibhavastu mālikāphenakaṣāyamātraparicchadaḥ, pūjyadeśādāgataḥ, kalāsu vicakṣaṇaḥ; tadupadeśena goṣṭhyāṃ veśe ca vāsayedātmānamiti pīṭhamardaḥ2, (kāmasū. 1.4) bhuktavibhavastu tatratya eva guṇavān sakalatraḥ goṣṭhyāṃ veśe ca bahumataḥ, tadupajīvanaḥ viṭaḥ3 (kāmasū. 1.4) ekādaśavidyastu krīḍanakaḥ viśvāsyaśca vidūṣakaḥ, vaihāsiko vā4 | muṇḍajaṭilavyañjanaḥ kuhaka aindrajāliko vā pāṣaṇḍī5 | te hi prāyeṇa nāgarakāṇāṃ mitrāṇi, mantriṇaḥ, dūtāśca bhavanti |
(5. sambandhataḥ —8)
sambandhiṣu
33. sakhā, kapiñjalaḥ puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetābhiṣaṅge6 |
34. guruḥ, upavarṣaḥ upakośāyāḥ kathāpīṭhe7 |
35. śiṣyaḥ, gālavaḥ kuśikasūnoḥ mādhavīniṣkrayaṇe8 | NOTES pg=1239! 1–5. kāmasūtre1.4,5,72, 57–59 | 6. kādambaryām | 7. bṛhatkathāyāḥ prathamo bhāgaḥ | 8. ayaṃ vṛttāntaḥ hariścandracarite | 9. mālatīmādhave |
36. preṣyaḥ, kalahaṃsakaḥ mādhavasya citraphalakānayane1 |
37. ātmā, maharṣiveṣo rāvaṇasya sītāharaṇe |
38. jñātiḥ, mahāśvetā kādambaryāścandrāpīḍānayane |
39. aurasaḥ, nāciketuḥ pitureva māturupayamane2 |
40. kanīyān, gopālakaḥ pālakasya kathāmukhalambhe |
(6. arthataḥ —8)
athāto 'rtha—prayojana—prayoga—yogyatā—vatāmudāharaṇāni | tatra asiddhāya yasmai pumān pravartate saḥ arthyamānatvādarthaḥ |
pūrvasiddhaṃ sat yadyenamasmai karmaṇe pravartayati tatpravṛttinimittatvāt prayojanam |
prayojanāpekṣayā rūpasvarūpaveṣabhāṣādivyatyayaḥ prayogaḥ |
sambhāvanādibhiryathāsthānamupayogo yogyatā | tatra
41. artheṣu yataḥ svakāryasiddhiḥ so 'rthaḥ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.27)
so 'haṃ tṛṣṇāturairvṛṣṭiṃ vidyutvāniva cātakaiḥ |
ariviprakṛtairdevaiḥ prasūtiṃ prati yācitaḥ || 10 ||
42. vyasanapraśasanam anarthapratighātaḥ1, yathā—(raghu. 16.69)
tasmāt samudrādiva mathyamānādud‍vṛttanakrāt sahasonmamajja |
lakṣmyeva sārdhaṃ surarājavṛkṣaḥ kanyāṃ puraskṛtya bhujaṅgarājāḥ || 11 ||
43. kāryasiddhau sādhāraṇyamubhayoḥ sahārthatā, yathā—
tasya droṇo dhanuṣi na gurussvasti devavratāya cchannābhyāsaṃ kurupatirayaṃ śrīsamụ̄dhairvilāsaiḥ |
bhoḥ karṇādyāśśṛṇuta tadimāṃ brāhmaṇasyāsya vāṇīṃ rādhāyantraṃ racayata punarviddhamapyastvaviddham || 12 ||
44. deśakālātmaprāp‍taucityajñānamāp‍tiḥ yathā—(raghu. 6.20)
tato nṛpāṇāṃ śrutavṛttavaṃśā puṃvat pragalbhā pratihārarakṣī |
prāk sannikarṣaṃ gamadheśvarasya nītvā kumārīmavadat sunandā || 13 ||
NOTES pg=1240! 1. katheyaṃ bhīṣmasyeti jñāyate iti rāghavaḥ | 2. vyasanapraśasanamarthaprati॰ iti rā. HOS pṛ. 1362
45. vañcanīyeṣu kālaharaṇaṃ pratāraṇam, yathā—(māmā. 6.2)
he rājānaścaramavayasāmājñayā sañcaradhvaṃ kartavyeṣu, śravaṇasubhagaṃ bhūmidevāḥ paṭhantu |
citraṃ nānāvacananivahaiśceṣṭatāṃ maṅgalebhyaḥ pratyāsannastvarayati hi no janyayātrāpraveśaḥ || 14 ||
46. upakṛtasya pratyupakaraṇam ānṛṇyaṃ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.86)
'adyaprabhṛtyavanatāṅgi! tavāsmi dāsaḥ' || 15 || (pṛ. 1184) ityādi
47. karmāpādanamātraṃ kīrtiḥ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 3.23)
sa mādhavenābhimatena sakhyā ratyā ca sāśaṅkamanuprayātaḥ |
aṅgavyayaprārthitakāryasiddhiḥ sthāṇvāśramaṃ haimavataṃ jagāma || 16 ||
48. karmātiśayādibhiḥ manaḥprasādaḥ prītiḥ, yathā—(māmā. 10.23)
ślāghyānāṃ guṇināṃ dhuri sthitavati śreṣṭhānvavāye tvayi pratyastavyasane mahīyasi paraṃ prīto 'smi jāmātari |
teneyaṃ madayantikādya bhavataḥ prītyai tava preyase mitrāya prathamānurāgaghaṭitāpyasmābhirutsṛjyate || 17 ||
(7. prayojanataḥ —8)
prayojaneṣu—
49. mā bhūdanayoḥ parasparamayogādatyāhitamiti dayā, yathā—(māmā. 4.5)
mā vāṃ sapat‍neṣvapi nāma tad bhūt pāpaṃ yadasyāṃ tvayi vā viśaṅkyam |
tat sarvathā saṅgamanāya yat‍naḥ prāṇavyayenāpi mayā vidheyaḥ || 18 ||
50. nāyakena nāyikāyāṃ hṛdayabandhanaṃ s‍nehaḥ, yathā—(māmā. 6.7)
vidhātā bhadraṃ no vitaratu manojñāya vidhaye vidheyāsurdevāḥ paramamaraṇīyāṃ pariṇatim |
kṛtārthau bhūyāstāṃ priyasuhṛdapatye paramataḥ prayat‍naḥ kṛts‍no 'yaṃ phalatu śivatātiśca bhavatu || 19 ||
51. yuktāvimau parasparasyeti kutūhalaṃ, yathā—(māmā. 1.16)
śarajjyots‍nākāntaṃ kumudamiva taṃ nandayatu sā sujātaṃ kalyāṇī bhavatu kṛtakṛtyassa ca yuvā |
varīyānanyonyapraguṇaguṇanirmāṇanipuṇo vidhāturvyāpāraḥ phalatu ca manojñaśca bhavatu || 20 ||
52. lajjādibhiḥ nāyakayoranirvāde vastuno/vastuni jñānamabhiprāyopalambhaḥ, yathā—
tasmin samāveśitacittavṛttiminduprabhāmindumatīmavetya |
pracakrame vaktumanukramajñā savistaraṃ vākyamidaṃ sunandā || 21 ||(raghu. 6.70)
53. nāyakayoḥ pūrvapuruṣaiḥ tatra vastuni protsāhanaṃ pūrvaprārthanā, yathā—(māmā. 1.9)
yanmāṃ vidheyaviṣaye sa bhavānniyuṅkte s‍nehasya tatphalamasau praṇayasya sāraḥ |
prāṇaistapobhirathavā 'bhimataṃ madīyaiḥ kṛtyaṃ ghaṭeta suhṛdo yadi tat kṛtaṃ syāt || 22 ||
54. saiva nāyake nāyikāyā vihitānyataraprārthanā yathā—(māmā. 4.6)
dayā vā s‍neho vā bhavati hi nije 'smin śiśujane bhavatyāssaṃsārād viratamapi cittaṃ dravayati |
ataśca pravrajyāsulabhasamayācāravimukhaḥ prasaktaste yat‍naḥ prabhavati punardaivamaparam || 23 ||
55. phalanirapekṣāpravṛttiśśīlam, yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.50)
tāṃ nāradaḥ kāmacaraḥ kadācit kanyāṃ kila prekṣya pitussamīpe |
samādideśaikavadhūṃ bhavitrīṃ premṇā śarīrārdhaharāṃ harasya || 24 ||
56. parasparaspardhā saṅgharṣaḥ, yathā—
aha bhaṇaï aalasāmī kaïvaa—diasaṃtaraṃta—majjhammi |
ṇāṇesi pāamūle jaï gaṇiaṃ tā ṇa jīāmi || 25 ||
(atha bhaṇati acalasvāmī katipayadivasāntarāntamadhye |
nānayasi pādamūle yadi gaṇikāṃ tarhi na jīvāmi ||)
(8. prayogataḥ —8)
57. prayogeṣu rūpādi(nā) pracchanno, yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.30)
athājināṣāḍhadharaḥ pragalbhavāg jvalanniva brahmamayena tejasā |
viveśa kaścijjaṭilastapovanaṃ śarīrabaddhaḥ prathamāśramo yathā || 26 ||
58. prakāśo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84)
ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī cacāla sā ca stanabhinnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitaḥ samālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 27 ||
59. hīno yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.40)
ato 'tra kiñcidbhavatīṃ bahukṣamāṃ dvijātibhāvādupapannacāpalaḥ |
ayaṃ janaḥ praṣṭumanāstapodhane na ced rahasyaṃ prativaktumarhasi || 28 ||
60. utkṛṣṭo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.31)
tamātitheyaṃ(yī) bahumānapūrvayā saparyayā pratyudiyāya pārvatī |
bhavanti sāmye 'pi niviṣṭacetasāṃ vapurviśeṣeṣvatigauravāḥ kriyāḥ || 29 ||
61. uddhato yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.50)
kiyac‍ciraṃ śrāmyasi gauri! vidyate mamāpi pūrvāśramasañcitaṃ tapaḥ |
tadardhabhāgena labhasva kāṅ‌kṣitaṃ patiṃ tamicchāmi ca sādhu veditum || 30 ||
62. udātto yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.32)
vidhiprayuktāṃ pratigṛhya satkriyāṃ pariśramaṃ nāma vinīya ca kṣaṇam |
umāṃ sa paśyan‍nṛjunaiva cakṣuṣā pracakrame vaktumanujjhitakramaḥ || 31 ||
63. dhṛṣṭo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.83)
nivāryatāmāli! kimapyasau vaṭuḥ punarvivakṣuḥ sphuritottarādharaḥ |
na kevalaṃ yo mahato 'pabhāṣate śṛṇoti tasmādapi yassa pāpabhāk || 32 ||
64. śaṭho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.72)
vapurvirūpākṣamalakṣyajanmatā digambaratvena niveditaṃ vasu |
vareṣu yad bālamṛgākṣi! dṛśyate tadasti kiṃ vyastamapi trilocane || 33 ||
(9. yogyatāyāḥ —4)
yogyeṣu nisṛṣṭārthaḥ prāyo yathā........., dūtasampreṣaṇe parimitārtho yathā ........,
sandeśadāne patrahārako yathā........, patrapraṇidhāne mūkadūto yathā........
agrato dūtīkalpe vakṣyāmaḥ | etena etatprabhedā api vyākhyātāḥ |
kā punariyaṃ yogyatā?
nanūktaṃ sambhāvanādibhiryathāsthānamupayogo yogyatā iti |
ke punassambhāvanādayaḥ?
sambhāvanātha viśvāsaḥ pravṛttirmantrasaṅgrahaḥ |
manonirvāṇamutsāha āśvāsaḥ kāryanirṇayaḥ || 34 || iti |
tatra prekṣāpūrvakārī dūtasampreṣaṇādiṣu vartamānaḥ, jātimatsu devādiṣveva dautyaṃ sambhāvayati | guṇavastu pitṛpaitāmahādiṣveva viśvasiti | kriyānimitteṣu sahapāṃsu— krīḍitādiṣveva pravartate | dravyanimitteṣu mālākārādiṣveva mantrasaṅgrahaṃ karoti | sambandhiṣu gurvādiṣveva saṃśayacchedaṃ vidhatte | arthapareṣveva pratyāśāmutsahate | prayojanapareṣveva śaśvadāśvasiti | prāyogikeṣveva kāryasiddhiṃ niścinoti, iti |
sambhāvanādīnāmapi ko heturiti cet? ya eva nisṛṣṭārthāderdūtabhedasya dūtyabhiprāyeṇa buddhimanto vāggminaśca vyāpriyante | yadāha— (ṛve. 10.71.2)
sak‍tumiva titaünā punanto yatra dhīrā manasā vācaḥ kuru |1
yatrāsahāyaḥ sakhyāni jānate bhadraiṣāṃ lakṣmīrnihitādhivāci || 35 ||
kiñca—(māmā. 3.11)
śās‍tre pratiṣṭhā sahajaśca bodhaḥ prāgalbhyamabhyastaguṇā ca vāṇī |
kālāvabodhaḥ pratibhānavatvamete guṇāḥ kāmadughāḥ kriyāsu || 36 ||
tatra buddhimate(ttve?) śuśrūṣādayo 'ṣṭau dhīguṇā eva yogyatāyāḥ hetuḥ —
1. śuśrūṣā, 2. śravaṇaṃ, 3. grahaṇaṃ, 4. dhāraṇaṃ, 5. vijñānaṃ, 6–7. ūhāpohau, 8. tattvābhiniveśaḥ iti |
buddhimān hi śrotavyaṃ śuśrūṣate; śuśrūṣitaṃ śṛṇotiḥ śrutaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti; gṛhītaṃ dhārayati, dhṛtaṃ vikalpayati, vikalpitaṃ tarkayati; tarkitamapohate; apoḍhaṃ niścinoti' iti |
vāggmitve tu (hetuḥ) puṇyaparipākajanmāntarīyasaṃskārābhyāsayogaḥ |
yathocyate— (kirātā. 14.3)
viviktavarṇābharaṇā sukhaśrutiḥ prasādayantī hṛdayānyapi dviṣām |
pravartate nākṛtapuṇyakarmaṇāṃ prasannagambhīrapadā sarasvatī || 37 ||
api ca—(saka. 2.177)
vidyāspa/syando vāgvidāṃ yaḥ prasannaḥ pūjyāṃ vācaṃ devatāṃ tāṃ namāmaḥ |
yāṃ brahmāṇaścetayante viśokāḥ sā no deyāt sūnṛtā sūnṛtāni || 38 ||

tatra darśiteṅgitākārāyāṃ praviraladarśanāyām apūrvāyāṃ ca prayojyāyāṃ dūtaprayogaḥ | sa caināṃ śīlato 'nupraviśediti praveśaḥ| tatra ca padātpadāntaramākāṅkṣediti saṅkṣepaḥ; ṣaṭpra kāraḥ, aṣṭādaśaprakāro veti vistaraḥ | yathā—
'vidhiprayuktāṃ pratigṛhya satkriyām' || 73 || (kusaṃ. 5. 32) ityata ārabhya 'iti praviśyābhihitā dvijanmanā' itiparyantaḥ kumārasambhave (5. 32—51)
upod‍ghātaḥ padaṃ caiva padārthaḥ padavigrahaḥ |
cālanā pratyavasthātra vyākhyā tatrāsya ṣaḍ‌vidhā || 74 ||
ṣaṇṇāmapi pṛthak traividhyādāṣṭādaśaprakāratvam | teṣu —
1. prastāvanāmātramupod‍ghātaḥ| saḥ anuṣaṅgaprasaṅgānuprasaṅgabhedāt trividhaḥ | tatra—
anuṣaṅgo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.33)
api kriyārthaṃ sulabhaṃ samitkuśaṃ jalānyapi snānavidhikṣamāṇi te |
api svaśaktyā tapasi pravartase śarīramādyaṃ khalu dharmasādhanam || 75 ||
prasaṅgo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.34)
api tvadāvarjitavārisambhṛtaṃ pravālamāsāmanubandhi vīrudhām |
cirojjhitālaktakapāṭalena te tulāṃ yadārohati dantavāsasā || 76 ||
anuprasaṅgo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.35)
api prasannaṃ hariṇeṣu te manaḥ karasthadarbhapraṇayāpahāriṣu |
yadutpalākṣepacalairvilocanaistavākṣisāpat‍nyamiva prayuñjate || 77 ||
2. prastutasya sthirīkaraṇaṃ padam| tad upakṣepavikṣepaprakṣepaiḥ trividham | tatra— upakṣepo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.36)
yaducyate pārvati! pāpavṛttaye na rūpamityavyabhicāri tad vacaḥ |
tathāhi te śīlamudāradarśane tapasvināmapyupadeśatāṃ gatam || 78 ||
vikṣepo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.37)
vikīrṇasap‍tarṣibaliprahāsibhiḥ tathā na gāṅgaiḥ salilairdivaścayutaiḥ |
yathā tvadīyaiścaritairanāvilaiḥ mahīdharaḥ pāvita eva sānvayaḥ || 79 ||
prakṣepo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.38)
anena dharmassaviśeṣamadya me trivargasāraḥ pratibhāti bhāmini! |
tvayā manonirviṣayārthakāmayā yadeka eva pratigṛhya sevyate || 80 ||
3. tatprayogaḥ padārthaḥ| so 'pi tredhā—upakramaḥ, prakramaḥ, anukrama iti | tatra upakramo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5. 39)
prayuktasatkāraviśeṣamātmanā na māṃ paraṃ sampratipattumarhasi |
yatassatāṃ sannatagātri! saṅgataṃ manīṣibhissāp‍tapadīnamucyate || 81 ||
prakramo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.40)
ato 'tra kiñcit bhavatīṃ bahukṣamāṃ dvijātibhāvādupapannacāpalaḥ |
ayaṃ janaḥ praṣṭumanāstapodhane! na cedrahasyaṃ prativaktumarhasi || 82 ||
anukramo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.41)
kule prasūtiḥ prathamasya vedhasastrilokasaundaryamivoditaṃ vapuḥ |
amṛgyamaiśvaryasukhaṃ navaṃ vayaḥ tapaḥ phalaṃ syāt kimitaḥ paraṃ tava || 83 ||
4. (padavigrahaḥ) pra[stutasyāsvīkāro 'pyanupapanna iti kathanaṃ padavigrahaḥ]1 tadapi tredhā — 'vitarkavismayavipratiṣedhabhedāt | teṣu —'
vitarko yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.42)
bhavatyaniṣṭādapi nāma dussahānmanasvināṃ sampratipattirīd‍ṛśī |
vicāramārgaprahitena cetasā na dṛśyate tacca kṛśodari! tvayi || 84 ||
vismayo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.43)
alabhyaśokābhibhaveyamākṛtirvimānanā subhru! kutaḥ piturgṛhe |
parābhimarśo na tavāsti kaḥ karaṃ prasārayetpannagarat‍nasūcaye || 85 ||
vipratiṣedho yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.44)
kimityapāsyābharaṇāni yauvane dhṛtaṃ tvayā vārdhakaśobhi valkalam |
vada pradoṣe vinikīrṇatārakā vibhāvarī yadyaruṇāya kalpate || 86 ||
5. prastuteṣvasaṃhataṃ cālanā | sāpi jñātājñātaniṣṭhitabhedāt tridhā | tatra— avijñātaviṣayā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.45)
divaṃ yadi prārthayase vṛthā śramaḥ pituḥ pradeśāstava devabhūmayaḥ |
athopayantāramalaṃ samādhinā na rat‍namanviṣyati mṛgyate hi tat || 87 ||
jñātaviṣayā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.46)
niveditaṃ niḥśvasitena soṣmaṇā manastu me saṃśayameva gāhate |
na dṛśyate prārthayitavya eva te bhaviṣyate prārthitadurlabhaḥ katham || 88 ||
niṣṭhitaviṣayā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.47)
aho sthiraḥ ko 'pi tavepsito yuvā cirāya karṇotpalaśūnyatāṃ gate |
apekṣate yaḥ ślathabandhinīrjaṭāḥ kapoladeśe kalamāgrapiṅgalāḥ || 89 ||
6. kathaṃcinmarṣaṇaṃ pratyavasthā| sāpi tredhā— samīpasthā, śliṣṭā, antargatā ca | tāsu— samīpasthā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.48)
munivrataistvāmatimātrakarśitāṃ divākarāpluṣṭavibhūṣaṇāspadām |
śaśāṅkalekhāmiva paśyato divā sacetasaḥ kasya mano na dūyate || 90 ||
śliṣṭā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.49)
avaimi saubhāgyamadena vañcitaṃ tava priyaṃ yaścaturāvalokinaḥ |
karoti lakṣyaṃ ciramasya cakṣuṣo na vaktramātmīyamarālapakṣmaṇaḥ || 91 ||
antargatā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.50)
kiyacciraṃ śrāmyasi gauri! khidyase(vidyate?) mamāpi pūrvāśramasañcitaṃ tapaḥ |
tadardhabhāgena labhasva kāṅkṣitaṃ varaṃ tamicchāmi ca sādhu veditum || 92 ||
(2. viś‍vāsanam —6)
(saināṃ śīlato 'nu)praviśya cākhyāna—kapaṭaiḥ, subhagaṅkaraṇayogaiḥ, janapravādaiḥ, pūrvavṛttāntaiḥ, kavikathābhiḥ, pāradārikakathābhiśca viśvāsayed (kāsū. 5.4.2) iti viśvāsanam| teṣu—
1. mithyāmithaḥpraśnottarādibhiḥ prayojyayoratisandhānaṃ kapaṭaḥ| yathāmālatamādhave
dvitīyāṅke— || 93 ||
lavaṅgikā— kusalaṃ bhaavadīe | (kuśalaṃ bhagavatyai |)
kāmandakī— (niḥśvasya) kuśalamiva |
lavaṅgikā— (svagataṃ) patthāvaṇā kkhu esā kavaḍaṇāḍaassa | (prastāvanā khalveṣā kapaṭanāṭakasya |)
avalokitā— cirāidaṃ bhaavadīe | ṇaṃ bhaṇāmi assatthasarīro mahābhāo māhavo tti (cirāyitaṃ bhagavatyā | nanu bhaṇāmi asvasthaśarīro mahābhāgo mādhava iti |)
kāmandakī— idaṃ gamyate, vatse, anujānīhi mām |
lavaṅgikā— (janāntikaṃ) sahi māladi, saṃpadaṃ bhaavadīe saāsādo tassa mahāṇuhāassa uggamaṃ jāṇīmo | (sakhi mālati, sāmprataṃ bhagavatyā— ssakāśāt tasya mahānubhāvasya udgamaṃ jānīmaḥ |)
mālatī— (janāntikaṃ) atthi me koūhalaṃ | (asti me kautūhalam |)
lavaṅgikā— (prakāśaṃ) (māmā. 2.81 ś‍lokāt param) ko eso māhavo ṇāma, jassiṃ bhaavadī evvaṃ siṇehagaruaṃ attāṇaṃ dhāredi? (ka eṣa mādhavo nāma yasmin bhagavatī evaṃ snehagurukamātmānaṃ dhārayati |)
kāmandakī— aprastāvikī mahatyeṣā kathā |
lavaṅgikā— taha vi ācakkhia bhaavadī pasādaṃ karedu (tathāpi ākhyāya bhagavatī prasādaṃ karotu) | ﻿
kāmandakī— 'śrūyatām asti' ityata ārabhya 'sa eṣa mādhavo nāme'—ti mālatī śrāvayati |
lavaṅgikā— kudo mahohahiṃ vajjhia pāriāassa ud‌gamo (kuto mahodadhiṃ varjayitvā parijātasya ud‌gama़) ityevamādi | (māmā. 2.11taḥparam)
taduktam—
bahiḥsarvākārapravaṇaramaṇīyaṃ vyavaharan parābhyūhasthānānyapi tanutarāṇi sthagayati |
janaṃ vidvānekassakalamatisandhāya kapaṭai— staṭasthaḥ svānarthān ghaṭayati ca maunaṃ ca bhajate || 94 ||(māmā. 1.17)
2. abhigāmikayogassubhagaṅkaraṇam|
yathā— tatraiva tṛtīyaṣaṣ‍ṭhāṅkayoḥ (māmā. 3 praveśake)— 'ajja kisaṇacaddasi tti jaṇaṇīe samaṃ māladī saṃkaraüraṃ gamissadi | tado evvaṃ sohaggaṃ bạdhḍhaï tti devadārāhaṇaṇimittaṃ sahatthakusumāvaaaṃ uddisia bhaavadī lavaṃgiādudīaṃ māladiṃ taṃ evva kusumāarujjāṇaṃ āṇaïssadi' (adya kṛṣṇacaturddaśīti jananyā samaṃ mālatī śaṅkarapuraṃ gamiṣyati | tata evaṃ kila saubhāgyaṃ vardhata iti devatārādhananimittaṃ svahastakusumāvacamuddiśya bhagavatī lavaṅgikādvitīyāṃ mālatīṃ tadeva kusumākarodyānamāneṣyati |)
yathā ca— sahi eso aṅgarāo imā(o) kuumamālāo | ma to imāsmiṃ pāṇiggahaṇamaṃgalārambhe sohaggasaṃpattiṇimittaṃ devadāo accehiṃ | (sakhi, eṣa aṅgarāgaḥ; imāḥ kusumamālāḥ | tadasmin pāṇigrahaṇamaṅgalārambhe saubhāgyasampattinimittaṃ devatā arcaya |) iti |
3. yathā tatraiva (janapravādaḥ)— addhi)atthi) esā ṇariṃdavaaṇāṇuroheṇa ṇaṃdaṇassa paḍivaṇṇā māladi tti saalo jaṇo amattaṃ juujjaï(jugucchaï) | (astyeṣā narendravacanānurodhena nandanasya pratipannā mālatīti sakalī jano 'mātyaṃ jugupsate |)
yathā vā—
anurāgapravādastu vatsayossārvalaukikaḥ |
śreyānasmākamevaṃ hi pratāryau rājanandanau || 95 ||(māmā. 1.16) ﻿
4. (pūrvavṛttāntaḥ) pūrā cakame duṣyantaṃ śakuntalā, rukmiṇī kaṃsavdiṣam, uṣā aniruddham, ityevamādi buddhikalpitamudāharaṇam | (kāsū. 5.4) |
5. kavikathā yathā— mahāśvetā puṇḍarīkaṃ, candrapīḍaṃ kādambarī, gurubhirapradattā pratipattimāpede | vāsavadattā ca sañjayāya rārjñe, mālatī rājasuhṛde nandanāya pitrā pradattamātmānamudayanāya, mādhavāya ca prāyacchat | (māmā. 2.7/8)
6. paradāraprayojanamitihāsādiḥpāradārikaṃ yathā— astyahalyeti gautamamaharṣeḥ priyakalatraṃ, tāmindraścakame | tatastam 'ahalyāyai jāra' iti nirjānanti | asti tāreti vācaspate: surapurodhasaḥ dharmapat‍nī | sā prajāpatimaticarataḥ patyuramarṣāt kiyantaṃ kālaṃ somena saha uṣitvā budhābhidhānamātmajaṃ suṣuve | evamañjanā prabhañjanena, kṛttikāpariṣat kṛśānunā hanūmantaṃ kārtikeyaṃ ceti |
(3. upāvartanam)
viśvasya ca 'kathamevaṃvidhaḥ patiriti patyāvanuśayaṃ grāhayitvā, na tava subhage dāsyamapi yuktaḥ kartumiti brūyāt' (kāsū. 5.4) ityupāvartanam |
tatrodāharaṇacchāyā— (māmā. 2.6.)
idamiha madanasya jaitramastraṃ sahajavilāsanibandhanaṃ śarīram |
anucitavarasamprayogaśocyaṃ viphalaguṇatiśayaṃ bhaviṣyatīti || 96 ||
yathā vā—(māmā. 2. 8.)
rājñaḥ priyāya suhṛde sacivāya kāryād‌datvātmajāṃ bhavatu nirvṛtimānamātyaḥ |
durdarśanena ghaṭatāmiyamapyanenadhūmagraheṇa vimalā śaśinaḥ kaleva || 97 ||
bhūyaśca yathāpurastādupāyeṣu vakṣyāmaḥ |
yadāha kāmandakī—(māmā. 3.1)
tathā vinayanamrāpi mayā mālatyupāyataḥ |
nītā katipayahena sakhīvisrambhasevyatām || 98 ||
(4. anuvartanam)
'nāyakayoḥ caritamanukūlatayā kāmitāni ca varṇayet' (kāsū. 5.4) ityanuvartanaṃ, yathā—(māmā. 1.23) ﻿
anyeṣu cantuṣu ca yastamasāvṛteṣu viśvasya dhātari samaḥ parameśvare 'pi |
so 'yaṃ prasiddhavibhavaḥ khalu cittajanmā mā lajjayā tava kathaṃcidapahrutirbhūt || 99 ||
yathā vā— 'ucitastāvadasyāṃ bhavato 'bhiṣaṅga' iti | 'amātyabhūrivasoḥ ātmajetyaparyāp‍tirbahumānasya iti |' (māmā. 1. 38/39)
api ca—'mālatī, mālatīti modate bhagavatī kāmandakī | mālatyā api snehadarśanāt suślaṣ‍ṭametat' (māmā. 1.35/36)
kiñca— 'sahi diṭiṭhaaā de aṇuruvaḥ ahilāso | sāaraṃ ujjhia mahāṇaī kahiṃ vā odaraḍa? kiṃ aṇṇado caridavvamedi? kā vā dāṇiṃ sahaāramaṃtareṇa adimuttalaaṃ pallavidaṃ sahedi? (sakhi! diṣ‍ṭayā te 'nurūpo 'bhilāṣaḥ | sāgaramujjhitvā mahānadī (kutra vāvatarati)? | kimanyataḥ caritavyameti(?)ko vā idānīṃ sahakāramantareṇātimuk‍talatāṃ (pallavitāṃ sahate)? (śāku. 3.10/11) ॰॰॰ ṇa sahejja ṇahaaṃṇā ॰॰॰ (na sahisyate nakhaśaṅkā) tuhmārisīo pakkhavāiṇīo hoti | sahi māladīe vi ramaṇīaaṇurāa evva ramaṇijjo imassiṃ mahāṇuhāve aṇurāappavādo tti | (yuṣmādṛśyaḥ pakṣapātinyaḥ bhavanti sakhi! mālatyā api ramaṇīyānurāga eva rāmaṇīye 'smin mahānubhāve 'nurāgapravādaḥ) iti || 100 ||'
yasya yasya hi yo bhāvastena tena hi taṃ naram |
anupraviśya medhāvī kṣipramātmavaśaṃ nayet || 101 || iti || (pañcatantram1.74)
cittānuvartanācca prasṛtasadbhāvāyāṃ tasyāṃ kāryaśarīramitthaṃ vadet 'śrṛṇu vicitramidaṃ subhage, tvaṃ (tvāṃ) kila saṃdṛśyāmutra asāvitthaṃ gotraputro nāyakaḥ unmādamanubhavati | dvitīye ahani vāci vaktre dṛṣ‍ṭayāṃ ca prasādamasyā lakṣayitvā punarapi kathāṃ pravartayet (kāmasū. 5.4) nāyakasya saubhāgyaṃ ślāghanīyatayā pracchannatsamprayogaṃ bhūtamabhūtaṃ vā kīrtayet (kāmasū. 5.4) | śrṛṇvatāṃ vā ahalyā 'vimārakaśākuntalādīnyanyāni ca sotkaṇṭhāni kathatet (kāmasū. 5.4) | tadevaṃ 'prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ (kumāraḥ) kadācidanyatra aparikliṣ‍ṭapūrvastapasvī, tato 'dhunā śakyamanena maraṇamapyanubhavitum |' iti ca varṇayet |
(4. kāryopanyāsaśuddhiḥ)
iṅgitākārāṃśca lakṣayediti kāryopanyāsaśuddhiḥ (kāsū. 5.4) |
yathā mālatīmādhave— ﻿
kamandakī— (mālatyāścibukamunnamayya) 'śrṛṇu vicitramidaṃ subhage, asti tāvad ekadā prasaṅgataḥ kathita eva mayā mādhavābhidhānaḥ kumāraḥ, yastvamiva māmakīnsya manasaḥ dvitīyaṃ bandhanam (māmā. 3.8)
lavaṅgikā— sumarāmo | (smarāmaḥ|)
kāmandakī— asti vidarbhādhipasya narateramātyaḥ samagrapuruṣaprakāṇḍacakra— cūḍāmaṇirdevarāto nāma, yamaśeṣabhuvanamahanīyapuṇyamahimānamātmanaḥ sāmarthyāt pitaiva te jānāti yaśca yādṛśaśceti (māmā. 2.8/9) |
api ca— (māmā. 2.9—11)
vyatikaritadigantāḥ śvetamānairyaśobhiḥ sukṛtivilasitānāṃ sthānamūrjasvalānām |
akalitamahimānaḥ ketanaṃ maṅgalānāṃ kathamapi bhuvane 'smiṁstādṛśāssambhavanti || 102 ||
tata udayagirerivaika eva sphuritaguṇadyutisundaraḥ kalāvān |
iha jagati mahotsavasya heturnayanavatāmudiyāya bālacandraḥ|| 103 ||
asau vadyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanā— dihāyātassampratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ |
yadalokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuṃvalayitavātāyanamiva || 104 ||
atra bālasuhṛdā makarandena saha vidyāmānvīkṣikīmadhīte | sa eṣa mādhavo nāmeti | kāmandakī— sa khalu manmathodyānayātrādivasāt prabhṛti durmanāyamānaḥ paravāniva śarīropatāpena | (māmā. 3.8/9)
yadindāvānandaṃ praṇayini jane vā na bhajate vyanak‍tyantastāpaṃ tadayamatidhoro 'pi viṣamam |
priyaṅguśyāmāṅgaprakṛtirapi cāpāṇḍumadhuraṃ vapuḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣāmaṃ vahati ramaṇīyaśca bhavati || 104 || (māmā. 3.9)
lavaṅgikā— idaṃ vi tassiṃ avasare bhaavadiṃ tuvarāaṃtīe (avaloidāe) udīriaṃ āsi | {idamapi tasminnavasare bhagavatīṃ tvarayantyā (avalokitayā) udīritamāsīt |}
kālandakī— yāvadaśrṛṇavaṃ mālatyevāsya manmathonmādaheturiti | mamāpi hi sa eva niścayaḥ. (māmā. 3.10) ﻿

kṣubhitamutkalikātaralaṃ manaḥ paya iva stimitasya mahodadheḥ || 106 ||
(6. avasthānivedanam)
nāyakayoḥ vilokanaśravaṇadivasādārabhya mitho 'bhilāṣāt cintādijanmanaḥ manovāgbuddhiśarorasyākalyasya sthānāt sthānāntaropavarṇanamavasthānivedanam | tacca kāryopanyāsaśeṣaḥ | yathāha kāmandakī— (māmā. 3.10—12)
'tadevaṃ prakṛtyā sukumāraḥ kumāraḥ | tadatrāparikliṣ‍ṭapūrvastapasvī | yato 'dhunā śakyamanena maraṇamapyanubhavitum | asau hi—'
dhatte cakṣurmukulini raṇatkokile bālacūte mārge gātraṃ kṣipati bakulāmodagarbhasya vāyoḥ |
dāvapremṇā sarasabisinīpatramātrāntarāya— stāmyanmūrtiśśrayati bahuśo mṛtyave candrapādān || 107 ||
yaccaitanmaraṇatāṃ daśamīṃ kāmasūtrakārāḥ kāmayamānāvasthāmāmananti | yadāhuḥ—'tasya daśa sthānāni cakṣuḥprītiḥ, manassaṅgaḥ, saṅkalpotpattī, nidrācchedaḥ, tanutā, viṣayebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ, lajjāpraṇāśaḥ, unmādaḥ, mūrcchā, maraṇam' (kāsū. 5.1) iti |
iha tu bhāveṣu maraṇānabhyupagamāt mṛtyuyogyataiva maraṇamucyate |
cakṣuḥprītiḥ punaḥ mitho 'bhilāṣa eva |
kāni tarhi cittajanmanaḥ daśasthānāni?
śrūyantām—'ṣaḍindriyāṇi, vaktraṃ, vāk, vapuḥ, ceṣ‍ṭā' iti | tatra—
manasi cintā, anusmaraṇaṃ ca |
buddhīndriyeṣu viṣayavyāvṛttirnidrācchedaśca |
vaktre lajjāpraṇāśaḥ unmādaśca |
vāci guṇakīrtanaṃ vilāpaśca |
vapuṣi vyādhiḥ tanutā ca |

saaṇe ciṃtāmaïaṃ kāūṇa piaṃ ṇimīliacchīe |

viṣayavyāvṛttiḥ yathā—(visā. 3.2)
saudhādudvijate tyajatyupavanaṃ dveṣṭi prabhāmaindavīṃ dvārāt trasyati citrakelisadaso veṣaṃ viṣaṃ manyate |

(tava virahojjāgarakaḥ svapne 'pi na dadāti darśanasukhāni |

unmādo yathā—(sūmu. 9)
candraṃ candanakardamena likhitaṃ yanmārṣṭi daṣṭādharā kāmaḥ puṣpaśaraḥ kileti sumanovargaṃ lunīte ca yat |
vandyaṃ nindati yacca manmathamasau bhaṅkatvā 'grahastāṅgulī— statkāmaṃ subhaga! tvayā varatanurvātūlatāṃ lambhitā || 113 ||
guṇakīrtanaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.137)
vilimpatyetasmin malayajarasārdreṇa mahasā diśāṃ cakraṃ cande sukṛtamatha tasyā mṛgadṛśaḥ |
dṛśorbāṣpaḥ pāṇau vadanamasavaḥ kaṇṭhakuhare hṛdi tvaṃ hnīḥ pṛṣṭhe vacasi ca guṇā eva bhavataḥ || 114 ||
vilāpo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.58)
yadā budhaiḥ sarvagatastvamucyase na vetsi bhāvasthāmimaṃ kathaṃ janam |

vyādhiryathā—
tasyāstāpamaharniśaṃ sa kathayāmyeṇīdṛśaste kathaṃ padminyāssarasaṃ dalaṃ vinihitaṃ yasyāśśamāyorasi |
