tanutā yathā—
(vaktraṃ tasyāḥ kṛśatarakapoladvayaṃ kāntilakṣyaṃ)1 bāṣpāmbhobhiścamiti patitaiḥ sūcyate ca stanāntaḥ |
tasyāḥ kiñcitsubhaga! tadabhūttānavaṃ tvadaviyoge yenākasmād valayapadavīmaṅgulīyaṃ prayāti || 117 ||
jā़ḍyaṃ yathā—(amaru. 110)
acchinnaṃ nayanāmbu bandhuṣu kṛtaṃ cintā gurubhyo 'rpitā dattaṃ dainyamaśeṣataḥ parijane tāpassakhīṣvāhitaḥ |
adya śvaḥ kila nivṛtiṃ vrajati sā śvāsaiḥ paraṃ khidyate vistrabdho bhava viprayogajanitaṃ duḥkhaṃ vimuktaṃ tayā || 118 || NOTES pg=1262! 1. pāda eṣo 'smābhiryojitaḥ|
mūrcchā yathā—
kathamiva manomohaṃ tasyāssakhe! kathayāmi te dahanapatitā dṛṣṭā mūrtirmayā nahi vaidhavī |
iti tu viditaṃ nārirūpassalokadṛśāṃ sudhā tava śaṭhatayā śilpotkarṣo vidhervighaṭiṣyate || 119 ||
(7. iṅgitākārajñānam)
iṅgitākārajñānamapi viśeṣatastatra prasiddhāyāṃ 'dvitīye 'hani vāci, vaktre, dṛṣṭyāṃ ca prasādamasyā lakṣayitvā punarapi kathāṃ pravartayediṅgitākārāṃśca lakṣayed' (kāmasū. 5.4) ityabhihitāt| 'te darśane prasīdati, virahe udvijate, vihasitaṃ kṛtvā sambhāṣate, ādareṇopamantrayate, āsannamāsanaṃ dadāti, iṣṭeṣūtsaveṣu smarati, bhakṣyeṣu ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ hāraṃ gacchati, kvāsi ॰ ॰ ॰ tvarayituṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ kiṃ vā kṛtamiti pṛcchati, vivikte darśayate, gṛhyamācaṣṭe, śaṅkāsthāneṣu nābhiśaṅkate, kathāyāṃ ramate, paravijñāpanāyāṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ pekṣate, vākyaṃ pratigṛh‍ṇāti, pathyamuktaṃ sahate, hastena, spṛśati, ślāghyenopahasani, parokṣe guṇān bravīti ॰ ॰ ॰ tadbhaktān pūjayati, mānaṃ vardhayati, arthaṃ karoti, anarthaṃ pratihanti, kṛtyeṣvātmānaṃ niyojayati, ākhyāyakamanuyuṅkte, śrutvā cintayati, jṛmbhate, niḥśvasiti; prītidāyaṃ ca dadāti, punardarśanānubandhaṃ visṛjati, sādhuvādinī satī kimidamaśobhanamabhidhatsa iti kathāmanubadhnāti, nāyakasya sādhya ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ pūrvasiddhaṃ ca tatsambandhaṃ darśanaṃ kathāṃ niyogaṃ vā svayamakathayantī tayā kathyamānaṃ kāṅkṣati, nāyakamanoratheṣu ca saparibhavaṃ nāma sahate, na ca nirvadati, tanmitreṣu viśvasiti, tayā saha krīḍāmabhinandati, svakarmasu caināṃ prabhaviṣṇuriva niyuṅkte'1 (kāsū. 5.4) iti| udāharaṇaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.2., 3)
vrajati virahe vaiciñyaṃ naḥ prasīdati sannidhau rahasi ramate prītyā dāyaṃ dadātyanuvartate |
gamanasamaye kaṇṭhe lagnā nirudhya nirudhya māṃ sapadi śapathaiḥ pratyāvṛttiṃ praṇamya ca yācate || 120 || NOTES pg=1236! 1. te darśane prasīdatītyārabhya prabhaviṣṇuriva niyuṅkta' iti yāvat sarvāṇi vākyāni bhojaracitānyeva ||
śākuntalādīnitihāsavādān prastāvitānanyaparairvacobhiḥ |
śrutvā madukatsaṅganiveśitāṅgīṃ cirāya cintāstimitatvameti || 121 ||
॰ ॰ ॰ hāryaṃ (?) yathā codāhṛtamiṅgitākāreṣu sthānasthāneṣu purastād darśiteṅgitākārāṃ nāyakābhijñānairupabṛṃhayet, sā cet saṃstutā syāt| asaṃstutāṃ tu guṇakathanairanurāgakathābhiśca āvarjayet| (kāsū. 5.4) 'manoharāṇi upāyanāni tāmbūlam anulepanaṃ strajamaṅgulīyakaṃ ॰ ॰ teṣu nāyakasya nakhadaśanapadāni tāni tāni cihnāni ca syuḥ| patracchedyāni ca nānābhiprāyākṛtīni darśayet| lekhagarbhāṇi ca karṇapatrādīni| teṣu ca tanmānorathākhyānaṃ prati prābhṛtadāne caināṃ niyojayed' iti (kāsū. 5.4) |
(8. upāyajñānam — 4)
upāyajñānam| teṣu ca prāg darśiteṅgitākārāṃ nāyakābhijñānairupabṛṃhayet |
sā cetsaṃstutā syāditi sāma |
asaṃstutāṃ guṇakathanairanurāgasaṅkathābhiścaināṃ niyojayediti bhedaḥ |
manoharāṇyupāyanāni tāmbūlamanulepanaṃ strajamaṅgulīyakaṃ vāso vā tena prahitāni |
tāni ca cihnāni syuriti daṇḍaḥ |
patracchedyāni nānābhiprāyākṛtīni preṣayet iti bhedadaṇḍau |
lekhagarbhāṇi, karṇapatrādīnīti dānabhedau |
teṣu ca tanmanorathākhyānamiti sāmabhedau| pratiprābhṛtadāne caināṃ niyojayediti dānadaṇḍau| te ca pratyekaṃ catvāraḥ pañcadhā bhavanti |
(1. sāma —5)
guṇakīrtanam, sambandhopākhyānam, parasparopakārasandarśanam, āyatipradarśanam, ātmopadhānaṃ ceti sāma |
1. teṣvabhijñādipraśaṃsā guṇakīrtanam| yathā—(saka. 5.369)
kulamamalinaṃ bhadrā mūrtiḥ matiśśrutiśālinī bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam |
bhujabalamalaṃ sphītā lakṣmīḥ prabhutvamakhaṇḍitam |
prakṛtisubhagā hyete bhāvā madasya ca hetavo vrajati puruṣo yairunmādaṃ ta eva tavāṅkuśāḥ || 122 ||
2. maitryādisaṃkīrtanaṃ sambandhopākhyānam| yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.39)
prayuktasatkāraviśeṣamātmanā na māṃ paraṃ sampratipattumarhasi |
yatassatāṃ sannatagātri! saṅgataṃ manīṣibhissāp‍tapadīnamucyate || 123 ||
3. svapakṣaparapakṣayoranyagrahākhyānaṃ parasparopakārasandarśanam| yathā—(śāku. 5.17)
ṇāvekkhio guruaṇo imīe ṇa tue vi pucchio baṃdhū |
ekkekkamevva carie bhaṇāmi kiṃ ekkamekkasya || 124 ||
(nāpekṣito gurujano 'nayā na tvayāpi pṛṣṭaḥ bandhuḥ |
ekaikameva carite bhaṇāmi kimekamekasya ||)
4. asminnevaṃgate idamedaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāśājananaṃ āyatipradarśanam| yathā—(bārā. 1.34)
so 'yaṃ svayaṃgrahaṇadurlalito daśāsyastvāṃ yācate duhitaraṃ paṇapūrvameva |
sambandhasandhimamunā ca sahānubhūya vaṃśo nimerjayatu yāvadiyaṃ dharitrī || 125 ||
5. yo 'haṃ sa bhavān, yanmama dravyaṃ tadbhavataḥ, svakṛtyeṣūpayujyatāmityātmopādhānaṃ, yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.50)
kiyacciraṃ śrāmayasi gauri vidyate mamāpi pūrvāśramasañcitaṃ tapaḥ |
tadardhabhāgena labhasva kāṅkṣitaṃ patiṃ tamicchāmi ca sādhu veditum || 126 ||
(2. bhedaḥ —5)
anyavidveṣaṇam, anyavyavartanam, anyopabhogadarśanam anyānurāgakathanam, anyasaubhāgyaprakāśanaṃ ceti bhedaḥ| taduktam— (kāsū. 5. 4, 64, 65, pṛ. 567 caukhaṃ. saṃ. 1964)
vidveṣaṃ grāhayet patyau ramaṇīyāni varṇayet |
citrān suratasambhogānanyāsāmapi darśayet || 127 ||
nāyakasyānurāgaṃ ca punaśca ratikauśalam |
prārthanaṃ cāparastrībhiravaṣṭambhaṃ ca varṇayet || 128 || tatra—
1. vidveṣaṃ grāhayet patyāviti vidveṣaṇam| yathā—
duddaṃsaṇeṇa īsālueṇa thereṇa duvviaṇ̇dheṇa |
ūvọdhā piasahi sāha(su) saṃpaaṃ kaha ṇu jīasi || 129 ||
(durdarśanenerṣyālunā sthavireṇa durvidagdhena |
upọdhā priyasakhi! kathaya sāmprataṃ kathaṃ nu jīvasi ||)
2. anyavyāvartanaṃ yathā—
kūrassa kāraṇaṭṭhaṃ dijjaï appā païssa ṇiaassa |
suraasuhaṃ puṇa muddhe hohii akkhaṇḍie sīle || 130 ||
(krūrasya kāraṇārthaṃ dīyate ātmā patyurnijakasya |
suratasukhaṃ punarmugdhe bhaviṣyati akhaṇḍite śīle ||)
3. citrān suratasambhogānanyāsāmapi darśayedityanyopabhogadarśanam |
yathā—(saka. 5.277)
apetavyāhāraṃ dhutavividhaśilpavyatikaraṃ karasparśārambhapragalitadukūlāntaśayanam |
muhurbaddhotkampaṃ diśi diśi muhuḥ preritadṛśo— rahalyāsutrāmṇoḥ kṣaṇikamiha tatsaṅgatamabhūt || 131 ||
4. nāyakasyānurāgaṃ ca punaśca ratikauśalaṃ ityanyānurāgakathanam| yathā—
sasimuhi muhassa lacchī ghaṇāliṇathaṇa cakkajuaṃ |
taṇuoari taṇuāaï haliasuo kuṇaü juttaṃ || 132 ||
(śaśimukhi! mukhasya lakṣmīḥ ghanālīnastananitamba—cakrayugam |
tanukodari! tanukāyate halikasutaḥ karotu yuktam ||)
5. prārthanaṃ cāparastrībhiravaṣṭambhaṃ ca varṇayedityanyasaubhāgyakathanam| yathā—(māmā. 2.11)
asau vidyādhāraśśiśurapi vinirgatya sadanā— dihāyātaḥ sampratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 133 ||
(3. dānam —5)
(deyavisargaḥ) gṛhītānurvatanam, āvartanapratipādanaṃ, svadravyadānam, ātmaparasveṣu svayaṃgrāhada(naṃ) ceti dānam| teṣu—
1. jita—nyasta—prayukta—pratiśrutādīnāṃ samarpaṇaṃ deyavisargaḥ| yathā—
dīpotsave 'dya bhavatā śatamekaviṃśa— dyūte jitā kitava! sā svayamāhṛtāni |
godāvarītaṭavaneṣu gatā vicetuṃ muktākadambakusumāni sakesarāṇi || 134 ||
2. adattasvīkṛtasya marṣaṇaṃ gṛhītānuvartanam| yathā—
sañjagmuṣā subhaga! bhīmarathīnikuñje saṃkhyāsstanāṃśukamagṛhyata yat tvayā naḥ |
svapne dadāsi gamayanna śaṭhatvameva tuṣyāmunā kimiti durlabhadarśano 'si || 135 ||
3. svayaṃgṛhītasya pratyarpaṇamāvartapratipādanam| yathā—(raghu. 16.86)
ityūcivānupahitābharaṇaḥ kṣitīśaṃ ślāghyo bhavān svajana ityanubhāṣitāram |
saṃyojayāṃ vidhivadāsa sametabandhuḥ kanyāmayena kumudaḥ kūlabhūṣaṇena || 136 ||
4. ātmīyasya hārakeyūrādeḥ prayatnano vitaraṇaṃ svadravyadānam| yathā—
āmucyatāmiha sudhārasadhāmni kaṇṭhe kādambarīprahita eṣa sa śeṣahāraḥ |
asyāḥ kumāra! tava nirjitamanmathāyāḥ mūrterguṇānuguṇamābharaṇaṃ kileti || 137 ||
5. mamānyasya sā yadasti tad‌dṛś‍yatāmiti ātmaparasveṣu svayaṃgrāhadānam| yathā—(māmā. 4.1)
yad vyālavraṇitasuhṛtpramohadagdhaṃ saujanyād vihitavatī gatavyathaṃ mām |
tat kāmaṃ prabhavatu pūrṇapātravṛttyā svīkartuṃ mama hṛdayaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca || 138 ||
(4. daṇḍaḥ —5)
śaṅkājananaṃ, abhibhartsanaṃ, arthāpaharaṇaṃ, parikleśanaṃ, upaghātaśca daṇḍaḥ| teṣu—
1. vacanabibhīṣikā śaṅkājananam| yathā—(mavīca. 1.59)
paulastyaḥ praṇayena yācata iti ślāghyena yenādaraḥ sambandhe sati yattrilokapatinā saukhye na tatra spṛhā |
gantavyā punaranyathāpi niyataṃ laṅkā tayā sītayā tanmā bhūdiha vaḥ purandarapurībandiprayukto vidhiḥ || 139 ||
2. praṇayakopādibhirākrośanamabhibhartsanam| yathā—(gāsa. 1.30ve.)
ṇikkiva jāābhīrua duddaṃsaṇa ṇiṃba—īḍa—sāriccha |
gāmo gāmiṇiṇaṃdaṇa tujjha kae taha vi taṇuāi || 140 ||
(niṣkṛpa jāyābhīruka durdarśana nimbakīṭasadṛśa! |
grāmo grāmaṇīnandana! tava kṛte tathāpi tanukāyate ||)
3. vastravibhūṣaṇāderbalacchalādibhiḥ ādānamarthāpaharaṇam| yathā—(mavīca. 1.59)
"bho gaṃgārola/geṇṭākarāla paacchasu nopavatthāni jāni majjaṃdidīṇaṃ tue apahitāni, aṃhehiṃ sagge gaṃtavvaṃ| kathaṃ sinānasāṭakesu parihitesu tattha vaccā—(gacchā)mo| agaccamānīo uṇa bhaāmo satakkutuno sāpāto| pabhataaṃ ca saṃvarikāaṃ silabhūdā ihavve avaciṭṭhissāmo||" (bho gaṅgārola/geṇṭākarāla prayaccha no vastrāṇi yāni majjantīnāṃ tvayā apahṛtāni| asmābhiḥ svarge gantavyam| kathaṃ snānaśāṭakeṣu parihṛteṣu tatra gacchāmaḥ? agacchantyaḥ punaḥ bibhimaḥ śatrakrato śāpāt| prabhātāyāṃ ca śarvarikāyāṃ śilābhūtāḥ ihaiva avasthāsyāmaḥ|) ityapsarobhirukte geṇṭākarālaḥ kaliṅgasenālambhe prāha—
'paacchāmi opavatthāni jamedi/jadi me ekka accharaṃ bhariaṃ saṃpaacchatha || 141 ||' (prayacchāmi aupavastrāṇi yadi me ekāmapsarasaṃ bhāryāṃ saṃprayacchatha|) iti|
4. kāmacārādeḥ vighātaḥ parikleśanam| yathā śākuntale—(1.27.3 pṛ. 546) priyaṃvadā— (śakuntalāmupasṛtya) halā! caṃḍi! tumaṃ ṇāruhasi gaṃtuṃ| rukkhaseaṇake me due dhāresi| tehiṃ dāva moāvehi attāṇaṃ tado gamissasi| (halā caṇḍi, tvaṃ nārhasi gantum| vṛkṣasecanake me dve dhārayasi| tābhyāṃ tāvat mocayatvātmānam| tato gamiṣyāsi) iti balādenāṃ nivartayati ||
5. vadhodyogaḥ upaghātaḥ, yathā—
iti paruṣamudīrya rājaputrīṃ maraṇavitīrṇamanāḥ paretabhūmau |
tribhuvanapatirujjagāma pīṭhāj jhaṭiti vimocitacandrahāsakośaḥ || 142 ||
eteṣāṃ ca (samastānāṃ) vyastānāṃ ca krameṇākrameṇa ca prayogo yathā— (mavīca. 1.30) (pṛ. 1106) 'kanyāratnamayonijanma bhavatām' itय़ādi || 143 || (pṛ. 1132)
(upāyānāṃ deśakālaviśeṣaḥ)
upāyāśca prayujyamānāḥ avaśyaṃ deśakālayoḥ viśeṣamapekṣante| parasparapakṣayora— bhidūtipratyayaḥ samāgamaḥ| ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tātyayapratīkāre gṛhodyāne gulmalatānikuñja— niṣkuṭādiṣu sakhī—bhikṣukī—tāpasī—bhavaneṣu, devatāyatane, devayātrāyā— mudyānakrīḍāyāṃ, jalāvataraṇe, vivāhayajñotsavavyasaneṣu, agnyutpāte, coravibhrame, janapadasya cakrāropaṇe, prekṣaṇavyāpāre (kāsū. 5.4)| yathā—(māmā. 7.3)
preyānmanorathasahastravṛtassa eṣa sup‍tapramattajanametadamātyaveśama |

kāmandakī—bhavati lavaṅgike vatsayā saha praviśābhyantaramitaḥ | stambhāpavāritau tiṣṭhāvaḥ | (māmā. 6.7–8) vayasya gatvā lavaṅgikāsthāne tiṣṭha | sahi mā ṇaṃ paḍibodhaïssasi | dāṇiṃ evva dummaṇāamāṇā īsa maṇṇe pasutteti | saṇiaṃ evva saa(ṇaddhammi) uvavisa | (sakhi maināṃ pratibodhayiṣyasi | idānīmeva durmanāyamānā īṣanmanye prasup‍teti | śanaireva śayanārdhe upaviśa |)
jitamiha bhuvane tvayā yadasय़āḥ sakhi vakulāvali vallabhāsi jātā |
pariṇata-bisadaṇḍa- pāṇḍu-mugdha-stana-pariṇāha-vilāsa-vaijayantī || 165 || iti
tāṃ vā tasya pradarśayediti praticchandaḥ|
aha so tumaṃ kaṃdappajaṇaṇiṃ rukkiṇiṃ via purusuttamo saaṃgāhasāhaseṇa sahadhammaāriṇiṃ karei | ko tado paḍivattī | sahi kīsa maṃ ettiaṃ āsāsedha | kāhaṃ imassa deṇa evva attāṇaṃ paṇīkadua maṃ miccukavalaṇādo kaḍḍiassa tassa ebva paraeassa? attaṇo sarīrasya | sahi saccaṃ karehi | kahidaṃ evva hiaāvedasūaehiṃ dīhaṇīsāsehiṃ | sarisaṃ mahāṇubhāvadāe | sumaresi edaṃ | (atha sa tvāṃ kandarpajananīṃ rukmiṇīmiva puruṣottamaḥ svayaṃgrāhasāhasena sahadharmacāriṇīṃ karoti | kā tataḥ pratipattiḥ | sakhi! kasmād māmetāvad āśvāsayatha | kāhametasya | tenaiva ātmānaṃ paṇīkṛtya māṃ mṛtyukabalanādīṣatkṛṣṭasya tasyaiva parakīyasya ātmanaśśarīrasya | sakhi satyaṃ kathaya | kathitameva hṛdayāvedasūcakaiḥ dīrghaniḥśvāsaiḥ | sadṛśaṃ mahānubhāvatāyāḥ | smarasyetat |) ityamantrastrāvapratipattiḥ |
uddāmadehaparidāhamahājvarāṇi saṅkalpasannidhivinoditavedanāni |

sahi uvālaṃbaṇijjaṃ ubāladdhāsi (sakhi, upālambhanīyamupālabdhāsi |)
mahābhāge evametat |

madayantikā—sahi malādi paḍibuddhāsi? (sakhi, mālati, pratibuddhāsi?) (vilokya saharṣasādhvasaṃ) aṃho aṇṇaṃ evva kiṃ vi edaṃ vaṭṭadi | (aho anyadeva kimapi etad vartate |)
rambhoru saṃhara bhayaṃ kṣamate vikāra— mutkampinasstanabharasya na madhyabhāgaḥ |
itthaṃ tvayaiva kathitapraṇayaprasāda saṅkalpanirvṛtiṣu saṃstuta eṣa dāsaḥ || 168 || (māmā. 7.1. / 2)
iti saṃyojanam |
kāmandakī—vatsa mādhava iyamaśeṣasāmantamastakottaṃsaparāgarañjitacaraṇāṅ— guleramātyabhūrivasorekāpatyaṃ mālatī bhagavatā sadṛśasaṃyogarasikena vedhasā manmathena ca tubhyaṃ dīyate |

(10. samāś‍vāsanam)

mādhavaḥ—(savilakṣaṃ) nahi, nahi |
kāmandakī—na tarhi prāgavasthāyāḥ (bhūrivasuḥ) parihīyate | tadidamāyuṣmantaṃ bodhayāmi | yadaiva nau vidyāgrahaṇāya nānādigantasāhacaryamāsīt tadaiva asmatsaudāminīsamakṣaṃ bhūrivasudevarātayoḥ vṛtteyaṃ pratijñā, avaś‍yamāvābhyāṃ apatyasambandhaḥ kartavya iti | iha tu vākpratiṣṭhāni dehināṃ vyavahāratantrāṇi | vāci puṇyāpuṇyahetvavasthāḥ sarvajanānāṃ āpatanti | idaṃ tāvatprasiddhameva— 'yaduta nandanāya mālatī prārthayamānaṃ bhūrivasurnṛpatimuktavān, prabhavati nijasya
kanyakājanasya mahārāja' iti | sampratyeva cāgatya puruṣeṇāveditam | yatkila rājñā padyāvatīśvareṇa amātyabhūrivasorupari viśvāsaṃ asmāsu ca prasādaṃ sabahumānamātanvatā bhaganamāgatya nandanāya mālatī pratipāditā | tatra bhūrivasoḥ vāga(nṛtaiva) | na khalu mahārājasya nijā kanyakā(mālatī) | kanyādāneṣu ca nṛpatayaḥ pramāṇamiti naivaṃvidhaḥ dharmācārasamayaḥ tasmādavicikitsitavyametat | api ca vatsa kimiti māmanavadhānāṃ manyase? paś‍yatu hi bhavān | (māmā. 4.1 / 2)
mā vāṃ sapat‍neṣvapi nāma tad bhūt pāpaṃ yadasyāṃ tvayi vā viśaṅkayam |
tat sarvathā saṅgamanāya yat‍na: prāṇavyayenāpi mayā vidheyaḥ || 170 ||
yathā vā—durlabhā na buddharakṣitāyāḥ priyasakhī bhavataḥ |
api ca—(māmā. 4. 9)

yā kaumudī nayanayorbhavatassujanmā tasyā bhavānapi manorathabaddhabandhuḥ |
tatsaṅgamaṃ prati sakhe! nahi saṃśaye 'sti yasminvidhiśca madanaśca kṛtābhiyogaḥ || 172 || (māmā. 1. 37)

anyonyasambhinnadṛśāṃ sakhīnāṃ tasyāstvayi prāganurāgacihnam |

kalahaṃsaḥ—(upasṛtya) edaṃ a | (etacca |) (citraphalakaṃ darśayati |)
yathā ca— vayasya kathaṃ bhagavatyāḥ sā medhāśaktirviparyeṣyati |
yathā ca—
makarandaḥ— api nāma buddharakṣitāsaṅkrāntā bhagavatīnītirvijeṣyate |
lavāṅgikā—ko sandeho mahābhāassa | kiṃ bahuṇā, jaha eso maṃjīrasaddo taha jāṇāmi deṇa vavadeseṇa āṇīdā buddharakkhidāe madaaṃtietti | tā uttarīāvavārido suttalakkhaṇo ciṭṭha | (kassandeho mahābhāgasya | kiṃ bahunā | yathaiṣa mañjīraśabdaḥ tathā jānāmi tena vyapadeśenānītā buddharakṣitayā madayantiketi | taduttarīyāpavāritaḥ sup‍talakṣaṇastiṣṭha) || 174 ||
yathā ca—sahi evvaṃ pi ṇāddhi āsāso | jassa kāraṇādo tumaṃ ukkhaḍiabaṃdhaṇaṃ kaṃkelipallava via hiaaṃ dhāreṃdī kilaṃdaṇavamāliākusumaṇīsahā parihiasi, so vi jāṇāvido bhaavadā vammaheṇa saṃdāvassa dūsattaṇaṃ | (sakhi, evamapi nāsti āśvāsaḥ | yasya kāraṇāt tvaṃ utkhaṇḍitabandhanaṃ kaṅkelipallavamiva hṛdayaṃ dhārayantī klāntanavamālikākusumanissahā parihīyase, so 'pi jñāpito bhagavatā manmathena santāpasya dussahatvam |)
makarandaḥ— iyameva nedīyasāṃ prakṛtirabhyudayānām | yathā ca—
mādhavaḥ— bhagavati sulabhamapi bahvanarthamatisaṅkaṭaṃ hi etad‌vayasyasya |
kāmandakī— āḥ! kastvamasyāṃ cintāyām |
yathā ca—
makaranda— vayasya atikātaro 'si | kimetat | nanu svastha evāsmi |
yathā ca—
mālatī— (mādhavasya lalāṭe hastaṃ datvā) diṭṭhiā vaḍḍhasi! (diṣṭayā vardhase) || 175 ||
(mādhavaḥ)— mahābhāge na bhetavyaṃ na bhetavyam— (māmā. 5. 26)
maraṇasamaye tyaktāśaṅkapralāpanirargala—
prakaṭitanijasnehaḥ so 'yaṃ sakhā pura eva te |
sutanu visṛjotkampaṃ sampratyasāvapi pāpmanaḥ phalamanubhavatyugraṃ pāpaṃ pratīpavipākinaḥ|| 176 ||
api ca—(māmā. 5. 32)
dhairय़ṁ nidhehi hṛdaye hata eṣa pāpaḥ kiṃ vā kadācidapi kenacidanvabhāvi |
sāraṅgasaṃhṛtividhāvibhakumbhakūṭakuṭṭākapāṇikuliśasya hareḥ pramādaḥ || 177 ||
(11. atyayapratīkāraḥ)
daivayogāt puruṣāparādhāt pramādato vā kāryasya vyāpadi pratyūhapraśamanam atyayapratīkāraḥ |
yathā— śākuntale—(4.1)āḥ atithiparibhāvini!
vicintayantī yamananyamānasā taponidhiṃ vetsi na māmupasthitam |
smariṣyati tvāṃ na sa bodhitopi san kathāṃ pramattaḥ prathamaṃ kṛtāmiva || 178 ||
priyavaṃdā— haddhi taṃ evva saṃuttaṃ | kassiṃ vi pūāaruhe avaraddhā suṇṇahiaā saüṃdalā | (punarvilokya) ṇa kkhu jassiṃ kassiṃ vi | eso duvvāso sulahakovo mahesī | (hā dhik, tadeva saṃvṛttam | kasminnapi pūjārhe aparāddhā śūnyahṛdayā śakuntalā | (punarvilokya) na khalu yasmin kasminnapi | eṣa durvāsāḥ sulabhakopo maharṣiḥ |)
anasūyā— gaccha pādesu paṇamia ṇivvaṭṭehi ṇaṃ | (gaccha, pādayoḥ praṇamya nivartaya enam |)
priyaṃvadā— sahi suhāvakkodho kasya aṇuṇaaṃ gaṇhaï | kiṃci uṇa sāṇukaṃpo kido | (sakhi, svabhāvakruddhaḥ kasya anunayaṃ gṛh‍ṇāti? kiṃcit punaḥ sānukampaḥ kṛtaḥ |)
anasūyā—kahehi edaṃ (kathayaitat) |
priyaṃvadā— jadā aṇuṇīdo vi ṇivattiduṃ ṇa iccadi tadā viṇṇavido mae duvvāsā, 'bhaavaṃ paḍhamabhattiṃ avekkhia aviṇṇādatavappahāvassa duhidujaṇassa bhaavadā ekko avarāho marisidabbo' iti | so tado ' ṇa me vaaṇaṃ aṇṇahā hoduṃ aruhadi kiṃdu ahiṇṇāṇāharaṇadaṃsaṇeṇa sāvo ṇivattissadi' tti maṃtaato evva aṃtarihido |
yadā— anunīto 'pi nivartituṃ necchati, tadā vijñāpito mayā durvāsāḥ— 'bhagavan prathamamityavekṣya avijñātatapaḥ prabhāvasya duhitṛjanasya bhagavataikaḥ aparādho marṣayitavya' iti | sa tadā— 'na me canamanyathā bhavitumarhati | kintu abhijñānābharaṇadarśanena śāpo nivartiṣyati' iti mantrayannevāntarhitaḥ |
anasūyā— sakkaṃ dāṇiṃ āsasiduṃ | addhi teṇa rāesiṇā saṃpatthideṇa saṇamaheaṃkidaṃ aṃgulīaaṃ sumaraṇīaṃti saüṃdalāe saaṃ piṇaddhaṃ | teṇa sāhīṇovāā saüṃdalā bhavissadi | {śakyamidanīmāśvasitum | asti tena rājarṣiṇā saṃprasthitena svanāmadheyāṅkitaṃ aṅgulīyakaṃ smaraṇīyamiti śakuntalāyā svayaṃ pinaddham | tena svādhīnopāyā śakuntalā bhaviṣyati} || 178 ||
yathā ca mālatīmādhave— (5.20)
nādastāvad vikalakurarīkūjitasnigdhatāraḥ'|| 180|| (pṛ. 1042) ityādi |
karālāyatanāccāyamuccaran karuṇadhvaniḥ |
vibhāvyate nanu sthānamaniṣṭhānāṃ tadīdṛśām || 181 ||
hanta samprati nirasta eva me sandehaḥ | tadapi nāma jīvantīmenāṃ sambhāvayeyam | (iti paritaḥ parikrāmati) (sahasopasṛtya khaṅgaṃ prakoṣṭhe nikṣipya)
durātmannapehi | pratihato 'si kāpālikāpasa | (svagataṃ) aho nu khalu bhostadetat kākatālīyaṃ nāma | samprati hi mama— (māmā. 5. 28, 30, 31)
'rāhaścandrakalāṃ'|| 182|| (pṛ. 554)
āḥ pāpakarman pāṣaṇḍacaṇḍāla!
asāraṃ saṃsāraṃ parimuṣitarat‍naṃ tribhuvanaṃ nirālokaṃ lokaṃ maraṇaśaraṇaṃ bāndhavajanam |
adarpaṁ kandarpaṁ jananayananirmāṇamaphalaṃ jagajjīrṇāraṇyaṃ kathamasi vidhātuṃ vyavasitaḥ|| 183 || (māmā. 5. 28)
api ca re re pāpa!
praṇayasakhīsalīlaparihāsarasādhigatai— rlalitaśirīṣapuṣpahananairapi tāmyati yat |
vapuṣi vadhāya tatra tava śastramupakṣipataḥ patatu śirasyakāṇḍayamadaṇḍa ivaiṣa bhujaḥ || 184 || (māmā. 5. 30)
(12. prayojyapreṣaṇam)
sandarśanasamāgamādihetoḥ saṅketakādau nāyakayorniyogaḥ prayojyapreṣaṇam | yathā mālatīmādhave—
buddharakṣitā—huṃ tumaṃ uṇa kahiṃ patthidāsi | (hum | tvaṃ punaḥ kutra prasthitāsi?)
avalokitā— ahaṃ kkhu bhaavadīe mādhavasaāsaṃ aṇuppesidā | saṃdiṭhṭhaṃ a tassa saṅkaraürasambandhi kusumākarujjāṇaṃ gadua kuṃjaṇiuṃjaperaṃtarattāsoagaṅaṇe ciṭṭetti | gado a tattha māhavo | (ahaṃ khalu bhagavatyā mādhavasakāśamanupreṣitā | saṃdiṣṭaṃ ca tasmai śaṅkarapurasambandhi kusumākarodyānaṃ gatvā kuñjanikuñjaparyantaraktāśokagahane tiṣṭheti | gataśca tatra mādhavaḥ |)
avalokitā— ajja kisaṇacaüddasitti jaṇaṇīe samaṃ māladī saṅkaraüraṃ gamissadi | tado evvaṃ kila sohaggaṃ bạdhḍhaï tti devadārahaṇaṇimittaṃ sahatthakusumāvacaaṃ uddisia lavaṅgiādudīaṃ māladī taṃ evva kusumāarujjāṇaṃ āṇaïssadi | tado aṇṇoṇṇadaṃsaṇaṃ havissadi tti | (adya kṛṣṇacaturdaśīti jananyā samaṃ mālatī śaṅkarapuraṃ gamiṣyati | tata evaṃ kila saubhāgyaṃ vardhata iti devatārādhananimittaṃ svahastakusumāvacayam uddiś‍ya lavaṅgikādvitīyāṃ mālatīṃ tadeva kusumākarodyānamāneṣyati | tataḥ anyonyadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati iti) || 185 ||
yathā ca—
kāmandakī— vatsau mālatīmādhavau ito nirgatya vṛkṣagahane gamyatām udvāha— maṅgalārtham | asmad‌vihārikāyāḥ paścādudyānavāṭaḥ | suvihitaṃ tatra vaivāhikadravyajātaṃ avalokitayā | bhūyaśca—(māmā. 6.19)
gạ̄dhotkaṇṭhakaṭhorakeralavadhūgaṇḍāvapāṇḍucchadai— stāmbūlīpaṭalaiḥ pinaddhaphalitavyānamrapūgadrumāḥ|
takkolīphalajagdhamugdhavikiravyāhāriṇastaddhuvo bhāgāḥ preṅkhitamātuluṅgavṛtayaḥ preyo vidhāsyanti vām || 186 ||
yatastatraiva madayantikāmakarandayo yāvadāgamanaṃ sthātavyam |
(13. sandhirakṣā)
parasparābhiyogādiṣu anāgatapratīhārādibhiḥ cchidrāpidhānaṃ sandhirakṣā |
yathā mālatīmādhave buddharakṣitā— ammahe susiliṭṭhamāladīṇevacchalacchīvippaladdha— ṇaṃdaṇakaraggaho amaccabhūrivasumaṃdire bhaavadīe saṃvihāṇeṇa khemeṇa govāido
ajja maaraṃdo | (aho suśliṣṭamālatīnepathyalakṣmīvipralabdhanandanakaragrahaḥ amātyabhūrivasunandire bhagavatyāḥ saṃvidhānena kṣemeṇa gopāyito 'dya makarandaḥ |) ﻿
kāmandakī— sādhu sakhe bhūrivaso sādhu | 'prabhavati nijasya kanyakājanasya mahārājaḥ' ityubhayalokāviruddhamupanyastam |
yathā vā—
avalokitā— bhaavadi, ṇa hu amacco māhavassa ṇāmaṃ vi jāṇādi tti ṇiravekkhadā lakkhīadi | (bhagavatī, na khalu amātyo mādhavasya nāmāpi jānātīti nirapekṣatā lakṣyate |)
kāmandakī— saṃvaraṇaṃ hi tat | paśya—(māmā. 1.17)
bahissarvākārapravaṇaramaṇīyaṃ vyavaharan parābhyūhasthānānyapi tanutarāṇi sthagayati |
janaṃ vidvānekassakalamatisandhāya kapadai— staṭasthaḥ svānarthān ghaṭayati ca maunaṃ ca bhajate || 187 ||
14. pratāpavyāvarṇanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.9)
vyatikaritadigantāśśvetamānairyaśobhi— ssukṛtavilasitānāṃ sthānamūrjasvalānām |
akalitamahimānaḥ ketanaṃ maṅgalānāṃ kathamapi bhuvane 'smin tādṛśāssambhavanti || 188 ||
14. prayojyopajāpaḥ yathā
avalokitā— tumaṃ kkhu bhaavadīe jāssiṃ paoaṇe ṇiuttā tattha ko uttaṃdo | (tvaṃ khalu bhagavatyā yasmin prayojane niyuktā tatra ko vṛttāntaḥ?)
buddharakṣitā— mae kkhu bhaavadīe samādeseṇa tāsu tāsu vīsaṃbhakahāsu īrīso tāriso tti kadua maaraṃdassa uvari piasahīe dūramārovido parokkhāṇurāo | eso a se maṇoraho avi ṇāma taṃ vekkhea ti | (mayā khalu bhagavatyāssamādeśena tāsu tāsu visrambhakathāsu īdṛśaḥ tādṛśa iti kṛtvā makarandasyopari priyasakhyāḥ dūramāropitaḥ parokṣānurāgaḥ | eṣa ca tasyāḥ manorathaḥ, api nāma taṃ paśyeyeti |)
16. parākramaṇaṃ yathā—
bho bho mālatyanveṣiṇaḥ iyamamātyabhūrivasumāśvāsayantī apratihataprajñā— cakṣurbhagavatī kāmandakī samādiśati paryavaṣ‍ṭabhyatāmadaḥ karālāyatanam | ﻿
nāghoraghaṇṭādanyasmāt karmaitaddāruṇādabhūt |
na karālopahārācca phalamanyad vibhāvyate || 189 || (māmā. 5.33)
17. bandhurat‍nāpahāro yathā—
kāmandakī — tatraiva makārandamadayantikāgamanaṃ yāvat sthātavyam |
mādhavaḥ — (saharṣaṃ) kalyāṇottarāvataṃsā kalyāṇasampat |
kalahaṃsaḥ — diṭṭhiā evvaṃ ṇo havissa di | (diṣ‍ṭyā evaṃ no bhaviṣyati |)
18. mitropagraho yathā—
avalokitā—bhaavadi so vi pāsaaro māhavassa vālamittaṃ maaraṃdo ṇaṃdaṇassa bhaïṇiṃ madaaṃtiāṃ jaï samuvvahaï taṃ vi māhavassa duiaṃ piaṃ hodi | (bhagavati, so 'pi pārśvacaro mādhavasya bālamitraṃ makarando nandanasya bhaginīṃ madayantikāṃ yadi samudvahati, tadapi mādhavasya diṛtīyaṃ priyaṃ bhavati |)
kāmandakī— niyuktaiva hi mayā tatra tatpriyasakhī buddharakṣitā |
19. suhṛdbhedo yathā—(māmā. 2.7)
guṇāpekṣāśūnyaṃ kathāmidamupakrāntamathavā kuto 'patyasnehaḥ kuṭilanayaniṣṇātamanasām |
idaṃ tvaidamparyaṃ yaduta nṛpaternarmasacivaḥ sutādānānmitraṃ bhavatu sa hi no nandana iti || 190 ||
lavaṅgikā— jadhā āṇattaṃ bhaavadīe taṃ taha evva | aṇṇahā tassiṃ vare duddaṃsaṇe adikkaṃtajovvaṇe kiṃ ti ṇa viāriaṃ amacceṇa | (yathājñap‍taṃ bhagavatyā tattathaiva | anyathā tasmina vare durdarśane 'tikrāntayauvane kimiti na vicāritamamātyena?)
20. cārajñānaṃ yathā—(māmā.)
avalokitā— bhaavadi sā dāṇiṃ sodāmiṇī samāsādidaaccariamaṃta— siddhippahāvā siripavvade kāvāliavadaṃ dhāredi | (bhagavati, sā idānīṃ saudāminī samāsāditāścaryamantrasiddiprabhāvā śrīparvate kāpālikāvrataṃ dhārayati |) kāmandakī— kutaḥ punāriyaṃ pravṛttiḥ? ﻿
avalokitā— atthi eddha ṇaarīe mahāmasāṇappaese karālā ṇāma cāmuṃḍā |
(astyatra nagaryāṃ mahāśmaśānapradeśe karālā nāma cāmuṇḍā)
kāmandakī—asti | yā kila vividhajīvopahārapriyeti sāhasikānāṃ pravādaḥ |
avalokitā— tassiṃ khu siripavvadādo āadassa ido ṇādidūrāsaṇṇamasāṇa— vāsiṇo sādhaassa muṃḍadhāriṇo aghoraghaṃṭaṇāmaheassa aṃtevāsiṇī mahāppahāvā kavālakuṃḍalā ṇāma aṇusajhaṃ āacchaï | tado iaṃ paüttī | (tasmin khalu śrīparvatādāgatasya ito nātidūrāsannaśmaśānavāsinaḥ sādhakasya muṇḍadhāriṇaḥ aghoraghaṇṭanāmadheyasya antevāsinī mahāprabhāvā kapālakuṇḍalā nāma anusandhyaṃ āgacchati | tata iyaṃ pravṛttiḥ |)
21. gūḍhadaṇḍāticāro yathā—
kāmandakī— vatsa makaranda, anenaiva vaivāhikena mālatīnepathyena apavāritaḥ pravartasva pariṇayāyātmanaḥ (iti paṭalakamarpayati |)
makarandaḥ— yathājñapayasi | yāvaditaḥ citrayavanikāmantardhāya naipathyaṃ dhārayāmi |
(tathā karoti|)
22. cārasamādhānaṃ yathā—
buddharakṣitā— saṃpadaṃ a tuvaraṃtakāmo kāmeduṃ sapādapaḍaṇaṃ avbhatthia puṇo balāmeḍia abhiddavaṃto maaraṃdeṇa ṇiṭṭhuraṃ paḍiharo jāmādā | so aṃ velakkharosāvesakhalaṃtaakkharo oruidaṇaaṇapapphuraṃtavaaṇo (sa) ṇivbharadukkhido ṇa me saṃpadaṃ edāṇa komārabaṃdhakīe paoaṇaṃ ti sasapahaṃ païṇṇaṃ kāūṇa vāsabhavaṇādo ṇiggado | tā edeṇa pasaṃgeṇa madaaṃtiaṃ āṇīa maaraṃdeṇa saṃjoaïssaṃ | (samprataṃ ca tvaramāṇakāmaḥ kāmayituṃ sapādapatanamabhyarthya punarvalātkāreṇa abhidravan makarandena niṣ‍ṭhuraṃ pratihato jāmātā | sa ca vailakṣyaroṣāveśaskhaladakṣaro 'varuditanayaprasphurad‍vadano nirbharaduḥkhito na me sāmaprataṃ etayā kaumārabandhakyā prayojanamiti saśapathaṃ pratijñāṃ kṛtvā vāsabhavanāt nirgataḥ | tasmādetena prasaṅgena madayantikām anīya makarandena saṃyojayiṣyāmi |) ﻿
23. samādhimokṣo yathā—
amhahe susiliṭṭhamāladīṇevacchalacchīvippaladdhaṇaṃdaṇakaraggaho amaccabhūriva— sumaṃdire bhaavadīvaaṇasaṃvihāṇehiṃ khemeṇa govāvido maaraṃdo | amhe ṇaṃdaṇāvāsamuvagadā | ado bhaavadī ṇaṃdaṇaṃ āṇucchia ṇiāvasaaṃ gaā | ajja ṇavavahūgharappavesiviraïdākālakomudīmahūsavappamattapajjāulāsesapariaṇo paoso aṇuūlaïssadi ajja ṇo vavasidaṃ | (aho suśliṣ‍ṭamālatīnepathya— lakṣmīvipralabdhanandanakaragraho 'mātyabhūrivasumandire bhagavatīvacanasaṃvidhanaiḥ khemeṇa gopāyito makarandaḥ | aho nandanāvāsamupagatā | ato bhagavatī nandanamāpṛcch‌ya nijāvasathaṃ gatā | adya navavadhūgṛhapraveśaviracitākālakaumudīmahotsavapramattaparyākulā— śeṣaparijanaḥ pradoṣo 'nukūlayiṣyatyadya no vyavasitam |)1
saiṣā dūtaviśeṣāṇāmaśītiścaturuttarā |
caturviṃśatireteṣāṃ mayoktā karmaṇāmapi || 191 ||
jātikriyādiyogena yasya dūtasya yo vidhiḥ |
yujyate tatra medhāvī tameva viniyojayet || 192 ||
bud‍dhvā budhaścaturaśītimapīha dūtān karmāṇi viṃśatimaśītiyutāṃ caturbhiḥ |
yo yatra sid‍dhyati tameva hi tatra dūta— sampreṣaṇādiṣu samīkṣya samādadhīta || 193 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śrṛṅgāraprakāśe abhiyogavidhiprakāśo nāma || aṣ‍ṭāviṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ || 28 ||
yatkāmatantramanu kiñcana nāṭyaśāstramādikṣadetadakhilaṃ khalu dūtakarma |
dhāreś‍varo nṛpatireṣa samuddideśa granthe 'tra kāvyanigamāgamasārvabhaumaḥ ||

nānāvidheṣu lakṣyeṣu vakṣyamāṇena vartmanā || 1 || tatra—
1. dūtasampreṣaṇaṃ yathā—(megha. 6, 7)
jātaṃ vaṃśe bhuvanavidite puṣkarāvartakānām || 2 || (pṛ. 1054) ityādi |
santap‍tānāṃ tvamasi śaraṇaṃ tatpayoda! priyāyāḥ sandeśaṃ me hara dhanapatikrodhaviśleṣitasya |
gantavyā te vasatiralakā nāma yakṣeśvarāṇāṃ bāhyodyāna—sthita—hara—śiraścandrikā—dhautaharmyā || 3 ||
2. sandeśadānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 486ve, 2.1)
ahaaṃ vioataṇari dusaho virahāṇalo calaṃ jīaṃ |
appāhijjaü kiṃ sahi! jāṇasi taṃ cea jaṃ juttaṃ || 4 ||
﻿
(ahaṃ viyogatanvī dussaho virahānalaścalaṃ jīvam |
abhidhīyatāṃ kiṃ sakhi jānāsi tvameva yad yuktam ||)
dūi tumaṃ via ṇiuṇā kakkhaḍhamaüāiṃ jāṇase vottuṃ(lluṃ) |
kaṃḍūiapaṃḍuraṃ jaha ṇa hoi taha taṃ kuṇijjāsu || 5 ||
{dūti tvameva nipuṇā karkaśamṛdukāni jānāsi kaktum |
kaṇḍūyitapāṇḍuraṃ yathā na bhavati tathā tvaṃ kurvīthāḥ ||} (gāsa. 2. 81)
3. supātrapraṇidhānaṃ yathā—
satthimala—āvalāo—suhāhahagujolaṃhaï |
sabbhāvamettaeṇaeṇaabhāvejjasu kiṃdha bahueṇā || 6 ||
vevira—siṇṇa—karaṃguli—pariggaha—kkhalia—lehaṇīmagge |
sotthi vvia ṇa samappaï piasahi lehammi kiṃ lihimo || 7 ||
(vepanaśīlasvinnakarāṅguliparigrahaskhalitalekhanīmārge |
svastyeva na samāpyate priyasakhi lekhe kiṃ likhāmaḥ ||) (gāsa. 3.44)
4. dūtānugamo yathā—(gāsa. 5.40)
taṃ bhaṇahi dūi eaṃ ṇa imaṃ eaṃ ti aṇupahamimāe |
puṇaruttaṃ sīsaṃtā kaha—vi samappaṃti saṃdesā || 8 ||
(taṃ bhaṇa dūti etannedametaditi anupadamanayā |
punaruk‍taṃ kathyamānāḥ kathamapi samāpyante saṃdeśāḥ ||)
seḍalliyasavvaṅgī gottaggahaṇeṇa tassa suhaassa |
dūiṃ paṭṭhāentī tassea gharaṅgaṇaṃ pattā || 9 ||
(svedārdīkṛtasarvāṅgī gotragrahaṇena tasya subhagasya |
dūtīṃ prasthāpayantī tasyaiva gṛhāṅgaṇaṃ prāp‍tā ||)(gāsa. 5.40)
5. sakhīvigarhaṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 5.12)
suppaü taïo vi gao jāmo tti sahio kīsa maṃ bhaṇaha |
sehāliāṇaṃ gaṃdho ṇa dei sottuṃ, suaha tumhe || 10 ||
(supyatāṃ tṛtīyo 'pi gato yāma iti sakhyaḥ kimiti māṃ bhaṇatha |
śephālikānāṃ gandho na dadāti svap‍tuṃ svapata yūyam ||)
﻿
kiṃ bhaṇaha maṃ sahio 'mā mara, dīsihaha so jiaṃtīe' |
kajjālāo eso siṇehamaggo uṇa ṇa hoi || 11 ||
(kiṃ bhaṇatha māṃ sakhyaḥ mā mriyasva drakṣyate sa jīvantyā |
kāryālāpa eṣa snehamārgaḥ punarna bhavati ||) (gāsa. 619ve.)
6. mārgodīkṣaṇaṃ yathā—
suraasuhalālasāhiṃ piaamaratthaṃtaresu puṇaruttaṃ |
pesijjaṃti sarahasaṃ samaaṃ dūīhi diṭṭīo || 12 ||
{suratasukhalālasābhiḥ priyatamarathyāntareṣu punaruktam |
preṣyante sarabhasaṃ samakaṃ dūtībhiḥ dṛṣ‍ṭayaḥ ||}
kaṃ tuṃgathagukkhitteṇa putti dāraṭṭhiā paloesi |
uṇṇāmia-kalasa-ṇivesiagghakamaleṇa va muheṇa || 13 ||
(kaṃ tuṅgastanotkṣip‍tena putri dvārasthitā pralokayasi |
unnamitakalaśaniveśitārghakamaleneva mukhena ||) (gāsa. 256ve.)
7. samāgamacintā yathā—(gāsa. 918 ve
vaccihii so gharaṃ se lahihii oāsamehii saāsaṃ |
bhaṇihii jaṃ bhaṇiavvaṃ, paccuttaṃ kiṃ ṇu pāvihii || 14 ||
{vrajiṣyati sa gṛhaṃ tasyā:, lapsyate 'vakāśameṣyati sakāśam |
bhaṇiṣyati yad bhaṇitavyaṃ yuktamuttaraṃ kiṃ nu prāpsyati ||}
āaassa kiṃ ṇu, kāhaṃ/kiṃ vocchaṃ kaha ṇu hohii imaṃti |
paḍhamuggaasāhasa—āriāeĕ hiaaṃ tharaharei || 15 ||
{āgatasya kiṃ nu kariṣyāmi kiṃ pravakṣyāmi kathaṃ nu bhaviṣyati idamiti |
prathamodgatasāhasakārikāyā hṛdayaṃ tharatharāyate ||} (gāsa. 2.87)
8. cirayadvimarśo yathā—(gāsa. 855ve)
dūī gaā cirāaha kiṃ so maha vāsamehii ṇa va tti |
jīvitamaraṇaṃtarasaṃṭhiāe aṃdolae hiaaṃ || 16 ||
(dūtī gatā cirāyate kiṃ sa mama vāsameṣyati na veti |
jīvitamaraṇāntarasaṃsthitāyā āndolāyate hṛdayam ||)
﻿
dūi ṇa ei caṃdo pi uggao jāmiṇī vi volei |
savvaṃ savvao ccia visaṃṭhulaṃ kassa kiṃ bhaṇimo || 17 ||
(dūtī na eti candro 'pi udgataḥ yāminyati atikrāmati |
sarvaṃ sarvata eva visaṃṣ‍ṭhulaṃ kasya kiṃ bhaṇāmaḥ ||) (gāsa.854ve.)
9. dūtāgamanaṃ yathā—(seba. 10.74)
sahiaṇa—hatthāhimukhaṃ daraïavisesaaṃ vi akkhiviūṇaṃ |
juaīhi paḍiṇiutto avalohijjaï sasaṃbhama dūijaṇo || 18 ||
{sakhījanahastābhimukhaṃ dharati ca dhṛtaṃ viśeṣakaṃ vyākṣipya |
yuvatibhiḥ pratinivṛtto 'valokyate sasaṃbhramaṃ dūtījanaḥ ||}
ahisāraṇaṃ ṇa geṇhaï ṇa saṃṭhavei alaaṃ ṇa pucchaï dūiṃ |
caṃdāloapaḍihado vevaï mūḍhahiao vilāsiṇi—sattho || 19 ||
(abhisāraṇaṃ na gṛhaṇāti na saṃsthāpayati alakaṃ na pṛcchati dūtīm |
candralokapratihataḥ sthapitaḥ mūḍhahṛdayaḥ vilāsinīsārthaḥ ||)seba. 10.65
10. ākāraparīkṣā yathā—(gāsa. 828ve.)
upphullaloaṇeṇaṃ kavolaosaṭ‍ṭamāṇaseeṇa |
abhaṇaṃteṇa vi bhaṇiā muheṇa se kajjaṇivvittī || 20 ||
(utphullalocanena kapolavisarpatsvedena |
abhaṇatāpi bhaṇitā mukhena tasyāḥ kāryanirvṛtiḥ ||)
ṇāao tti pecchaï parihāsullāvirīeṁ dūī so |
ṇūmaṃtīe pahariso osaṭṭaï gaṃḍapāsesu || 21 ||
{sa nāgata iti prekṣadhvaṃ parihāsollāpaśīlāyā dūtyāḥ |
chādayantyāḥ (=gopāyantyāḥ) praharṣo visarpati gaṇaḍa—pārś‍vayoḥ ||} gāsa.856ve
11. dūtapratibhedo yathā—
ehi gamāgamakheosaraṃtapammuttakusumadhammille |
sahi vīsama tā va bhaṇejjaü vā jaṃ teṇa saṃdiṭṭhaṃ || 22 ||
(ehi gamāgamakhedāpasarapramuk‍takusumadhammille |
sakhi! viśrāmya tāvad bhaṇyatāṃ vā yattena saṃdiṣ‍ṭam ||)
jaṃ tuha kajjaṃ taṃ cia kajjaṃ majjha tti jaṃ saā bhaṇisi |
o dūi saccavaaṇe ajja si pāraṃ gaā tassa || 23 ||
﻿
{yattava kāryaṃ tadeva mameti yat sadā bhaṇasi |
he dūti! satyavacane 'dyāsi pāraṃ gatā tasya ||} gāsa. 861ve.,vala.415
12. dūtaparipraś‍no yathā—(gāsa. 857ve.)
kaha ṇu gaā kaha diṭṭho kiṃ bhaṇiaṃ kiṃ va teṇa paḍipaṇṇaṃ |
eaṃ ccia ṇa samappaï puṇaruttaṃ jaṃpamāṇīe || 24 ||
(kathaṃ nu gatā kathaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ kiṃ bhaṇitaṃ ki ca tena pratipatram |
evameva na samāpyate punaruktaṃ jalpamānāyāḥ ||)
piapāsāhi ṇiatto saccaṃ aliaṃ va jaṃ bhaṇaï dūijaṇo |
tāṃ ccia kāmiṇisattho dūmeṃtiṃ pi bahuso ṇiattei kahaṃ || 24 ||
{priyapārśvāt nivṛttaḥ satyaṃ alīkāmiva yā bhaṇāti dūtījanaḥ |
tāmeva kāminīsārthaḥ dunvatīmapi bahuśo nivartayati kathām ||}seba. 10.67
13. dūtavyāhāro yathā—
jaïāiritavesaviaviassadūlasīsaṃta |
saṃgamasūesamabahiamaṇaharā hoṃti saṃdesā || 26 || (pṛ. 1297)
avalaṃbijjaü dhīraṃ sāso ṇa hu(a)so ehiha ihaggae vi paose |
ia dūīhi tulijjaï paḍhamāṇiapio vilasiṇisattho || 27 ||
{avalambyatāṃ dhairyaṃ śvaso na atigate 'pi pradoṣe |
iti dūtībhiḥ tulyate prathamānītapriyatamaḥ vilasinīsārthaḥ ||}(seba.10.79)
14. dūtavākyākarṇanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 858ve.)
dūī—muha—aṃda—puloirīeṁ kiṃ bhaṇihii tti ajjhāe |
pia—saṃgama—galia—maṇorahāeṁ hiaaṃ dharadharei || 28 ||
(dūtīmukhacandrapralokanaśīlāyāḥ kiṃ bhaṇiṣyatītyāryāyāḥ |
priyasaṅgamagalitamanorathāyāḥ hṛdayaṃ dhaḍa़dhaḍa़āyate ||)
kāe vi mahurasad‌daṃ sarasa—paripphuḍa—viiṇṇa—muha—sohaṃ |
muiaṃ dūī—vaaṇaṃ kīraï kaṇṇe kuvalaaṃ va || 29 ||
{kayā 'pi madhuraśabdaṃ(madhu-rasārdraṃ) sarasaparisphuṭavitīrṇamukhaśobham |
muditaṃ dūtīvacanaṃ kriyate karṇe kuvalayamiva ||}
﻿
15. gamanavṛttānto yathā—
bahiṇiggaāmhi vaaṇeṇa tujjha pattā a pattalaṇiuṃjaṃ |
uddāṇaṃ jattha mivei gamei so jaṇo virahadukkhāiṃ || 30 ||
(bahirnirgatāsmi vacanena tava prāp‍tā ca patralanikuñjam |
udyānaṃ yatra gamayati sa jano virahaduḥkhāni ||)
appāiāi duha deṇa jāi tāṇa mae ṇa muṇiāi |
aṃhubbhata—sāsa—paḍikkha—vaṃlata—visama—kkhara—paāiṃ || 31 ||
(āpyāyitāni tava tena yāni tāni mayā na jñātāni |
abhyudgataśvāsapratīkṣavalamānaviṣamākṣarapadāni ||) (gāsa. 859ve.)
16. pravṛttyupalambho yathā—
kṣataiḥ kvāpi prītaḥ kvacidapi nimittaiḥ pulakitaḥ kvaciccopaśrutyā śamitaparitāpo vikasitaḥ |
prasādārthaṃ mugdhe! tava vigatalajjo ( 'grabhaṇiti—) ṣvabhijño daivajñaṃ janamapi ca te pṛcchati patiḥ || 32 ||
asau vidyādhāraḥ śiśurapi vinirgatya bhavanā— dihāyātassaṃpratyavikalaśaraccandramadhuraḥ |
yadālokasthāne bhavati puramunmādataralaiḥ kaṭākṣairnārīṇāṃ kuvalayitavātāyanamiva || 33 ||(māmā. 2.11)
17. priyasandeśo yathā—(gāsa. 850ve.)
caṃdo vi caṃdavaaṇe muṇālavāhālae muṇālāiṃ |
iṃdīvarāi iṃdīvaracchi tāveti tuha viraho || 34 ||
(candro 'pi candravadane mṛṇālabāhālate mṛṇālāni |
indīvarāṇīndīvarākṣi! tāpayanti tava virahaḥ ||)
caṃdamuhi caṃdadhavalā dīhā dīhacchi tuha vioammi |
caüjāmā saajāma vva jāmiṇī kahaṃ vi bolīṇā || 35 ||
(candramukhi candradhavalā dīrghā dīrghākṣa! tava viyoge |
caturyāmā śatayāmeva yāminī kathamapi vyālīnā ||) (gāsa. 3.52)
﻿
18. suhṛtsaṃmantraṇaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 4.96, 98)
ahaṃ yathātathā vāpi bhaveyaṃ sa tu matkṛte |
kathaṃ bhaviṣyatītyeṣā cintā dalayatīva mām || 36 ||
vada kiṃ karavāṇyatra muhyatīva mano mama |
mā bhūnme dustaro vipravadhainasi nimajjanam || 37 ||
19. avasthānubhavo yathā—(kādakasā. 4.99)
ityādi vilapantyā me tatkālasulabhodayā |
jahāra cetanāṃ mūrcchā nidreva nayanadyutim || 38 ||
sā tu taimirakasyeva babhūva bahulakṣapā |
mohāyādyāpyanāyyaiva/ryeva sutarāṃ manaso mama || 39 ||
20. sahāyotsāhanaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 6.31, māmā. 2.1)
uttiṣ‍ṭha yadi jīvantīṃ māmicchasi tamānaya |
aha netumaśak‍tā hi sudūramidamantaram || 40 ||
manorogastīvro viṣamiva visarpannavirata— pramāthī nirdhūmaṃ jvalati vidhutaḥ pāvaka iva |
hinasti pratyaṅgaṃ jvara iva garīyānita ito na māṃ jñā/trātuṃ tātaḥ prabhavati na cāmbā na bhavatī || 41 ||
21. priyadūtāgamanaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 5.95, 6.9)
niśi tasyāṃ vyatītāyāmanyedyurudite ravau |
keyūrakastamāgatya hemakūṭādathābravīt || 42 ||
dineṣvatha vyatīteṣu patralekhā tadantikam |
prāpad balāhakāśvīyanirvṛttapathasauṣ‍ṭhavā || 43 ||
22. dūtapratipattiryathā—(kusaṃ. 6.50, 52)
tānarghyānarghyamādāya dūrāt pratyudyayau giriḥ |
nāmayan sāragurubhiḥ pādanyāsairvasundharām || 44 ||
﻿
vidhiprayuktasatkāraiḥ svayaṃ mārgasya deśikaḥ |
sa tairākramayāmāsa śuddhāntaṃ śuddhakarmabhiḥ || 45 ||
23. vārtābhidhānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.55, 57)
mūḍhaṃ buddhamivātmānaṃ haimībhūtamivāyasam |
bhūmerdivamivārūḍhaṃ manye bhavadanugrahāt || 46 ||
avaimi pūtamātmānaṃ dvayenaiva dvijottamāḥ |
mūdh‍ni gaṅgāprapātena dhautapādāmbhasā ca vaḥ || 47 ||
24. kāryaparyanuyogo yathā—(kusaṃ. 6.61, 62)
kartavyaṃ vo na paśyāmi syāc‍cet kiṃ nopadiśyate/papadyate |
manye matpāvanāyaiva prasthānaṃ bhavatāmiha || 48 ||
tathāpi kārye kasmiṃścidājñāṃ me dātumarhatha |
viniyogaprasādā hi kiṅkarāḥ prabhaviṣṇuṣu || 49 ||
25. dūtavākyaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 4.89, 90)
tato 'hamidamevātra prāp‍takālamiti drutam |
rājaputri! suhṛtprāṇarakṣaṇārthamihāgataḥ || 50 ||
ataḥ paraṃ tu sāmarthyagatārthā yā yathā giraḥ |
kaṇṭhe viparivartante kāścit tvamapi vettha tat || 51 ||
26. uttarābhyupapattiryathā—(kusaṃ. 5.63, 64)
athāgrahaste mukulīkṛtāṅgulau niveśayantī sphaṭikākṣamaṇḍalam |
kathañcidadrestanayā mitākṣaraṃ ciravyavasthāpitavāgabhāṣata || 52 ||
yathāśrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara tvayā jano 'yamuc‍caiḥpadalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 53 ||
27. dūtaprativākyaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.65, 72)
athāha varṇī vidito maheśvarastadarthinī tvaṃ pura eva vartase |
amaṅgalābhyāsaratiṃ vicintya taṃ tavānuvṛttiṃ na tu kartumutsahe || 54 ||
vapurvirūpākṣamalakṣyajanmatā digambaratvena niveditaṃ vasu |
vareṣu yad bālamṛgākṣi mṛgyate tadasti kiṃ vyastamapi trilocane || 55 ||
﻿
28. dūtavākyākṣepo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.73, 82)
vipatpratīkārapareṇa maṅgalaṃ nipevyate bhūtisamutsukena vā |
jagaccharaṇyasya nirāśiṣassataḥ kimebhirāśopahatātmavṛttibhiḥ || 56 ||
alaṃ vivādena yathāśrutastvayā tathāvidhastāvadaśeṣamastu saḥ |
mamātra bhāvaikarasaṃ manaḥ sthitaṃ na kāmavṛttirvacanīyamīkṣate || 57 ||
29. dūtābhibhartsanaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.74, 75)
iti dvijātau pratikūlavādini pravepamānādharalakṣyakopayā |
vivartitabhrūlatamāhite tayā vilocane tiryagupāntalohite || 58 ||
uvāca cainaṃ paramārthato haraṃ na vetsi nūnaṃ yata evamāttha mām |
alokasāmānyamacintyahetukaṃ dviṣanti mandāścaritaṃ mahātmanām || 59 ||
30. parijana(/nādi)kṣobho yathā—(kādakasā. 4.101, 102)
kiṃ śāstra guravaḥ ke vā kā lajjā kā kulasthitiḥ |
rakṣyantāmātmanaḥ prāṇā yūnastasya ca sarvathā || 60 ||
gandharvāṇāṃ vivāho 'yamicchayānyonyasaṅgamaḥ |
śāstraṣu paṭhitastasmāt tūrṇamuttiṣ‍ṭha gamyatām || 61 ||
31. gurujanāśaṅkā yathā—(rat‍nā 2.1)
dullahajaṇāṇurāo lajjā garuī paravvaso appā |
piasahi visamaṃ pemmaṃ maraṇaṃ saraṇaṃ ṇavara ekkaṃ || 62 ||
(durlabhajanānurāgo lajjā gurvī paravaśa ātmā |
priyasakhi viṣamaṃ prema maraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ kevalamekam ||)
jvalatu gagane rātrau rātrāvakhaṇḍakalaḥ śaśī dahatu madanaḥ kiṃ vā mṛtyoḥ pareṇa vidhāsyati |
mama tu dayitaḥ ślāghyastāto jananyamalānvayā kulamamalinaṃ na tvevāyaṃ jano na ca jīvitam || 63 || (māmā. 2.2)
32. sahāyāvego yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.61, 60)
na vedmi sa prārthitadurlabhaḥ kadā sakhībhirāsrāntaravīkṣitāmimām |
tapaḥkṛśāmabhyupapatsyate sakhīṃ vṛṣeva sītāṃ tadavagrahakṣatām || 64 ||
﻿
drumeṣu sakhyā kṛtajanmasu svayaṃ phalaṃ tapassākṣiṣu dṛṣ‍ṭameṣvapi |
na ca prarohābhimukho 'pi dṛśyate manoratho 'syāḥ śaśimaulisaṃśrayaḥ || 65 ||
33. itikartavyatā yathā—(kādakasā. 5.106, 107)
tadarthamatha saṃmantrya saha mantrisutena ca |
evametaditi dhyātvā prasthāne sthairyamagrahīt || 66 ||
satyaṃ vedmi tava prasādamadhikaṃ ceto mamedaṃ padaṃ dātuṃ necchati kintu śāsanamidaṃ nollaṅghanīyaṃ guroḥ |
manyuḥ samprati saṃhitāṃ punarihāgantāsmi kādambarīṃ sandiśyeti sabāṣpagadgadamasau keyūrakaṃ prāhiṇot || 67 ||
34. svayaṃpravṛttiryathā—
ārūḍhavisphuritacāpamanojarāje sajjīkṛte dayitasaṅgamasaṅgarāya |
uc‍cairnitambajayahastini hemakakṣyāmeṇekṣaṇā sarabhasaṃ nibiḍīcakāra || 68 ||
k‍va prasthitāsi karabhoru ghane niśīthe prāṇādhiko vasati yatra janaḥ priyo me |
ekākinī vada kathaṃ na bibheṣi bāle nanvasti puṅkhitaśaro madanaḥ sahāyaḥ || 69 ||
35. nāyakānayanaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 10.47, 70)
sakhi dayitamihānayeti sā māṃ prahitavatī kusumeṣuṇā vibhinnā |
hṛdayamahṛdayā na nāma pūrvaṃ bhavadupakaṇṭhamupāgataṃ viveda || 70 ||
tadanagha tanurastu sā sakāmā vrajati purā hi parāsutāṃ tvadarthe |
punarapi sulabhaṃ tavānurāgī yuvatijanaḥ khalu nāpyate 'nurūpaḥ || 71 ||
36. priyābhigamo yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84, 85)
ito gamiṣyāmyathavetivādinī cacāla sā ca stanabhinnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitaḥ samālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 72 ||
taṃ vīkṣya vepathumatī sarasāṅgayaṣ‍ṭi— rnikṣepa eva padamud‌dhṛtamud‌vahantī |
mārgācalavyatikarākuliteva sindhuḥ śailādhirājatanayā na yayau na tasthau || 73 ||
﻿
37. upasthāpanaṃ yathā—
vedhāllaṇiṃ appuvvahaṇaṇīsahahīe kae vi samattāhi |
āaṃciavihuttaṃ gamaṇaṃ chātaralacchīe || 74 ||
eṃto vi paloanocchāhavialaṃtakesahatthāe |
vialaṃtavalaāhaṇāe kahaṃ vi saṃbhāvio daïo || 75 ||
(āyannapi pralokanotsāhavigalatkeśahastayā |
vigalad‌valayābharaṇayā kathamapi saṃbhāvito dayitaḥ ||)
38. sambhramavikalpo yathā—
turia-pahāia-diṭṭammi pariaṇe āgao tti soūṇa |
ajjā sajjhasavialā paaṃ pi dāuṃ ṇa pārei || 76 ||
{tvarita—pradhāvita—dṛṣ‍ṭe parijane āgata iti kṣutvā |
āryā sādhvasavikalā padamapi dātuṃ na pārayati ||}
sajjhasavesavevirakomalorupaḍisiddhasamuhasebhāre |
keṇa va diṇṇaṃ tāvii pieṇa pariraṃbhiā ramaṇī || 77 ||
{sādhvasavepanaśīlakomalorupratiṣiddhasamūhasaṃbhāre |
kena vā dattaṃ tāvaditi(diṇṇodaṃta tti) priyeṇa parirabdhā ramaṇī ||}
39. nāyakāpratibodhanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 6.15)
puraścakṣūrāgastadanu manaso manyuparatā tanuglāniryasya tvayi samabhavad yatra ca tava |
yuvā so 'yaṃ preyāniha suvadane muñca jaḍatāṃ vidhāturvaidagdhyaṃ vilasatu sakāmo 'stu madanaḥ || 78 ||
tvaṃ vatsaleti kathamapyavalambitātmā satyaṃ jano 'yamiyato divasānanaiṣīt |
āviddha—kaṅkaṇa—kara—praṇaya—prasādaṃ āsādya nandatu cirāya phalantu kāmāḥ || 79 ||
40. suhṛtparihāso yathā—(raghu. 6.82, kusaṃ. 7.19)
tathāgatāyāṃ parihāsapūrvaṃ sakhyāṃ sakhī vetrabhṛdābabhāṣe |
ārye vrajāvānyata ityathaināṃ vadhūsūyākulitaṃ dadarśa || 80 ||
﻿
patyuḥ śiraścandrakalamanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam |
sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīr mālyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna || 81 ||
athāto dūtapuraskāra itivṛttākhyānamavasthājñānamavadhānaṃ samprayogasampradhānaṃ śaktivivecanaṃ samāgamopāyaḥ samīhitasiddhiriti prapañcato 'bhidhīyante |
(41. dūtapuraskāraḥ)
tatra dūtīsakhīnāyakādibhedād dūtapuraskāraprapañcaḥ | tatra —
1. dūtīkṛto yathā—(māmā. 1.18/19)
kāmandakī— vatse avalokite, sādhu sādhu | anena matpriyābhiyogena smārayasi me pūrvaśiṣyāṃ saudāmanīm |
yathā vā— sādhu sakhe bhūrivaso sādhu | prabhavati nijasya kanyakājanasya mahārāja iti ubhayalokāviruddhamuttaramupanyastam|| 82 || (māmā. 2.2/3)
yathā ca—(māmā. 10.20)
ehyehi bhūrijanajīvitadānapuṇya— sambhāradhāriṇi! cirādasi hanta dṛṣ‍ṭā |
dattapramodamapi nandaya me śarīram āliṅgya sauhṛdanidhe! virama praṇāmāt || 83 ||
yataḥmdash;(māmā. 10.21)
vandyā tvameva jagataḥ spṛhaṇīyasiddhiḥ evaṃvidhairvilasitairatibodhisattvaiḥ |
yasyāḥ purā paricayapratibaddhabījam udbha‍ūtabhūriphalaśāli vijṛmbhitena || 84 ||
2. sakhīkṛto yathā—(māmā. 6.15/16)
sādhu lavaṅgike sādhu | avasare khalu anurāgo(pa)kārayorgarīyasorupanyāsaḥ |
yathā vā—(māmā. 4.6)
'dayā vā s‍neho vā bhagavati nije 'smin śiśujane' || 85 || ityādi
yathā ca—(māmā. 2.7/8)
jadā bhaavadīe āṇattaṃ | aṇṇahā tassiṃ avasare duddaṃsaṇe adikkaṃtajovvaṇe ﻿
kiṃti ṇa viāridaṃ amac‍ceṇa | tā pasīda bhaavadi pirattāhi etto jīvaṃtamaraṇādo piasahiṃ tuha vi esā duhidā evva |
(yathā bhagavatyā ' 'jñap‍tam | anyathā tasmin avasare durdarśane atikrantayauvane kimiti na vicāritam amātyena? tat prasīda bhagavati paritrāyasva etasmāt jīvanmaraṇāt priyasakhīm, tavāpi khalu eṣā duhitaiva || 86 ||)
3. nāyakakṛto yathā—(māmā. 10.22)
api cintāmaṇiścintāpariśramamapekṣate |
idaṃ tvakṛtamanyena kṛtamāścaryamāryayā || 87 ||
yathā vā—(rat‍nā. 4.19)
'yāto vikramabāhurātmasamatāṃ prāp‍teyamurvītale' || 88 || (pṛ.639) ityādi
4. nāyikākṛto yathā—(māmā. 6.7/8)
hā paramatthavādiṇi piasahi lavaṃgie esā dāṇiṃ piasahī aṇādhā maraṇe vaṭṭamāṇā āgavbhaniggamaṇiraṃtaropaūḍhavīsaṃbhasarisaṃ parissajja tti abbhatthedi | (hā paramārthavādini priyasakhi, lavaṅgike, eṣā idānīṃ priyasakhī anāthā maraṇe vartamānā āgarbhanirgamanirantaropārūḍhavisrambhasadṛśaṃ pariṣvaṃjeti abhyarthayate |)
yathā vā—(māmā. 7.1/2)
madayantikā— kiṃ puṇo vi paṇaabhaṃgeṇa kidāvarāho aaṃ jaṇo jeṇa evaṃ maṃtesi | piasahi tumaṃ lavaṃgia a saṃpadaṃ me hiaaṃ |
(kiṃ punarapi praṇayabhaṅgena kṛtāparādhaḥ ayaṃ jano yena evaṃ mantrayase | priyasakhi tvaṃ lavaṅgikā ca sāmprataṃ me hṛdayam || 89 ||) (pṛ. 180, NS 1936)
5. evaṃ sāmānyato 'pi yathā—
kaha vi vilaggāloaṇa—ṇīsasaṇubbhaḍapiāhiuk‍kaṃṭhaṃ |
dullahajaṇāṇurattaṃ dūio puṇa jiāveṃti || 10 ||
(kathamapi vilag‍nālokananiḥś‍vāsanodbhaṭapriyādhikotkaṇṭham |
durlabhajanānurak‍taṃ dūtyaḥ punarjīvayanti ||)
katto sandesasuhaṃ katto sarasāi mohaṇasuhāi |
ciṃtāmaṇi vva loammi sā hu dūī jaï ṇa hoi || 91 ||
﻿
(kutaḥ sandeśasukhaṃ kutaḥ sarasāni mohanasukhāni |
cintāmaṇiriva loke sā khalu dūtī yadi na bhavati |)
jaïāiritavesaviaviasadūla sīsaṃta |
saṃgamasuhasamabbhahiamaṇarahā hoṃti saṃdesā || 92a || (pṛ.1289)
(saṅgamasukhasamābhyadhikamanorathā bhavanti sandeśāḥ ||)
asaṅkalpitamapyarthamutsṛṣ‍ṭamapi kāraṇāt |
punarāvartayatyeva dūtī vacanakauśalāt || 92b || (kāmasū.5.4)
(42. itivṛttākhyānam)
dūtīsakhīnāyikāvyākhyānaprapañcaḥ | tatra—
1. dūtīsakhyāḥ yathā—(māmā. 2.8/9) 'śrūyatāmasti, vidarbhādhipasya narapateḥ amātya' ityata ārabhya 'sa eṣa mādhavo nāma' itiyāvat |
2. dūtīnāyikā yathā—(māmā. 3.10/11)
kāmandakī— mālatyāś‍cibukamunnamayya 'śṛṇu vicitramidaṃ subhage | asti tāvadekadā prasaṅgataḥ kathita eva mayā mādhavābhidhānaḥ kumāro yastvamiva māmakīnasya manaso dvitīyaṃ bandhanam' ityupakramya 'aho upanyāsa aho mahattvāropaṇe yat‍na' iti mādhavasya sampratyayotpattiriti yāvat |
3. dūtī nāyakasya yathā—(māmā. 4.4/5)
evamatidurmanāyamānaḥ pīḍayati māṃ vatso (mādhavaḥ) vatsā ca mālatī | duṣkaraṃ nirāśā praṇiti (iti) | pṛcchāmi ca tāvadāyuṣmantaṃmapi | bhavānamaṃsta yathā bhūrivasureva mālatīmasmabhyaṃ dāsyatīti | (ataḥ) prabhavati ॰ ॰ ॰ kathañcana māmanavadhānāṃ manyase' itiyāvat |
4. evaṃ sakhī dūtyā yathā—(māmā. 3.12/13)
'bhaavadī evvaṃvādiṇi tti atthi | aṃhāṇaṃ vi bhaṭṭidāriā bhavaṇasaṇṇaracchāmuhamuhuttavedanassa/maṇḍaṇassa tassa evva devassa bahuso aṇubhūdadaṃsaṇā bhavia raviarāsiliṭṭhamuddhakamaliṇīkaṃdasuṃdarāvaavasohāvihā— vidāṇaṃgaveaṇāvaïararamaṇīā vi pariaṇakuladiṇṇāhiṇaṃdaï kalākīlā— vasāṇadāṃ vammahassa' itiyāvat | ﻿
(bhagavatī evaṃvādinīti asti | asmākamapi bhartṛdārikā bhavanāsannarathyāmukhamuhūrtavedanasya/ maṇḍanasya tasyaiva devasya bahuśo 'nubhūtadarśanā bhūtvā ravikarāśliṣ‍ṭamugdhakamalinīkanda— sundarāvayavaśobhāvibhāvitānaṅgavedanāvyatikararamaṇīyāpi parijanakuladattā 'bhinandati kalākrīḍāvasānatāṃ manmathasya || 93 ||)
5. sakhī nāthikāyā yathā— (kādakasā. 7.53–55,77, 78)
atha bibhrajjaṭāstanvīḥ srutāmbukaṇadanturāḥ |
sta/s‍nānārdravalkalastābhiradṛśyata kapiñjalaḥ || 94 ||
svayamevopasṛtyaiṣa mahāśvetāmabhāṣata |
rājaputryapi nāmāyaṃ pratyabhijñāyate janaḥ || 95 ||
ahaṃ kapiñjalastasya vayasyo dayitasya te |
cirāgamanadaurātmyādupālabhyo 'smi na tvayā || 96 || ityata ārabhya,
kapiñjalakathātastaṃ vaiśampāyanavigraham |
puṇḍarīkamabhijñāya mahāśvetānvatapyata || 97 ||
dvitīye 'pyahamevāsya jātā janmani mṛtyave |
śap‍to mamānurakto 'sau mayeti vilalāpa sā || 98 || iti yāvat
6. sakhī nāyakasya yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.52, 62)
sakhī tadīyā tamuvāca varṇinaṃ nibodha sādho tava cetkutūhalam |
yadarthamambhojamivoṣṇavāraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tapaḥsādhanametayā vapuḥ || 99 ||
ityata upakramya,
agūḍhasadbhāvamitīṅgitajñayā nivedite naiṣ‍ṭhikasundarastayā |
apīdamevaṃ parihāsa ityumāmapṛcchadavyañjitaharṣalakṣaṇaḥ || 100 || iti yāvat
7. nāyako dūtyā yathā—(māmā. 4.1)
'adyāhamantarnagara eva kāṃcid vārtāmupaśrutya mādhavasya cittodvegamadhikamāśaṅkamānaḥ tvaritamavalokitāviditakusumākarodyānavṛttāntaḥ parāpatanneva śārdūlāvaskandena gocaramimāmabhijātakanyakāmabhyupapannavān' || 101 ||
8. nāyakaḥ sakhyuryathā—'śrūyatām, gato 'hamavalokitājanitakautukaḥ kāmadevāyatanam (māmā. 1.23/24)' ityata ārabhya, ﻿
jayati jayinaste te bhāvā navendukalādayaḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ santyevānye mano madayanti ye |
mama tu yadiyaṃ yātā loke vilecanacandrikā nayanaviṣayaṃ janmanyekaḥ sa eva mahotsavaḥ || 102 || (māmā. 1.39)
iti yāvat |
9. nāyako nāyikāyā yathā—(māmā. 5.27)
tvatpāṇipaṅkajaparigrahapuṇyajanmā bhūyāsamityabhiniveśakadarthyamānaḥ |
bhrāmyatrṛmāṃsapaṇanāya paretabhūmā— vākarṇya bhīru ruditāni tavāgato 'smi || 103 ||
10. nāyikāya dūtyā yathā—(māmā. 7.1/2)
'piasahi buddharakkhidāpakkhavādapac‍caeṇa padhamaṃ evva tassiṃ jaṇe aciraṇivvudadaṃsaṇā bhavia' (priyasakhi buddharakṣitāpakṣapātapratyayena prathamameva tasmin jane aciranirvṛttadarśanā bhūtvā ||) ityata ārabhya
'piasamakkhaṃ savvamaṇubhavia jhaḍiti suṇṇāraṇṇasaṇṇihaṃ puṇo vi maṃdabhāiṇī vibhāvemi jīvaloaṃ' (priyasamakṣaṃ sarvamanubhūya jhaḍiti śūnyāraṇyasannibhaṃ punarapi mandabhāginī vibhāvayāmi jīvalokam ||) iti yāvat | yadvā 'kathaṃ puṇo dīaṇāḍiāvicchedapaḍaho tāḍiadi |' (kathaṃ punaḥ dīrghanāḍikāvicchedapaṭahaḥ tāḍyate || 104 ||) iti yāvat |
11. nāyikāsakhyā yathā—(śāku. 3.10)
śākuntale 'jado pahudi mama daṃsaṇapahaṃ gado tapovaṇarakkhī rāesī tado ārahia taggadeṇa ahilāseṇa eārisāvatthā saṃuttā | tahā kareha yahā tassa rāesiṇo aṇukaṃpaṇīā homi | aha aṇṇahā siṃca dāṇiṃ me udaaṃ |' (yataḥ prabhṛti mama darśanapathamāgataḥ tapovanarakṣī rājarṣiḥ, tata ārabhya tadgatena abhilāṣeṇa etādṛśāvasthā saṃvṛttā | tathā kurutaṃ yathā tasya rājarṣeḥ anukampanīyā bhavāmi | atha anyathā siñcataṃ idānīṃ me udakam |)
rājā— saharṣaṃ 'śrutaṃ śrotavyam | vimarśacchedi vacanam | etāvān kāmina' ityārabhya || 105 || (śāku. 3.10)
tapati tanugātri! madanastvāmaniśaṃ māṃ punardahatyeva |
glapayati yathā śaśāṅkaṃ na tathā hi kumudvatīṃ divasaḥ || 106 ||iti yāvat |
(śāku. 3.14)
12. nāyikā nāyakasya yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.64)
yathāśrutaṃ vedavidāṃ vara! tvayā jano 'yamuccaiḥpadalaṅghanotsukaḥ |
tapaḥ kiledaṃ tadavāp‍tisādhanaṃ manorathānāmagatirna vidyate || 107 ||
evamanye 'pi yathā—(māmā. 6.15 / 16)
'bhaavadi kisaṇa—raaṇi—masāṇa—pacāra—vivvasida—visama—vavasāa— ṇiṭṭhāvida—caṃḍa—pacaṃḍapakhaṃḍadoddaṇḍasāhaso sāhasio eso | ado piasahī ukkaṃvidā |' (bhagavati kṛṣṇarajanīśmaśānapracāravyavasitaviṣamavyavasāyaniṣṭhāpitacaṇḍapracaṇḍa— pākhaṇḍadordaṇḍasāhaso sāhasika eṣaḥ | ataḥ priyasakhī utkampitā |)
yathā vā—(māmā. 3.14/15)
'aṇṇaṃ ca jāṇidavvaṃ bhaavadīe | etacca māhavapadiccaṃdaasaṇāhaṃ cittaphalaaṃ | (mālatyāḥ stanāṃśukamapanīya) esā a tassa evva sahatthaviraïdā kaṃṭhavilaṃbidā baülamālā jīvidappiasahitti || {anyacca jñātavyaṃ bhagavatyā | etacca mādhavapraticchandakasanāthaṃ citraphalakam | (mālatyāḥ stanāṃśukamapanīya) eṣā ca tasyaiva svahastaviracitā kaṇṭhavilambitā bakulamālā jīvitapriyasakhīti |} yad‍vyālavraṇitasuhṛtpramohamugdhaṃ saujanyād vihitam' || 108 || (māmā.4.1) ityādi
api ca—(rat‍nā. 2.6)
durvārāṃ madanaśaravyathāṃ vahantyā kāminyā yadabhihitaṃ puraḥ sakhīnām |
tadbhūyaḥ śukaśiśuśārikābhiruktaṃ dhanyānāṃ śravaṇapathātithitvameti || 109 ||
asyāvasthānivedanātprayojya ॰ ॰ ॰ bhedaḥ |
(43. avasthājñānam)
sakhī—dūtī—nāyakodāsīneṣu dṛṣṭaśrutānumitabhedāvasthājñānaṃ prapañcaḥ| tatra —
1. sakhyā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—
pramlānotpalakomale sakhi dṛśau nīlāñjanenāñcite karpūracchuraṇācca gaṇḍaphalake saṃvargikaḥ/rdhiṃtaḥ pāṇḍimā |
śvāsāḥ santu ca kandukabhramibhuvaḥ kintu prabhāvāhinā— maṅgānāṃ kraśimānamutkaṭamamuṃ ko nāma notprekṣate || 110 ||
2. sakhyā śrutaṃ yathā—
priyasakhi! vipaddaṇḍāghātapravātaparamparā— paricayacale cintācakre vidhāya vidhiḥ khalaḥ |
mṛdamiva haṭhāt piṇḍīkṛtya pragalbhakulālavad bhramayati mano no jānīmaḥ kimatra vidhāsyati || 111 ||
3.sakhyā anumitaṃ yathā—(visā. 2.14)
yat tālīdalapākapāṇḍuradanaṃ yad durdinaṃ netrayoḥ yat preṅkholitakelipaṅkajavanāśvāsāḥ prasarpanti ca |
gaurī krudhyatu vartate yadi na te tat ko 'pi citte yuvā dhigdhiktvāṃ sahapāṃsukhelanasakhīloke 'pi yannihnavaḥ || 112 ||
4. dūtyā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.3)
nikāmaṃ kṣāmāṅgī sarasakadalīgarbhasubhagā kalaśeṣā mūrtiḥ śaśina iva netretsavakarī |
avasthāmāpannā madanadahanoddāhavidhurā— miyaṃ naḥ kalyāṇī ramayati manaḥ kampayati ca || 113 ||
5. dūtyā śrutaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.13)
yadi tadviṣayo 'nurāgabandhaḥ sphuṭametaddhi phalaṃ manojñatāyāḥ |
iti nanditamapyavasthayāsyāḥ hṛdayaṃ dāruṇayā vidāryate me || 114 ||
6. dūtyānumitaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.2)
īṣattiryagvalanaviṣamaṃ kūṇitaprāntametat premodbhedastimitalalitaṃ kiñcidākuñcitabhru |
antarmodānubhavamasṛṇasrastaniṣkampapakṣma— vyaktaṃ śaṃsatyaciramanayordṛṣṭamākekarākṣam || 115 ||
7. nāyakasya dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—(śāku. 3.8)
kṣāmakṣāmakapolamānanamuraḥ kāṭhinyamuktastanaṃ madhyaḥ klāntataraḥ prakāmavinatāvaṃsau chaviḥ pāṇḍurā |
śocyā ca priyadarśanā ca madanakliṣṭeyamālakṣyate patrāṇāmiva śoṣaṇena marutā spṛṣṭā latā mādhavī || 116 ||
8. nāyakasya śrutaṃ yathā—(sūmu. 1.60)
tanvaṅgayāstvamiti pramodaviśadaṃ nāstīti khedālasaṃ cakṣurdvārapathāvatāriṇi jane vyāpārayantyā muhuḥ |
harṣārtiprabhavapratikṣaṇabhavasvedāmbudāhajvare bāṣpāmbhaḥkaṇikāḥ payodharataṭe puṣyanti śuṣyanti ca || 117 ||
9. nāyakasyānumitaṃ yathā—(śāku. 2.2)
snigdhaṃ vīkṣitamanyato 'pi nayane yatprerayantyā tayā yātaṃ yacca nitambayorgurutayā mandaṃ vilāsādiva | mā gā ityuparuddhayā yadapi sā sāsūyamuktā sakhī sarvaṃ tat kila matparāyaṇamaho kāmī svatāṃ paśyati || 118 ||
evaṃ nāyakaviṣaye sakhyādīnāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.35)
mā mūmuhat khalu bhavantamananyajanmā mā te malīmasavikārāghanā matirbhūt |
ityādi nanviha nirarthakameva yasmin kāmaśca jṛmbhitaguṇo navayauvanaṃ ca || 119 ||
10. śrutaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.12)
dhatte cakṣurmukulini raṇatkokile bālacūte mārge gātraṃ kṣipati vakulāmodagarbhasya vāyoḥ |
bhā(dā)vapremṇā sarasabisinīpatramātrottarīya— stāmyanmūrtiḥ śrayati bahuśo mṛtyave candrapādān || 120 ||
11. anumitaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3. 9)
yadindāvānandaṃ praṇayini jane vā na bhajate vyanaktyantastāpaṃ tadayamatidhīro 'pi viṣamam |
priyaṅguśyāmāṅgaprakṛtirapi cāpāṇḍu madhuraṃ vapuḥ kṣāmaṃ kṣāmaṃ vahati ramaṇīyaśca bhavati || 121 ||
12. nāyikāto nāyakasya śrutaṃ yathā—(śāku. 3.13)
tuha/tujjha ṇa āṇe hiaaṃ maha aṇa maaṇo divā vi rattiṃ vi |
ṇigghiṇa tavei baliaṃ tui juttamaṇorahaṃ hiaaṃ || 122 ||
(tava na jāne hṛdayaṃ mama punaḥ madano divāpi rātrimapi |
nirghṛṇa! tapati balīyaḥ tvayi yuktamanorathaṃ hṛdayam ||)
13. nāyakato nāyikāyā yathā—(śāku. 3.14)
tapati tanugātri madanastvāmaniśaṃ māṃ punardahatyeva |
glapayati yathā śāśāṅkaṃ na tathā hi kumudvatīṃ divasaḥ || 123 || ityādi
14. nāyakasya svānubhūtaṃ yathā—(śāku. 3.10)
idamaśiśirairantastāpād vivarṇamaṇīkṛtaṃ niśi niśi bhujanyastāpāṅgapravartibhiraśrubhiḥ |
anatilulitajyāghātāṅkaṃ muhurmaṇibandhanāt kanakavalayaṃ srastaṃ srastaṃ mayā pratisāryate || 124 ||
15. anyena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.5)
kuvalayadalaśyāmo 'pyaṅgaṃ dadhat paridhūsaraṃ lalitavikaṭanyāsaḥ śrīmanmṛgāṅkanibhānanaḥ |
rahasi vinayaṃ vāmo yasya prakāśitasāhasaḥ pravigaladasṛkpaṅkaḥ pāṇirlalannarajāṅgalaḥ || 125 ||
(44. avadhānam)
sakhīdūtīnāyakānāṃ deśakālakāryapātrabhedād avadhānaprapañcaḥ| tatra —
1. sakhyā deśāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.10)
'ayamasau mahānadyorvyatikaraḥ | sa eṣaḥ—
jalanibiḍitavastravyaktanimnonnatābhiḥ parigatataṭabhūmiḥ snānamātrodgatābhiḥ |
rucirakanakakumbhaśrīmadābhogatuṅgastanavinihitahastasvastikābhirvadhūbhiḥ || 126 ||
2. kālāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.20)
gamanamalasaṃ śūnyā dṛṣṭiḥ śarīramasauṣṭhavaṃ śvasitamadhikaṃ kinvetat syātkimanyadato 'thavā |
bhramati bhuvane kandarpājñā vikāri ca yauvanaṃ lalitamadhurāste te bhāvāḥ kṣipanti ca dhīratām || 127 ||
3. kāryāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.42)
abhihanti hanta kathameṣa mādhavaṃ sukumārakāyamanavagrahaḥ smaraḥ |
acireṇa vaikṛtavivartadāruṇaḥ kalabhaṃ kaṭhora iva kūṭapākalaḥ || 128 ||
4. pātrāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 6.6)
iyamavayavaiḥ pāṇḍukṣāmairalaṅgakṛtamaṇḍanā kalitakusumā vallī/bālevāntarlatā pariśoṣiṇī | vahati ca varārohā ramyāṃ vivāhamahotsava— śriyamudayinīmatyarthaṃ ca vyanakti manorujam || 129 ||
5. dūtyā deśāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 6.19)
'gạ̄dhotkaṇṭha' || 130 || (pṛ. 946) ityādi
6. kālāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.12)
kṣipannidrāmudrāṃ madanakalahacchedasubhagā— mupāntotkampānāṃ vihagamithunānāṃ prathamataḥ |
dadhānassaudhānāmalaghuṣu nikuñjeṣu ghanatā— masau sandhyāśāṅkhadhvaniranibhṛtaḥ khe vicarati || 131 ||
7. kāryāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.13)
vare 'nyasmin dve/doṣaḥ pitari vicikitsā ca janitā purāvṛttodgārairapi ca kathitā kāryapadavī |
stutaṃ māhābhāgyaṃ yadabhijanato yacca guṇataḥ prasaṅgād vatsasyetyatha khalu vidheyaḥ paricayaḥ || 132 ||
8. pātrāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.19)
śarajjyotsnā kāntaṃ kumudamiva taṃ nandayatu sā sujātaṃ kalyāṇī bhavatu kṛtakṛtyassa ca yuvā |
varīyānanyonya—praguṇa—guṇa—nirmāṇa—nipuṇo vidhāturvyāpāraḥ phalatu ca manojñaśca bhavatu || 133 ||
9. nāyakasya deśāvadhānaṃ yathā—(śāku. 1.15)
śāntamidamāśramapadaṃ sphurati ca bāhuḥ kutaḥ phalamihāsya |
athavā bhavitavyānāṃ dvārāṇi bhavanti sarvatra || 134 ||
10. kālāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.14)
'prakṛtilalitametatsaukumāryaikasāram' || 135 || (pṛ. 1100) ityādi
11. kāryāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 6.3)
mālatyāḥ prathamāvalokanadinādārabhya vistāriṇo bhūyaḥ snehaviceṣṭitairmṛgadṛśo nītasya koṭiṃ parām |
asyāntaḥ khalu sarvathāsya madanāyāsasya sarvasya me kalyāṇaṃ vidadhātu vā bhagavatīnītirviparyetu vā || 136 ||
12. pātrāvadhānaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.4 iyaṃ hi mama)
āvirbhavantī prathamaṃ priyāyāḥ so śacch‌vāsamantaḥkaraṇaṃ karoti |
santāpadagdhasya śikhaṇḍiyūno vṛṣṭeḥ purastādaciraprabheva || 137 ||
13. nāyikāvadhānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.65, 6.49)
phalahīpāḍaa/vāhaṇapuṇṇāhi/hamaṃgala laṃgale kuṇaṃtīe |
vahuāe/asaīeṁ maṇorahagabbhiṇīe hatthā tharaharaṃti || 138 ||
(kārpāsīkṣetrakarṣaṇapuṇyāhamaṅgalaṃ lāṅgale kurvatyāḥ |
vadhukāyā manorathagarbhiṇyāḥ hastau tharatharāyete ||)
ajja mae gaṃtavvaṃ ghaṇaṃdhaāre vi tassa suhaassa |
bālā/ajjhā ṇimīlaacchī paaparivāḍiṃ ghare kuṇaï || 139 ||
(adya mayā gantavyaṃ ghanāndhakāre 'pi tasya subhagasya |
bālā/ āryā nimīlitākṣī padaparipāṭīṃ gṛhe karoti ||) gāsa. 3.49
14.kāryāvadhānaṃ yathā—
dṛṣṭiṃ he prativeśini! kṣaṇamihāpyasmin gṛhe dāsyasi prāyeṇāsya śiśoḥ pitā na virasāḥ kaupīrapaḥ pāsyati |
ekākinyapi yāmi tad varamitaḥ srotastamālākulaṃ nīrandhrāḥ punarālikhantu jaraṭhacchedā nalagranthayaḥ || 140 ||
15. pātrāvadhānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 865ve.)
emea akaa/maṃdapuṇṇā appattamaṇorahā vivajjissaṃ |
jaṇavāvo vi ṇa jāo teṇa samaṃ haliaütteṇa || 141 ||
(evameva akṛtapuṇyā aprāp‍tamanorathā vipatsye |
janavādo 'pi na jātaḥ, tena samaṃ halikaputreṇa ||)
(45. (saṃ(pra)yogasaṃvidhānam)
svayaṃkṛta—dūtakṛta—gurukṛta—sahāyakṛta—yogāt saṃyogasaṃvidhānaprapañcaḥ| tatra— svayaṃkṛteṣu nāyakakṛtaṃ nāyikākṛtaṃ ca | teṣu—
1. nāyakakṛtaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.84)
ito gamiṣyāmyathaveti vādinī cacāla sā ca stanabhinnavalkalā |
svarūpamāsthāya ca tāṃ kṛtasmitaḥ samālalambe vṛṣarājaketanaḥ || 142 ||
2. nāyikākṛtaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 8.80)
candrāpīḍaṃ sā ca jagrāha kaṇṭhe kaṇṭhasthānaṃ jīvitaṃ ca prapede |
tenāpūrvāṃ sā samullāsalakṣmīminduspṛṣṭā sindhuveleva bheje || 143 ||
3. ubhayakṛtaṃ yathā—
paḍhama—pahāeṁ puhakkio paosa—kāla—paḍisiddha—dhīrāraṃbho |
pecchaï gamaṇaddhapahe caṃda—kara—samappie pie juaïjaṇo || 144 ||
(prathama—prabhayā pṛthaka‌kṛta: pradoṣa—kāla—pratiṣiddha—dhairyārambhaḥ |
prekṣate gamanārdhapathe candrakarasamarpitān priyān yuvatijanaḥ ||)
4. anubhayakṛtaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.27)
'tvatpāṇipaṅkajaparigrahapuṇyajanmā bhūyāsam' || 145 || (pṛ.788) ityādi dūtakṛteṣu nāyakāpekṣayā nāyikāpekṣayā ubhayāpekṣayā anubhayāpekṣayā ca | teṣu—
5. nāyakāpekṣayā yathā—(māmā. 7.3)
preyān manorathasahasravṛtaḥ sa eṣa sup‍tapramattajanametadamātyaveśma |
prauḍhaṃ tamaḥ kuru kṛtajñatayaiva bhadramutkṣip‍tamūkamaṇinūpuramehi yāvaḥ || 146 ||
6. nāyikāpekṣayā yathā—
ia jā maṇammi ūsā puraṃtavāma—tthaṇī valaṃteī/veārei |
tā aṇiruddho sud‍dhaṃtamāṇio cittalehāe || 147 ||
(iti yāvanmanasi uṣā sphurad‍vāmastanī valamānā/vicārayati |
tāvad aniruddhaḥ śuddhāntamānītaḥ citralekhayā ||)
7. ubhayāpekṣayā yathā—(māmā. 6.15)
'puraścakṣūrāgastadanu manaso manyu(nanya)paratā' || 148 || (pṛ.714) ityādi
8. ubhayāna/anubhayāpekṣayā yathā—(rudraṭālaṅkāre 6.47 namisādhu)
pṛṣṭaḥ kāle vadati sa māṣaṃ tadviparītaṃ samyamaraṇye |
lumpati coṣṭre raṃ vā ṣaṃ vā tasmai dattā vikaṭanitambā || 149 ||
9. gurukṛte nāyakāpekṣayā yathā—(māmā. 1.13)
apatyasambandhavidhipratijñā priyasya nītā suhṛdaḥ smṛtiṃ ca |
alokasāmānyaguṇastanūjaḥ prarocanārthaṃ prakaṭīkṛtaśca || 150 ||
10. nāyikāpekṣayā yathā—(kusaṃ. 1.58)
tamarghyamarghyādibhiradrināthaḥ svargaukasāmarcitamarcayitvā |
ārādhanāyāsya sakhīsametāṃ samādideśa prayatāṃ tanūjām || 151 ||
11. ubhayāpekṣayā yathā—(māmā. 1.15)
viśeṣatastu bālatvāt tayorvinatabhāvayoḥ |
tena mādhavamālatyoḥ kāryassvamatinihnavaḥ || 152 ||
12. anubhayāpekṣayā yathā—(raghu. 13.85)
imāṃ svasāraṃ ca yavīyasīṃ me kumudvatīṃ nārhasi nānumantum |
ātmāparādhaṃ nudatīmupetāṃ śuśrūṣayā pārthiva! pādayoste || 153 ||
sahāyakṛteṣu nāyakāpekṣayā yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.7)
prārambhe 'smin svāmino vṛddhihetau daivenetthaṃ dattahastāvalambe |
siddherbhrāntirnāsti satyaṃ tathāpi svecchākārī bhīta evāsmi bhartuḥ || 154 ||
13. nāyikāpekṣayā yathā—(śāku. 5.15)
tvamarhatāṃ prāgrasaraḥ smṛto 'si naḥ śakuntalā mūrtimatīva satkriyā |
samānayaṃstulyaguṇaṃ vadhūvaraṃ cirāya vācyaṃ na gataḥ prajāpatiḥ || 155 ||
14. ubhayāpekṣayā yathā—(kādakasā. 5.59)
lajjāstimitamāsīnāmatha kādambarīṃ balāt |
mahāśvetā gṛhācāraṃ candrāpīḍe nyadhāpayat || 156 ||
15. ubhayānapekṣayā yathā—
. . . saṃvāhaṃti jaṃṇiājaṃjaṃ | ālīhaüṃ . . de romaṃcassamuppahaï || 157 ||
(46. śak‍tivivecanam)
sakhīdūtanāyikānāṃ prabhutvotsāhamantradaivabhedācchaktivivecanaprapañcaḥ| tatra —
1. sakhyuḥ prabhuśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(mavīca. 1.54)
dorlīlāñcitacandraśekharadhanurdaṇḍāvabhaṅgodyata— ṣṭaṅkāradhvanirāryabālacaritaprastāvanāḍiṇḍimaḥ |
drākparyastakavāṭasampuṭamita—brahmāṇḍabhāṇḍodara— bhrāmyatpiṇḍitacaṇḍimā kathamaho nādyāpi viśrāmyati || 158 ||
2. sakhyuḥ utsāhaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(bābhā. 1.83)
'kasya droṇo dhanuṣi na guruḥ svasti devavratāya channābhyāsaḥ'|| 159 || (pṛ. 1029) ityādi |
3. sakhyuḥ mantraśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.9)
'pramathya kravyādaṃ maraṇasamaye' || 160 || (pṛ. 1276) ityādi |
4. sakhyuḥ daivaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 3.18)
vayaṃ bata vidūrataḥ kramagatā vasoḥ kanyakā kathaṃ tadavapātitādadhigatāyudhaḥ sambhramāt |
kuto 'pi makaranda etya sahasaiva madhye sthito dṛḍhaṃ paraśunāhato vyasurasau kṛtaścāmunā || 161 ||
5. dūtasya prabhuśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 9.53)
gurucaryātapastantramantrayogābhiyogajām |
imāmākṣepaṇīṃ siddhimātanomi hitāya vaḥ || 162 ||
6. mantraśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 1.14)
tāṃ yācate narapaternarmasuhṛnnandano nṛpamukhena |
tatsākṣātpratiṣedhaḥ kopāya śivastvayamupāyaḥ || 163 ||
7. utsāhaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.5) (pṛ. 791)
'mā vāṃ sapat‍neṣvapi nāma tad bhūt pāpaṃ yadasyām' || 164 || ityādi
8. daivaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(rat‍nā. 1.6)
dvīpādanyasmādapi madhyādapi jalanidherdiśo 'pyantāt |
ānīya jhaṭiti ghaṭayati vidhirabhimatamabhimukhībhūtaḥ || 165 ||
9. nāyakasya prabhuśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.32)
dhairyaṃ nidhehi hṛdaye hata eṣa pāpaḥ kiṃ vā kadācidapi kenacidanvabhāvi |
sāraṅgasaṃhṛtividhāvibhakumbhakūṭakuṭṭākapāṇikuliśasya hareḥ pramādaḥ || 166 ||
10. utsāhaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—
yenāropaṇakarmaṇāpi bahavo vīravrataṃ tyājitāḥ kāryaṃ sajjitabāṇamīśvaradhanustaddorbhirebhirmudā |
strīrat‍naṃ tadagarbhasambhavamito labhyaṃ ca līlāyitāt tenaiṣā mama phullapaṅkajavanī jātā dṛśāṃ viṃśatiḥ || 167 ||
11. mantraśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 4.4)
'samānapremāṇaṃ janamasulabhaṃ prārthitavato vi dhau vāme' || 168 || (pṛ. 1174) ityādi |
12. daivaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5. 28) (pṛ. 554)
'rāhoścandrakalāmivānanacarīṃ daivāt samāsādya me' || 169 || ityādi
13. nāyikāyāḥ prabhuśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.1)
manorā/rogastīvraṃ viṣamiva visarpannavirataṃ pramāthī nirdhūmaṃ jvalati vidhutaḥ pāvaka iva |
hinasti pratyaṅagaṃ jvara iva garīyānita ito na māṃ trātuṃ tātaḥ prabhavati na cāmbā na bhavatī || 170 ||
14. mantraśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(māmā. 2.2)
'jvalatu gagane rātrau rātrāvakhaṇḍakalaśśāśī' || 171 || (pṛ.887) ityādi
15. utsāhaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 3.49)
'ajja mae gaṃdavvaṃ' || 172 || (pṛ. 1230) ityādi
16. nāyikāyāḥ daivaśaktivivecanaṃ yathā—(kādakasā. 4.123)
virama rama/maraṇodyogādasmāt priyeṇa tavāmunā punarapi mahāśvete! vatse! bhaviṣyati saṅgamaḥ |
iti giramimāṃ śrutvā tasmāt sasambhramavismayāt kimijamiti taṃ tatrāpṛccha prasṛtya kapiñjalam || 173 ||
(47. samāgamopāyaḥ)
tapasyāsāhasādibhiḥ samāgamopāyaprapañcaḥ; yathocyate—
tapasyā sāhasaṃ māyā cchadma cchalitakaṃ haṭhaḥ |
veṣo rūpāntarāpattirindrajālaṃ vinirgamaḥ || 174 ||
(utsavālekhapūjādir)1 lekhaśceṣṭā 'nuvartanam |
kāryopadeśaḥ sāhāyyamityupāyāḥ samāgame || 175 || teṣu
1. tapasyā yathā—(kusaṃ. 5.2)
iyeṣa sā kartumavandhyarūpatāṃ samādhimāsthāya tapobhirātmanaḥ |
avāpyate vā kathamanyathā dvayaṃ tathāvidhaṃ prema patiśca tād‍ṛśaḥ || 176 ||
2. sāhasaṃ yathā—(māmā. 5.5)
tatko 'yamatigambhīramadhurākṛtiruttaraṅgitakuṭilakuntalaḥ kṛpāṇapāṇiḥ śmaśānamavatarati? (ya eṣaḥ) 'kuvalayadalaśyāmo 'pyaṅgaṃ dadhatparidhūsare' tyādi || 177 ||
3. māyā yathā—(raghu. 12.53)
rakṣasā mṛgarūpeṇa vañcayitvā sa rāghavau |
jahāra sītāṃ pakṣīndraprayāsakṣaṇavighnitaḥ || 178 ||
4. chadma yathā—(māmā. 1.14)
'tāṃ yācate narapateḥ || 171 || (pṛ. 1309) ityādi
5. chalitakaṃ yathā—(māmā. 6.18/19)
'vatsa makaranda, anenaiva vaivāhikena mālatīnaipathyena parivāritaḥ pravartasva pariṇayāyātmānam || 180 || iti| NOTES pg=1311! 1. iyamasmākaṃ yojanā |
6. haṭho yathā—(raghu. 7.31)
sa rājalokaḥ kṛtapūrvasaṃvidārambhasiddhau samayopalabhyam |
ādāsyamānaḥ pramadāmiṣaṃ tadāvṛtya panthānamajasya tasthau || 181 ||
7. veṣaḥ yathā—
(muk‍tākalāpamitabhūṣaṇamac)1 chamekaṃ vāsaśca vāsavaripurmamṛṣe 'lasāṅgaḥ |
sañcikliśe kalitarudraniketanādribhariṇa tatkṣaṇamasau maṇibhūṣaṇānām || 182 ||
8. rūpāntarāpattiryathā—(urā. 2.10)
dordaṇḍāḥ kva dhṛtāṅgadāḥ kva ca sirānaddhau bhujau dvāvimau vaktrāṇi kva nu kāntimanti valimat kvedaṃ mamedaṃ mukham |
vācastāḥ kva jitārṇavadhvanighanāḥ kvedaṃ vacassaṃyataṃ helākampitabhūdharaḥ kva caraṇanyāsaḥ, kva mandā gatiḥ || 183 ||
9. indrajālaṃ yathā—(seba. 11.28)
païmāhappa—ṇisaṇṇā avamaṇṇia—sesa—sappurisa—soḍīrā |
jaï ṇavaraṃ ejja vasaṃ lua—rāhava—sīsa—daṃsaṇe jaṇaasuā || 184 ||
(patimāhātmyaniṣaṇṇā avamānita—śeṣa—satpuruṣa—śauṇḍīryā |
yadi nūnamiyāt vaśaṃ lūna—rāghava—śīrṣa—darśane janakasutā ||)
10. vinirgamo yathā—(śāku. 3.11)
ayaṃ sa te tiṣṭhati saṅgamotsuko viśaṅkase bhīru yato 'vadhīraṇām |
labheta vā prārthayitā na vā śriyaṃ śriyā durāpaḥ kathamīpsito janaḥ || 185 ||
11. {utsavaḥ yathā mālavikāgnimitre |
devapūjā yathā mālatyāḥ kāmadevapūjā | (māmā.)}1
12. lekho yathā—(kāda.)
dūraṃ muktālatayā bisasitayā vipralobhyamāno me |
haṃsa iva darśitāśo mānasajanmā tvayā nītaḥ || 186 || NOTES pg=1312! 1. iyamasmākaṃ yojanā |
13. ceṣṭānuvartanaṃ yathā—
sā māhamāsagosaggamaṃjaritaṃ vi diṇapuṇaggamia |
atatāaduhe doh‍iṇavituṃhe dhadhaṃmiṭṭho || 187 ||
14. kāryopadeśo yathā—(gāsa. 4.28)
ṇīāiṁ ajja ṇikkiva piṇaddhaṇavaraṃgaāeṁ varaīe |
gharaparivāḍīa paheṇaāiṁ tuha daṃsaṇāsāe || 188 ||
(nītāni adya niṣkṛpa pinaddhanavaraṅgakayā varākyā |
gṛhaparipāṭyā praheṇakāni tava darśanāśayā ||)
15. sāhāyyaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.493)
helodastamahīdharasya tanutāmālokya doṣṇorhateḥ(reḥ) hastāvaṃsataṭe nidhāya caraṇāvaropya tatpādayoḥ |
śailoddhārasahāyatāṃ jigamiṣoraprāp‍tagovardhanā rādhāyāḥ suciraṃ jayanti gagane vandhyāḥ karabhrāntayaḥ || 189 ||
(48. samīhitasiddhiḥ)
itivṛttasya sandhyādīnām alabdhalābhārthādibhedāt samīhitasiddhiprapañcaḥ| arthitayā abhipravṛttasya yathepsitaphalāvāp‍tiḥ samīhitasiddhiḥ |
sā ca pramāṇaprameyavicāraniścayapravṛtterantareṇa na syāt| atastannibandhanā eva itivṛtteṣu pratimukhādayo bījabindvādīnāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ ye kriyāvibhāgāste sandhayo 'vasthāḥ saṃsthāḥ samavasthāścābhidhīyante| tatra —
(1. pramāṇam)
pramāṇaṃ parokṣapratyakṣobhayātmakamapi yuktiyuktameva pramāṇamiti| pramāṇavicāreṣu yukteḥ balīyastvād yuktiḥ pramāṇam| yathocyate—''yuktyā yanna ghaṭāmupaiti tadahaṃ d‍ṛṣṭvāpi na śraddadhe|' tacca pañcāvayavameva vākyaṃ yatparārthānumānamiti ācakṣate| te cāvayavāḥ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanāni, teṣāmaśeṣapramāṇasamabhivyāhārarūpatvāt| uktaṃ ca 'tatrāgamaḥ pratijñā heturanumānamudāharaṇamupamānamupanayaḥ pratyakṣam' (nyāyasū.) iti |
(2. prameyam)
ātmaśarīrendriyārthabuddhimanaḥ pravṛttidoṣapretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāpavargāstu prameyam| tat sāmānyena saṃkṣepato deśaḥ, kālaḥ, pātram, śaktiḥ,sādhanamiti |
viśeṣatastu bījabindupatākāprakarīkāryamiti| yathocyate— (nāśā. 19.20)
bījaṃ binduḥ patākā ca prakarī kāryameva ca |
arthaprakṛtayaḥ pañca jñātvā yojyā yathāvidhi || 190 || tatra—
1. bījaṃ mahāvākyārthaḥ| yathā jānakīharaṇaṃ, subhadrāharaṇaṃ, kumārasambhavaḥ, śiśupālavadha iti| uktaṃ ca— (nāśā. 19.21)
alpamātramupakṣip‍taṃ bahudhā yad visarpati |
phalāvasānaṃ yacca syāt tad bījamiti kīrtitam || 191 ||
bījamiva bījaṃ (tathoktam)
yathā— bījamup‍tamante prakāṇḍa . . . śākhāprarohapallavapuṣpādinā prakāreṇa bahudhā visarpadante phalāya kalpate, tathā yo mahāvākyārthaḥ nāyakopanāyakānunāyakapratināyakasuhṛtsahāyādivyāpārabhedād bahudhā visarpannante phalāya jāyate sa bījamiti |
2. kathāśarīrāvicchedaheturviṣkambhakapraveśakādirasambaddhaḥ sambaddho vā binduḥ| uktaṃ
ca— prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇam |
yāvatsamāp‍tirbandhasya sa binduriti kīrtitaḥ || 192 || (nāśā. 19.23)1
yathā hi payobinduś‍cyotan payo 'bhiṣyandalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyā avicchedahetuḥ, yathā vā ghṛtabinduragnijvalanalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ vivṛddhaye yassyādevaṃ vicchinneṣu kathāśarīreṣu yo 'nusandhātā sa binduriti |
3. kathāśarīravyāpino nāyakasya prādhānyena yadupakārakaṃ svena phalena phalavat sā patākā| yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.24)2
yasyā vṛttaṃ parārthaṃ syāt pradhānasyopakārakam |
pradhānabaddhaphalavat sā patāketi kīrtitā || 193 ||
yathāhi patākā nāyakasya cihnarūpā prakarṣaśobhāyai bhavantī svasyāpi prakarṣaśobhāyai bhavati evamitivṛtteṣu yadupanāyakādeḥ caritaṃ tat pradhānasya ātmanaśca śobhāprakarṣāya jāyamānaṃ patāketyucyate| patākaivāphalavatyanu— NOTES pg=1314! 1—2. asmatsaṃskaraṇe 19.22,23.
bandhavihīnā ca prakarī| yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.25)1
phalaṃ prakalpate yasyāḥ parārthāyaiva kevalam |
anubandhavihīnāṃ tāṃ prakarīti vinirdiśet || 194 ||
4. prakarīva prakarī| laghurhi prakaraḥ prakarītyucyate| sa tu puṣpādīnāmeva syāt| sa ca puṣpaprakaraḥ parārthopakārakādeśśayanasthānasyānyasya vā śobhāyai bhavati| evaṃ mahāprabandhasya yaḥ ṛtuvarṇanādiranyo vā ko 'pi tadvidho vyāpāraḥ sā prakarī|
5. dharmādīnāmanyatamapuruṣārthaḥ kāryam, yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.26)2
yadādhikārikaṃ vastu samyak prājñaiḥ prayujyate |
yadarthastu samārambhaḥ tat kāryamiti kīrtitam || 195 ||
atrodāharaṇāni—(mavīca. 1.7)
prācetaso munivṛṣaḥ pravaraḥ kavīnāṃ yat pāvanaṃ raghupateḥ praṇināya vṛttam |
bhaktasya tatra sumahānti mamāpi vāca— stāḥ suprasannamanasaḥ kṛtino bhajantām || 196 || iti bījasya |
'hā vatsāḥ kharadūṣaṇatriśiraso vadhyāḥ stha pāpasya me' || 117 ||(pṛ. 696)
(mavīca. 4.11) ityādi bindoḥ |

ārambhaṃ jagṛhe mahendraśikharādambhonidherlaṅghane raṃhasvī raghunāthapādarajasāmuccaiḥ smaran mārutiḥ || 198 ||

mainākaḥ kimayaṃ ruṇaddhi gagane manmārgamavyāhataṃ śaktistasya kutaḥ sa vajrapāta/patanād bhīto mahendrādapi |
tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇa— mā jñātaṃ sa jaṭāyureṣa jarayākliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati || 199 ||
iti prakaryāḥ (urāca. 2.31)

(vicāraḥ) evamarthaprakṛtīnāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyām avagatatvasya hānopādānopekṣābuddhihetave vicāraḥ| sa ca pañcāṅgaḥ — 1. karmaṇāmārambhopāyaḥ, 2. puruṣadravyasampat, 3. deśakālavibhāgaḥ, 4. vinipātapratīkāraḥ, 5. kāryasiddhiśceti |
tasya ca viniścayāvasthāyāṃ pañca karmāṇi —
1. anupalabdhasya jñānam, 2. upalabdhasya niścayabalādhānam; 3. anarthadvaidhasya saṃśayacchedanam; 4. ekadeśad‍ṛṣṭasya śeṣopalabdhiḥ, 5. viparyayavicikitsā ceti |
tena ca nirṇītā 'bhimataphalasiddhiḥ(nāyakaḥ) alabdhalābhārthaṃ, labdhaparirakṣārthaṃ, rakṣitābhivṛddhaye, arthitopayogāya, upayuktaparyāp‍taye ca vartamānaḥ yaṃ yaṃ kriyāprabandha— skandhamadhyāste tasya tasya mukhapratimukhākṛtibhiḥ sandhyādayo vyapadeśā bhavanti| te ca sandhayo 'vasthāsaṃsthāsamavasthā iti| tatra —
(pañcanāṭakasandhayaḥ)
mukhaḥ pratimukho garbho vimarśo nirvahaṇam ityārambhāt parisamāp‍tiparyantāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ pañca sandhayo bhavanti| yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.35)
mukhaṃ pratimukhaṃ garbho vimarśaśca tathaiva hi |
tathā nirvahaṇaṃ ceti sandhayaḥ pañca nāṭake || 201 ||
1. tatrādhikāriṇo nāyakāderyatra nirdeśastan mukham| uktaṃ ca—(nāśā. 19.36)
yatra bījasamutpattirnānārtharasasambhavā |
kathāśarīrānugatā tanmukhaṃ parikīrtitam || 202 ||
2. tatra phalārthāyāḥ pravṛtterupakramastaddheturvā tat pratimukham, yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.37)
bījasyod‍ghāṭanaṃ yatra d‍ṛṣṭanaṣṭamiva kvacit |
mukhe nyastasya d‍ṛśyeta tad vai pratimukhaṃ smṛtam || 203 ||
3. yatra kriyāphalasyodbheda (lābha)nāśānveṣaṇādayo jāyante sa garbhaḥ| yathocyate—
udbhedaḥ kāryabījasya prāp‍tiraprāp‍tireva vā |
punaścānveṣaṇaṃ yatra sa garbha iti saṃjñitaḥ || 204 || (nāśā. 19.38)
4. kriyāphalāvāp‍taye vicāranirṇayo vimarśaḥ| yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.39)
garbhanirbhinnabījotthaḥ( 'rthaḥ) krodhavyasanajo 'pi vā |
vipralambhakṛto vāpi vimarśa iti kīrtitaḥ || 205 ||
5. kriyāphalena samyagyogo nirvahaṇam, yathocyate—(nāśā. 19.40)
yatrānayanamarthānāṃ mukhādyānāṃ mahaujasām |
phalopasaṅgatānāṃ syājjñeyaṃ nirvahaṇaṃ ca tat || 206 ||
ihodāharaṇamekaślokena| (amaruśa. 75)
kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamaśrutam |
asahana—sakhī—śrotra—prāp‍ti—prasāda—sasambhramaṃ vivalitad‍ṛśā śūnye gehe samucch‌vasitaṃ punaḥ || 207 ||
evaṃ mahāvākyeṣvapi rat‍nāvalyādiṣu draṣṭavyam| teṣāṃ ca kilotkṣepaparikaraparinyāsādīni catuṣṣaṣṭiraṅgāni| tāni ca neha pratanyante| abhyupagatatvāt| yathā hyupakṣepādayastathopod‍ghātādayo 'pi sambhavantyeva| tathā ca te prabandheṣvādhikārikā ānuṣaṅgikāḥ prāsaṅgikā vā prayoktavyāḥ, yathā sandarbhaśobhāyai bhavanti| tenānusandhyādīnāmapi samāveśaḥ siddho bhavati| tatra kimādhikārikaṃ kimānuṣaṅkikaṃ kiṃ prāsaṅgikamiti cet— (nāśā. 19.3, 4)
yatkāryaṃ hi phalaprāp‍tau samarthaḥ parikalpyate |
tadādhikārikaṃ jñeyamanyat syādānuṣaṅgikam || 208 ||
kāraṇāt phalasaubhāgyavṛtaṃ syādādhikārikam |
tasyodāharaṇārthaṃ tu prāsaṅgikamihocyate || 209 ||
evamete pañcasandhayaḥ sāṅgāḥ sānuṣaṅgaprasaṅgāś‍ca daivapauruṣobhayavyāpārapradhānatayā tredhā sambhavanti— avasthāḥ, saṃsthāḥ, samavasthā iti| tatra—
yāsu daivasya prādhānyaṃ tā avasthāḥ, daivakṛto hi kāryapariṇāmo 'vasthā| tatra pauruṣamupāśraya āste, daivameva ca pradhānatvena vyāpriyate | tatra hyanuguṇe kāryamārabdhamārambhādibhaṅgyā siddhyatyeva |

(1. mānaviṣayāśrayālambanabhedāḥ — 36)
tatra viṣayāśrayālambanabhedopabhedeṣu dhairyaguṇaprakṛtipravṛttinimittāḥ
1.1 dhīrodātta-dhīroddhata-dhīralalita-uttama-madhyama-kaniṣṭha-sāttvika-rājasa-tāmasa- dakṣiṇa-śaṭha-dhṛṣṭanāmāno mānopayogino dvādaśaviṣayabhedāḥ;
1.2 guṇavayodhairyaprakṛtinimittāḥ uttamā, madhyamā, kaniṣṭhā, mugdhā, madhyā, pragalbhā, dhīrā, adhīrā, udāttā, uddhatā, lalitā, śāntābhinayanā(mānaḥ?) mānasaṃbandhino dvādaśa āśrayabhedāḥ|
1.3 pratyakṣādipramāṇajanmāno mānotpattihetavo dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāpanna—śrutāśrutārthāpanna—śaṅkita— saṃbhāvitānumitopamitaviparītotprekṣitasmṛtasvap‍nopalabdhāhvayā dvādaśaivālambanabhedāḥ |
saiṣā viṣayāśrayālambanaviśeṣabhedopādhinibandhanāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśattadupādhisaṃjñayo— dāhriyate |
(1.1 viṣaya bhedāḥ —12)

2. dhīroddhataviṣayo yathā—(rat‍nā. 3.14)
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi mūrgh‍nā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimba hartuṃ kṣamā yadi paraṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 9 ||1
4. uttamaviṣayo yathā—(raghu. 14.62)
kalyāṇabuddherathavā tavāyaṃ na kāmacāro mayi śaṅkanīyaḥ |
mamaiva janmāntarapātakānāṃ vipākavisphūrjathuraprasahyaḥ || 10 ||
5. madhyamaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 943ve.)
pecchasi aṇimisaṇaaṇo jaṃpasi viṇaaṃ ṇa daṃsase paṭṭhi/piṭṭham |
ko suhaa tujjha doso haahiaaṃ niṭṭhuraṃ majjha || 11 ||
(prekṣase animiṣanayano jalpasi vinayaṃ na darśayasi pṛṣṭham |
kassubhaga tava doṣo hatahṛdayaṃ niṣṭhuraṃ mama ||)
6. kaniṣṭhaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 731ve.)
uvahāriāe samaaṃ ua piṃḍāre kahaṃ kuṇaṃtammi |
ṇaavahuāe sarosaṃ savva c‍cia vac‍caā mukkā || 12 ||
(upabhāryayā samaṃ paśya prakoṣṭhe kathāṃ kurvati |
navavadhyā saroṣaṃ sarva eva vatsakā muk‍tāḥ ||)
7. sāttvikāviṣayo yathā—(kirātā. 10.55)
yadi manasi śamaḥ kimaṅga cāpaṃ śaṭha! viṣayāstava vallabhā na muktiḥ |
bhavatu diśatu nānyakāminībhyastava hṛdaye hṛdayeśvarāvakāśam || 13 ||
8. rājasaviṣayo yathā—
līlāvatī caraṇacumbitamaulimagre kāntaṃ vidhūya vihitāgasamuc‍cacāla |
atrāntare mukharanūpurayugmamasyāḥ saubhāgyagandhagajaḍiṇḍimatāṃ jagāma || 14 ||
NOTES pg=1322! 1. tṛtīyaḥ dhīralalitaviṣayo nopalabhyate |
9. tāmasaviṣayo yathā—(seba. 19.15)
īsāmaccharagarue sāhikkheva—parivaḍ‌̣dhi—ovālaṃbhe |
kaha kaha vi gamei khaṇaṃ vilakkhahasiehi kāmiṇisamullāve || 15 ||
(īrṣyāmatsaragurukān sādhikṣepaparivardhitopālambhān |
kathaṃ kathamapi gamayati kṣaṇaṃ vilakṣahasitaiḥ kāminī—samullāpān ||)
10. dakṣiṇaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.24)
piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ guruāiṁ do vi kajjāi |
jīe tumaṃ kārijjasi tīe ṇamo āhijāīe || 16 ||
(priyaviraho 'priyapadarśanaṃ ca guruke dve api kārye |
yayā tvaṃ kāryase tasyai nama ābhijātyai ||)
11. śaṭhaviṣayo yathā—
aviśadavalannetropāntaṃ vilokanamasphuṭaṃ cakitacakitā vācaḥ sparśaḥ k‍vacijjanasaṅkule |
iti tava mayā premārambhe ya eva vilokitāḥ kaṭhinamanaso dṛṣṭā bhāvāsta eva virajyataḥ || 17 ||
12. dhṛṣṭaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 892ve.)
alaliaï diṭhṭhi-ṇibbhac‍cio vi vihuo vi lakha/ggae sie/siae |
pahao vi cuṃbaï balā alajjae kaha ṇu kuppissaṃ || 18 ||
(āśrayate dṛṣṭinirbhartsito 'pi vidhuto 'pi lag‍nayā śikhayā |
prahato 'pi cumbati balādalajjayā kathaṃ nu kopiṣyāmi ||)
(1.2. āśrayabhedāḥ —12)
āśrayaviṣayopādhinibandhaneṣu
1. uttamāśrayo yathā—(gāsa. 6.13)
hasiehiṃ uvālambhā accuvaārehiṃ rūsiavvāiṃ |
aṃsūhiṃ maṃḍaṇāiṃ eso maggo sumahilāṇaṃ || 19 ||
(hasitairupālambhā atyupacāraiḥ roṣitavyāni |
aśrubhirmaṇḍanāni eṣa mārgaḥ sumahilānām ||)
2. madhyamāśrayo yathā—(gāsa. 6.64)
ṇavi taha aṇālavaṃtī hiaaṃ dūmei māṇiṇī ahiaṃ |
jaha dūra—viambhia—garua—rosa—majjhattha—bhaṇiehiṃ || 20 ||
(nāpi tathānālapantī hṛdayaṃ dunoti māninyadhikam |
yathā dūravijṛmbhitagurukaroṣamadhyasthabhaṇitaiḥ ||)
3. kaniṣṭhāśrayo yathā—(gāsa. 946)
huṃ ṇillajja samosara taṃ cia aṇuṇesu jāeṁ de vaaṇe |
pāaṃguṭṭhālattaaraseṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ || 21 ||
(huṃ nirlajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yayā te vadane |
pādāṅguṣṭhālaktakarasena tilakaṃ vinirmitam ||)
4. mugdhāśrayo yathā—(amaru. 29)
sā patyuḥ prathamāparādhasamaye śikṣopadeśaṃ vinā no jānāti savibhramāṅgavalanā—vakroktikartavyatām |
svacchairacchakapolamūlagalitaiḥ paryastanetrotpalā bālā kevalameva roditi luṭhallolālakairaśrubhiḥ || 22 ||
5. madhyamāśrayo yathā—
uttiṣṭhāmi vimuñca nātha! sutanu! k‍va prasthitā na k‍vacin necchāmi prabhuṇaikamāsanamahaṃ jātaḥ kathaṃ vā prabhuḥ |
svācchandyānnanu kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava mayā no kiñciditthaṃ girā tanvaṅgī dayitaṃ dunoti rudatī kṛtvā mukhaṃ vakṣasi || 23 ||
6. pragalbhāśrayo yathā—(amaru. 18)
'ekatrāsanasaṃsthitiḥ parihṛtā' || 24 || (pṛ.1132) ityādi
7. dhīrāśrayo yathā—
dhario amarisapasaro māṇakkhalaṇe vi ṇa paḍio cia vāho |
tīe ṇavaraṃ piaame gahie aṇiattaloaṇaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 25 ||
(dhṛto 'marṣaprasaro mānaskhalane 'pi na patita eva bāṣpaḥ |
tayā kevalaṃ priyatamena gṛhīte nivartyamānalocanaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
8. adhīrāśrayo yathā—(sūmu. 195)
yāvanno sakhi! gocaraṃ nayanayorāyāti tāvad drutaṃ gatvā brūhi yathādya te dayitayā mānaḥ samālambitaḥ |
dṛṣṭe dhṛṣṭaviceṣṭite tu kitave tasminnavaśyaṃ mama svedāmbhaḥplutirodhanirbharatanoḥ smeraṃ mukhaṃ jāyate || 26 ||
9. udāttāśrayo yathā—
bhrūbhedo na kṛtaḥ kṛtā mukhaśaśicchāyādinā/vā mādṛśī kāluṣyeṇa na lambhitāḥ kalagiraḥ kopaḥ svato lakṣyate |
yatprāgalbhyamapāsya samprati navībhūtaṃ punarlajjayā yaccāyaṃ vinayādaraḥ praṇayinā mukto mahān vartate || 27 ||
10. uddhatāśrayo yathā—
gotrādgotramupaiti cañcalatayā yā pādamūlāt prabho— rdṛṣṭā yā ca piturmameti paṭake dṛṣṭā patantī jala/ḍam |
seyaṃ sāgarikā tvayā paśupate | mūrdh‍nā na nāropite— tyuktaḥ kopakaṣāyapāṭaladṛśā devyā haraḥ pātu vaḥ || 28 ||
11. lalitāśrayo yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.21)
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bhedakāri hasitaṃ noktaṃ vaco niṣṭhuram |
antarbāṣpajaḍīkṛtaṃ prabhutayā cakṣurna visphāritaṃ kopaśca prakaṭīkṛto dayitayā muktaśca na praśrayaḥ || 29 ||
12. śāntāśrayo yathā—
sakhyaḥ kiṃ paruṣairvimuñcata ruṣaṃ tasyāparādhaḥ sakṛt kṣantavyaścapalasya māṃ prati punaḥ kartā priyo nāpriyam |
itthaṃ mānaparigrahavyatikaraṃ hitvā tathā pratyuta prārabdhānunayā yathā parijanenaivākulā hasyate || 30 ||
(1.3 ālambanabhedāḥ —12)
ālambanopādhinibandhaneṣu—
1. dṛṣṭāparādhālambano yathā—
