majjha samuhāvarāhaṃ tuha karaṃtassa daliadakkhiṇṇaguṇaṃ |
agaṇia—parivāa—bhaaṃ juaï—jaṇammi vaha/pahuttaṇaṃ ṇibaḍiaṃ || 31 ||
(mama samukhāparādhaṃ tava kurvataḥ dalitadākṣiṇyaguṇam |
agaṇitaparivādabhayaṃ yuvatijane prabhutvaṃ nipatitam ||)
2. adṛṣṭārthālambano yathā—(gāsa. 932ve.)
pac‍cakkhamaṃtuāraa jaï cuṃbasi maha ime haakaole |
to majjha piasahīe visesao kissa taṇṇāo || 32 ||
(pratyakṣamanyukāraka yadi cumbasi me imau hatakapolau |
tasmānmama priyasakhyā viśeṣakaḥ kasmādārdraḥ ||)
3. śrutāparādhālambano yathā—(gāsa. 3.16)
pattia ṇa pattiaṃtī jaï tujjha ṇa hoṃti majjha ruarīe |
puṭ‍ṭhīeṁ bāhabiṃdū pulaübbheeṇa bhijjaṃtā || 33 ||
(pratīhi na pratiyantī yadi tava na bhavanti mama rodanaśīlāyāḥ |
pṛṣṭhe bāṣpabindavaḥ pulakodbhedena bhidyamānāḥ ||)
4. aśrutārthāpannālambano yathā—(pṛ. 1367)
nirmag‍nena mayāmbhasi smarabharādālī samāliṅgitā kenālīkamidaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe! mudhā tāmyasi |
ityutsvap‍naparamparāsu śayane śrutvā giraṃ śārṅgiṇaḥ savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭhagrahaḥ pātu vaḥ || 34 ||
5. śaṅkitāparādhālambano yathā—(gāsa. 862ve.)
païṇa vaṇṇijjaṃte akkhāṇaasuṃdarīe rūvaṃmi |
īsāmaccharagaruī ghariṇī huṃkāraaṃ dei || 35 ||
(patyā varṇyamāne ākhyānakasundaryā rūpe |
īrṣyāmatsaragurviṇī gṛhiṇī huṃkārakaṃ dadāti ||)
6. sambhāvitāparādhālambano yathā—(gāsa. 1.26)
ṇa kuṇaṃti c‍cia māṇaṃ ṇisāsu pāsuttadaravibuddhāsu |
suṇṇaïa—pāsa—parimusaṇa—veaṇaṃ jaï si jāṇaṃto || 36 ||
(na kurvantyeva mānaṃ niśāsu prasup‍tadaravibuddhāsu |
śūnyīkṛtaśayanaparimuṣitavedanāṃ yadyajñāsyaḥ ||)
7. anumitāparādhālambano yathā—(gāsa. 931ve.)
ṇahapaa—pasāhiaṃgo ṇid‍dāghummaṃta—loaṇo ṇa tahā |
jaha ṇivvaṇāharo sāmalaṃga dūmesi maha hiaaṃ || 37 ||
(nakhapadaprasādhitāṅgo nidrāghūrṇamānalocane na tathā |
yathā nirvraṇādharo śyāmalāṅga dūnayasi mama hṛdayam ||)
8. upamitāparādhālambano yathā
gottakkhalaṇavilakkho rehaṃ a lihasi kiṃ mahīpaṭ‌ṭhe |
aha sa c‍cia ṇivaḍiā aṇurāaparavvase hiae || 38 ||
(gotraskhalanavilakṣo rekhāṃ ca likhasi kiṃ mahīpṛṣṭhe |
atha satyaṃ nipatitā anurāgaparavaśe hṛdaye ||)
9. viparītāparādhālambano yathā—
bhujagaphaṇasahastrasvaccharat‍nāp‍tabimbe nijavapuṣi sapat‍nīśaṅkayerṣyākulāyāḥ |
samaṇihṛdayaghātānnūnamabdheḥ sutāyāś‍caraṇamavatu mṛd‍nan kaṃsavidhvaṃsakṛd vaḥ || 39 ||
10. utprekṣitāparādhālambano yathā—(gāsa. 1.71)
jettiamettaṃ tīraï ṇivvọdhuṃ desu tettiaṃ paṇaaṃ |
ṇa aṇo viṇiatta—pasāa—dukkhadussahaṇa—kkhamo savvo || 40 ||
(yāvanmātraṃ śak‍noti nirvọdhuṃ dehi tāvantaṃ praṇayam |
na jano vinivṛttaprasādaduḥkhadussahanakṣamaḥ sarvaḥ ||)
11. smṛtāparādhālambano yathā—(saka. 5.322)
thoārūḍhamahumaā khaṇapamhaṭhṭhāvarāhadiṇṇullāvā |
hasiūṇa saṇṇavijjaha pieṇa saṃbhariapulaoccaā piā kāvi || 41 ||
(stokārūḍhamadhukā kṣaṇaprasmṛtāparādhadattollāpā |
hasitvā saṃjñāpyate priyeṇa saṃbhṛtaputalakoc‍cayā priyā kāpi ||)
12. svap‍nopalabdhāparādhālambano yathā—(megha. 110)
bhūyaścāha tvamasi śayane kaṇṭhalag‍nā purā me nidrāṃ gatvā kimapi rudatī sasvaraṃ viprabuddhā |
sāntarhāsaṃ kathitamasakṛt pṛcchataśca tvayā me dṛṣṭaḥ svap‍ne kitava ramayankāmapi tvaṃ mayeti || 42 ||
(2. mānabhedajātayaḥ —24)
athāmīṣāmeva bhedāścaturviṃśatirmānabhedajātaya ucyante | te ca bhāmaḥ, kopaḥ, krodhaḥ, utprāśaḥ/saḥ, roṣaḥ, īrṣyāyitaṃ, mantrāyitaṃ, asūyitaṃ, vaimanasyaṃ, unmādaḥ, manyuḥ, mātsaryam, abhiniveśaḥ, avajñā, visūraṇaṃ, vailakṣyaṃ, anuśayaḥ, kāluṣyaṃ, kṣobhaḥ, āvegaḥ, amarṣaḥ, kopātirekaḥ, ugratvaṃ, praṇayakalaha iti | teṣu —
1. strīṇāṃ lalitakopo bhāmaḥ | (yathā kusaṃ. 6.45)
bhrūbhedibhirvikampoṣṭhairlalitāṅgulitarjanaiḥ |
yatra kopaiḥ kṛtā strīṇāmaprasādārthinaḥ priyāḥ || 43 ||
yathā vā—(rat‍nā. 2.17)
dṛṣṭiṃ ruṣā kṣipasi yadyapi bhāminī māṃ s‍nigdheyameṣyati tathāpi na rūkṣabhāvam |
tyaktvā varāṃ vrajasi cet skhalitairayaṃ te khedaṃ gamiṣyati gururnitarāṃ nitambaḥ || 44 ||
2. vallabhādau vaimanasyahetuḥ kopo yathā—
dūmei a me hiaaṃ puṇo puṇo vi rahasaṃgajuttāṇuṇaaṃ |
dosaparāhuttaṭhiaṃ valaṃtamaṇṇuṇivvoliāharaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 45 ||
(dunoti ca me hṛdayaṃ punaḥ punarapi rahassaṅgayuk‍tānunayam |
doṣa—parāṅmukhasthitaṃ valanmanyu—malinitādharaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
yathā vā—(harivi.)
paṭṭhaṃti maaṇa—pasara—ppasāa—sammuhā vilāsiṇīsamullāvā |
tīeṁ uṇa tassa dīraï rosaparāhuttajaṃpiehi vi hiaaṃ || 46 ||
(paṭh‍yante madanaprasaraprasādasaṃmukhā vilāsinīsamullāpāḥ |
tayā punastasya dīryate roṣaparāṅmukhajalpitairapi hṛdayam ||)
3. sa eva svātyayādihetuḥ krodho, yathā—
maṃtūṇa vi haravijiaṃ. . . . iaṇosariaṃ |
māi ramaṇakkhalaṇaṃ rejjatujaaī ṇa tilaalahuī ṇa piā ||47||
yathā vā—
majjhaṃ c‍cia vaaṇijjaṃ amaraṃtīe gurue (vi tuha avarāhe)|
sohaggapaṭṭacūḍo mā lajjavio tumaṃ ṇu pāvasi aasaṃ || 48 ||
(mamaiva vacanīyamamriyamāṇāyā guruke( 'pi tava aparādhe)|
saubhāgyapaṭṭacūḍo mā lajjitaḥ tvaṃ nanu prāp‍noṣi ayaśaḥ ||)
4. priyādiṣu vyājanindotprāśo/so yathā—(harivi.)
sā kusumehi guruiā maha vi kao suhaa daṃsaṇeṇa pasāo |
kaha a ṇa pi/pasāasad‍do laggaï ṇa sahiaassa imassa tuha || 49 ||
(sā kusumairgurūkṛtā mamāpi kṛtassubhaga darśanena prasādaḥ |
kathaṃcana prasādaśabdo lagati na sahṛdayasya asya tava ||)
yathā vā—
kīraï guṇo vi doso sevaṃtammi vi diṇe ṇa dijjaï diṭ‍ṭhī |
ajassa ṇa bihijjaï jaha gahiaṃ taha pahuttaṇaṃ ramaṇijjaṃ || 50 ||
(kriyate guṇo 'pi doṣaḥ, sevamāne 'pi dīne na dīyate dṛṣṭiḥ |
ayaśaso na bhīyate yathā gṛhītaṃ tathā prabhutvaṃ ramaṇīyam ||)
5. priyāparādhānmanassaṃrambho roṣo yathā—
taha baṃdhaṇaaṇurāe taha saṃmoha—vialaṃta—visamālāve |
te c‍ci tīeṁ maaguṇā rosa tti ṭhiā pasāavimuhaṃmi muhe || 51 ||
(tathā baddhānurāge tathā sammohavigalad‍‌viṣamālāpe |
ta eva tasyā madaguṇā roṣa iti sthitāḥ prasādavimukhe mukhe ||)
yathā vā—
ṇaaṇapaholirabāhapphuriāharamettaṇīsahaṃ a aṇīsaṃ |
dūmeiṃ gharagaāeṁ rosaviramālaṇaparaṃ hiaaṃ || 52 ||
{nayanapraghūrṇanaśīlabāṣpaṃ sphuritādharamātranissahaṃ vitataniḥśvāsam |
dunoti gṛhamāgacchantyāḥ roṣa—gopana—paraṃ mama hṛdayam ||}
6. samānāsu dānamānādyamarṣaṇamīrṣyāyitaṃ yathā—
vāoraddapaṇavaṃirivaviraïakaṇṇavaaṃsaduppec‍ce |
vāhaguruaṇasaṃmaïbāhue vahumuhe diṣṭhī || 53 ||
(॰॰॰ viracitakarṇāvataṃsaduṣprekṣe |
gurujanasammativāhake vadhūmukhe dṛṣṭiḥ ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.6)
jo tīe ahara—rāo rattiṃ uvvāsio piaameṇa |
so c‍cia dīsaï gose savattiṇaaṇesu saṃkaṃto || 54 ||
(yastasyā adharārāgo rātrāvud‍vāsitaḥ priyatamena |
sa eva dṛśyate prabhāte sapat‍nīnayaneṣu saṃkrāntaḥ ||)
7. anubhayāpekṣo manyurmantrāyitaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.264) (harivi.)
kuviā a sac‍cahāmā same vi vahuāṇa ṇavara māṇakkhalaṇe |
paaḍiahiaasāro pemmāsaṃgasariso pavaṭṭhaï maṇṇū || 55 ||
(kupitā ca satyabhāmā anusṛtā patyā kevalaṃ mānaskhalane |
prakaṭitanijasāraḥ premāsaṅgasadṛśaḥ pravartate manyuḥ ||)
yathā vā—(visā. 1.19)
'atrāntare lalitahāralatā' || 56 || (pṛ.648) ityādi
8. pararddhyasahanamasūyitaṃ yathā—
toṇī ṇiapemma—paḍipasāa—dūṇamāṇaṃ asahaṃti caliā |
jāva païṇo calaṃtaṇeura—palāva—kaḍ‌̣dhia—hiaā || 57 ||
(tasmāt nijapremapratiprasādadūnāsahamānā calitā |
yāvat patyuḥ calannūpurapralāpakaṭhinahṛdayā ||)
yathā vā—
gotrād gotramupaiti cañcalatayā yā pādamūlāt prabho— rbhraṣṭā yā ca piturmameva kaṭake dṛṣṭā vahantī jalam |
seyaṃ sāgarikā tvayā paśupate mūrdhānamāropite— tyuktaḥ kopakaṣāyapāṭaladṛśā devyā haraḥ pātu vaḥ || 58 ||
9. harṣāvasādo vaimanasyaṃ yathā—
ṇīsāsāgamadhūsaro tti mahuro taṃbolakāocchido huṃ dukkaṃ cigalesi daṃca vaaṇaṃ bāhullagaṃḍāṃkiṇo |
dā māṇaṃ bahuvallahassa hiaaṃ (du)vvārijaṃ māṇiṇī eṇhiṃ mā paritammagāḍhahiaā godūṇa savvaṃsahā || 59 ||
(niḥśvāsāgamadhūsaro 'timadhuraḥ tāmbūla. . . huṃ duḥkhaṃ . . vadanaṃ bāṣpārdragaṇḍāṅkitam |
tanmānaṃ bahuvallabhasya hṛdayaṃ durvāri yanmāninī idānīṃ māṃ paritāmyadgāḍhahṛdayā . . . sarvaṃsahā ||)
yathā vā—
veseṇa ṇatthi dukkhakaaṃ ca attapemaṇaṃ masaṃmi pio uhui |
veśāvaṇaramaṇaraṇṇaamāṇa(ṇi)ṇīe māṇakkhalaṇaṃ || 60 ||
10. viruddhavākyādijaḥ koṣānuśaya unmādo yathā—
sāhasu vilāsiṇi—aṇaṃ je ahileṃti sarasāvarāhā piaā |
kiṃ haadakkhiṇṇaguṇāṇaṃ pahavaṃtāṇa suhaa esa suhāo || 61 ||
(kathaya vilāsinī—janameva abhilīyante sarasāparādhāḥ vividhāḥ |
kiṃ hatadākṣiṇyaguṇānāṃ prabhavatāṃ subhaga eṣa svabhāvaḥ ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 6.11)
āma sā suhaa guṇamaṇorūvasohirī, āma ṇigguṇā a ahaṃ |
jo vā tīe ṇa sariso so kiṃ savvo jaṇo maraü || 62 ||
(āma sā subhaga! tava guṇarūpaśobhanaśīlā āma nirguṇā cāham |
yo vā tasyā na sadṛśaḥ sa kiṃ sarvo jano mriyatām ||)
11. aparādhajanmaduḥkhotpādito manyuryathā—
āsūtryante śvasitamaruto yatkucotsedhakampai— rantardhyānāt truṭati ca bahiryādṛśo lakṣalābhaḥ |
pakṣmotkṣepavyatikarahito yaśca bāṣpastadete bhāvāścaṇḍi! dravitahṛdayaṃ manyumāvedayanti || 63 ||
yathā vā—(amaru. 81)
kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena mṛditā nipīto niḥśvāsairayamamṛtahṛdyo 'dhararasaḥ |
muhurlag‍na : kaṇṭhe taralayati bāṣpasstanataṭīṃ priyo manyurjātastava niranurodhe! na tu vayam || 64 ||
12. paraguṇasambhāvanā 'sahiṣṇutā mātsaryam yathā—(gāsa. 6.10)
vesosi jīa paṃsula ahiaaraṃ sā hu vallahā tujjha |
ia jāṇaī vi mae ṇa īsiaṃ daḍḍhapemmassa || 65 ||
(dveṣyo 'si jīva! pāṃsula adhikataraṃ sā khalu vallabhā tava |
iti jānantyā api mayā na īrṣyitaṃ dagdhapremṇaḥ ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 753ve.)
sa ccia rāmeu tumaṃ paṃḍia iti alaṃ mha ramieṇa |
sabbhāvavāhirāiṁ lajjā jāṇaī aggamaggāiṃ || 66 ||
(sa eva ramayati tvāṃ paṇḍita ityalamasmākaṃ na ramitena |
sad‍bhāvabāhyāni lajjā jānāti agravartmāni ||)
13. abhiniveśaḥ yathā—
ṇa sahi aṇuṇaabhaṇiaṃ ṇa desi pasaraṃtarosamukkāmarisā |
kaha ā e karaṃ cia dūravisavvaïaṇiṭṭhuraṃ tuha hiaaṃ || 67 ||
(na sakhi! anunayabhaṇitaṃ na dadāsi, prasaradroṣamuktāmarṣam |
kathamā ekarasameva dūravisaṃvaditaniṣṭhuraṃ tava hṛdayam ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.29)
taha māṇo māṇahaṇāeṁ tīa emea dūramaṇubaddho |
jaha se aṇuṇīa pio ekkaggāma ccia paütthaḥ || 68 ||
(tathā māno mānadhanāyā tathā evameva dūramanubaddhaḥ |
yathā tasyā anunīya priya ekagrāma eva proṣitaḥ ||)
14. avajñā yathā—
chindānaṃ hṛdayaṃ matiṃ bidhurayā dākṣiṇyamunmīlayan devotprāsanayā janena janitaṃ yatprema sāpi priyam |
sọdhuṃ hantumapekṣituṃ jarayituṃ nihnotumutpuṃsituṃ nidhyātuṃ gadituṃ ca na praṇayibhiḥ tajjanmanā pāryate || 69 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.53)
pemmassa virohiasaṃdiṭṭhiassa pacakkhadiṭṭhavilaassa |
hiaassa va tāviasaṃalassa viraso raso hoī || 70 ||
(premṇaḥ virodhitasaṃdṛṣṭasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭavilayasya |
hṛdayasyeva tāpitasaṃśītalasya viraso raso bhavati ||)
15. visūraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 930ve.)
haṃho kiṃva ṇa diṭṭhaṃ halā mae jīviaṃ dharaṃtīe |
so maṃ aṇuṇei pio ahaṃ vi aṇuṇajjimi haāsā || 71 ||
(aho kiṃ vā na dṛṣṭaṃ sakhi mayā jīvitaṃ dharantyā |
sa māmanunayati priyaḥ, ahamapi anuneṣyāmi hatāśā ||)
yathā vā—
purāsīdasmākaṃ tanuriyamabhinnaiva satataṃ tato nu tvaṃ preyān vayamapi hatāśāḥ priyatamāḥ |
idānīṃ nāthastvaṃ vayamapi kalatraṃ kimaparaṃ mayāp‍taṃ prāṇānāṃ kuliśakaṭhinānāṃ phalamidam || 72 ||
16. priyāvamānād vilakṣādibhyo lajjā vaivakṣyaṃ yathā—
ṇa piaïhajjhapaï ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
samuhapaḍivakkha—viliātaṃmetummahaï vāaḍaccia marisaṃ || 73 ||
yathā vā—(kusaṃ. 3.75)
śailātmajāpi piturucchiraso 'bhilāṣaṃ vyarthaṃ samīkṣya lalitaṃ vapurāt‍manaśca |
sakhyoḥ samakṣamiti cādhikajātalajjā śūnyā jagāma bhavanābhimukhī kathañcit || 74 ||
17. vipriyasya punaḥ punaḥ smaraṇamanuśayaḥ, yathā— (dra. 35.30 pṛ. 1587)
takkhaṇa-jaṇia-paripasaṃ-bharia-virodha-saṃga-juttāṇusaaṃ tīe |
garuaṃṇisaṃmalagao ṇiattaṃ piamarise ccia hiaaṃ || 75 ||
{tatkṣaṇajanitaparipraś‍nasaṃsmṛtavirodhasaṅgayuktānuśayaṃ tasyāḥ |
guruaṃ śyāmalāṅgayā nivṛttaṃ priyāmarṣa iva hṛdayam ||}
yathā vā—
amuṇikkhaṇaladdhasuhe takkhaṇasaṃbhariamaṃtudūmiavihalo |
hiae mā ṇavaraṃ ṇa ciraṃ ṇa cireṇa paṇaagaruo passa maï roso || 76 ||
(ajñātakṣaṇalabdhasukhe tatkṣaṇasaṃsmṛtamanyudūnavihvalaḥ |
hṛdaye mā kevalaṃ na ciraṃ na cireṇa praṇayagurukaḥ paśya mayi roṣaḥ ||)
18. vipriyoparāgāccittāśuddhiḥ kāluṣyaṃ yathā—
taṃ cia a sohaï māṇo samuhaṃ jāva paṇaaṃ ṇa khaṃḍeti piā |
khalio a paṇaapasaro pacchā māṇavaïā ṇiaṃtaao || 77 ||
(tāvadeva ca śobhate mānaḥ sammukhaṃ yāvat praṇayaṃ na khaṇḍayati priyā |
skhalitaśca ṇayaprasaraḥ paścāt mānavatyā niyantraṇakaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
varaṃ bhrūbhaṅgaste prakaṭitagurukrodhavibhavāḥ varaṃ sopālambhāḥ praṇayavimukhā gadgadagiraḥ |
varaṃ mānāropaprasabhajanito 'nādaravidhi— rnigụ̄dhāntaḥkopā kaṭhinahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam || 78 ||
19. priyāparādhajadhairyadhvaṃsaḥ kṣobho yathā—
bhaṅgaṃ bhruvoḥ śvasitamānadamaśru cakṣuḥ khedaṃ manastanulatā ca malīmasatvam |
naivāvagāhitumalaṃ sutanostadeṣa manye 'nupāyaparavat‍tvamupaiti kopaḥ || 79 ||
yathā vā—
dhīraṃ dhariaṃ pi gaaṃ dūravalaggo vi pia ṇio maarāo |
lahaï a pemmaṃdhaṃmaṃ kilammaï paa/ḍaï vela/vavise hiaaṃ || 80 ||
(dhairyaṃ dhṛtamapi gataṃ dūrāvalagno 'pi priya! nijo madarāgaḥ |
labhate ca premāndhyaṃ klāmyati patati vañcanāviṣe hṛdayam ||)
20. vyalīkānusandhānāt krodhodbheda āvego yathā—
todhā lajjāpaṇaā bhaṇaï viakkhaṇaviaṇṇadiṭṭhio |
hāsavisesa-maṃtugariikaa-kaṃṭhadhda-parikkhalaṃta-visamullāvā || 81 ||
(tataḥ sā lajjāpraṇayā bhaṇati vicakṣaṇaviṣaṇṇad‍ṛṣṭayā |‌
hāsaviśeṣamanyugurūkṛtakaṇṭhārdhapariskhalad‌viṣamollāpā ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 914 ve.)
ummūlaṃtī va hiaaṃ aṇuṇijjaṃtīo māṇavattīo |
samha/bhariamaṇṇuṇibbharabāhabharod‍bhūlia/bharorumbhiamuhīo || 82 ||
(unmūlayantīva hṛdayaṃ anunīyamānā mānavatyaḥ |
saṃsmṛta—manyu—nirbhara—bāṣpa—bharoparuddha—mukhyaḥ ||)
21. kṛtāparādheṣu krodhāpraśāntiramarṣo yathā—(gāsa. 4.76)
avarajjhasu ettāhe vīsatthaccia jaṇammi ṇiphala-maüe |
kāuṃ ṇikkiva dukkhaṃ pattia sahiaṃ ucca ekkassa-ccia hiaaṃ || 83 ||
(aparādhyasvedānīṃ viśvasta eva jane niṣphalamṛduke |
kṛtvā niṣkṛpa duḥkhaṃ pratīhi sahitamuccairekasyaiva hṛdayam ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 4.75)
teṇa ṇa marāmi maṇṇūhiṁ pūriā ajja, jeṇa, re suhaa |
taggaamaṇā maraṃtī mā tujjha puṇo vi laggissaṃ || 84 ||
(tena na mriye manyubhiḥ pūritādya yena re subhaga |
tadgatamanā mriyamāṇā mā tava punarapi lagiṣyāmi ||)
22. kopātirekaśca . . . yathā—(śāku. 5.23)
mayyeva vismaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛttaṃ rahaḥ praṇayini (yama) pratipadyamāne |
bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣyā bhagnaṃ śarāsanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 85 ||
yathā vā—
ia sāvarāha-piaama-daṃsaṇa-pasaraṃta-rosa-pajjalio |
sohaï viaṃbhia-saṃraṃbha-vibbhamo māṇiṇīsattho || 86 ||
(iti sāparādhapriyatamadarśanaprasarad‍roṣaprajvalitaḥ |
śobhate vijṛmbhitasaṃrambhavibhramo māninīsārthaḥ ||)
23. tadevānunayāsādhyamugratā yathā—
daïagabhiavvaṇavadiamuhaliabhuāiā kāvi |
rosaviasaṃtavisesapattalaṃ esiasubhaï || 87 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.60)
acchoḍiavatthaddhaṃtapatthie maṃtharaṃ tumaṃ vacca |
ciṃtesi thaṇaharāāsiassa majjhassa vi ṇa bhaṃgaṃ || 88 ||
(balādākuṣṭavastrārdhāntaprasthite mantharaṃ tvaṃ vraja |
cintayasi stanabharāyāsitasya madhyasyāpi na bhaṅgam ||)
24. aparādhataḥ priyābhibhartsanatāḍanādikaraṇaṃ praṇayakalahaḥ yathā—(gāsa. 946ve.)
huṃ ṇillajja samosara taṃ cia aṇuṇesu jāe de vaaṇe |
pāaṃguṭṭhālattaaraseṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ || 89 ||
(huṃ nirjajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yayā te vadane |
pādāṅguṣṭhālak‍takarasena tilakaṃ vinirmitam ||)
yathā vā—
pāde mūrdhani tāmratāmupagate karṇotpale cūrṇite chinne hāralatāguṇe karatale sampātajātavraṇe |
aprāp‍tapriyatāḍanavyatikarā hantuṃ punaḥ cetasā vāñchantī muhureṇaśābanayanā paryākulaṃ roditi || 90 ||
(3. mānaviśeṣāḥ —24)
athaiteṣāṃ viśeṣāścaturviṃśatiḥ — sahajaḥ, āhāryaḥ, yauvanajaḥ, visrambhajaḥ, sthiraḥ, bhaṅguraḥ, samaḥ, viṣamaḥ, prakāśaḥ, gūḍhaḥ, caṇḍaḥ, mṛduḥ, udbhaṭaḥ, masṛṇaḥ, ṛjuḥ, vakraḥ, sādhyaḥ, kṛcchrasādhyaḥ, yāpyaḥ, asādhyaḥ, purāṇaḥ, jīrṇaḥ, punarnavaḥ, nava iti | teṣu —
1. sahajānurāgajanmā sahajo yathā—(gāsa. 967 ve.)
keligottakkhalaṇe varassa paphpullaïṃ dihiṃ dei |
bahuvāsakavāsagṛhe vahue bāholliā diṭṭhī || 91 ||
(kelīgotraskhalane varasya praphullāṃ dhṛtiṃ dadāti |
bahuvāsakavāsagṛhe vadhvāḥ bāṣpārdritā d‍ṛṣṭiḥ ||)
2. āhāryānurāgajanmā āhāryo yathā—(gāsa. 941ve.)
aliakuviaṃ pi kaamaṃtuaṃ va maṃ jesu suhaa aṇuṇeṃto |
tāṇa diahāṇa haraṇe ruāmi, ṇa uṇo ahaṃ kuviā || 92 ||
(alīkakupitāmapi kṛtamantukāṃ va māṃ yeṣu subhaga! anunayan |
teṣāṃ divasānāṃ smaraṇe rodimi na punarahaṃ kupitā ||)
3. yauvanānujarāgajanmā yauvanajaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 924ve.)
aï pīṇatthaṇa utthaṃbhiāṇaṇe suaṇu suṇasu maha vaaṇaṃ |
athirammi jujjaï ṇa jovvaṇaṃmi māṇo pie kāuṁ || 93 ||
(atipīnaghanastanottambhitānane sutanu śrṛṇu mama vacanam |
asthire yujyate na yauvane mānaḥ priye kartum ||)
yathā vā—(saka. 2.63)
jyotirbhyastadidaṃ tamaḥ samuditaṃ jāto 'yamad‍bhyaśśikhī pīyūṣādidamucchritaṃ viṣamayaṃ cchāyāp‍tajanmātapaḥ |
ko nāmāsya vidhiḥ praśāntavidhaye bāḍhaṃ drạdhīyānayaṃ vyādhiryatpriyato 'pi vipriyamidaṃ sakhyaḥ kṛtaṃ sāntvanaiḥ || 94 ||*
5. vināśakāraṇairavināśanīyaḥ sthiraḥ, yathā—(amaru. 38)
'kopo yatra bhrukuṭighaṭanā'||95|| (pṛ.641) ityādi
6. vināpi kāraṇaṃ vinaśvaro bhaṅguraḥ sa yathā—(amaru. 28)
bhrūbhede racite 'pi d‍ṛṣṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamud‍vīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sasmitamidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate |
kārkaśyaṃ gamite 'pi cetasi tanū romāñcamālambate d‍ṣṭe nirvahaṇaṃ sa vakṣyati/bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmin jane || 96 ||
7. utpatterāprakarṣamavicchinnaikarūpasantānaḥ samaḥ, sa yathā—(saka. 3.127)
eṃto vi ṇa saccavio gose pasaraṃtapallavāruṇacchāo |
majjaṇataṃbesu mao taha maaloaṇesu amariso || 97 ||
(āgacchannapi na dṛṣṭaḥ yathā me prasaratpallavāruṇarāgaḥ |
majjanatāmrayormadastathā madalocanayoramarṣaḥ ||)
8. vicchidyamānasantāpo viṣamaḥ, sa yathā—(saka. 5.492)
dhīreṇa māṇabhaṃgo māṇakkhalaṇeṇa gurua—dhīrāraṃbho |
ullalaï tulijjaṃte ekaṃmi pi se thiraṃ ṇa laggaï hiaaṃ || 98 ||
{dhairyeṇa mānabhaṅge mānaskhalanena gurukadhairyārambhaḥ |
ullalati tolyamāne ekasminnapyasyāḥ sthiraṃ na lagati hṛdayam ||}
NOTES pg=1337! * ataḥ paraṃ 'visrambhajaḥ' nopalabhyate |
9. āvirbhūtopalakṣaṇaḥ prakāśaḥ, sa yathā—
dukkhaṃtaria-maṇasuhaṃ pieṇa vimaṇa-vilioṇaeṇa pulaïaṃ |
rosāgamapaḍivellia-visama-virajjaṃta-loaṇaṃ tīeṁ muhaṃ || 99 ||
(duḥkhāntarita-manassukhaṃ priyeṇa vimanaskavrīḍitāvanatena pralokitam |
roṣāgama-prativellita-viṣama-virajyamānalocanaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
10. anāvirbhūtalakṣaṇo gūḍhaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 869ve.)
sāhippaṃti ṇa kassa vi rottūṇa ṇea pāaḍijjaṃti |
māṇaviārā kulapā/bāliāeṁ hiae vilāveṃti || 100 ||
(sādhayiṣyanti tasyā api rud‍dhvā naiva pātayiṣyanti |
mānavikārāḥ kulapā/bālikāyā hṛdaye vilīyante ||)
11. bhūtaprabhūtacihnaścaṇḍaḥ, sa yathā—(gāsa. 2.92)
āaṃbaṃtakaolaṃ khaliakkharajaṃpiriṃ phuraṃtoṭṭhiṃ |
mā cchivasu tti sarosaṃ samosaraṃtiṃ piaṃ bharimo || 101 ||
(ātāmrāntaḥ-kapolāṃ skhalitākṣarajalpanaśīlāṃ sphuradoṣṭhīm |
mā spṛśeti saroṣamapasarpantīṃ priyāṃ smarāmaḥ ||)
12. tadviparīto mṛduḥ, sa yathā—
bhiuḍī ṇa kaā kaḍuaṃ ṇa ālaviaṃ, aharaṃ ṇa pammuṭhṭhaṃ |
uvaūhiā ṇa ruṇṇā eeṇa a jāṇimo māṇaṃ || 102 ||
(bhrukuṭī na kṛtā, kaṭukaṃ nālapitaṃ, adharo na pramṛṣṭaḥ |
upagūhitā na ruditā etenāpi jānīmo mānam ||)
13. āviṣkṛtavikṛtānekarūpa udbhaṭaḥ, sa yathā—
kṣaṇavikasito dīrghaśvāsaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ mukulīkṛtaḥ kṛtakahasitairvyakto maunapratikriyayā kṣaṇam |
kṣaṇavikasito narmālāpairiti kramasūcita— sthagitaviṣamo mugdhe! mānaḥ kadarthayatīva mām || 103 ||
14. dhairyāntarhitagambhīrābhogo masṛṇaḥ, yathā—
yad gamyaṃ gurugauravasya suhṛdo yasmin labhante 'ntaraṃ yaddākṣiṇyavaśādupaiti sahate yaccopacārānapi |
yallajjā viruṇaddhi yatra śapathairutpādyate pratyayaḥ tatkiṃ prema sa ucyate paricayastatrāpi kopena kim || 104 ||
15. (anud‍bhinna)muddhinnahṛd‍gatārtho 'nṛjuḥ, sa yathā— (amaru. 94)
idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama! nanu śvetamatha kiṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenāpi bhavatu |
purā yenaivaṃ me ciramanusṛtā vākyapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi! paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ || 105 ||
16. ṛjupratyanīkarūpo vakraḥ, sa yathā—
aṅgasyāsya mama svabhāvatanutā mātaḥ karomyatra kiṃ jāte jāgaraṇāruṇe ca nayane vyālolatāre yadi |
kopasyāvasaro 'tra kaḥ kathamapi smeraṃ ca nābhūnmukhaṃ tenoktaḥ sakhi! kiñcideṣa caraṇāvākramya yena sthitaḥ || 106 ||
17. praśamayituṃ śakyasādhanaḥ sādhyaḥ | sa yathā—
taṃ ṇatthi jaṃ sahiaṇo ṇa bhaṇejja pacchakkhamaṃtudūmiahiaaṃ |
aṇuṇejjā jaṃpaṃto jaï ṇavaraṃ vammaho miaṃko va vio || 107 ||
(tannāsti yat sakhījano na bhaṇet pratyakṣamanyudūnahṛdayam |
anunayet jalpan yadi kevalaṃ manmatho mṛgāṅka iva priyaḥ ||)*
19. prakarṣabhaṅgamātropaśāntaśālibhiḥ prayat‍nairanunmīlanīyo yāpyaḥ, sa yathā—
smṛtisvap‍nāvāp‍tatvadakhilavilāsavyasanino na me dūrasthāyāṃ tvayi balavadutkaṇṭhi hṛdayam |
paraṃ vijñātaivaṃ tava taruṇi! caṇḍatvamadhunā śrute vā svap‍ne vā yadi bhavati vāmaiva bhavati || 108 ||
20. sarvaprayat‍nānāmagocaro 'sādhyaḥ, sa yathā—(amaru. 60)
lākṣālakṣma lalāṭapaṭaṭmabhitaḥ keyūramudrā gale vaktre kajjalakālimā nayanayostāmbūlarāgo 'paraḥ |
dṛṣṭvā kopavidhāyi maṇḍanamidaṃ prātaściraṃ preyasoḥ krīḍātāmarasodare mṛgadṛśaḥ śvāsāḥ samāp‍tiṃ gatāḥ || 109 ||
NOTES pg=1339! * ataḥ paraṃ 'kṛcchasādhyaḥ' nopalabhyate
21. manaḥparyuṣitaḍambaraḥ purāṇaḥ, sa yathā-(gāsa. 709ve.)
ṇa vi taha takkhaṇa-sua-maṃtudukkhaviaṇāurāoṁ vi ruaṃti |
jaha diṭṭhammi piaame aṇuṇijjaṃtīoṁ taruṇīo || 110 ||
(nāpi tathā tatkṣaṇaśrutamanyuduḥkhavedanāturā virudanti |
yathā dṣṭe priyatame anunīyamānāstaruṇyaḥ ||)
22. mānaso manaso 'vastrastavīryo jīrṇaḥ, sa yathā—
vilīno visrambhaḥ sapadi tadapi prema galitaṃ cyutāścitrākārāḥ praṇayasubhagāstā api giraḥ |
priyasyaivaṃ tattad vinayabahiraṅgavyavasitaṃ kimanyad duḥkhānāṃ hṛdayanagarīcatvaramasi || 111 ||
23. praśamyod‍bhūtaḥ punarnavaḥ, sa yathā—
caturacaṭubhirgạ̄dhāśleṣairhaṭhāt paricumbanai— ralakakalanairvāraṃ vāraṃ gato 'pyatimandatām |
aparavanitāsaṅgāllagnaṃ vilokya vilepanaṃ kuvalayadṛśaḥ kopaḥ kānte punarnavatāṃ gataḥ || 112 ||
24. sadyaḥ samupajāyamāno navaḥ, sa yathā—
bhavatu viditaṃ vyarthālāpairalaṃ priya! gamyatāṃ, tanurapi na te doṣo 'smākaṃ vidhistu parāṅmukhaḥ |
tava yadi tathārūḍhaṃ prema prapannamimāṃ daśāṃ prakṛtitarale kā naḥ pīḍā gate hatajīvite || 113 ||
(4. viṣayaprakīrṇāni —8)
athaiteṣveva viśayāśrayālambanaprakīrṇakāni caturviṃśatiḥ | tatra
1. viṣayaprakīrṇakeṣu svapativiṣayo yathā—
pravṛttaiva prayāmīti vāṇī vallabha! te mukhāt |
ayātāpi tvayedānīṃ mandapremṇā karomi kim || 114 ||
2. upapativiṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 5.45)
akaaṇṇua tujjha kae pāusarāīsu jaṃ mae khuṇṇaṃ |
uppekkhāmi alajjira ajja vi taṃ gāmacikkhillaṃ || 115 ||
(akṛtajña tava kṛte prāvṛḍ‍rātriṣu yo mayā kṣuṇṇaḥ |
utpaśyāmyalajjāśīla! adyāpi taṃ grāmapaṅkam ||)
3. proṣitaviṣayo yathā—
sahi tāva acchaü ccia alāhi kiṃ bāhueṇa leheṇa |
eārisaṃ lihaṃtāṇa eṃti pahiā viesāo || 116 ||
(sakhi tāvadāstāmeva, alaṃ kiṃ bahukena lekhena |
etād‍ṛśaṃ likhatāṃ yanti pathikā videśāt ||)
4. samāgamaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 849ve.)
kaṃṭhaggahaṇeṇa saajjhiāeṁ abbhāgaovaāreṇa |
bahuāe piammi vi āgaammi sāmaṃ muhaṃ jāaṃ || 117 ||
(kaṇṭhagrahaṇena sairandhrikāyā abhyāgatopacāreṇa |
vadhvāḥ priye 'pyāgate śyāmaṃ mukhaṃ jātam ||)
5. kalahāntaritāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 5.20)
aha so vilakkhahiao mae ahavvāe agahiāṇuṇao |
para-vajja-ṇaccarīhiṃ tuhmehiṃ uvekkhio ṇeṃto || 118 ||
(atha sa vilakṣahṛdayo mayā abhavyayā agṛhītānunayaḥ |
para-vādya-nartanaśīlābhiryuṣmābhirupekṣito niryan ||)
6. khaṇḍitāviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 937ve.)
ṇaha-paa-pasāhiaṃgo ṇid‍dāghummaṃta-loaṇo ṇa tahā |
jaha ṇivvaṇāharo sāmalaṃga dūmesi maha hiaaṃ || 119 ||
(nakhapadaprasādhitāṅgo nidrāghūrṇamānalocano na tathā |
yathā nirvraṇādharo śyāmalāṅga dūnayasi mama hṛdayam ||)
7. vañcakaviṣayo yathā—(raghu. 19.17)
aṅgulīkisalayāgratarjanaṃ bhrūvibhaṅgakuṭilaṃ ca vīkṣitam |
mekhalābhirasakṛcca bandhanaṃ vañcayan praṇayinīravāpa saḥ || 120 ||
8. cirakāriviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 4.85)
ehii piotti ṇimesaṃ va jaggiaṃ jāmiṇīe paḍamaddhaṃ |
sesaṃ saṃtāvaparavasāe varisaṃ va bolīṇaṃ || 121 ||
(eṣyati priya iti nimeṣamiva jāgarita yāminyāḥ prathamārdham |
śeṣaṃ saṃtāpaparavaśāyā varṣamiva vyavalīnam ||)
(5. āśrayaprakīrṇāni —8)
1. āśrayaprakīrṇakeṣu khaṇḍitāśrayo yathā—(gāsa. 7.53)
paccūsāgaa raṃjitadeha piāloa—loaṇāṇaṃda |
aṇṇatta—khavia—savvari ṇahahūsaṇa diṇavaï ṇamo de || 122 ||
(pratyūṣāgata! rañjitadeha! priyālokalocanānanda! |
anyatra kṣapitaśarvarīka! nabho/khabhūṣaṇa! dinapate! namaste ||)
2. kalahāntaritāśrayo yathā—
hatthasalilāhaāe avahīraṃtīeṁ diṇṇasahisaṃlāvaṃ |
kalahaṃtariāe viaaṇāhaṇaṃ tīe dūmio paḍivakkho || 123 ||
(hastasalilāhatayā apaharantyā dattasakhīsaṁllāpam |
kalahāntaritayaiva gatanāthānāṃ tayā dūnaḥ pratipakṣaḥ ||)
3. vāsakasajjāśrayo yathā—
ṇimmavia—maṃḍaṇāṇaṃ vi sohā vāsaa—māṇiāṇaṃ vimaliā |
mohaṃ ṇeva païṇo parioso ccia pasāhaṇaṃ juvaīṇaṃ || 124 ||
(nirmitamaṇḍanānāmapi śobhā vāsakavimānitānāṃ vimalitā |
moghaṃ naiva, patyuḥ paritoṣa eva prasādhanaṃ yuvatīnām ||)
4. abhisārikāśrayo yathā—
mā śrauṣīḥ sakhi! yad vadāmi balavatprāṇāntikotkaṇṭhayā nivrīḍāsmi kṛtā bhaviṣyati punarmānaprasūtaṃ yaśaḥ |
ko doṣaḥ svayamānayāmi yadi taṃ tasyāparādhairahaṃ no dūye sa yathātathāstu manasaḥ sā dhāraṇā nānyataḥ || 125 ||
5. vipralabdhāśrayo yathā—
kṛtakakṛtakairmāyāśāṭhyaiḥ tvayāsmyativañcitā nibhṛtanibhṛtaiḥ kāryālāpairmayāpyupalakṣitam |
bhavatu viditaṃ neṣṭāhaṃ te na me dayito bhavān ahamasahanā tvaṃ niḥsnehaḥ samena samaṃ gatam || 126 ||
6. proṣitapatikāśrayo yathā—
sahi tāva acchaü ccia alāhi kiṃ bāueṇa leheṇa |
eārisaṃ lihaṃtāṇa eṃti pahiā viesāo || 127 ||
(sakhi! tāvat āstāmeva, alaṃ kiṃ bahukena lekhena |
etād‍ṛśaṃ likhatāṃ yanti pathikā videśāt? ||)
7. virahotkaṇṭhitāśrayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.17)
ehii vio paüttho, ahaṃ a kuppejja, so vi aṇuṇijja |
ia kae vi phalaï maṇorahāṇaṃ mālā piaamammi || 128 ||
(eṣyati priyo proṣito ahaṃ ca kopiṣyāmi so 'pyanuneṣyati |
iti kasyā api phalati manorathānāṃ mālā priyatame ||)
8. svādhīnabhartṛkāśrayo yathā—
paśyantī nijameva bharturadhare dantavraṇaṃ khidyate sāśaṅkaṃ svayamapyamārgapatitān kṛtvā nakhān kupyati |
tanvī sarvavivekahāriṇi pade rāgasya tatra sthitā yatrātmāpi vṛthā vikalpakalitaḥ kopāya sañjāyate || 129 ||
(6. ālambanaprakīrṇāni —8)
1. ālambanaprakīrṇakeṣu parihāsālambano yathā—(gāsa. 923 ve.)
pariucchiā ṇa jaṃpaï cuṃbijjatī balā muhaṃ harasi |
parisūsamāṇavi muhe pariaṃci/pariciaṃ maṇaṃ maha dūmesi || 130 ||
(paripṛṣṭā na jalpasi cumbyamānā balāt mukhaṃ harasi |
pariśuṣyamāṇāpi mukhe paricitaṃ mano mama dunosi ||)
2. āśaṃsālambano yathā—
hojja vaṇe so diaho jattha pio majjha maṃttukaarosaṃ |
aṇuṇejja ṇe sahiaṇo ciraṃ ṇihuattaṇi acchijja || 131 ||
3. jijñāsālambano yathā—(urāca. 3.37)1
asminneva latāgṛhe tvamabhavastanmārgadattekṣaṇaḥ sā haṃsaiḥ kṛtakautukā ciramabhūd godāvarīsaikate | NOTES pg=1343! 1. ākaro mṛgya iti rāghavaḥ|
āyāntyā paridurmanāyitamiva tvāṃ vīkṣya baddhastayā kātaryādaravindakuḍmalanibho mugdhaḥ1 praṇāmāñjaliḥ || 132 ||
4. upadeśālambano yathā—
(aliaṃ vaṃcaa—) vaaṇaṃ pijjaï hālāhalavisamasajjaṃ |
jaṃ hiaaṃ abalaṃbadhiraṃ/avalaṃbia dhīraṃ dijjasi māṇassa ettāhe || 133 ||
{(alīkaṃ vañcaka) vacanaṃ pīyate hālāhalaṃ viṣamasahyam |
yad‍ hṛdaya! avalambya dhairyaṃ dīyase mānāyedānīm ||}
5. kutūhalālambano yathā—
bhrūbhede racitastadīkṣaṇapare nistarjite locane gātraṃ prāvṛtamaṃśukena sakalaṃ vṛttirgirāṃ saṃyatā |
cetaḥ kautukavihvalaṃ bhramati me tat kena vā d‍ṛśyate gatvā dūti! tamānaya priyatamaṃ mānaḥ kṛto 'yaṃ mayā || 134 ||
6. kaitavālambano yathā—
draṣṭavyādapasārite ca nayane ruddhe ca bāṣpāmbhasā kāntaṃ ca sphuraṇena gaṇḍayugalaṃ jātaṃ ca harṣollasat |
autsukyād vinivartitaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ magnaṃ ca cintārṇave mānaścāhriyate priye dayitayā premṇā na ca kṣamyate || 135 ||
7. kāraṇālambano yathā—
avvokajjeṇa viṇāaddhakapaattapāharāhillo |
uccaḍatāparioso roso vi ṇa hoi vetālā || 136 ||
8. pratāpālambano yathā—
rasa&siajjhaa&kaadhikkāraṇā&jaṇia&ṇicca&kovāṇā/kovāe |
puttaa! veārijjasi aliapaduhaṇae soṇhāe || 137 ||
(rasikādhyāya—kṛtādhikāraṇā—janitanityakopanayā |
putraka! vyāpāryase alīkapṛthustanayā snuṣayā ||) NOTES pg=1344! 1. mugdhaḥ = baddhaḥ rā.jo.
(7. viṣayakarmāṇi —6)
atha viṣayāśrayaprakīrṇakarmāṇi| tāni pratyekaṃ ṣọdhā| teṣu — 1. mānavaikṛtāni 2. mānavitarkāḥ 3. mānabhaṅgopāyāḥ 4. mānaparipraś‍nāḥ 5. citracāṭūktayaḥ 6. priyopālambhāśceti viṣayasyāparādhakartuḥ karmāṇi| teṣu —
(1. mānavaikṛtāni)
manod‍ṛgvaktravāgvapuśceṣṭāsu vailakṣyābhyutpattyādayo mānavaikṛtāni| tatra manasi vailakṣyamanuśayaśca, d‍ṛśi jñānānyathātvaṃ (bhramaṇaṃ) ca vaktre chāyābhraṃśa utkaṇṭhāveśaśca, vāci vaiklavyaṃ pravilāpaśca, vapuṣi santāpo viṣayavyāvṛttiśca, ceṣṭāyāmārambhastadabhiśaṅkā ceti| tatra —
1. manasi vailakṣyaṃ yathā—
paṇaakkhalaṇavilakkhaṃ tassa ॰ ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ ॰ kiṃ kae vva pia muhaṃ kilaṃi hiaaṃ || 138 ||
(praṇayaskhalanavilakṣaṃ tasya ॰ ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ ॰ kiṃ kṛta iva priya mukhaṃ, klāmyati hṛdayam ||)
2. tatraivānuśayo yathā—
re viaaṃdhaāra—viaḍaṃ ekkaṃ dohaṇavi uha viaṇāvāsaṃ |
vaḍ̣dhitāe visamaaṃ maaṇāṇusaāṇa se vahuppaï hiaaṃ || 139 ||
(re vitatāndhakāravikaṭaṃ ekaṃ dvayorapi paśya vedanāvāsam |
vardhitāyā viṣamayaṃ madanānuśayānāṃ tasyāḥ bhaviṣyati hṛdayam ||)
3. d‍ṛśi jñānānyathātvaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.145)
pariaṭṭhaṃte ṇisisamae maṃḍaliakusumāuhaṃ va aṇaṃgaṃ |
virahammi maṇṇaï harī ṇahe aṇatthapariuṭṭhiaṃ va miaṃkaṃ || 140 ||
(parivardhamāne niśāsamaye maṇḍalita—kusumāyudhamivā 'naṅgam |
virahe manyate harirnabhasyanarthapratyutthamiva mṛgāṅkam ||)
4. (bhramaṇaṃ) yathā—
gahaṇaddhapaṇaṃmi garuaciṃtālahiaṃ pecchaï purao |
purao vaṭhiaṃ rosālaṃ bhaṃta loaṇaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 141 ||
(grahaṇārdhapaṇe gurukacintālabdhaṃ prekṣate purataḥ |
purato valitaṃ roṣavad bhrāntalocanaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
5. vaktre cchāyābhraṃśo yathā—
purao ciṃtaavalaā pacchā aparāhagorakapisaṃvalaā |
viraaṃti kiṃ davettia hariṇo aṇuṇaamaṇorāmuhasohaṃ || 142 ||
6. tattai(trai)votkaṇṭhāveśo yathā—
sasidiṇṇavasaddhakkho orādiadhīrahiaaladvā ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ sakkaṃ harimmapi virahukkaṃṭho || 143 ||
7. vāci vaiklavyaṃ yathā—
uggāhiapaṃhuṭṭhā darajaṃpaṇamukkabahalaṇīsāsā |
sāhaṃti virahadukkhaṃ asamattavaakkharāvi se ullāvā || 144 ||
(udgrāhitaprasmṛtā darajalpanamuktabahalaniḥśvāsāḥ |
kathayanti virahaduḥkhaṃ asamāp‍tavaco 'kṣarā api tasyā ullāpāḥ ||)
8. tatraiva vipralāpo yathā—(saka. 5.341)
asamatto vi samappaï apariggahialahuā paraguṇālāo |
tassa piāpaḍibaṃdhā ṇa samappaï raï—suhā samattā vi kahā || 145 ||
(asamāp‍to 'pi samāpyate aparigṛhītalaghukaḥ paraguṇālāpaḥ |
tasya priyāpratibaddhā na samāpyate ratisukhā samāp‍tāpi kathā ||)
9. vapuṣi santāpo yathā—
॰ ॰ vā a ciṃtiaṃ vi saṃvaï osāhiṇo vi apaṇīo |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tīe samāgamamaṇoraho chalapaïṇo || 146 ||
(॰ ॰ vā ca cintitamapi samprati utsāhino 'pi apanītaḥ |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tasyāḥ samāgamamanoratho chalapateḥ ||)
10. tatraiva viṣayavyāvṛttiryathā—(harivi.)
saṃvaḍ̣dhiasaṃtosā phuraṃtakotthuhamaṇippahāsaṃvaliā |
viuṇiamaṇasaṃtāvā jāā savisesadūsahā sasikiraṇā || 147 ||
(saṃvardhita—saṃtoṣāḥ sphuratkaustubhamaṇiprabhāsaṃvalitāḥ |
dviguṇitamanassaṃtāpā jātā saviśeṣadussahā śaśikiraṇāḥ ||)
11. ceṣṭāyāmārambho yathā—(līlāvatī. 567)
ṇa sahaï kālakkhevaṃ vo muṇio gaṃtuṃ.....haāṇurāhehi |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tassa gamaṇāraṃbho || 148 ||
(na śobhate kālakṣepo vāṃ jñāto gantuṃ hatānurāgaiḥ |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tasya gamanārambhaḥ ||)
12. tatraiva tadabhiśaṅkā yathā—
jaha jaha tīe bhavaṇaṃ pāvaï kaadūssahāvarāhavilakkho |
taha taha se ahiaaraṃ hiaaṃ garuammi saṃsaaṃmi ṇisaṇṇaṃ || 149 ||
(yathā yathā tasyāḥ bhavanaṃ, prāpnoti kṛtadussahāparādhavilakṣaḥ |
tathā tathā tasyā adhikataraṃ hṛdayaṃ guruke saṃśaye niṣaṇṇam ||)
(2. mānavitarkāḥ)
1. mānasattānubandhaprakarṣasamparkānugamapunaḥprādurbhāveṣu vividhālocanaṃ vitarkaḥ yathā—
(kāntaṃ viddhaṃ praṇayagurubhiḥ kāmabāṇairniśānte)1 d‍ṛṣṭvā mugdhasmitamavikṛtaṃ kopasamparkaśaṃsi |
yāmītyuktaṃ bhṛśamapaṭutāmātmanaḥ khyāpayantyā mānasyāntar viracitapadasyeyamārambhalīlā || 150 ||
2. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—
aruṇaṃ bhavatyudaśru ca rajo 'pi karuṇairvikūṇitaṃ cakṣuḥ |
manyuṃ vinā tu na syuḥ kaṇṭhoraḥkuṇṭhitā vācaḥ || 151 ||
3. mānānubandho yathā—
lalāṭaḥ sandhatte (śramajalalavān saṃ-)2 spṛhayati (smitiṃ bimbaprakhyaṃ daśanavasanadvandvamadhunā |)3
mukhendurmāñjiṣṭhīmavatarati sadyaḥpariṇatiṃ priyāyāstanmanyurjitamadanatantro vijayate || 152 ||
4. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—
tīe daṃsaṇasuhae paṇaakkhalaṇajaṇio muhammi maṇahare |
roso vi haraï hiaaṃ maapaṃko vva malalaṃchaṇaṃmi ṇisaṇṇo || 153 || NOTES pg=1347! 1—3. etattritayamasmatkṛtā lopapūrttiḥ|
{tasyā darśanasubhage praṇayaskhalanajanito mukhe manohare |
roṣo 'pi harati hṛdayaṃ madapaṅka iva mṛgalāñchane niṣaṇṇaḥ ||}
5. mānaprakarṣo yathā—(gāsa. 6.64)
'ṇa vi taha aṇālaṃvatī' || 154 || (pṛ.1340)
6. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—(rat‍nā. 3.15)
samārūḍhaprītipraṇayabahumānāt pratidinaṃ vyalīkaṃ vīkṣyedaṃ kṛtamakṛtapūrvaṃ khalu mayā |
priyā muñcatyadya dhruvamasahanā jīvitamasau prarūḍhasya premṇaḥ skhalitamaviṣahyaṃ hi bhavati || 155 ||
7. mānasamparko yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.21)
bhrūbhede sahasodgate 'pi vadanaṃ nītaṃ parāṃ namratā— mīṣanmāṃ prati bheda || 156 || ityādi| (pṛ. 888)
8. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—
tadevājihmākṣaṃ mukhamaviśadāstā gira imāḥ sa evāṅgakṣepo mayi sarasamāśliṣyati tanum |
yaduktapratyuktaṃ tadapaṭu śiraḥkampanaparaṃ priyā mānenāho punarapi1 kṛtā me navavadhūḥ || 157 ||
9. mānasyāgamo yathā—(gāsa. 1.88)
jāṇaï jāṇāveuṃ aṇuṇaa—viddavia—māṇaparisesaṃ |
païrikkammi vi viṇaāvalaṃhaṇaṃ sa ccia kuṇaṃtī || 158 ||
(jānāti jñāpayitumanunayavidrāvitamānapariśeṣam |
pratirikte 'pi vinayāvalambanaṃ saiva kurvatī ||)
10. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—
kupyatyakasmāt kupitāpi ramyā svayaṃ prasādaṃ samupaiti paścāt |
svayaṃ prasanneti bibharti lajjāmatūryakaṃ prekṣaṇakaṃ priyā me || 159 || NOTES pg=1348! 1. punaravīti rāghavajośerau|
11. mānasya punaḥ prādurbhāvo yathā—
tucchīkṛtaḥ kimapi saṃvṛtasambhrameṇa manyuḥ/manye punarbahulatāṃ gata eṣa manyuḥ |
(kurvanti kintu kucakuḍmalamadhya-) lambāmekāvalīmiva yadaśrukaṇāḥ patantaḥ || 160 ||
12. tatraiva vaividhyaṃ yathā—
bhavatu ruṣi kaṭhorā kintu ramyā mṛgākṣī nirupadhi madhurāṇāṃ svādavo 'mī vikārāḥ |
śrayati kaṭhinabhāvaḥ śuktipātreṣvapo yāḥ kavalanabahumānastāssusuktāphalāntaḥ/lanti || 161 ||
(3. mānabhaṅgopāyāḥ)
mānāpanayane sāmadānabhedadaṇḍayogā mānabhaṅgopāyāḥ| teṣu —
priyavacanamanuvṛttiḥ praṇāma iti trividhaṃ sāma |
atisandhānaṃ samarpaṇaṃ ॰ ॰ ॰ miti trividhaṃ dānam |
śaṅkādyutpādanamindrajālaṃ māyeti trividho bhedaḥ| upekṣā pratikopaḥ prasthānamiti trividho daṇḍaḥ| tatra sāmaprakāreṣu
1. priyavacanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 925 ve.)
taralacchi caṃdavaaṇe thoratthaṇi kariaroru taṇumajjhe |
dīhāvi samappaï sisirajāmiṇī kaha ṇu de māṇo || 162 ||
(taralākṣi! candravadane! sthūlastani! karikaroru! tanumadhye! |
dīrdhāpi samāpyate śiśirayāminī kathaṃ nanu te mānaḥ ||)
2. anuvṛttiryathā— (gāsa. 1.86)
ekkaṃ paharu vviṇṇaṃ hatthaṃ muhamārueṇa vīaṃto |
so vi hasaṃtīe mae gahio vīeṇa kaṃṭhammi || 163 ||
(ekapraharodvignaṃ hastaṃ mukhamārutena vījayan |
so 'pi hasantyā mayā gṛhīto dvitīyena kaṇṭhe ||)
3. praṇāmo yathā— (harivijayaḥ)
to ia suraarukāraṇa-maülia—hiaāe sāvasesa-lahuo |
saṃbhāvia ccia hio hariṇā pāapaḍaṇaṃmi tīeṁ amariso || 164 ||
(tata iti priyānuvartanamukulitahṛdayāyāḥ sāvaśeṣalaghukaḥ |
saṃbhāvita eva hṛto hariṇā pādapatane tasyā amarṣaḥ ||)
4. dānaprakāreṣvatisandhānaṃ yathā—
dohaṃ cia hiaaraṃ viāe ṇivvaḍaï piaamesu pasāo |
ṇīsāmaṇṇāpakao akaremāṇo valaara ॰ ॰ || 165 ||
(dvābhyāmeva hitakaraḥ priyāḥ niṣpatati priyatameṣu prasādaḥ |
nissāmānyāpakṛto 'kriyamāṇo valayara ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ||)
aïrā āṇemi tuhaṃ amaāsaalolabbhamaralaṃghiakusumaṃ |
tiasa-gaa-dāṇa-sīhara-tusāra-taṇṇāa-pallavaṃ saggadumaṃ || 166 ||
(acirādānayāmi tavāmṛtāsavalolabhramaralaṅghitakusumam |
tridaśagatadānaśībharatuṣārārdritapallavaṃ svargadrumam ||) (harivi.)
5. samarpaṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 6. 50)
sa-kaaggaha-rahasu-ttāṇiāṇaṇā piaï, piamuhaviiṇṇaṃ |
thoaṃ thoaṃ rososahaṃ va ua māṇaṃsiṇī maïraṃ || 167 ||
{sakacagraharabhasottānitānanā pibati priyatamamukhavitīrṇām |
stokaṃ stokaṃ roṣauṣadhamiva paśya manasvinī madirām ||}
6. bhedaprakāreṣu śaṅkādyutpādanaṃ yathā—(sūmu. 202)
prasāde vartasva prakaṭaya mudaṃ santyaja ruṣaṃ priye! śuṣyantyaṅgānyamṛtamiva te siñcatu vacaḥ |
nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukhaṃ na mugdhe pratyetuṃ prabhavati gataḥ kālahariṇaḥ || 168 ||
7. indrajālaṃ yathā—(rat‍nā. 4.14)
harmyāṇāṃ hemaśrṛṅgaśriyamiva nivahairarciṣāmādadhānaḥ sāndrodyānadrumālīplavanapiśunitātyantatīvrābhitāpaḥ |
kurvan krīḍāmahīdhraṃ sajaladharamiva śyāmalairdhūmapātai— reṣa ploṣārtayoṣijjana iha sahasaivotthito 'ntaḥpure 'gniḥ || 169 ||
8. māyā yathā—
jaṃ vi aliovaāraṃ parasya dakkhiṇṇaāeṁ gheppaï hiaaṃ |
jaï so vi siṇehollihaṇaṃ ṇāma savbhāva-kaiava-viseso || 170 ||
(yadapi alīkopacāraṃ parasya dākṣiṇyaiḥ gṛhyate hṛdayam |
yadi tasyā api s‍nehollekhanaṃ nāma sadbhāvakaitavaviśeṣaḥ ||)
9. daṇḍaprakāreṣūpekṣā yathā—
kaïava-paraṃmuhāṇaṃ thoosariāṇaṃ ek‍kasaaṇaṃmi |
pūrijjaï romaṃcuggameṇa doṇaṃvi oāso || 171 ||
(kaitava—parāṅ‍mukhānāṃ stokāpasṛtānāmekaśayane |
pūryate romāñcodgamena dvayorapi avakāśaḥ ||)
10. pratikopo yathā—
rūsasi ruṭ‌ṭhia ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ajja |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ o || 172 ||
11. prasthānaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 9.45)
savyalīkamavadhīritakhinnaṃ prasthitaṃ sapadi kopapadena |
yoṣitaḥ suhṛdiva sma ruṇaddhi prāṇanāthamadhi bāṣpanipātaḥ || 173 ||
(4. mānaparipraś‍nāḥ)
manodṛgvaktravāgvapuśceṣ‍ṭāsu mānavaikṛtānuyogā mānaparipraśnaḥ | sa
1. manasi yathā—
kimiti kabarī yādṛktādṛgdṛśau kimakajjale na khalu likhitāḥ patrāvalyaḥ kimadya kapolayoḥ |
ayamayamayaṃ kiṃca klāmyatyasaṃsmaraṇena te śaśimukhi! sakhīhastanyasto vilāsaparicchadaḥ || 174 ||
2. dṛśi yathā—(harivi.)
kīsa imesu bahuso visamappattataliṇaṃjaṇachavikalusā |
dīhāvaṃgesu tujjha parivaḍ‍ḍhaṃti/gholaṃti ṇaaṇesu bāhuppīḍā || 175 ||
(kasmāt anayoḥ bahuśo viṣamodvartanāñjanacchavikaluṣāḥ |
dīrghāpāṅgayostava parivardhante nayanayoḥ bāṣpotpīḍāḥ ||)
3. vaktre yathā—(harivi.)
kīsa maliāvaaṃsaṃ vaaṇṇaṇīsāsapaṃḍurāhararāaṃ |
vaaṇaṃ vahasi kisoari kara—saṃkāmia—kaola—pattālekkhaṃ || 176 ||
(kasmād malināvataṃsa bahalaniḥśvāsapāṇḍurādhararāgam |
vadanaṃ vahasi kṛśodari! karasaṅkrāmitakapolapatrālekhyam ||)
4. vāci yathā—
taṇuaṃ pi aṇivvaḍiaṃ puṇo puṇo vevirāharoṭ‌ṭhipisuṇiaṃ |
vaaṇabbhaṃtarabhariaṃ hiaaṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ tuhaṃ pasammaï vaaṇaṃ || 177 ||
(tanukamapi anirvartitaṃ punaḥ punarvepanaśīlādharoṣ‍ṭhapiśunitam |
vadanābhyantarabhṛtaṃ hṛdayasthitaṃ kiṃ tava praśāmyati vacanam ||)
5. vapuṣi yathā—
kāntyā pāṭalayā kimadya sakalākrāntā mukhendoḥ prabhā kiñcoṣṇairadharaḥ saroruhamukhi! śvāsānilaiḥ śoṣyate |
ityukto 'pi punaḥ prakopaparayā maunena nirbhartsito māninyāḥ suhṛdeva bāṣpapayasā gacchan dhṛto vallabhaḥ || 178 ||
6. ceṣ‍ṭāyāṃ yathā—
śvāsotkampataraṅgiṇi stanataṭe dhautāñjanaśyāmalāḥ kīryante kaṇaśaḥ kṛśāṅgi! kimamī bāṣpāmbhaso bindavaḥ |
kiñcākuñcitakaṇṭharodhakuṭilāḥ karṇāmṛtasyandino huṅkārāḥ kalapañcamapraṇayinastruṭ‍yanti niryānti ca || 179 ||
(5. citracāṭūk‍tayaḥ)
priyāpratyānayanāya priyasya 1bhujaṅgabhaṅgibhāṣitāni citracāṭūktayaḥ | tāśca ātmano doṣābhyupagame doṣānabhyupagame ubhayābhāve ca, parasparadoṣāropaṇe doṣānāropaṇe ubhayābhāve ca | tatra—
1. doṣābhyupagame yathā—(rat‍nā.3.14)
ātāmratāmapanayāmi vilakṣa eṣa lākṣākṛtāṃ caraṇayostava devi! mūrdh‍nā |
kopoparāgajanitāṃ tu mukhendubimbe hartuṃ kṣamā yadiparaṃ karuṇā mayi syāt || 180 ||
NOTES pg=1352! 1. vakratā hi bhujaṅgasya bhaṅgī | vakrabhāṣitamato vakroktiḥ |
2. doṣānabhyupagamo yathā—(rat‍nā. 2.20)
prasīdeti brūyāmidamasati kope na ghaṭate kariṣyāmyevaṃ no punariti bhavedabhyupagamaḥ |
na me doṣo 'stīti tvamidamapi ca jñāsyasi mṛṣā kimetasmin vaktuṃ kṣamamiti na vedmi priyatame! || 181 ||
3. ubhayābhāvo yathā—
tyaja ruṣamimāṃ tvaṃ māmevaṃ na vaktumahaṃ kṣame kathamiti yato nāyaṃ nyāyaḥ prabhāvanujīvinām |
caraṇapatane caṇḍi! prāyaḥ sphuranti manorathāḥ kimuta na vayaṃ nanvetasyāṃ dhuri praṇayasya te || 182 ||
yathā vā—(saka. 5.368)
ādhātuṃ vinayaṃ nirāgasi jane kupyantu nāmeśvarāḥ tena svāśayaśuddhireva suvacā prāyaḥ prabhūṇāṃ puraḥ |
mithyāmānini! manyase yadi tadā nityaṃ manovartinī dhyātā tāmarasākṣi! citrapaṭake kā vā tvadanyā mayā || 183 ||
4. doṣānāropaṇe yathā—(vikra. 3.14)
dātuṃ vā prabhavasi māmanyasmai ha/kartumeva vā dāsam |
nāhaṃ punastathā tvayi yathāhi māṃ śaṅkase bhīru || 184 ||1
5. ubhayābhāve yathā—
kaa—vippio ṇa māṇiṇi! bhaṇāmi kaha tujjha vaaṇapaḍiūlaṃ |
kaa—vippiosi eaṃ, vi dāruṇaṃ tāu/va maṃ/mā bhaṇasu || 185 ||
(kṛtavipriyo na mānini bhaṇāmi kathaṃ tava vacanapratikūlam |
kṛtavipriyo 'sīti etadapi dāruṇaṃ tāvanmāṃ/mā bhaṇa ||)
(6. priyopālambhāḥ)
priyāyāḥ pravṛttidūṣaṇamupālambhaḥ | sa dvidhā— prarūḍhavisrambhāyām, aprarūḍhavisrambhāyāṃ ca | tayoḥ prarūḍhavisrambhāyāṃ ṣọdhā — prakṛtisthaḥ, komalaḥ, kaṭhoraḥ, nāgaraḥ, upanāgaraḥ grāmya iti | teṣu — NOTES pg=1353! 1. ākaro mṛgya iti tu rāghavaḥ HOS. pṛ. 1488 |
1. prakṛtistho yathā—(harivi.)
akkhaṃḍie vi paṇae akaaṃmi vi vippie akajje vi majjha |
jāaṃ cia vaaṇijjaṃ tuha rosammi daïe ṇimittaṃ pi paaṃ || 186 ||
(akhaṇḍite 'pi praṇaye 'kṛte 'pi vipriye akārye 'pi mama |
jātameva vacanīyaṃ tava roṣe dayite nimittamapi priyam ||)
2. komalo yathā—
aparikkhiadosaguṇaṃ avamaṇṇia cirapparūḍhavīsaṃha—rasaṃ |
avahīriāṇurāaṃ tume vi maha rusiuṃ jaṇeṇa vi khiṇṇaṃ || 187 ||
(aparīkṣitadoṣaguṇaṃ avamatya ciraprarūḍhavisrambharasam |
avadhīryānurāgaṃ tvayāpi mahyaṃ ruṣ‍ṭvā janeneva khinnam ||)
3. kaṭhoro yathā—
ṇa a sahi aṇuṇaabhaṇiaṃ ṇa desi pasaraṃ ṇa hosi muk‍kāmarisā |
kaha ā ek‍karasaṃ cia dūraviṃsaṃvaïa ṇiṭṭhuraṃ tuha hiaaṃ || 188 ||
(na ca sakhi! anunayabhaṇitaṃ na dadāsi prasaraṃ na bhavasi muk‍tāmarṣā |
kathaṃ vā ekarasameva dūravisaṃvaditaniṣ‍ṭhuraṃ tava hṛdayam ||)
4. nāgaro yathā—
vīsaṃbhaṇivvisaṃke vicchad‌dhiakav‍avapaṃ āraṃmijaṇe |
āsaṃkiaṃ pahiaaṃlāujjaṃto akahaṇalaggaüaaso || 189 ||
5. upanāgaro yathā—
jāva ṇa lakkhei paro jāva ṇa labbhaï piammi parasaṃgho |
tāva akaopaārā kiraṃti kaā hiaabahumaā || 190 ||
(yāvanna lakṣayati paraḥ, yāvanna labhyate priye pa pa(rā)saṅgaḥ |
tāvat kṛtopakārā kīrttayati kṛtā hṛdayabahumatā ||)
6. grāmyo yathā—
avahāreūṇa ciraṃ bhaṇasu tumaṃ cia amukkarosā vi phuḍaṃ |
kiṃ agaṇeūṇa imaṃ hojjā tumammi majjhapamāakkhaliaṃ || 191 ||
(avadhārya ciraṃ bhaṇa tvameva amuk‍taroṣāpi sphuṭam |
kimagaṇayitvā idaṃ bhaviṣyati tvayi prasādaskhalitam ||)
aprarūḍhavisrambhāyāmapi prakṛtisthaḥ ṣọdhaiva prakṛtisthādibhedāt| teṣu—
7. prakṛtistho yathā—
kṣaṇavikasito dīrghaśvāsaiḥ kṣaṇaṃ mukulīkṛtaḥ kṛtakahasitairvyakto maunapratikriyayā kṣaṇam| kṣaṇavighaṭito narmālāpairiti kramasūcitaḥ sthagitaviṣayo mugdhe mānaḥ kadarthayatīva mām ||192||
8. komalo yathā—(amaru. 81)
'kapole patrālī karatalanirodhena' ||193|| (pṛ.870) ityādi|
9. kaṭhoro yathā—
kṛśaprayā rātriḥ kṛśatanu śanairyena vinaman pradīpo 'yaṃ nidrāvaśamupaghato ghūrṇata iva| praṇāmānto mānastyajasi na tathāpi krudhamaho kucapratyāsattyā hṛdayamapi te caṇḍi! kaṭhinam||194||1
10. nāgaro yathā—(amaru.14)
kṛto dūrādeva smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ śirasyājñā nyastā prativacanamapyānatimati| na dṛṣ‍ṭe śauthilyānmilanamiti ceto dahati māṃ nigụ̄dhāntaḥkopā kaṭhinahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam||195||
11. upanāgaro yathā—
varaṃ bhrūbhaṅgaste prakaṭitagurukrodhavibhavā varaṃ sopālambhāḥ praṇayavimukhā gad‌gadagiraḥ| varaṃ mānāṭopaprasabhajanito 'nādaravidhi— rna gụ̄dhāntaḥkopā kaṭhinahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam||196||
12. grāmyo yathā— NOTES pg=1355! 1. āvutto bāṇaḥ śyālaś‍ca mayuraḥ| ādyaṃ caraṇatrayaṃ bāṇasya priyāṃ prasādayataḥ caturthaś‍ca mayūrasya rahasicchatrasyeti prasiddhiḥ|
tvayā kṣāntaṃ kṣā/kāntaṃ kuru mukhamito māṃ prati kṛtaṃ nidhehīmaṃ pṛṣ‍ṭhe mama karamayaṃ kānta! nihitaḥ |
sakhīnāṃ nirbandhānmama ca dhṛtapāṇeḥ praṇamataḥ priye kāruprītestava paramagụ̄dhā mayi ruṣaḥ || 197 ||
(8. āśrayakarmāṇi —16)
atha mānāvasthāḥ, mānamaryādāḥ, mānopakramaḥ, mānapratibhedāḥ, mānavimarśāḥ, mānopālambhāścetyāśrayasya vyalīkapriyādisọdhuḥ karmāṇi | tatra manodṛgvaktravāgvapuśceṣ‍ṭāsu mānavaikṛtāni mānāvasthāḥ | tatra manasi cintā vyāmohaśca, dṛśi dainyaṃ prajñāgaraśca, vaktre vaivarṇyamunmādaśca, 1vācyaratirvilāpaśca, vapuṣi kārśyaṃ viṣādaśca, ceṣ‍ṭāyāṃ śūnyatā nirvedaśceti | teṣu
1. manasi cintā yathā—
aṇuṇaaṇirāsagaruaṃ paḍivakkhassa garuattaṇeṇa ṇi/visaṇṇaṃ |
pemmāsaṃgheṇa puṇo samāsasaṃttī (viloaī varāī) || 198 ||
(anunayanirāsagurukaṃ pratipakṣasya gurutvena ni/viṣaṇṇam |
premāsaṅegana punaḥ samāśvasatī (vilokyate varākī)||)
2. tatraiva vyāmoho yathā—
dūragaaṃ pi ṇiattaï dūraṇiattaṃ puṇo paattaï pemmaṃ |
kaha hoi pariṇāmo māṇassa i mohaṃti vimuhijjaṃti || 199 ||
(dūragatamapi nivartayati, dūranivṛttaṃ punaḥ pravartayati prema |
kathaṃ bhavati pariṇāmo mānasyeti mohayanti vimuhyanti ||)
3. dṛśi dainyaṃ yathā—
paḍivakkhe dūmijjaï jīeṁ ṇa vīsavaï gurua—maṃtupaḍihaā |
tīse kaha vi sahiaṇe khaṃḍiapemmalahiā ṇisammaï diṭṭhī || 200 ||
{pratipakṣe dūyamāne yayā na vaśrāmyate guruka—manyupratihatayā |
tasyāḥ kathamapi sakhījane khaṇḍitapremalaghvī niśāmyati dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ ||}
NOTES pg=1356! 1. vāci a॰ iti tvatra vivakṣā |
4. tatraiva prajāgaro yathā—
saïjjhae haamāṇo oggahagahio mae ahavvāe |
raaṇīsu vi saaṇijje ṇiccaṃ jaggāviā jeṇa || 201 ||
(sahyatāṃ hatamānaḥ avagrahagṛhīto mayā abhavyayā |
rajanīṣvapi śayanīye nityaṃ jāgaritā yena ||)
5. vaktre vaivarṇyaṃ yathā—
pecchaï a so viaaṃ maṃdiasavioaparighūsaro |
laggamuhiṃ sasidaṃsaṇapā ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ||
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ aṇiattā || 202 ||
6. upādānavimarśo yathā—
allā aṇuṇaaṇīo ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ || 203 || (?)
7. saṃśayavimarśo yathā—
prārabdhe 'nunaye punardviguṇite manyau sakhīnarmaṇā pratyāpattisamutsuke priyatame pādānate tiṣ‍ṭhati |
manyūtpīḍakṛtāgasāśrukaluṣāmuttānayantyā dṛśaṃ māninyā kṣatamānalāghavabhayādantardvidhaivāsyate || 204 ||
8. upekṣāvimarśo yathā—
vilīno visrambhassapadi tadapi prema galitaṃ cyutāścitrākārāḥ praṇayasubhagāstā api giraḥ |
priyasyaivaṃ tattad vinayabahiraṅgavyavasitaṃ kimanyad duḥkhānāṃ hṛdaya! nagarīcatvaramasi || 205 ||
9. siddhivimarśo yathā—(amaru. 97)
bhrūbhedo racitaściraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ rod‍dhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hasitaṃ maune 'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
dhairyaṃ kartumapi sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathañcinmayā baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā || 206 ||
10. asiddhivimarśo yathā—(gāsa. 4.74)
ṇid‌dābhaṃgo āvaṃḍurattaṇaṃ dīharā a ṇīsāsā |
jāaṃti jassa virahe teṇa samaṃ kīriso māṇo || 207 ||
(nidrābhṅga āpāṇḍuratvaṃ dīrghāśca niḥśvāsāḥ |
jāyante yasya virahe tena samaṃ kīdṛśo mānaḥ ||)
mānavatyāḥ priyamuddiśya svaparapravṛttigarhaṇamupālambhaḥ |
sa ṣọdhā ātmaviṣayaḥ, priyaviṣayaḥ, ātmāśritaviṣayaḥ, (priyāśritaviṣayaḥ), ubhayāśritaviṣayaḥ, anubhayāśritaviṣayaśceti | teṣu—
11. ātmaviṣayo yathā—
aṇṇattihi ॰ ॰ ॰ tuha vāmo ॰ ॰ ॰ (?) || 208 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 2.58)
avahatthiūṇa sahiampiāiṃ jāṇaṃ kaeṇa ramio si |
eāiṁ tāiṁ sokkhāiṁ saṃsao jehi jīassa || 209 ||
(apahastayitvā sakhījalpitāni yeṣāṃ kṛte na ramito 'si |
etāni tāni saukhyāni saṃśayo yairjīvasya ||)
12. priyaviṣayo yathā—
sahiaṃ māṇakkhalaṇaṃ ṇāo paḍivakkhavippiatthāṇaraso |
sahio a tuha vioo mā lajjasu suhaa lajjiavvammi mae || 210 ||
(soḍhaṃ mānaskhalanaṃ jñātaḥ pratipakṣavipriyasthānarasaḥ |
soḍhaśca tava viyogo mā lajjasva subhaga lajjitavyamapi mayā ||)
yathā vā—
paṃthia jaha uppaṇṇā taha avarajjaṃti kāmiṇīṇa piāmā (piaamā) |
ṇa uṇa galiopaāraṃ purao dīsaṃti vippiāiṃ karittā || 211 ||
(pathika yathā utpannā tathā aparajyanti kāminīnāṃ priyatamāḥ |
na punargalitopacāraṃ purato dṛśyante vipriyāṇi kṛtvā ||)
13. ātmāśritaviṣayo yathā—(amaru. 69)
caraṇapatanaṃ sāntvālāpā manoharacāṭavaḥ prasabhajanito gạ̄dhāśleṣo haṭhāc‍ca kacagrahaḥ |
sakhi bahuraso yasyāsvādaḥ sa eva na śaṅkyate hṛdayadayite kartuṃ mānaḥ kimatra karomyaham || 212 ||
yathā vā—(amaru. 11)
tad‌vaktrābhimukhaṃ mukhaṃ vinamitaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ kṛtā pādayoḥ tasyālāpakutūhalākulatare śrotre niruddhe mayā |
pāṇibhyāṃ ca tiraskṛtaḥ sapulakaḥ svedodgamo gaṇḍayoḥ sakhyaḥ kiṃ karavāṇi yānti śataśo yatkañcuke sandhayaḥ || 213 ||
14. priyāśritaprabhutvaviṣayo yathā—
sāhasu vilāsiṇiaṇaṃ jea ahileṃti sarasāvarāhā piaviviā |
kiṃ haadakkhiṇṇaguṇāṇaṃ pahavaṃtāṇa suhaa esa suhāo || 214 ||
{kathaya vilāsinījanameva abhilīyante sarasāparādhāḥ priyā—vividhāḥ |
kiṃ hatadākṣiṇyaguṇānāṃ prabhavatāṃ subhaga eṣa svabhāvaḥ ||}
yathā vā—(pṛ. 1329)
kīraï guṇo vi doso || 215 ||
15. ubhayāśritapremaviṣayo yathā—(amaru.)
'purābhūdasmākaṃ tanuriyamabhinnaiva satatam' || 216 || (pṛ. 894) ityādi |
yathā vā—(amaru. 38)
kopo yatra bhrukuṭiracanā vigraho yatra maunaṃ yatrānyonyaṃ smitamanunayo dṛṣ‍ṭhipātaḥ prasādaḥ |
tasya premṇastadidamadhunā vaiśasaṃ paśya jātaṃ tvaṃ pādānte luṭhasi na ca me manyumokṣaḥ khalāyāḥ || 217 ||
16. anubhayāśritasakhīviṣayo yathā—(amaru. 92)
niḥśvāsā vadanaṃ dahanti hṛdayaṃ nirmūlamunmūlyate nidrā naiti na dṛśyate priyamukhaṃ naktandivaṃ rudyate |
aṅgaṃ śoṣamupaiti pādapatitaṃ yāvanna sambhāvyate sakhyaḥ kaṃ guṇamākalayya dayite mānaṃ vayaṃ kāritāḥ || 218 ||
yathā vā—
mānonnatetyakaruṇetyatipaṇḍiteti mayyeva dhikkṛtiranekamukhī sakhīnām |
dākṣiṇyamātramasṛṇena viceṣ‍ṭitena dhūrtasya tasya na guṇānupavarṇayanti || 219 ||
(9. prakīrṇakarmāṇi —11)
atha pratibodhanaṃ, parihāsaḥ, upadeśa; pratibo/ṣedhanaṃ, upajāpaḥ, skhalitagopanamiti prakīrṇakarmāṇi | tāni prāyaśaḥ sakhīdūtyoreveti tayorevodāhriyante | tatra—
1. sakhīpratibodhanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.10)
sahi erisi c‍cia gaī mā ruvvasu taṃsa—valia—muhaaṃdaṃ |
eāṇaṃ bāla—bāluṃki—taṃtukuḍilāṇaṃ pemmāṇaṃ || 220 ||
(sakhi īdṛśyeva gatiḥ, mā rodīḥ tryasravalitamukhacandram |
eteṣāṃ bālakarkaṭītantukuṭilānāṃ premṇām ||)
yathā vā—
yad vaco viparītakāriṇi mayi premaskhale na śrutā yat kalyāṇaparāṅ‌mukhi! priyatamaḥ pādānato nekṣitaḥ |
paśyaitannanu paśya durnayatarorasyāpi pāpaṃ phalaṃ yenendurdahano tathā malayajo vāyuḥ kuṭhārīkṛtaḥ! || 221 ||
2. dūtīpratibodhanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 6.16)
kiṃ ruvasi kiṃ viva soasi kiṃ kuppasi suaṇu ek‍kamek‍kassa |
pemmaṃ visaṃ va visamaṃ sāhasu ko ruṃdhiuṃ taraï || 222 ||
(kiṃ rodiṣi kimiva śocasi kiṃ kupyasi sutanu ekaikasmai |
prema viṣamiva viṣamaṃ kathaya ko roddha‍uṃ śak‍noti ||)
yathā vā—(amaru. 80)
anālocya premṇaḥ pariṇatimanāpṛcch‌ya suhṛda— stvayā darpānmānaḥ saralahṛdaye! samprati kṛtaḥ |
samākṛṣ‍ṭā hyete virahadahanodbhāsuraśikhāḥ svahastenāṅgārāstadalamadhunāraṇyaruditaiḥ || 223 ||
3. sakhīparihāso yathā—(kavyāda. 2.289)
idamamlānamālāyā lag‍naṃ ‍ stanataṭe tava |
chādyatāmuttarīyeṇa navaṃ nakhapadaṃ sakhi || 224 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.87)
avalaṃbiamāṇaparammuhīe eṃtassa māṇiṇi! piassa |
puṭṭha pulaüggamo tuha kahei samuhaṭṭhiaṃ hiaaṃ || 225 ||
(avalaṃmbitamānaparāṅ‌gamukhyā prāp‍tasya mānini! priyasya |
pṛṣ‍ṭhapulakodgamastava kathayati sammukhasthitaṃ hṛdayam ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 928ve.)
ḍhakkesi caliavalae hatthe muṃcasi ahomuhī bāhaṃ |
parirumbhasi ṇīsāse bahuaṃ te māṇaviṇṇāṇaṃ || 226 ||
(sthagayasi calitavalanau hastau muñcasyadhomukhī bāṣpam |
pratiruṇatsi niḥśvāsān bahulaṃ te mānavijñānam ||)
4. manopadeśeṣu sakhyupadeśo yathā—(gāsa. 5.65)
pāapaḍaṇāṇa muddhe! rahasa-balāmoḍi-cuṃbiavvāṇa |
daṃsaṇamettapasijjiri! cukkasi suhāṇaṃ bahuāṇaṃ || 227 ||
(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasādaśīle vañcitāsi sukhānāṃ bahukānām ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 5.32)
pāapaḍio ṇa gaṇio, piaṃ bhaṇaṃto vi appiaṃ bhaṇio |
vaccaṃto vi ṇa ruddho, bhaṇa kassa kae kao māṇo || 228 ||
(pādapatito na gaṇitaḥ priyaṃ bhaṇannapyapriyaṃ bhaṇitaḥ |
gañchannapi na niruddho bhaṇa kasya kṛte kṛto mānaḥ ||)
5. dūtyupadeśo yathā—(gāsa. 895ve.)
jaï puttali! bahuehiṃ aṇuṇaasokkhehi atthi de kajjaṃ |
rua tāva geṇha māṇaṃ khaṇamettaṃ tammi suhaammi || 229 ||
(yadi putrike bahubhiranunayasaukhyairasti te kāryam |
ruda tāvat gṛhāṇa mānaṃ kṣaṇamātraṃ tasmin subhage ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 894ve.)
aṇuṇaapasaraṃtapiapaḍaṇūsavaṃ sarahasaṃ cuṃbaṇasuhelliṃ |
eāi a aṇṇāi a avasovva kao phalaï māṇo || 230 ||
(anunayaprasaratpriyapatanotsavaṃ sarabhasaṃ cumbanasukhakelim |
etāni cānyāni cāvaśa eva kṛtaḥ phalati mānaḥ ||)
6. mānapratiṣedhe sakhīpratiṣedho yathā—(gāsa. 6.22)
māṇummattāeṁ tae akāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kuṇaṃtīe |
addaṃsaṇeṇa pemmaṃ viṇāsiaṃ poḍhavāeṇa || 231 ||
(mānonmattayā tayā akāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kurvatyā |
adarśanena prema vināśitaṃ prauḍhavādena ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 4.9)
jaṃ jaṃ pihulaṃ aṃgaṃ taṃ taṃ jāaṃ kisoari kisaṃ te |
jaṃ jaṃ taṇuaṃ taṃ taṃ vi ṇiṭṭhiaṃ kiṃ tha māṇeṇa || 232 ||
(yadyadvikalamaṅga tattajjātaṃ kṛśodari kṛśaṃ te |
yadyattanukaṃ tattadapi niṣ‍ṭhitaṃ kimatra mānena ||)
7. dūtīpratiṣedho yathā—(gāsa. 126ve.)
suhaā vi suṃdari vi hu taruṇī vi hu māṇaṇitti ā putti |
caṃdaṇalaṭṭhi vva bhuaṃgadūmiā kiṃ ṇu dūmesi || 233 ||
(subhagāpi sundaryapi khalu taruṇyapi khalu māninīti ā putri |
candanalateva bhujaṅgadūnā kiṃnu dunoṣi ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 1.45)
ṇaïūrasaccahe jovaṇammi diahesu ṇiccapahiesu |
aṇiattāsu a rāīsu putti kiṃ daḍḍhamāṇeṇa || 234 ||
{nadīpūrasadṛśe yauvane divaseṣu nityapathikeṣu |
anirvṛtāsu ca rātriṣu putri kiṃ dagdhamānena ||}
8. nāyakopajāpeṣu sakhyupajāpo yathā—(gāsa. 121ve.)
kajjaṃ viṇa vi kaamāṇaḍaṃbarā pulaabhiṇṇasavvaṃgī |
ujjallāliṃgaṇasokkhalālasā putti muṇiāsi varāī || 234 ||
(kāryaṃ vināpi kṛtamānaḍambarā pulakabhinnasarvāṅgī |
ujvalāliṅganasaukhyalālasā putri jñātāsi varākī ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 3.77)
aṇuṇaapasāiāe tujjha varāhe ciraṃ gaṇaṃtīe |
apahuttohaahatthaṃgulīe tīe ciraṃ ruṇṇaṃ || 236 ||
(anunayaprasāditayā tavāparādhāṃś‍ciraṃ gaṇayantyā |
aprabhūtobhayahastāṅragulyā tayā ciraṃ ruditam ||)
9. dūtyupajāpo yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)
kaṃḍujjuā varāī ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa |
alasāiaruṇṇaviaṃbhiāi diaheṇa sikkhaviā || 237 ||
(kāṇḍarjukā varākī adya tvayā kṛtāparādhena |
alasāyitaruditavijṛmbhitāni divasena śikṣitā ||)
yathā vā—
sabbhāvasiṇehavevirīe jeṇa tumaṃ nivattaṃto |
sā suhaa patta dūīkulavilakkhevva se didṭhī || 238 ||
(sadbhāvas‍nehavepanaśīlāyāḥ yena tvaṃ nivartamānaḥ |
sā subhaga! patradūtīkulavilakṣeva tasyāḥ dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ ||)
10. skhalitagopaneṣu sakhīgopanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 909ve.)
veārijjasi muddhe gottakkhalaṇeṇa mā khu tuṃ ruvasu |
kiṃ va ṇa pecchasi aṇṇaha eddahamettehi acchīhiṃ || 239 ||
(vyākulīkriyase mugdhe! gotraskhalanena mā khalu tvaṃ rodīḥ| kiṃ vā na paśyasyanyathā etāvanmātrābhyāmakṣibhyām||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 908ve.)
aï caṃḍi kiṃ ṇa pecchasi jaï so vāharaï aṇṇagotteṇa |
aha de icchaï maccharapaṇacciacchaṃ muhaṃ dad‌ṭhuṃ || 240 ||
(ayi caṇḍi! kiṃ na paśyasi yat sa vyāharatyanyagotreṇa |
asau ta icchati matsarapraṇartitākṣi! mukhaṃ draṣ‍ṭum ||)
11. dūtīgopanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 967ve.)
keligottakkhalaṇe vi kuppae kaïaaṃ aāṇaṃtī |
dud‌dama! mua parihasaṃ ajjā saccaṃ cia paruṇṇā || 241 ||
(kelīgotraskhalane 'pi kupyati kaitavamajānantī |
durdama! muñca parihāsaṃ āryā satyameva praruditā ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 907ve.)
mā velavesu bahuaṃ puttaa! aliaihi gottehiṃ |
esā vi jāṇaïccia parihāsonmissabhaṇiāiṃ || 242 ||
(mā vyākulaya bahukaṃ putraka! alīkairgotraiḥ |
eṣāpi jānātyeva parihāsonmiśrabhaṇitāni ||)
(10. mānavikārāḥ—6), (11. manopalakṣaṇasthānāni—6)
athāsya ṣaḍ vikārā bhavanti—'jāyate, vivardhate, vivartate, vipariṇamate, apakṣīyate, vinaśyatīti |
ṣaṭ copalakṣaṇasthānāni—'hṛdayaṃ, cakṣuṣī, vaktraṃ, vāgvapuśceṣ‍ṭe'ti | teṣu—
1. jāyate yathā—
dhūmāyate manasi mūrcchati ceṣ‍ṭiteṣu sanadīpyate vapuṣi cakṣuṣi jājvalīti |
vaktre parisphurati vāci vijṛmbhate 'syāḥ kāntāparādhajanito bata mānavahriḥ || 243 ||
2. vivardhate yathā—
bhruvorbhedaḥ śedo manasi vacasi śvāsabhṛśatā dṛśorbāṣpaḥ kampo vapuṣi kucayoraśrunicayaḥ |
vimohaśceṣ‍ṭāsu sphuritapunaruktānyadharayo— stavākalpaḥ ko 'yaṃ bata taruṇi manena vihitaḥ || 244 ||
3. vivartate yathā—
tadevajihyākṣaṃ mukhamaviśadāstā gira imāḥ sa evāṅgakṣepo mayi sarasamāśliṣyati tanum |
yaduktapratyuktaṃ tadapadu śiraḥ kampanaparaṃ priyā manenāho punarapi kṛtā me navavadhūḥ || 245 ||
4. vipariṇamate yathā—
āruṇyaṃ paripīya gaṇḍaphalake labdhodayaḥ pāṇyimā viśrāntasphurito 'dharastaralatāṃ śvāsānilairnīyate |
muktā sauṣ‍ṭhavakarkaśā ca valanā kārśyaślathairaṅgakaiḥ kaṣ‍ṭo mānakalistanurna sahate tvaṃ kopanā kiṃ bruve || 246 ||
5. apakṣīyate yathā—(amaru. 28)
bhrūbhede racite 'pi dṛṣ‍ṭiradhikaṃ sotkaṇṭhamud‌vīkṣate ruddhāyāmapi vāci sāsmitāmidaṃ dagdhānanaṃ jāyate |
kārkaśyaṃ janite vicetasi tanū romāñcamālambate dṛṣ‍ṭe nirvahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ mānasya tasmiñ jane || 247 ||
6. vinaśyati yathā—(amaru. 160)
dṛṣ‍ṭe locanavartmanā mukulitaṃ pārśvasthite vaktrava— nnyagbhūtaṃ bahirāsitaṃ pulakavat sparśaṃ samātanvatī |
nīvībandhavadāgataṃ śithilatāṃ sambhāṣamāṇe priye manenāpasṛtaṃ hriyeva sudṛśaḥ pādaspṛśi preyasi || 248 ||
(12. manotpattikāraṇāni—12)
athāto mānotpattikāraṇāni—'vipriyakaraṇaṃ, priyākaraṇaṃ, vāritavāmatā, kāmacāraḥ, svarūpatānyatvaṃ, śāṭhyaṃ, pratāraṇaṃ, khaṇḍanam, avajñānam, akṛtajñatā, sapat‍nī—nāmagrahaṇaṃ, gotraskhalanami'ti | teṣu—
1. vipriyakaraṇaṃ yathā—(harivi.)
taṃ tiasakusumadāṇaṃ/maṃ hariṇā ṇimmahia—surahi—gaṃdhāmoaṃ |
appaṇaaṃ pi dūmia—paṇaïṇi—hiaeṇa ruppiṇie viiṇṇaṃ || 249 ||
(tat tridaśakusumadāma hariṇā nirmathitasurabhigandhāmodam |
apraṇayitamapi dūnapraṇayinīhṛdayena rukmiṇyai vitīrṇam ||)
2. priyākaraṇaṃ yathā—(śāku. 5.23)
mayyeva vismaraṇadāruṇacittavṛttau vṛttaṃ rahaḥpraṇayamapratipadyamāne |
bhedād bhruvoḥ kuṭilayoratilohitākṣyā bhagnaṃ śārāsanamivātiruṣā smarasya || 250 ||
3. vāritavāmatā yathā—(gāsa. 4.4)
jaha jaha vāei pio taha taha ṇaccāmi caṃcale pemme |
vallī valei aṅgaṃ sahāvathaddhe virukkhammi || 251 ||
(yathā yathā vādayati priyastathā tathā nṛtyāmi cañcale premṇi |
vallī valayatyaṅgaṃ svabhāvastabdhe 'pi vṛkṣe ||)
4. kāmacāro yathā—
dūsahakaāvarāhaṃ avarahe vi gurue pasāāhimuhaṃ |
appacchaṃdapaataṃ piaṃ ca pemmaṃ ca doṇṇa vi huuccaṃti || 252 ||
(dussahakṛtāparādhaṃ aparādhe 'pi guruke prasādābhimukham |
ātmachandapravṛttaṃ priyaṃ ca prema ca dve api khalūcyete ||)
5. svarupatānyatvaṃ (gāsa. 6.6)
īsāmacchara—rahiehiṃ ṇivviārehi māmi acchīhiṃ |
eṇhiṃ jaṇo jaṇaṃ miva ṇirikkhae kahaṃ ṇa jhijjāmo || 253 ||
(īrṣyāmatsararahitābhyāṃ nirvikārābhyāṃ mātulānyakṣibhyām |
idānīṃ jano janamiva nirīkṣate kathaṃ na kṣīyāmahe ||)
6. śāṭhyaṃ yathā—
paḍibhiṃdaï hoṃtavaraṃ ghariṇī daïaṃ paraṃmuhaṇuvaṇṇaṃ |
vāsagharadīraeṇaṃ ṇīsāsaṃdoliasiheṇa || 254 ||
(pratibhinatti bhavadvaraṃ gṛhiṇī dayitaṃ parāṅ‍mukhasup‍tam |
vāsagṛhadīpakena niśvāsāndolitaśikhena ||)
7. pratāraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.52)
kaṃḍujjāā varāī sā ajja tae sā kaāvarāheṇa |
alasāiaruṇṇaviaṃbhiaṃ diaheṇa sikkhaviā || 255 ||
(kāṇḍarjukā varākī sā 'dya tvayā kṛtāparādhena |
alasāyitasaṃjñāvijṛmbhitaṃ divasena śikṣitā ||)
8. khaṇḍanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 7.53)
paccūsāgaa ṇavarattapiāloaloaṇāṇaṃda |
aṇṇatthakkhaviasavvari ṇahahūsaṇa diṇavaï ṇamo de || 256 ||
(pratyūṣāgata! navarak‍tapriyāloka! locanānanda! |
anyatrakṣapitaśarvarīka! nakha/bhobhūṣaṇa! dinapate! namaste ||)
9. avajñānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.46)
ummūlaaṃti va hiaaṃ imā ire tuha virajjamāṇassa |
avahīraṇavasavisaṃṭhula—valaṃta—ṇaaṇaddha—diṭṭhāiṃ || 257 ||
(unmūlayantīva hṛdayaṃ imāni re tava virajyamānasya |
avadhīraka—savisaṃṣ‍ṭhula—valannayanārdhadṛṣ‍ṭāni ||)
10. akṛtajñatā yathā—(gāsa. 5.45)
akaaṇṇua tujjha kae pāusarāīṃsu jaṃ mae khuṇṇaṃ |
uppekkhimo alajjira ajja vi taṃ gāmacikkhillaṃ || 258 ||
(akṛtajña! tava kṛte prāvṛḍrātriṣu yo mayā kṣuṇṇaḥ |
utpaśyāmi alajjāśīla! adyāpi taṃ grāmapaṅkam ||)
11. sapat‍nīnāmagrahaṇaṃ yathā—
nirmagnena mayāmbhasi smarabharādālissamāliṅgitā kenālīkamidaṃ tavādya kathitaṃ rādhe! mudhā tāmyasi |
ityutsvapnaparamparāsu śayane śrutvā vacaśśārṅgiṇaḥ savyājaṃ śithilīkṛtaḥ kamalayā kaṇṭhagrahaḥ pātu vaḥ|| 259 ||
12. gotraskhalanaṃ yathā—
agghaï gottakkhalaṇe paccakkha-ṇigalia-saṃgalaṃta-visāo |
eṃtaṇiattia—bāho ṇetta—ṇiatta—daï—uttaro juaïjaṇo || 260 ||
(arghati gotraskhalane pratyakṣanirgalad/saṅgalad‌viṣādaḥ |
etannivartitabāṣpo netranivṛttadayitottaro yuvatijanaḥ ||)
(13. manopalakṣaṇāni—12)
mānopalakṣaṇāni—'avajñānam, atyādaraḥ, vikṛtavīkṣaṇam, anālokaḥ, asambhāṣaṇaṃ, vākpāruṣyam, aśrūdgamaḥ, dīrghaniḥśvāsaḥ, avilakṣasmitaṃ, vyājanivṛttiḥ, atyantānukūlyaṃ, prasādhanāgrahaṇamiti | teṣu
1. avajñānaṃ yathā—(kusaṃ. 8.49)
nirvibhujya daśanacchadaṃ tato vāci bharturavadhīraṇāparā |
śailarājatanayā samīpagāmālalāpa vijayāmahetukam || 261 ||
2. atyādaro yathā—(amaru. 14)
kṛto dūrādeva smitamadhuramabhyudgamavidhiḥ śirasyājñā nyastā prativacanamapyānatimati |
na dṛṣ‍ṭeḥ śaithilyānmilanamiti ceto dahati māṃ nigụ̄dhāntaḥkopā kaṭhinahṛdaye saṃvṛtiriyam || 262 ||
3. vikṛtavīkṣaṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 920 ve.)
dāvaṃteṇa tuha muhaṃ bhumaā/bhaṅgammi hoṃta—ṇava—soham |
akaeṇa uvakaaṃ ajja maṇṇuṇā majjha pasiacchi || 263 ||
(darśayatā tava mukhaṃ bhrūbhaṅge bhaviṣyatravaśobham |
akṛtenopakṛtamadya manyunā mama, prasṛtākṣi! ||)
4. anāloko yathā—
sphurasi bāhulate! kimanarthakā tvamapi locana! vāma bhava sthiram |
tamahamāgatamapyaparādhinaṃ na parirabdhumalaṃ na ca vīkṣitum || 264 ||
5. asambhāṣaṇaṃ yathā—
vāhippaṃtīva-vahū-ullāvaṃ-ṇavavarassa ṇa hu dei |
dāvei appaṇo hatthaṃ vāragaā sā ṇāhaṃ || 265 ||
(vyāhriyamāṇaiva vadhūḥ ullāpaṃ navavarasya na khalu dadāti |
darśayati ātmano hastaṃ dvāragatā sā nātham ||)
6. vākpārupyaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 946ve.)
huṃ ṇillajja samosara taṃ cia aṇuṇesu jaā de vaaṇe |
pāaṃguṭṭhālattaaraseṇa tilaaṃ viṇimmaviaṃ || 266 ||
(huṃ nirlajja samapasara tāmevānunaya yayā te vadane |
pādāṅguṣ‍ṭhālaktakarasena tilakaṃ vinirmitam ||)
7. aśrūdgamo yathā—
dūsahamaṃtupaütto muhutta—saṃgalia—dhīra—paḍiutto/ṇivvatto |
ṇaaṇaṃtaparikkhalio ṇa paḍaï tīe maḍaaṃ baholaï/vahaï vāho || 267 ||
(dussahamanyupravṛttaḥ muhūrtasaṅgalitadhairyapratigup‍taḥ |
nayanāntapariskhalito na patati tasyā mṛdukaṃ vahati bāṣpaḥ ||)
8. dīrghaniḥśvāso yathā—(gāsa. 6.18)
dhīrakkhaliaṇiattā dūraviaṃbhaṃtarosapaḍivajjhaṃtā |
pasaraṃti seagaruā vīsamiūṇa piammi se ṇīsāsā || 268 ||
(dhairyaskhalitanivṛttā dūravijṛmbhamāṇaroṣapratipadyamānāḥ |
prasaranti svedagurukā viśramya priye tasyā niḥśvāsāḥ ||)
9. (a) vilakṣasmitaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 6.18)
bāhollaphuria—gaṃḍāharāe bhaṇiaṃ vilakkhahasirīe |
ajja vi kiṃ rūsijjaï savahāvatthaṃ gaaṃ pemmaṃ || 261 ||
(bāṣpārdrasphuritagaṇḍādharayā bhaṇitaṃ vilakṣahasanaśīlayā |
adyāpi kiṃ ruṣyate śapathāvasthāṃ gataṃ prema ||)
10. vyājanivṛttiryathā—(gāsa. 917ve.)
piaamaviiṇṇacasaaṃ acakkhiaṃ piasahīeṁ deṃtīe |
abhaṇaṃtīeṁ vi māṇaṃsiṇīe kahio ccia viroho || 270 ||
{priyatamavitīrṇacaṣakam asvaditaṃ priyasakhyai dadatyā |
abhaṇantyāpi manasvinyā kathita eva virodhaḥ ||}
11. atyantānukūlyaṃ yathā—
jalaviṇabījasikāmaṃ bhaṇiaṃ cakareḍitaṃ tahā turiaṃ |
paṃsātubharodevaṃghaliaṃ ṇa ccia kabhei bhoi || 271 ||
12. prasādhanāgrahaṇaṃ yathā—(harivi.)
kīsa maliāvaaṃsaṃ vaṇṇa—ṇīsāsa—paṃḍurāhararāaṃ |
vaaṇaṃ vahasi kisoari karasaṃkāmiakapolapattālekkhaṃ || 272 ||
(kasmāt malināvataṃsaṃ bahalaśvāsapraguṇitādharatāpam |
vadanaṃ vahasi kṛśodari karasaṅkrāmitakapolapatrālekhyam ||)
(14. mānoddīpanāni—12)
atha mānoddīpanāni—'vayasyāvākyaṃ, vipakṣasatridhiḥ, sakhīvailakṣyaṃ, sapat‍nyupahāsaḥ, saubhāgyadarśanaṃ, dākṣiṇyoktiḥ, atyantopekṣā, draṣ‍ṭavyapralāpaḥ, aparādhasmaraṇaṃ, vivakṣānukampā, ārdrāparādhatā, priyānunaya iti | teṣu'
1. vayasyāvākyaṃ yathā—
sakhi sthitvā sthitvā kucakalaśayoraśruvisarai— rupāntau siñcantī kimidamadhunā rodiṣi mṛṣā |
alaṃ cāsmābhirvā niravadhi tadaivātra ruditaṃ tṛṇacchanne kūpe kathamapi yadaivāsi patitā || 273 ||
2. vipakṣasannidhiryathā—(harivi.)
sarisa-paḍivakkha-purao hiaammi aüvva-māṇa-bhaṃga-kalusie |
samasuhadukkhammi jaṇe virikkaseso vi se ṇa māi amariso || 274 ||
(sadṛśapratipakṣapurato hṛdaye apūrvamānabhaṅgakaluṣite |
samasukhaduḥkhe jane viriktaśeṣo 'pi tasyā na māti amarṣaḥ ||)
3. sakhīvailakṣyaṃ yathā—(harivi.)
gottakkhaliammi pie maṇṇe pāuḍia-sāhi-ṇivesia-ṇaaṇaṃ |
āūramāṇa-vāhaṃ kīeṁ vi ṇivvoliāharaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 275 ||
(gotraskhalite priye manye prakaṭitasakhī—niveśitanayanam |
āpūryamāṇa—bāṣpaṃ kayāpi malinitādharaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
4. sapat‍nyupahāso yathā—
'sahiaṃ māṇakkhalaṇam' || 276 || (pṛ. 1358) ityādi |
5. saubhāgyadarśanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 6.28)
thorasuehiṃ ruṇṇaṃ savattivaggeṇa pupphavaïāe |
bhuasiharaṃ païṇo pecchiūṇa siramaggatuppaliaṃ || 277 ||
(sthūlāśrubhī ruditaṃ sapat‍nīvargeṇa puṣpavatyāḥ |
bhujaśikharaṃ patyuḥ prekṣya śiromagnavarṇalip‍tam ||)
6. dakṣiṇyoktiryathā—(gāsa. 4.53)
avarāhehiṃ vi ṇavi taha patia jaha maṃ/taṃ imehiṃ dūmesi |
avahatthiasabbhāvehiṃ suhaa dakkhiṇṇabhaṇiehiṃ || 278 ||
(aparādhairapi naiva tathā pratīhi yathā mamebhirdunoṣi |
apahastitasadbhāvaiḥ subhaga! dākṣiṇyabhaṇitaiḥ ||)
7. atyantopekṣā yathā—
priyasakhi! yayoḥ premagranthistathā prathamaḥ sa nau sphuṭitapiṭharībandhaślāghyo vipakṣagṛhe 'pyabhūt |
janavadadhunā sadmanyāvāṃ vasāva ihaiva tau dhigaparicitaṃ prema strīṇāṃ cirāya ca jīvitam || 279 ||
8. draṣ‍ṭavyapralāpo yathā—
aüoccia accasure kajjaliāharakaresi kīsavahe |
kiṇṇaï ua sassaṃlajjaṇijjaï hatthavāeṇa || 280 ||
9. aparādhasmaraṇaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 913ve.)
kaaviccheo sahībhaṃgibhaṇiasaṃbhāviāparāhāe |
jhaḍiā pallavaï puṇo ṇaaṇa—kaolesu kovatarū || 281 ||
(kṛtavicchedaḥ sakhībhaṅgibhaṇitasambhāvitāparādhāyāḥ |
jhaṭityāpallavayate punarnayanakapoleṣu kopataruḥ ||)
10. vipakṣānukampā yathā—
jāmiahiaapaharisā agahiāattaṇa vimukkamaccharamahurā |
aṇuaṃpaṃtī ṇa/vavioaṃ jasavattīṇa me suā uvvahaï || 282 ||
(yāmikahṛdayapraharṣā agṛhītātmanāṃ vimuktamatsaramadhurā |
anukampamānā navaviyogaṃ sapat‍nīnāṃ me sutā ud‌vahati ||)
11. ārdrāparādhatā yathā—
sāhasu vilāsiṇiaṇaṃ je āhileṃti sarasāvarāhā piaā |
kiṃ haa dakkhaṇaguṇā pahavaṃtāṇa suhaa esa sahāo || 286 ||
(kathaya vilāsinījanameva abhilīyante sarasāparādhāḥ priyāḥ |
kiṃ hatadākṣiṇyaguṇānāṃ prabhavatāṃ/subhaga eṣa svabhāvaḥ ||)
12. priyānunayo yathā—(kirātā. 8.64)
priyeṇa siktā paramaṃ vipakṣataś‍cukopa kācinna tutoṣa sāntvanaiḥ |
janasya rūḍhapraṇayasya cetasaḥ kimapyamarṣo 'nunaye bhṛśāyate || 284 ||
(15. mānavilāsāḥ—12)
atha mānavilāsāḥ | tatra savyalīkapreyaso vāṅ‌manaḥkāyakṛtapravṛttidarśanajanmā priyāvakroktivinyāso mānavilāsaḥ | sa dvidhā, sammukhaḥ parāvṛttaśca | tayoḥ priyābhimukhye sammukhaḥ | so 'pi dvidhā—śuddho miśraśca | tayorapi śuddhastridhā— vākpavṛttijaḥ, manaḥpravṛttijaḥ, kāyapravṛttijaśca | miśro 'pi tridhā | vāṅ‌manaḥpravṛttijaḥ, vākkāyapravṛttijaḥ, kāyapravṛttijaśca | priyamuddiśya sakhyānyābhimukhye parāvṛttaḥ | so 'pi dvidhā—cetanaviṣayo 'cetanaviṣayaśca | tayoścetanaviṣayastridhā sāmānyaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ, viśeṣaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ, kalpanāniṣ‍ṭhaśca | acetanaviṣayo 'pi tridhā—pratyakṣaviṣayo 'pratyakṣaviṣayo 'nirdhārita— viṣayaśca | tatra
1. sammukhabhedeṣu vākpravṛttijaḥ śuddho yathā—(gāsa. 942ve.)
āma ṇa tuhāvarāho piaama me loaṇāṇa iha doso |
māṇāsahammi caḍulehiṃ vāsio jo hiaaṃmi || 285 ||
(āma na tavāparādhaḥ priyatama! me locanayoriha doṣaḥ |
mānāsahe caṭulābhyāṃ vāsito yo hṛdaye ||)
2. sa eva manaḥpravṛttijo yathā—(gāsa. 2.85)
aṇṇaa! ṇāhaṃ kuviā, uvaūhia, kiṃ muhā pasāesi |
tuha maṇṇusamuppaṇṇeṇa majjha maṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ || 286 ||
(ṛjuka/ajñaka! nāhaṃ kupitā, upagūhasva, kiṃ mudhā prasādayasi |
tava manyusamutpannena mama mānenāpi na kāryam ||)
3. kāyapravṛttijo yathā—(gāsa. 706ve.)
avasara rottuṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā pusaa me haacchīiṃ |
daṃsaṇamettuṃmaïehiṃ jahi hi sīlaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ || 287 ||
(apasara roditumeva nirmite mā pusaya me hatākṣiṇī |
darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ khalu śīlaṃ tava na jñātam ||)
4. vāṅ‌manaḥpravṛttijo miśro yathā—(saka. 5.109)
pahavaṃti ccia purisā mahisā mahilāṇaṃ kiṃttha suhaa! viḍiosi |
aṇurāaṇolliāe ko doso āhiāīe || 288 ||
(prabhavantyeva puruṣāḥ mahilānāṃ kimatra subhaga! vihito 'si |
anurāganoditāyāḥ ko doṣa ābhijātyāyāḥ ||)
5. sa eva kāyapravṛttijo yathā—(gāsa. 1.51)
āma jaro me maṃdo, ahava ṇa maṃdo, jaṇassa kā tattī |
suha pṛcchia suhaa suaṃdhaandha mā aṃdhiaṃ chivasu || 289 ||
(āmajvaro me mando 'thavā na mando janasya kā cintā |
sukhapṛcchaka subhaga sugandhagandha mā gandhikāṃ spṛśa ||)
6. manaḥkāyapravṛttijo yathā—(gāsa. 945ve.)
aṇuvattaṃto amhārisaṃ jaṇaṃ suhaa! āhijāīe |
ciṃtesi uṇo ṇa hiae aṇāhijāī suhaṃ jiaī || 290 ||
(anuvartamāno 'smādṛśaṃ janaṃ ābhijātyā |
cintayasi punarna hṛdaye anābhijātyā sukhaṃ jīyate ||)
7. parāvṛttaviṣayeṣu cetanaviṣayaḥ sāmānyaniṣ‍ṭho yathā—
peśche māpasi bhiṃdaha pie jaṇe daṃsaṇaṃ vi ramaṇijjaṃ |
paḍibhiṇṇuvvaṭṭharadisopuaṃ jamāāhiālaṃvi || 291 ||
8. sa eva sakhāyābhimukhye viśeṣaniṣ‍ṭho yathā—(gāsa. 2.31)
vāharaü maṃ sahīo tissā gotteṇa kiṃttha bhaṇieṇa |
thirapemmā hou jahiṃ tahiṃ mā kiṃ pi ṇaṃ bhaṇaha || 292 ||
(vyāharatu māṃ sakhyastasyā gotreṇa kimatra bhaṇitena |
sthiraṃ prema bhavatu yatra tatrāpi mā kimapyenaṃ bhaṇata ||)
9. gotraskhalanataḥ sapat‍nyanusandhāne kalpanāniṣ‍ṭho yathā—(gāsa. 4.90)
pāapaḍiaṃ ahavve kiṃ dāṇiṃ ṇa uṭṭhavesi bhattāraṃ |
eaṃ cia avasāṇaṃ dūraṃ pi gaassa pemmassa || 296 ||
(pādapatitaṃ abhavye kimidānī notthāpayasi bhartāram |
etadevāvasānaṃ dūramapi gatasya premṇaḥ ||)
10. acetanaviṣayaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.50)
suhaücchaaṃ jaṇaṃ dullahaṃ pi dūrāhi amha āṇeṃta |
uaāraa jara jīaṃ pi ṇeṃta ṇa kaāvarāho si || 294 ||
(sukhapṛcchakaṃ janaṃ durlabhamapi dūrādasmākamānayan |
upakāraka jvara jīvamapi nayan na kṛtāparādho 'si ||)
11. sa evāpratyakṣaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 1.24)
piaviraho appiadaṃsaṇaṃ a guruāiṃ do vi dukkhāi |
jissā tumaṃ kārijjasi tīe ṇamo āhiāīe || 295 ||
(priyaviraho 'priyadarśanaṃ ca guruke dve api duḥkhe |
yayā tvaṃ kāryase tasye nama ābhijātyai ||)
12. anirdhāritaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 3.65)
aṇuvattaṇāṃ kuṇaṃto vese vi jaṇe a—hiṇṇa—muharāo |
appavvaso vi suaṇo paravvaso āhijāīe || 296 ||
(anuvartanāṃ kurvan dveṣye 'pi jane abhitramukharāgaḥ |
ātmavaśo 'pi sujanaḥ paravaśa ābhijātyāḥ ||)
(16. mānamoṭṭāyitāni—12)
atha mānamoṭṭāyitāni | vilāsa eva kākvādinātivakro mānamoṭṭāyitam | so 'pi dvidhā agotraskhalanaviṣayo gotraskhalanaviṣayaśca | tayorādyaḥ prāgvadeva śuddho miśraśca | dvitīyastvabhihitanimitto gatinimittaśca | tatra śuddhamiśrau pūrvavadeva tridhā | abhihitanimittastu tridhā—vidhimukhena, pratiṣedhamukhena pratiṣedhavidhimuśena ca | gatinimitto 'pi tridhaiva vṛttānuṣaṅgataḥ, vartamānānuṣaṅgataḥ, bhaviṣyadanuṣaṅgataśca | teṣu—
1. vākyapravṛttijaṃ śuddhaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 750ve.)
saddhā me tujjha piattaṇassa kaha taṃ ti ṇea āṇāmo |
de pasia tumaṃ cia sikkhavesu jaha te piā homi || 297 ||
(śraddhā me tava priyatvasya kathaṃ tadityetanna jānāmi |
prārthaye tāvat prasīda tvameva śikṣaya yathāsya priyā bhavāmi ||)
2. tadeva manaḥpravṛttijaṃ yathā—
etthaccia vasasi tumaṃ sāhasu mā kuṇasu suhaa ṇīsāsaṃ |
esaccia hoi gaī pariṇaïparusāṇaṃ pemmāṇaṃ || 298 ||
(atraiva vasāsi tvaṃ mā kuru subhaga! niḥś‍vāsam |
eṣaiva bhavati gatiḥ pariṇatiparuṣāṇāṃ premṇām ||)
3. kāyapravṛttijaṃ yathā—
uṇṇamasu suhaa eaṃ kaheu paḍisiddha—daḍḍhahiaassa |
paṃsulika aṇimmaeṇa kiṃ pāapaḍaṇeṇa || 299 ||
(annama subhaga! etat kathayitvā utpīḍayasi dagdhahṛdayasya |
pāṃsulika! anirmalenaitena kiṃ pādapatanena ||)
4. vāṅ‌manassammiśraṃ yathā—
rakkhaṃti āhiāaṃ sahaṃtī virahaṃ piaṃ pajaṃpati |
kiṃ khu purisā—viaḍ̣dhā āhiṇaṃdijjaṃti mahilāhiṃ || 300 ||
(rakṣantyābhijātyaṃ sahante virahaṃ priyaṃ prajalpanti |
kiṃ khalu puruṣā vidagdhā abhinandyante mahilābhiḥ ||) ku.
5. tadeva vākkāyajaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 5.89)
dīsasi piāiṃ jaṃpasi sabbhāo suhaa ettio ccea |
phāleiūṇa vi hiaaṃ sāhasu ko dāvae kassa || 301 ||
(dṛśyase priyāṇi jalpasi sadbhāvaḥ subhaga etāvaneva |
pāṭayitvāpi hṛdayaṃ kathaya ko darśayati kasya ||)
6. manaḥkayajaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.76)
avarajjhasu vīsaddhaṃ saccaṃ(vvaṃ) te suvia visāhimo amhe |
guṇaṇibbharammi hiae pattia dosā ṇa māaṃti || 302 ||
(aparādhyasya vistrabdhaṃ satyaṃ sarvaṃ te śrutvāṃ viṣahāmahe vayam |
guṇanirbhare hṛdaye pratīhi doṣā na mānti ||)
7. abhihitanimittato vidhimukhena yathā—(gāsa. 905ve.)
eaṃ cia maha ṇāmaṃ bhaṇa bhaṇa de suhaa kīsa viliosi |
paḍibhāi jaṃ ṇa tujjha vi mama pi kiṃ teṇa teṇa ṇāmeṇa || 303 ||
(evameva mama nāma bhaṇa bhaṇa tāvat subhaga kasmāt vrīḍito 'si |
pratibhāti yanna tavāpi mamāpi kiṃ tena nāmnā ||)
8. tadeva pratiṣedhamukhena yathā—
tujjha vaaṇaïracchaa kiṃ imiṇā vimakkhareṇa ṇāmeṇa |
jaṇṇa ūṇāūṇa a ahyasu bhaṇṇaṃ tae ṇāṃma || 304 ||
(tava vadanacirasthitena kimanena viṣamākṣareṇa nāmnā |
yena punaḥpunaśca asmāsu bhaṇitaṃ tvayā nāma ||)
9. pratiṣedhavidhimukhena yathā—
hou ṇa suaṃ cia mae ṇea tume suhaa kiṃ ci vi paüttaṃ |
ettāhe saṃbhariūṇa bhaṇasu re majjha jaṃ ṇāmaṃ || 305 ||
(bhavatu na śrutameva mayā naiva tvayā subhaga kiñcidapi pravṛttam |
idānīṃ saṃsmṛtya bhaṇa re mama yannāma ||)
10. gatinimittako vṛttānuṣaṅgato yathā—(gāsa. 1.32)
aha saṃbhāviamaggo suhaa tue jevva ṇavara ṇivvụ̄dho |
eṇhiṃ hiae aṇṇaṃ aṇṇaṃ vāāeṁ loassa || 306 ||
(atha sambhāvitamārgaḥ subhaga! tvayaiva kevalaṃ nirvyūḍhaḥ |
idānīṃ hṛdaye anyadanyad vāci lokasya ||)
11. vartamānānuṣaṅgato yathā—
ettha ahaṃ cea piā ṇa a sā mā lajja bhaṇasu vīsattho |
veso suhaa purao ṇa ṇivvarijjaṃti sabbhāvā || 307 ||
(atrāhameva priyā na ca sā mā lajjasva bhaṇa vistrabdhaḥ |
dveṣyasya subhaga purato na kathyante sad‌bhāvāḥ ||)
12. bhaviṣyadanuṣaṅgato yathā—(gāsa. 906ve.)
suhaa muhuttaṃ suppaü jaṃ jaṃ pahibhāi taṃ bhaṇissihisī |
ajja ṇa pecchaṃti tuhaṃ ṇid‍dāgaruāi acchīi || 308 ||
(subhaga! muhūrtaṃ supyatāṃ, yadyat pratibhāti tad bhaṇiṣyasi |
adya na prekṣete tava nidraguruke akṣiṇī ||)
(17. manasukhānubhāvāḥ—6)
atha mānasukhānubhāvāḥ | tatra māne bahumānādisampad‌yogādayaṃ bahumataḥ; jighṛkṣito 'nubaddhaḥ, śikṣitaḥ, upadrutaḥ, vidrutaśceti ṣọdhā sambhavati | teṣu
1. bahumato yathā—(gāsa. 7.75)
atthakka-rūsaṇaṃ khaṇa-pasaṃjaṇaṃ alia-vaaṇa-ṇibbaṃdho |
ummaccharasaṃdāo puttaa paaī siṇehassa || 309 ||
(akasmād roṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaprasādanam alīkavacananirbandhaḥ |
unmūrcchitasantāpaḥ putraka! padavī s‍nehasya ||)
yathā vā—(gāsa. 829ve.)
jattha ṇa ujjaggirao jattha ṇa īsā visūraṇaṃ māṇo |
sabbhāvacāḍuaṃ jattha ṇatthi ṇeho tahiṃ ṇatthi || 310 ||
(yatra nāstyujjāgarako yatra nerṣyā khedo mānaḥ |
sadbhāvacāṭukaṃ yatra nāsti s‍nehastatra nāsti ||)
2. jighṛkṣito yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.243)
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihyākṣī paśyati sphuritādharā || 311 ||
yathā vā—(amaru. 97)
bhrūbhedo guṇitaściraṃ nayanayorabhyastamāmīlanaṃ rod‌dhuṃ śikṣitamādareṇa hāsitaṃ maune 'bhiyogaḥ kṛtaḥ |
dhairyaṃ dhartumiha sthirīkṛtamidaṃ cetaḥ kathāñcinmayā
baddho mānaparigrahe parikaraḥ siddhistu daive sthitā || 312 ||
3. anubaddho yathā—(gāsa. 2.29)
taha māṇo māṇatīe emea dūramaṇubaddho |
jaha saviṇīa vivio pio ekkaggāmaccia paramattho/paüttho || 313 ||
(tathā māno mānavatyā evameva dūramanubaddhaḥ |
yathā suvinīya vividhaḥ priya ekagrāma eva proṣitaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
līlāvatīcaraṇacumbitamaulimagre kāntaṃ vidhūya vihitāgasamuc‍cacāla | atrāntare mukharanupurayugmamasyāḥ saubhāgyagandhagajaḍiṇḍimatāṃ ||314||
4. śikṣito yathā—(gāsa. 1.26)
paṇaakuviāṇa doṇha vi aliapasuttāṇaṁ māṇaïllāṇa |
ṇic‍cala-ṇiruddha-ṇīsāsa-diṇṇa-aṇṇaṇaṃ ko mallo || 315 ||
(praṇayakupitayoḥ dvayoḥ apyalīkaprasup‍tayoḥ mānavatoḥ |
niścalaniruddhaniḥśvāsadattakarṇayoḥ ko mallaḥ ||)
yathā vā—
cuṃbasu sahassaüttaṃ muhamiṇamo hāriaṁ mae jūe |
māṇo uṇa muc‍caï sāmalaṃ kaha māṇaïttīe || 316 ||
(cumba sahasrakṛtvo mukhamidaṃ hāritaṃ mayā dyūte |
mānaḥ punarmucyate śyāmalāṅga kathaṃ mānavatyā ||)*
6. vidruto yathā—(māgha. 10.63)
granthimud‍grathayituṃ hṛdayeśe vāsasaḥ spṛśati mānadhanāyāḥ |
bhrūyugena sapadi pratipede romabhiśca samameva vibhedaḥ || 317 ||
yathā vā—(gāsa. 779ve.)
kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario |
atthakkapulliaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍaü || 318 ||
(kāraṇagṛhīto 'pi mayā māna evameva yat samavasṛtaḥ |
akāṇḍapuṣpitāṅkola! tava mastake patatu ||)
(18. mānotpattiprakīrṇāni —11)
atha mānotpattiprakīrṇakāni | tatra mānavatyāḥ svahṛdayasakhīpriyatamādiṣu vaimanasyāt prakīrṇakāni | tatra —
1. svahṛdaye śaṅkāyāṃ yathā—(gāsa. 3.2)
appacchaṃda—pahāvira dullahalambhaṃ jaṇaṃ vimaggaṃta |
āāsapahehiṃ bhamaṃta hiaa kaïā vi bhajjihisi || 319 ||
NOTES pg=1378! *ataḥ paraṃ upadrutaḥ nopalabhyate |
(ātmacchanda—pradhāvanaśīla durlabhalambhaṃ janamapi vimārgayat |
ākāśapathairbhramadhṛdaya kadāpi bhaṅkṣyase ||)
2. vipriyapravṛttau yathā—
sahiaṃ gottakkhalaṇaṃ diṭ‌ṭho a pio ahiṇṇamuharāo |
eṇhiṃ vittavi (pijjaï) vāhovāhivva paḍia || 320 ||
(soḍhaṃ gotraskhalanaṃ dṛṣ‍ṭaśca priyo 'bhinnamukharāgaḥ |
idānīṃ pīyate tayā bāṣpodadhiriva pathika ||)
3. ॰ ॰ ॰ hyapravṛttau yathā—
vilīno visrambhaḥ sapadi tadapi prema galitaṃ cyutāścitrākārāḥ praṇayasubhagāstā api giraḥ |
priyasyaivaṃ tattad‍‌vinayabahiraṅgavyavasitaṃ kimanyad duḥśānāṃ hṛdaya nagarīcatvaramasi || 321 ||
4. sakhyā dayitadoṣākhyāne yathā—(amaru. 94)
idaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ priyatama nanu śvetamadhikaṃ gamiṣyāmo yāmo bhavatu gamanenāpi bhavatu |
purā yeneyaṃ me ciramanusṛtā vākyapadavī sa evānyo jātaḥ sakhi paricitāḥ kasya puruṣāḥ || 322 ||
5. hṛdaye śaṅkāyāṃ yathā—(amaru.)
sakhi! sa subhago mandaḥ s‍neho mayīti na me vyathā vidhiviracitaṃ yasmāt sarvo janaḥ sukhamaś‍nute |
mama tu manasaḥ santāpo 'yaṃ jane vimukhe 'pi yat kṣaṇamapi hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām || 323
6. dai ॰ ॰ ॰
jyotirbhyastadidaṃ tamassamuditaṃ jāto 'yamad‍bhyaśiśakhī pīyūṣādidamutthitaṃ viṣamayaṃ chāyāp‍tajanmātapaḥ |
ko nāmāsya bhavet praśāntiṣu vidhirbāḍhaṃ drạdhīyānayaṃ granthiryat priyato 'pi vipriyamidaṃ samyakkṛtaṃ sāntvanaiḥ || 324 ||
7. priye taddoṣāpādane yathā—(gāsa. 904ve.)
bhaṇa bhaṇa jaṃ jaṃ paḍihāi tujjha taṃ taṃ sahāri/mimo amhe |
asahattaṇaṃ ca jīaṃ ca vallabhe dovii ṇa ghaḍaṃti || 325 ||
(bhaṇa bhaṇa yad yat pratibhāti tava tat tad sahāmahe vayam |
asahamānatvaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ca vallabhe dvāvapi na ghaṭete ||)
8. svadoṣāpādane yathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ gahikkhe vaaṇaṃ saha tīṇa taṇṇā |
haṇaosi pio jīaṃ cia kalisiaṃ pi maha piaṃ || 326 ||
9. ubhayadoṣāpādane yathā—(gasa. 4.76)
avarajjhasu ettāhe vīsaddho c‍cia jaṇammi ṇipphalamaüe |
kāuṃ ṇik‍kiva dukkhaṃ pattia sahaü a ekkassa c‍cia hiaaṃ || 327 ||
{aparādhyasvedānīṃ viśvasta eva jane niṣphalamṛduke |
kṛtvā niṣkṛpa duḥkhaṃ pratīhi sahatāṃ caikasyaiva hṛdayam ||}
yathā vā—(gāsa. 910ve.)
sottuṃ suhaṃ ṇa labbhaï avvo pemmeṇa vaṃkavisamassa |
dugghaḍia—maṃcaassa va khaṇe khaṇe pāapaḍaṇeṇa || 328 ||
(svap‍tuṃ sukhaṃ na labhyate aṃbo premṇā vakraviṣamasya |
durghaṭitamañcasyeva kṣaṇe kṣaṇe pādapatanena ||)
10. priyaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 931ve.)
tā sokkhaṃ tāva raī tā raṇaraṇaassa ṇatthi oāso |
jā dukkhekkaṇihāṇe ṇa hoi bahuvallahe pemmaṃ || 329 ||
(tāvatsaukhyaṃ tāvad ratistāvad raṇaraṇakasya nāstyavakāśaḥ |
yāvad duḥkhaikanidhāne na bhavati bahuvallabhe prema ||)
11. devaviṣayo yathā—(gāsa. 844ve.)
jaï devva tuṃ pasaṇṇo mā kāhisi majjha māṇusaṃ jammaṃ |
aha jaṃmaṃ mā pemmaṃ jaï pemmaṃ mā jaṇe julahe || 330 ||
(yadi deva tvaṃ prasanno mā kuruṣva mama mānuṣaṃ janma |
atha janma mā prema, yadi prema mā jane durlabhe ||)
(19. manopādhibhaṅgāḥ —11)
atha mānopādhibhaṅgāḥ | te cāṅgacakṣuścittacāṭudhairyakāryaśak‍tyākāradeśakāla— pātrasaṃjñādyupādhibhyo bhavanti | tatra —
1. aṅgopādhiryathā—
aṇṇatthapesi eṇehe ॰ ॰ ॰ || 331 || (?)
2. cittopādhiryathā—(gāsa. 903ve.)
avarāhasahassāiṃ bharimo hiaeṇa tammi addiṭṭhe |
diṭṭhammi uṇo piasahi ekkaṃ pi khu ṇaṃ ṇa saṃbharimo || 332 ||
(aparādhasahasrāṇi bharāmo hṛdayena tasmitradṛṣ‍ṭe |
dṛṣ‍ṭe punaḥ priyasakhi! ekamapi khalu na smarāmaḥ ||)
3. cāṭūpādhiryathā—(gāsa. 902ve.)
jāṇimi kaāvarāhaṃ jāṇimi aliāi bhaṇaï saalāi |
aṇuṇaṃte uṇa jāṇe kaāparāhaṃ vi appāṇaṃ || 333 ||
(jānāmi kṛtāparādhaṃ jānāmi alīkāni bhaṇāti sakalāni |
anunayati punarjāne kṛtāparādhāmivātmānam ||)
4. dhairyopādhiryathā—(līlāvaī 716 tulyam)
bhaṇa sahio ॰ ॰ ॰ tammi || 334 || (?)
5. kāryopādhiryathā—
bhiuḍīe vāhāro aṃgakkhivaṇāi visahi kīraṃti |
sahasā diṭṭhammi pieṃ tā piasahi suṃdaro māṇo || 335 ||
(bhrukuṭyā vyāhāraḥ aṅgakṣepaṇāni yadā kriyante |
sahasā dṛṣ‍ṭe priye tāvat priyasakhi! sundaro mānaḥ ||)
6. śaktyupādhiryathā—
॰ ॰ ॰ uṇa asammohā tassa uppariuṃ || 336 ||
7. ākāropādhiryathā—(gāsa. 4.14)
acchīi tāṃ thaïssaṃ dohiṃ vi hatthehiṃ tammi diṭṭhammi |
aṃgaṃ kalaṃbakusumaṃ va pulaïaṃ kaha ṇu ḍhakkhissaṃ || 337 ||
(akṣiṇī tāvatsthagayiṣyāmi dvābhyāmapi hastābhyāṃ tasmin dṛṣ‍ṭe |
aṅaṃga kadambakusumamiva pulakitaṃ kathaṃ nu sthagayiṣye ||)
8. deśopādhiryathā—(gāsa. 901ve.)
jaïā pio ṇa dīsaï bhaṇaha halā kassa kīrae māṇo |
aha diṭṭhammi vi māṇo tā tassa piattaṇaṃ katto || 338 ||
(yadā priyo na dṛśyate bhaṇata sakhyaḥ kasya kriyate mānaḥ |
atha dṛṣ‍ṭe 'pi mānastāvattasya priyatvaṃ kutaḥ ||)
9. kālopādhiryathā—(gāsa. 745ve.)
kassa ṇa saddhā garuattaṇammi païṇā pasajjamāṇassa |
jaï māṇabhaṃjaṇīo ṇa hoṃti hemaṃtarāīo || 339 ||
(kasya na śraddhā gurutve patyā prasādyamānena |
yadi mānabhañjinyo na bhavanti hemantarātrayaḥ ||)
10. pātropādhiryathā—(gāsa. 743ve.)
bhiuḍīe puloissaṃ ṇibbhacchissaṃ parammuhī hossaṃ |
jaṃ bhaṇaha taṃ karissaṃ sahio jaï taṃ ṇa pekkhissaṃ || 340 ||
(bhrakuṭyā pralokayiṣyāmi nirbhartsayiṣyāmi parāṅ‍mukhī bhaviṣyāmi |
yadbhaṇatha tatkariṣyāmi sakhyo yadi taṃ na prekṣiṣye ||)
11. saṃjñopadhiryathā—(gāhāko. 440)
māṇo māe do akkharāi piasaggamotti bahuāi |
bahuaṃ jaṃpaï thoehi ettha tumaṃ c‍cia pamāṇaṃ || 341 ||
(māno mātaḥ dve akṣare, priyasaṅgama iti bahukāni |
bahukaṃ jalpati stokaiḥ atra tvameva pramāṇam ||)
(20. mānabhaṅgakāraṇāni —12)
atha mānabhaṅgakāraṇāni | madaḥ, trāsaḥ, bhayam, ṛtūpagamaḥ, upavanavikāsaḥ, surabhivanavātaḥ, kokilādyālāpaḥ, prabhātaṃ, pradoṣaścandrodayaḥ, pravāsārambhaḥ, viviktamiti | yathocyate—
trāso bhayaṃ mada ṛtūpagamaḥ pradoṣaścandrodayaḥ pikarutaṃ rajanīvirāmaḥ |
hṛdyo marud vikasitopavanaṃ viviktamādyaḥ pravāsa iti mānanivarhaṇāni || 342 ||
1. teṣu mado yathā—
gheppaṃti appaṇa c‍cia kaāvarāhā vi kāmiṇīhi viaamā |
kiṃ ia sikkhāvaṃto avarajjhaï vi piaṃ karei mahumao || 343 ||
(gṛhyanta ātmanaiva kṛtāparādhā api kāminīmiḥ priyatamāḥ |
kimiti śikṣayannaparādhyati, priyaṃ karoti madhumadaḥ ||)
2. trāso yathā—(harivi.)
caṃdāmaa-paḍijīvia-kavāla-mukka-ṭṭahāsa-bhīāe |
gorīe māṇa-vighaḍaṇa-ghaḍaṃta-deho haro jaaï || 344 ||
(candrāmṛtapratijīvitakapālamuktāṭṭahāsabhītāyāḥ |
gauryā mānavighaṭanaghaṭamānadeho haro jayati ||)
3. bhayaṃ yathā—(urā. 1.1)
paulastyapīnabhujasampadudasyamāna— kailāsasambhramaviloladṛśaḥ priyāyāḥ |
śreyāṃsi vo diśatu nih‍nutakopacihna— māliṅganotpulakamāsitamindumauleḥ || 345 ||
4. ṛtūpagamo yathā—
tānyetāni śikhaṇḍitāṇḍavagurūnambhodharānambare tanvānāni dināni nūnamamṛtasyandīni vandāmahe |
