udgạ̄dhā navanīlanīrajadṛśāmatyantamāyāmino bhidyante svayameva yeṣu viṣamā mānagrahagranthayaḥ || 346 ||
5. upavanavikaso yathā—(gāsa. 779ve.)
kāraṇagahio vi mae māṇo emea jaṃ samosario |
atthakka—phulliaṃkolla tujjha taṃ matthae paḍaü || 347 ||
(kāraṇagṛhīto 'pi mayā māna evameva yatsamapasṛtaḥ |
akāṇḍapuṣpitāṅkola tava tat mastake patatu ||)
6. surabhivanavātaḥ yathā—(līlāvatī 32)
aha ṇavara tattha doso jaṃ gimha-paosa-malliāmoo |
aṇuṇaasuhāi māṇaṃsiṇīṇa bhottuṃ c‍cia ṇa dei || 348 ||
(atha kevalaṃ tatra doṣaḥ yat grīṣmapradoṣamallikāmodaḥ |
anunayasukhāni manasvinīnāṃ bhok‍tumeva na dadātu ||)
7. kokilādyālāpo yathā—
kalakaṃṭhīkalaraommūliassa māṇassa kiṃsuataruassa |
bhūipatao hoi mahuṃmi māhavībhamarajhaṃkāro || 349 ||
(kalakaṇṭhīkalaravonmūlitasya mānasya kiṃśukatarukasya |
bhūmau patato bhavati madhau mādhavībhramarajhaṅkāraḥ ||)
8. prabhātaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.29)
ajja sahi rāisese māṇamahūsava—suhacchiārad‍dhe |
sahasatti kukkuḍarao ṇisāmio vajjhapaḍaho vva || 350 ||
(adya sakhi rātriśeṣe mānamahotsavasukhakṣayārabdhe |
sahaseti kukkuṭaravo niśāmitaḥ vadhyapaṭaha iva ||)
9. pradoṣo yathā—
jaha jaha atthamaï ravī vialiasajjhāvo padosāmmi |
taha taha māṇo māṇaṃsiṇīṇa hiaesu vijjhāi/vivujjhaï || 351 ||
(yathā yathā 'stameti ravirvigalitasacchāyaḥ pradoṣe |
tathā tathā māno manasvinīnāṃ hṛdayeṣu vidhyati/budhyate ||)
10. candrodayo yathā—(harivi.)
aṇuṇaasuhaṃ ṇa pattaṃ piāhi daïesu khijjaï vi ṇa calaṇo |
osoriaṃmi paḍhamaṃ dūīevva dosiṇāe māṇaggahaṇe || 352 ||
11. pravāsārambho yathā—
jā aṇuṇaaṃ ṇa gehaṇaï māṇakkhalaṇaṃmi sahiaṇeṇa vi bhaṇiā |
pāapaḍaṇehiṃ ṇeṃtaṃ saccia kaāvi piaṃ ṇivārei piā || 353 ||
(yā anunayaṃ na gṛh‍ṇāti mānaskhalane sakhījanenāpi bhaṇitā |
pādapatanaiḥ yāntaṃ saiva kadāpi priyaṃ nivārayati priyā ||)
12. viviktaṃ yathā—(māgha. 4.45)
yā na yayau priyamanyavadhūbhyaḥ sāratarāgamanā yatamānam |
tena saheha bibharti rahaḥ strī sā ratarāgamanāyatamānam || 354 ||
(21. mānopaśāntayaḥ —12)
atha mānopaśāntayaḥ | virodhiprādurbhāvaḥ, pratipakṣābhiyogaḥ, pratyanīkadharṣaṇaṃ, vipakṣābhibhavaḥ, paribhraṃśaḥ, avasraṃsanaṃ, calanaṃ, skhalanaṃ, vighaṭṭanam, unmūlanam, palāyanam, apunarbhāva iti | teṣu —
1. virodhiprādurbhāvo yathā—
avalambiovaāraṃ abhagga-māṇa-pasaraṃ paatta-paharisaṃ |
ekkaṃ a ekkarāaṃ (jāaṃ) se daïadaṃsaṇa c‍cia hiaaṃ || 355 ||
(avalambitopacāramabhag‍namānaprasaraṃ pravṛttapraharṣam |
ekaṃ ca ekarāgaṃ ca jātaṃ dayitadarśana eva hṛdayam ||)
2. pratipakṣābhiyogo yathā—
to ia—maṇorahehiṃ vi alaṃghaṇijjagaruaṃ piammi bhaṇaṃte |
ādattā lakkheu aṇṇa c‍cia se rasaṃtaraṃ muhasohā || 356 ||
(tata ito manorathairalaṅghanīyagurukaṃ priye bhaṇati |
āttā lakṣayitumanyameva tasyā rasāntaraṃ mukhaśobhā ||)
3. pratyanīkadharṣaṇaṃ yathā—
thoatthoa—pasario tīe ṇiraṃtara—pariṭṭhiāmarisa—rasaṃ |
laṃghei c‍cia hiaaṃ paḍivallehoṇṇaa/isaho parioso || 357 ||
(stokastokaprasṛtaḥ tasyāḥ nirantaraparisthitāmarṣarasam |
laṅghayatīva hṛdayaṃ pratipallekhonnatisakhaḥ paritoṣaḥ ||)
4. vipakṣābhibhavo yathā—(harivi.)
thoosaraṃtarosaṃ thoatthoa—parivaḍ‍ḍhamāṇa—paharisaṃ |
hoi adūrapasāaṃ uhaa—rasāatta—vibbhamaṃ tīe muhaṃ || 358 ||
(stokāpasarad‍roṣaṃ stoka—stoka—parivardhamānapraharṣam |
bhavati ca dūraprasādamubhayarasāyattavibhramaṃ tasyā mukham ||)
5. prabhātaparibhraṃśo yathā—(gāsa. 933ve.)
uvvahaï daïa—gahiāharoṭṭha—jhijjaṃta—rosa—paḍirāaṃ |
pāṇosaraṃtamaïraṃ va phalihacasaaṃ muhaṃ bālā||359||
(udvahati dayitagṛhītādharoṣ‍ṭhakṣīyamāṇaroṣapratirāgam |
pānāpasaranmadiramiva sphaṭikacaṣakaṃ mukhaṃ bālā ||)
6. avasraṃsanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 1.74)
diḍhamaṃtudūmiāeṁ vi gahio daïammi pecchaha imāe |
osaraï vāluāsuṭṭhiovva māṇo surusūraṃto || 360 ||
(dṛḍhamanyudūnayā gṛhīto dayite paśyatānayā |
apasarati vālukāmuṣ‍ṭiriva mānassurusurāyamāṇaḥ ||)
7. calanaṃ yathā—
aha o tti ṇavaria ac‍cāsaṇṇo pi sac‍cabhāmāe hari |
pariaṇamuha c‍cia suo vāhajalattaria—ṇoaṇāeĕ, ṇa diṭṭho || 361 ||
(athāgata iti sahasā atyāsanno 'pi satyabhāmayā hariḥ |
parijanamukhādeva śruto bāṣpajalāntaritalocanayā, na dṛṣ‍ṭaḥ ||)
8. skhalanaṃ yathā—(harivi.)
tīe vialaṃttadhīraṃ abbhuṭṭhaṃtīeĕ thaṇa—paholira—vāhaṃ |
dūrosaraṃta raṇaṃ dūraara—valaggaveaṇaṃ ṇīsasiaṃ || 362 ||
(tasyāḥ vigaladdhairyaṃ abhyutthitāyāḥ stanapravahanaśīlabāṣpam |
dūrāpasaratsmaraṇaṃ dūratarāvarūḍhavedanaṃ niḥśvasitam ||)
9. vighaṭṭanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 935ve., vala. 361)
tuṃgo tthiro visālo jo sahi me māṇapavvao raïo |
so daïadiṭṭhivajjāsaṇīeṁ ghāammi ṇa pahutto || 363 ||
(tuṅgaḥ sthiro viśālo yassakhi me mānaparvato racitaḥ |
sa dayitadṛṣ‍ṭivajrāśanyāghāte 'pi na paryāp‍taḥ ||)
10. unmūlanaṃ yathā—(harivi.)
to ia suraaru—kāraṇa—maülia—hiaāe sāvasesalahuo |
saṃbhāvia c‍cia hio hariṇā pāapaḍaṇammi tīeṁ amariso || 364 ||
(tata iti suratarukāraṇamukulitahṛdayāyāḥ sāvaśeṣalaghukaḥ |
sambhāvita eva hṛto hariṇā pādapatane tasyā amarṣaḥ ||)
11. palāyanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 2.44)
jo kaha vi sahīhi maha chiddaṃ lahiūṇa pesio hiae |
so māṇo coriakāmua vva diṭṭhe pie ṇaṭṭho || 365 ||
(yaḥ kathamapi sakhībhirmama chidraṃ lambhayitvā preṣito hṛdaye |
sa mānaścoritakāmuka iva dṛṣ‍ṭe priye naṣ‍ṭaḥ ||)
12. apunarbhāvo yathā—(harivi.)
to se rubbhaṃta c‍cia hiaa—viaṃbhaṃta—harisa—veaüc‍ciliā |
pāapaḍiassa hariṇo paḍiā puṭṭhīe bāhasalilatthevā || 366 ||
(tatastasyāḥ rudhyamānā eva hṛdayavijṛmbhamāṇaharṣavegoc‍cilitāḥ |
pādapatitasya hareḥ patitāḥ pṛṣ‍ṭhe bāṣpasalilabindavaḥ ||)
(22. mānopaśamalakṣaṇāni —12)
atha mānopaśamalakṣaṇāni— nayananimīlanam, mukhaprasādaḥ, bāṣpamokṣaḥ, pulakodbhedaḥ, doṣapratibhedaḥ, akramanindā, upālambhaḥ, pratyupālambhaḥ, manojugupsā, mānānuśayaḥ, mānayogyā, mānānuyoga iti | teṣu —
1. nayananimīlanaṃ yathā—
daïāloapaattā aṃtocchīṇa pasaraṃta-vāha-vialiā |
maülaï-aṃbua-pasarā tīse dasaṇasuhaṃ ṇa pāvaï diṭhṭhī || 367 ||
(dayitālokapravṛttā 'vyucchinna—prasarad—bāṣpavikalitā |
mukulitā 'mbuja—prasarā tasyā darśanasukhaṃ na prāp‍noti dṛṣ‍ṭiḥ ||)
2. mukhaprasādo yathā—
āloie c‍cia pie ṭhavio tīe maaṇeṇa mohaṇasuhao |
kusumadhaṇummi bāṇo valaïavibbhamaüṇe muhammi pahariso || 368 ||
(ālokita eva priye sthāpitaḥ tasyā madanena mohanasubhagaḥ |
kusumānamita—dhanuṣi bāṇo valayitavibhramaguṇe mukhe praharṣaḥ ||)
3. bāṣpamokṣo yathā—(amaru. 50)
aṅganāmatitānavaṃ kuta idaṃ kampaśca kasmāt kuto mugdhe pāṇḍukapolamānanamiti prāṇeśvare pṛcchati |
tanvyā sarvamidaṃ svabhāvajamiti vyāhṛtya pakṣmāntara— vyāpī bāṣpabharastayā calitayā niḥśvasya mukto 'nyataḥ || 369 ||
4. pulakodbhedo yathā—(kirātā. 9.46)
śaṅkitāya kṛtabāṣpanipātāmīrṣyayā vimukhitāṃ dayitāya |
māninīmabhimukhasthitacittāṃ śaṃsati sma ghanaromavibhedaḥ || 370 ||
5. doṣapratibhedo yathā—(gāsa. 3.1)
acchaü tā aṇṇajaṇo hiaaṃ cia appaṇo tuha pamāṇaṃ |
taha taṃsi maṃdaṇeho jaha ṇa uvālaṃbhajoggo si || 371 ||
(āstāṃ tāvad anyajano hṛdayamevātmanaḥ tava pramāṇam |
tathā tvamasi mandas‍neho yathā nopālambhayogyo 'si ||)
6. aprakramanindā yathā—(gāsa. 7.17)
kiṃ bhaṇaha maṃ sahīo karehi māṇaṃti kiṃttha māṇeṇa |
sabhāvabāhire tammi majjha māṇeṇa vi ṇa kajjaṃ || 372 ||
(kiṃ bhaṇatha mā sakhyaḥ kuru mānamiti kimatra mānena |
svabhāvabāhye tasmin mama mānenāpi na kāryam ||)
7. upālambho yathā—(amaru.)
sakhi sa subhago mandas‍neho mayīti na me vyathā vidhiviracitaṃ yasmāt sarvo janassukhamaś‍nute |
mama tu manasassantāpo 'yaṃ jane vimukhe 'pi yat kṣaṇamapi hatavrīḍaṃ ceto na yāti virāgitām || 373 ||
8. pratyupālambho yathā—
mānonnatetyasahanetyatipaṇḍiteti mayyeva dhikkṛtiranekamukhī sakhīnām |
dākṣiṇyamātramasṛṇena viceṣ‍ṭitena dhūrtasya tasya hi guṇānupavarṇayanti || 374 ||
9. manojugupsā yathā—
ṇa vi teṇa tahā taviā jaha imiṇā māmi daḍ‍ḍhahiaeṇa | bahu ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tiṃ kuṇaṃteṇa || 375 ||
(nāpi tena tathā tāpitā tathā 'nena māmi dagdhahṛdayena |
bahu ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ nti kurvatā ||)
10. mānānuśayo yathā—
yaḥ sakhi mānānuśayodayastena bhavatu pāpena |
॰ ॰ ॰ tī bhavituṃ kalaprāṇaiḥ krīṇāni bhaiṣajyam || 376 ||
11. mānayogyā yathā—(kāvyāda. 2.246)
mānayogyāṃ karomīti priyasthāne sthitāṃ sakhīm |
bālā bhrūbhaṅgajihmākṣī paśyati sphuritādharā || 377 ||
12. mānānuyogo yathā—(gāsa. 898ve.)
alliaï diṭṭhiṇibbhacchio vi vihuo vi laggae siae |
pahao vi cumbaï balā alajjae kaha ṇu kuppissaṃ || 378 ||
(ālīyate dṛṣ‍ṭinirbhartsito 'pi vidhuto 'pi lagati sicaye |
prahato 'pi cumbati balādalajjakāya kathaṃ nu kopiṣyāmi ||)
(23. mānabhaṅgopādhayaḥ —12)
atha mānabhaṅgopādhayaḥ | te ca nidrā, madaḥ, trāsaḥ, bhayam, ajñānam, prasaṅgaḥ, pramādaḥ, deśaḥ, kālaḥ, kāryam, pātram, sup‍tamityādayo bhavanti | teṣu—
1. nidropadhānaṃ yathā—
praṇayiṣu purā mithyāmānī na cāṭuśatairapi praṇayamabhajanyassaubhāgyagrahāttaruṇījanaḥ |
svayamanunaye hūṇasteṣāmihānuśayādayaṃ nayati vivaśo nidrāṃ dūtye mṛṣāpraṇayāmapi || 379 ||
2. madopadhānaṃ yathā—
agahiadaïāṇuṇao pacchā aṇuṇei aṇuṇasaāvisaṃvalio |
kaïavaṇirūviamao vi kaïavamaaṇaümmūlio juvajaïjaṇo || 380 ||
(agṛhītadayitānunayaḥ paś‍cāt anunayati anuśayavisaṃvalitaḥ |
kaitava—nirūpita—mado niṣkaitavamadanonmūlito yuvatijanaḥ ||)
3. trāsopadhānaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.46)
bhayādivāśliṣya ruṣāhate 'mbhasi priyaṃ mudānandayati sma māninī |
akṛtrimapremarasāhitairmano haranti rāmāḥ kṛtakairapīhitaiḥ || 381 ||
4. bhayopadhānaṃ yathā—(kirātā. 8.48)
karau dhunānā navapallavākṛtī payasyagādhe kila jātasambhramā |
sakhīṣu nirvācyamadhārṣṭayadūṣitaṃ priyāṅgasaṃśleṣamavāpa māninī || 382 ||
4. ajñānopadhānaṃ yathā—(amaru. 75)
kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaṃ prakalpitamadrutam |
asahanasakhīśrotraprāp‍tipramādasasambhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucch‌vasitaṃ punaḥ || 383 ||
6. prasaṅgopadhānaṃ yathā—
māṇo vā 'māṇo c‍cia māṇaṃ bāreha gharabbhāraṃ |
pecchāmutāva kaïā kaāvarāho samalliaï || 384 ||
7. pramādopadhānaṃ yathā—(saka. 5.322)
thoārūḍhamahumaā khaṇapamhaṭṭhāvarāhadiṇṇullāvā |
hasiūṇa saṃṭhavijjaï pieṇa saṃbharialajjiā kāvi piā || 385 ||
(stokārūḍhamadhumadā kṣaṇaprabhraṣ‍ṭāparādhadattollāpā |
hasitvā saṃjñāpyate priyeṇa saṃsmṛtā lajjitā kāpi priyā ||)
8. deśopadhānaṃ yathā—
ajjaṃ vaheṇa kahaāhatthābha tthivva uvaṇiātassa |
majjaṇiā mūlālaggathoacchāhiṃ kuṇaṃteṇa || 386 ||
9. kālopadhānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 899ve.)
himacuṇṇajoahatthāo jassa dappaṃ kuṇaṃti rāīo |
kaha tass piassa mae tīraï māṇo halā kāuṃ || 387 ||
(himacūrṇayogahastā yasya darpaṃ kurvanti rātrayaḥ |
kathaṃ tasya priyasya mayā śakyate mānaḥ sakhyaḥ kartum ||)
10. kāryopadhānaṃ yathā—
cuṃbasu sahassahuttaṃ muhamiṇamo hāriaṃ mae jue |
māṇo uṇa muc‍caï sāmalaṃ kaha māṇaïttīe || 388 ||
(cumba sahasrakṛtvo mukhamidaṃ hāritaṃ mayā dyūte |
mānaḥ punarmucyate śyāmalāṅgi kathaṃ mānamuk‍tāyāḥ ||)
11. pātropadhānaṃ yathā—
sahi pāesu chivaṃti viovvakivelavesumaṃsuaïṃ |
ehiṇuvajjasu pāsepāiamuhiāviṇaṃ muṇiomo || 389 ||
12. sup‍topadhānaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 4.68)
bharimo se saaṇaparammuhīe vialaṃtamāṇapasarāe |
kaïavasuttavvattaṇatthaṇabharuppellaṇasuhelliṃ || 390 ||
(smarāmastasyāḥ śayanaparāṅ‌mukhyā vigalanmānaprasarāyāḥ |
kaitava—sup‍todvartana—stanabharotpreraṇa—sukha—kelim ||)
(24. mānānubhāvasaukhyāni—12)
atha mānānubhāvasaukhyāni | teṣu pādapatanaṃ, prasahyāśleṣaḥ, haṭhakacagrahaḥ, cumbanabalātkāraḥ, priyapraṇayoktiḥ, upālambhasūktiḥ, s‍nehaparīkṣā, vipakṣābhibhavaḥ, sakhīślāghā, bandhubahumānaḥ, lābhaviśeṣaḥ, śṛṅgāravṛddhiriti | tatra —
1. pādapatanaṃ yathā—(gāsa. 893ve.)
paṇamaha māṇassa/maaṇassa halā calaṇe kiṃ devaehi aṇṇehiṃ |
jassa pasāeṇa pio lolaï pāaṃtapāsesu || 312 ||
(praṇamata mānasya/madanasya sakhyaścaraṇau kiṃ daivatairanyaiḥ |
yasya prasādena priyaḥ lolati pādāntapārśveṣu ||)
2. prasahyāśleṣo yathā—(gāsa. 929ve.)
kajjaṃ viṇā vi kaamāṇaḍaṃbarā pulaabhiṇṇasavvaṃgī |
ujjalāliṃgaṇa-sokkha-lālasā putti muṇiāsi || 392 ||
(kāryaṃ vināpi kṛtamānaḍambarā pulakajīrṇasarvāṅgī |
ujjvalāliṅganasaukhyalālasā putri! jñātāsi ||)
3. haṭhakacagraho yathā—
unnamayya sakacagrahamāsyaṃ cumbati priyatame haṭhavṛttyā |
huṃhu muñca ma ma meti ca mandaṃ jalpitaṃ jayati mānavatīnām || 393 ||
4. cumbanabalātkāro yathā—(gāsa. 5.35)
pāapaḍaṇāṇa muddhe rabhasabalāmoḍicuṃbiavvāṇaṃ |
daṃsaṇamettapasajjiri cukkāsi suhāṇaṃ bahuāṇa || 394 ||
(pādapatanānāṃ mugdhe! rabhasabalātkāracumbitavyānām |
darśanamātraprasannaśīle cyutāsi sukhānāṃ bahukānāṃ ||)
5. priyapraṇayoktiryathā—
śvāsotkampitakampi ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ |
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ tvayi || 395 || (?)
6. upālambhoktiryathā—
aparikkhia dosaguṇaṃ avamaṇṇaa cirapparūḍhavīsambharasaṃ |
avahīriāṇurāaṃ tume vi maha rūsiuṃ jaṇeṇa vi khiṇṇaṃ || 396 ||
(aparīkṣya doṣaguṇaṃ avamatya ciraprarūḍhavisrambharasam |
avadhīryānudūtaṃ tvamapi mahyaṃ ruṣ‍ṭvā janena na vidīrṇam ||)
7. s‍nehaparīkṣā yathā—(gāsa. 927ve.)
paḍipakkhassa vi purao samuhaṃ bhaṇiā si teṇa pasia tti |
avalaṃbiassa māṇiṇi māṇassa vi kiṃ phalaṃ aṇṇaṃ || 397 ||
(pratipakṣasyāpi purataḥ sammukhaṃ bhaṇitāsi tena prasīdeti |
avalambitasya mānini! mānasyāpi kiṃ phalamanyat ||)
8. vipakṣābhibhavo yathā—(harivi.)
tīe savisesadūmiasavattihiaāeṁ ṇivvalaṃta—siṇehaṃ |
piagaruiāa ṇimiaṃ sohaggaguṇāṇa aggabhūmīeṁ paaṃ || 398 ||
(tayā saviśeṣadūnasapat‍nīhṛdayayā nirbalas‍neham |
priyagurūkṛtayā nyastaṃ saubhāgyaguṇānāmagrabhūmau padam ||)
9. sakhīślāghā yathā—
kṣutaiḥ k‍vāpi prītiḥ k‍vacidapi nimittaiḥ pulakitā (k‍vacinmithyāvādaira)mitaparitāpo vikasitaḥ |
prasādārthaṃ mugdhe tava vigatalajjo 'nṛtaśate— ṣvabhijño daivajñaṃ janamapi ca te pṛcchati patiḥ || 399 ||
10. bandhubahumāno yathā—(sūmu. 205)
cakṣurlup‍tamaṣīkaṇaṃ kabalitastāmbūlarāgo 'dhare viśrāntā kabarī kapolaphalake lup‍teva gātradyutiḥ |
manye mānini! sāmprataṃ praṇayinā kairapyupāyakramai— rbhag‍no mānatarustathāpi phalitaścetasthalīvardhitaḥ || 400 ||
11. lābhaviśeṣo yathā—(harivi.)
dāra-ṭṭhavia-sura-dumaṃ taṃ cia kusumovaāragghaviaṃ |
aṇṇaṃ ca sac‍cavijjaï pariosa-paritta-pariaṇaṃ tīeĕ gharaṃ || 401 ||
(dvārasthāpitasuradrumaṃ tadeva kusumopahārārghitam |
anyac‍ca saṃvīkṣyate paritoṣaparītaparijanaṃ tasyā gṛham ||)
12. śṛṅgāravṛddhiryathā—
paṇaaparipūraṇeṇa aviraabhūsiapiaamāgameṇa a garuo |
pasaraï laddhatthāmo aṇṇaṇṇarasaṃtarehiṃ tīe pahariso || 402 ||
(praṇayaparipūraṇenāviratabhūṣita—priyatamānamena ca gurukaḥ |
prasarati labdhasthāmā 'nyānyarasāntaraistasyāḥ praharṣaḥ ||)
evamete trayo mānāsrayaśca tadupādhayaḥ |
jātayaśca viśeṣāśca prakīrṇānāṃ ca bhaktayaḥ || 403 ||
avasthāvaikṛtopāyamiṣajjitavibhaktikaiḥ |
karma sānunayaiḥ ṣọdhā nāyakasya samāsataḥ || 404 ||
nāyikāyāśca maryādāprakramapratibhedanaiḥ |
priyapriyavayasyānāmupālambhairvimarśanaiḥ || 405 ||
sakhīdūtyoḥ samāśvāsaiḥ parihāsaiḥ pravartanaiḥ |
nivartanaiḥ sakāntopajāpaiḥ skhalitagopanaiḥ || 406 ||
samāsenaiva ṣọdhaiva pṛthakpṛthagudīritam |
karmaitad vyāsato 'pyuktaprakāreṇaiva gamyatām || 407 ||
atha janmādibhiḥ ṣaḍ‌bhirvikāraireṣa bhidyate |
māno 'g‍niriva dhūmārci ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ || 408 ||
॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ bho lokoṣ‍ṭabhasmabhiḥ |
tatra mānanimittāni mānasyoddīpanāni ca || 409 ||
mānotpattiprakīrṇāni mānasaukhyānubhūtayaḥ |
mānaliṅgani mānopalakṣaṇasthānakādi ṣaṭ || 410 ||
mānavakroktivinyāsā mānamoṭṭāyitāni ca |
mānopaśamacihnāni mānāpagamahetavaḥ || 411 ||
upādhibhaṅgā mānasya mānabhaṅgasya bhaktayaḥ |
mānabhaṅgopadhānāni mānānubhavasammatāḥ || 412 ||
uktāḥ saṃkṣepataḥ prājñairanuktamanumīyatām |
manuṣyavacasā ke 'sya prakārān vak‍tumīśate ||
kṣamante mātumambhodherāpaḥ ke 'ñjalinā janāḥ || 413 ||
paraśśatavikalpavāniti sa eṣa mānasridhā mayaiṇanayanāmanaḥ—paramabāndhavo varṇitaḥ |
athādhvagavilāsinīmukhasarojasandhyātamaḥ— pravāsa upavarṇyate ratisamudracandrodayaḥ || 414 ||
iti śrīmahārājādhirājaśrībhojadevaviracite śṛṅgāraprakāśe mānaprakāśo nāma
|| triṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ samāp‍taḥ || 30||
manuṣyahṛdayāmbudhau bahalabhaṅgasaṅega kaviḥ ka ekaśa udāharedapi sahasraśīrṣāyitaḥ |
nṛpastadiha sūkṣmaśo yadidamuc‍cakairvyāhara— tyasāvadhikavistaraṃ viṣayametamanyo hyasau ||
atha
śrṛṅgāraprakāśe ekatriṃśaḥ prakāśaḥ
pravāsavarṇanaprakāśaḥ
athāto 'vasaraprāp‍taṃ pravāsamupavarṇayiṣyāmaḥ| tatra prathamānurāgādīnāṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvo vicitraḥ, paraḥ paro rāgavardhana iti vimarśe vicitratayā prathamānurāgādīnāṃ prathama— mabhidhānaṃ, rāgavardhanatvena mānādīnāmanantarasiti, mānānantaraṃ pravāso 'bhidhīyate |
kathaṃ punaḥ rāgavardhanād vicitrasya prāthamyam?
taducyate— rāgavṛddheḥ vaicitryasyāvadhātumaśakyatvāt| rāgāndho hi vaicitryamavaicitryaṃ vā nāvadhātuṃ śaknoti| yathocyate—(kāmasūtre 2.2)
śāsrāṇāṃ viṣayastāvad yāvanmandarasā narāḥ |
raticakre pravṛtte tu nāsti śāsraṃ na ca kramaḥ || 1 ||
rāgavṛddhihetutvād vaicitryasya hetuḥ prathamaṃ phalamanantaraṃ syāditi | taduktaṃ—
taistairupāyairaucityād vaicitryasya prayojitaiḥ |
yunāṃ sneho 'bhimānaśca rāgayogaśca jāyate || 2 ||
bhavatu nāma rāgavardhanatayā prathamaṃ vicitratā| vicitrāṇāṃ tu kiṃkṛtaṃ mithaḥprāthamyam? rāgavardhanānāṃ vā kutastyamānantaryamiti |
atrocyate— prāgasaṅgatayoḥ saṅgataviyuktayośca mānapravāsakaruṇavipralambhāḥ| prathamānurāgastu prāgasaṅgatayorevetyataḥ sa prathamamevābhidhīyate| karuṇāttu karuṇo 'nantara eva jāte mānapravāsayorasambhava eva| nahi tathāvidhebhyaḥ saṃvidhānakebhyaḥ tathāvidhāyāma— kṛtrimāyāṃ rāgavṛddhau samupajāte niṣkaitave prakṛṣ‍ṭe ca vibhramajānurāge mānapravāsayoravakāśaḥ syāt| tathātve vā nai . . . . yoranya . .|| uktaṃ ca—
kaïavarahiaṃ pemmaṃ ṇatthi cia māmi māṇuse loe |
aha hoi kassa viraho virahe hottammi ko jiaï || 3 ||
(kaitavarahitaṃ prema nāstyeva mātulāni mānuṣe loke |
atha bhavati kasya viraho bhavati virahe kasko jīvati ||)gāsa. 2.24
(rasakramaḥ)
ato 'paścimameva karuṇavipralambhasya karuṇānantarasambhogasya vā abhidhānaṃ bhavitumarhati| mānapravāsayostu pravāsānmāno vicitrasta ... vikāsāt mā .. vicitraḥ| tatra cetassaṅkocāt| prathamānurāge hi rāgiṇaścittaṃ vikṣipyate; māne vikasati; pravāse saṅkucati; karuṇe saṅikṣapyata iti pūrvācāryavādaḥ| kathaṃ sa upapadyata iti cet — tathāvidhaprathamānurāganimittasya sannidhānāt| yathā hi cumbaka—bhrāmaka—karṣaka— drāvakai—rayasaste te vikārāḥ cumbana—bhramaṇa—karṣaṇa—dravāhvayā jāyante; tathā prathamānurāgamānapravāsakaruṇavipralambhasannidhermanaso vikṣepa—vikāsa—saṅkoca—saṅkṣepā iti| yathā vā japāsūryacandrakarpūrasannidheḥ sphaṭikāśmano 'nekaprakṛterekarūpasyānurāga— jvalana—syandana—sphuṭanā—(ni jāyante) tāthā| vikṣepavikāsasaṅkocasaṅkṣepādhiṣ‍ṭhitasya viprayogicetasaḥ prathamānurāgamānapravāsakaruṇavipralambhānubhāvā iti| etena prathamānurāgādīnāṃ rāgavardhantave tāratamyamapi parasparamānantaryaheturvyākhyātam| uttarottaramupacīyamānaprīyiyogaṃ hi priyopacāraṃ caturakāmino manobhava ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ॰ ṇitavyahetuṃ manya/va| tasmānmānādanantaraḥ karuṇātprathamaḥ pravāsa evābhidhānavyo bhavati |
(pravāsaḥ)
kaḥ punarayaṃ pravāso nāma, yasyaite dayitajātayo narma(nāma?)mdash; śravaṇasaṅkīrtanādibhyo bibhyatīti|
ucyate— satyanurāge parasparaṃ daivādijanitadeśāntaravyavadhānaṃ pravāsaḥ| sa
daivāpatra uttamaḥ |
dharmāpatro madhyamaḥ |
arthāpatraḥ kaniṣ‍ṭhaḥ| teṣu—
daivāpanno yathā—(māmā. 9.8)
na yatra pratyāśāmanupatati no vā rahayati pravikṣip‍taṃ cetaḥ praviśati ca mohāndhatamasam |
akiñcitkurvāṇāḥ paśava iva tasyāṃ vayamaho vidhāturvāmatvād vipadi parivartāmaha ime || 4 ||
dharmāpatanno yathā—(kādambarīkathāsāre 5.107)
jānāmyātmāni te prasādamasamaṃ ceto mamaitat padaṃ dātuṃ necchati kintu śāsanamidaṃ nollaṅghanīyaṃ guroḥ |
manyussamprati sahyatāṃ punarihāgantāsmi kādambarīṃ sandiśyeti sabāṣpagadgadamasau keyūrakaṃ prāhiṇot || 5 ||
arthāpanno yathā—
yā vimboṣ‍ṭharucirna vidrumamaṇiḥ svapne 'pi tāṃ labdhavān hāsaśrīḥ sudṛśastapobhirapi kiṃ muktāphalaiḥ prāpyate |
tatkāntiḥ śataśo 'pi vahripatanairhomnaḥ kathaṃ setsyati tyaktvā rat‍namayīṃ prayāsi dayitāṃ kasmai dhanāyādhvaga! || 6 ||
athaiṣa trividho 'pi sāmānyato viśeṣataśca prapañcyamānaḥ prāyaśo dvipañcāśatprakāraḥ prathate| tatra—
(sāmānyato —24)
sāmānyato bhūtapūrvaḥ, abhūtapūrvaḥ, sādhāraṇaḥ, asādhāraṇaḥ, sahajarāgaḥ, visrabdharāgaḥ, prāp‍tasamayaḥ, aprāp‍tasamayaḥ, sa—pratividhānaḥ, niṣpratividhānaḥ, sannikṛṣ‍ṭaḥ, viprakṛṣ‍ṭaḥ, sāvadhiḥ, niravadhiḥ, alpakālaḥ, dīrghakālaḥ, sānubandhaḥ (saṃsṛṣ‍ṭaḥ), niranubandhaḥ(asaṃsṛṣ‍ṭaḥ), prakāśakāryaḥ, pracchannakāryaḥ, sopasaṃhāraḥ, nirupasaṃhāraḥ, nāyikānimittaḥ, nāyakanimitta iti prakārāś‍caturviṃśatiḥ |
(viśeṣataḥ —28)
daivāpannaścaturdhā — śāpakṛtaḥ, pāpakṛtaḥ, sambhramakṛtaḥ, vibhramakṛta iti | evaṃ
dharmāpanno 'pi — sābhiprāyaḥ, nirabhiprāyaḥ, sānutāpaḥ, niranutāpa iti |
arthāpanno 'pi — sābhyanujñaḥ, nirabhyanujñaḥ, sopadhānaḥ, nirupadhāna iti |
daivadharmāpannaḥ — prakṛtisthaḥ, komalaḥ, kaṭhoraḥ, pariṇata iti |
daivārthāpanno 'pi — grāmyaḥ, nāgaraḥ, upanāgaraḥ, viprakīrṇa iti |
dharmārthāpanno 'pi — hitaḥ, ahitaḥ, sukhaḥ, duḥkha iti |
daivadharmārthāpanno 'pi — vṛttaḥ, āyataḥ, tryasraḥ, caturasraśceti ||
arthāścānvarthato bhūtapūrvādīnāmudīritāḥ |
ṣaṭ‍‌triṃśataḥ pravāsānāṃ ṣoḍaśānāṃ tu kathyate || 7 ||
yasminviyoginoḥ karma svasthayoriva jāyate |
anurāgātirekā 'pi prakṛtisthaḥ sa ucyate || 8 ||
yūnoryannopajāyante manomārdavasūcakāḥ |
aśrupātādayaḥ śaśvadanubhāvāḥ sukomalāḥ || 9 ||
yatra daivādijanitaṃ sādhyamekasya dṛśyate |
viyogakāraṇaṃ so 'smin kaṭhora iti kathyate || 10 ||
pūrvaṃ kaṭhoro bhūtvā yaḥ komalatvaṃ prapadyate |
śāpādihetuvigamāt jñeyaḥ pariṇatastu saḥ || 11 ||
te 'mī dharmānurodhāya daivayogāc‍ca tad‍‌vatām |
āvardhante tato daivadharmāpannā iti smṛtāḥ || 12 ||
viyogakāraṇaṃ yatra vrīḍāhetuḥ prajāyate |
arthabhraṃśādinā yūnāṃ sa grāmya iha gīyate || 13 ||
yatrānyatrānuraktasya priyasya priyakāmyayā |
kayācit kriyate sevā nāgaraḥ so 'bhidhīyate || 14 ||
nimittakupitāyā yo yoṣitaḥ priyakāraṇāt |
puruṣeṇa pravartyeta jñeyaḥ sa upanāgaraḥ || 15 ||
yatrānyayoṣid‌vyāsaṅge patyurāpatite sriyāḥ |
bhavedarthānavāp‍tyārtiḥ sa prakīrṇaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 16 ||
ete cārthānubandhāc‍ca daivāc‍ca samupasthitāḥ |
daivārthāpannasaṃjñatvaṃ prayānti budhasaṃsadi || 17 ||
yatrāyatyāṃ hi tad bharturabhisandhāya bhāminī |
pravartate viyogāya hitaḥ sa parikīrtyate || 18 ||
yatrārthagauravād yātaḥ pravāsī na nivartyate |
vipadyate 'pi vā yoṣidahitaḥ sa nigadyate || 19 ||
yatrārtho labhyate 'bhīṣ‍ṭaḥ priyābhīṣ‍ṭaṃ ca sid‌dhyati |
na cānartho bhavet kaścit sukhaḥ sa upavarṇyate || 20 ||
pravāsino mahad duḥkhaṃ yatprabhāveṇa jāyate |
lag‍nadoṣādijanitaṃ sa duḥkha iti śasyate || 21 ||
dharmārthāvanurudhyete catvāro 'pi pravartitāḥ |
dharmārthāpannasaṃjñāyāssthānaṃ bhavitumīśate || 22 ||
yatrobhayorbhavedicchā kriyā ca virahaṃ prati |
sarvas‍nehāśri lopāt sa pravāso vṛtta ucyate || 23 ||
yatraikatra kriyecchā ca dvitīye tad‌viparyayaḥ |
premṇaḥ koṭidvayabhreṣāt sa vṛttāyata iṣyate || 24 ||
yatraikasya kriyā necchā dvitīyasya dvayaṃ na tat |
sa premakāśrivibhraṃśāt tryaśra ityeva kathyate || 24 ||
icchā yatrobhayo rnāsti yatrobhayoḥ kriyā |
so 'naṣ‍ṭasarvapremāśri caturasro 'bhidhīyate || 26 ||
daivādarthāc‍ca dharmāc‍ca catvāro 'mī samutthitāḥ |
labhante daivadharmārthāpannasaṃjñāṃ vivek‍tṛṣu || 27 ||
(sāmānyata pravāsaḥ —24)
tatra sāmānyabhedeṣu,
1. bhūtapūrvo yathā—(gāsa. 3.73)
avvo dukkaraāraa puṇo vi taṃtiṃ karesi gamaṇassa |
ajja vi ṇa hoṃti saralā veṇīe taraṃgiṇo ciurā || 28 ||
(avvo duṣkarakāraka punarapi cintāṃ karoṣi gamanasya |
adyāpi na bhavanti saralā veṇyāḥ taraṅgiṇaḥ cikurāḥ ||)
2. abhūtapūrvo yathā—(gāsa. 5.53)
sahi sāhasu sabbhāveṇa pucchimo kiṃ asesamahilāṇaṁ |
vaḍ‍ḍhaṃti karaṭṭhiā c‍cia valaā dahae paütthammi || 29 ||
(sakhi kathaya sadbhāvena pṛcchāmaḥ kimaśeṣamahilānām |
vardhante karasthitā eva valayā dayite proṣite ||)
